lord spake moses mount sinai saying
speak children israel say ye come land give you then keep sabbath lord
six years thou shalt sow thy field prune vineyard gather fruit thereof
seventh year sabbath rest land lord thou shalt neither sow thy field nor prune vineyard
groweth its own accord thy harvest thou shalt reap neither gather grapes vine undressed year rest land
sabbath land meat you thee thy servant maid hired stranger sojourneth
thy cattle beast land increase thereof meat
thou shalt number seven sabbaths years thee times space forty nine
then shalt thou cause trumpet jubile sound on tenth day seventh month atonement ye make throughout your land
ye hallow fiftieth year proclaim liberty throughout land inhabitants thereof jubile you return every man possession family
jubile fiftieth year you ye sow neither reap groweth itself nor gather grapes thy vine undressed
jubile holy you ye eat increase thereof out field
year jubile ye return every man possession
if thou sell ought thy neighbour or buyest neighbour's hand ye oppress one another
according number years after jubile thou shalt buy thy neighbour fruits sell thee
according multitude years thou shalt increase price thereof fewness diminish number fruits doth sell thee
ye therefore oppress one another thou shalt fear thy god am lord your
wherefore ye do statutes keep judgments dwell land safety
land yield her fruit ye eat your fill dwell therein safety
if ye say what we eat seventh year behold sow nor gather our increase
then command blessing upon you sixth year bring forth fruit three years
ye sow eighth year eat yet old fruit until ninth her fruits come store
land sold ever mine ye strangers sojourners
land your possession ye grant redemption
if thy brother waxen poor hath sold away some possession any kin come redeem then
if man none redeem himself able
then let count years sale thereof restore overplus man whom sold may return possession
if able restore then sold remain hand hath bought until year jubile go out return possession
if man sell dwelling house walled city then may redeem within whole year after sold full
if redeemed within space full year then house walled city established ever bought throughout generations go out jubile
houses villages no wall round about counted fields country may redeemed go out jubile
notwithstanding cities levites houses possession may redeem at any time
if man purchase levites then house sold city possession go out year jubile houses cities among children israel
field suburbs cities may sold perpetual possession
if thy brother waxen poor fallen decay thee then thou shalt relieve yea though stranger or sojourner may live
take thou no usury or increase fear thy god brother may live thee
thou shalt give thy money upon usury nor lend victuals increase
am lord your god brought you forth out land egypt give canaan
if thy brother dwelleth by thee waxen poor sold thou shalt compel serve bondservant
hired servant sojourner thee serve year jubile
then depart thee both children return own family possession fathers
servants brought forth out land egypt sold bondmen
thou shalt rule over rigour fear thy god
both thy bondmen bondmaids thou shalt heathen round about you ye buy
moreover children strangers do sojourn among you ye buy families begat your land possession
ye take inheritance your children after you inherit possession bondmen ever over brethren israel rule one another rigour
if sojourner or stranger wax rich by thee thy brother dwelleth poor sell himself stock stranger's family
after sold may redeemed again one brethren redeem
either uncle or uncle's son may redeem any nigh kin family if able himself
reckon bought year sold jubile price sale according number years time hired servant
if there yet many years behind according give again price redemption out money bought
if there remain few years year jubile then count according give again price redemption
yearly hired servant other rule rigour over thy sight
if redeemed these years then go out year jubile both children
children israel servants whom brought forth out land egypt am lord your god
ye make you no idols nor graven image neither rear standing set any stone your land bow down am lord god
ye keep sabbaths reverence sanctuary am lord
if ye walk statutes keep commandments do
then give you rain due season land yield her increase trees field fruit
your threshing reach vintage sowing time ye eat bread full dwell land safely
give peace land ye lie down none make you afraid rid evil beasts out neither sword go through your
ye chase your enemies fall before you by sword
five you chase hundred put ten thousand flight your enemies fall before by sword
respect you make fruitful multiply establish covenant
ye eat old store bring forth because new
set tabernacle among you soul abhor
walk among you your god ye people
am lord your god brought you forth out land egypt ye should bondmen broken bands yoke made go upright
if ye hearken do these commandments
if ye despise statutes or your soul abhor judgments so do commandments break covenant
also do you even appoint over terror consumption burning ague consume eyes cause sorrow heart ye sow your seed vain enemies eat
set face against you ye slain before your enemies hate reign over flee none pursueth
if ye yet hearken then punish you seven times more your sins
break pride your power make heaven iron earth brass
your strength spent vain land yield her increase neither trees fruits
if ye walk contrary hearken bring seven times more plagues upon you according your sins
also send wild beasts among you rob your children destroy cattle make few number high ways desolate
if ye reformed by these things walk contrary
then also walk contrary you punish yet seven times your sins
bring sword upon you avenge quarrel covenant ye gathered together within your cities send pestilence among delivered hand enemy
broken staff your bread ten women bake one oven deliver you again by weight ye eat satisfied
if ye hearken walk contrary
then walk contrary you also fury even chastise seven times your sins
ye eat flesh your sons daughters
destroy your high places cut down images cast carcases upon idols soul abhor you
make your cities waste bring sanctuaries desolation smell savour sweet odours
bring land desolation your enemies dwell therein astonished at
scatter you among heathen draw out sword after your land desolate cities waste
then land enjoy her sabbaths long lieth desolate ye your enemies' even rest
long lieth desolate rest because did your sabbaths ye dwelt upon
upon left alive you send faintness hearts lands enemies sound shaken leaf chase flee fleeing sword fall none pursueth
fall one upon another before sword none pursueth ye no power stand your enemies
ye perish among heathen land your enemies eat you
left you pine away iniquity your enemies' lands also iniquities fathers
if confess iniquity fathers trespass trespassed against also walked contrary
also walked contrary brought land enemies if then uncircumcised hearts humbled accept punishment iniquity
then remember covenant jacob also isaac abraham land
land also left enjoy her sabbaths while she lieth desolate without accept punishment iniquity because even despised judgments soul abhorred statutes
yet land enemies cast away neither abhor destroy utterly break covenant am lord god
sakes remember covenant ancestors whom brought forth out land egypt sight heathen might god am lord
these statutes judgments laws lord made between children israel mount sinai by hand moses
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel say man make singular vow persons lord by thy estimation
thy estimation male twenty years old even sixty fifty shekels silver after shekel sanctuary
if female then thy estimation thirty shekels
if five years old even twenty then thy estimation male shekels female ten
if month old even five years then thy estimation male shekels silver female three
if sixty years old above male then thy estimation fifteen shekels female ten
if poorer than thy estimation then present himself before priest value according ability vowed
if beast whereof men bring offering lord any man giveth such holy
alter nor change good bad or if at beast then exchange thereof holy
if any unclean beast do offer sacrifice lord then present before priest
priest value whether good or bad thou valuest who art so
if at redeem then add fifth part thereof thy estimation
man sanctify house holy lord then priest estimate whether good or bad so stand
if sanctified redeem house then add fifth part money thy estimation
if man sanctify lord some part field possession then thy estimation according seed thereof homer barley valued at fifty shekels silver
if sanctify field year jubile according thy estimation stand
if sanctify field after jubile then priest reckon money according years remain even year abated thy estimation
if sanctified field any wise redeem then add fifth part money thy estimation assured
if redeem field or sold another man redeemed any more
field goeth out jubile holy lord devoted possession thereof priest's
if man sanctify lord field hath bought fields possession
then priest reckon worth thy estimation even year jubile give thine day holy thing lord
year jubile field return whom bought even possession land did belong
thy estimations according shekel sanctuary twenty gerahs
only firstling beasts should lord's no man sanctify whether ox or sheep
if unclean beast then redeem according thine estimation add fifth part thereto or redeemed sold thy
notwithstanding no devoted thing man devote lord hath both beast field possession sold or redeemed every most holy
none devoted men redeemed surely put death
tithe land whether seed or fruit tree lord's holy lord
if man at redeem ought tithes add thereto fifth part thereof
concerning tithe herd or flock even whatsoever passeth under rod tenth holy lord
search whether good or bad neither change if at then both thereof holy redeemed

lord spake moses saying
command children israel put out camp every leper one hath issue whosoever defiled by dead
both male female ye put out without camp defile camps midst whereof dwell
children israel did so put out without camp lord spake moses
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel man or woman commit any sin men do trespass against lord person guilty
then confess sin done recompense trespass principal thereof add fifth part give against whom hath trespassed
if man no kinsman recompense trespass let recompensed lord even priest beside ram atonement whereby made
every offering holy things children israel bring priest
every man's hallowed things whatsoever any man giveth priest
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel say if any man's wife go aside commit trespass against
man lie her carnally hid eyes husband kept close she defiled there no witness against neither taken manner
spirit jealousy come upon jealous wife she defiled or if
then man bring wife priest her offering tenth part ephah barley meal pour no oil upon nor put frankincense thereon jealousy memorial bringing iniquity remembrance
priest bring her near set before lord
priest take holy water earthen vessel dust floor tabernacle put
priest set woman before lord uncover woman's head put offering memorial her hands jealousy hand bitter water causeth curse
priest charge her by oath say woman if no man lain thee thou hast gone aside uncleanness another instead thy husband free bitter water causeth curse
if thou hast gone aside another instead thy husband defiled some man lain thee beside thine
then priest charge woman oath cursing say lord make thee curse among thy people doth thigh rot belly swell
water causeth curse go thy bowels make belly swell thigh rot woman say amen
priest write these curses book blot out bitter water
cause woman drink bitter water causeth curse enter her become
then priest take jealousy offering out woman's hand wave before lord offer upon altar
priest take handful offering even memorial thereof burn upon altar afterward cause woman drink water
hath made her drink water then come pass if she defiled done trespass against husband causeth curse enter become bitter belly swell thigh rot woman among people
if woman defiled clean then she free conceive seed
law jealousies wife goeth aside another instead her husband defiled
or spirit jealousy cometh upon jealous over wife set woman before lord priest execute her law
then man guiltless iniquity woman bear her
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel say either man or woman separate themselves vow nazarite lord
separate himself wine strong drink no vinegar or neither any liquor grapes nor eat moist dried
days separation eat nothing made vine tree kernels even husk
days vow separation there no razor come upon head until fulfilled separateth himself lord holy let locks hair grow
days separateth himself lord come at no dead body
make himself unclean father or mother brother sister die because consecration god upon head
days separation holy lord
if any man die very suddenly by hath defiled head consecration then shave day cleansing on seventh
on eighth day bring two turtles or young pigeons priest door tabernacle congregation
priest offer one sin offering other burnt make atonement sinned by dead hallow head same day
consecrate lord days separation bring lamb first year trespass offering before lost because defiled
law nazarite days separation fulfilled brought door tabernacle congregation
offer offering lord one lamb first year without blemish burnt ewe sin ram peace offerings
basket unleavened bread cakes fine flour mingled oil wafers anointed meat offering drink offerings
priest bring before lord offer sin offering burnt
offer ram sacrifice peace offerings lord basket unleavened bread priest also meat offering drink

priest take sodden shoulder ram one unleavened cake out basket wafer put upon hands nazarite after hair separation shaven
priest wave offering before lord holy breast heave shoulder after nazarite may drink wine
law nazarite who hath vowed offering lord separation beside hand get according vow so must do after

lord spake moses saying
take levites among children israel cleanse
thus shalt thou do cleanse sprinkle water purifying upon let shave flesh wash clothes so make themselves clean

belongeth levites twenty five years old upward go wait upon service tabernacle congregation

lord spake moses wilderness sinai first month second year after come out land egypt saying
let children israel also keep passover at appointed season
fourteenth day month at even ye keep appointed season according rites ceremonies thereof
moses spake children israel should keep passover
kept passover on fourteenth day first month at even wilderness sinai according lord commanded moses so did children israel
there certain men who defiled by dead body man could keep passover on day came before moses aaron
those men said we defiled by dead body man wherefore kept back may offer offering lord appointed season among children israel
moses said stand still hear what lord command concerning you
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel saying if any man you or your posterity unclean by reason dead body journey afar off yet keep passover lord
fourteenth day second month at even keep eat unleavened bread bitter herbs
leave none morning nor break any bone according ordinances passover keep
man clean journey forbeareth keep passover even same soul cut off among people because brought offering lord appointed season bear sin
if stranger sojourn among you keep passover lord according ordinance manner thereof so do ye one both born land
on day tabernacle reared cloud covered namely tent testimony at even there upon appearance fire until morning
so alway cloud covered by day appearance fire night
cloud taken tabernacle then after children israel journeyed place where abode there pitched tents
at commandment lord children israel journeyed pitched long cloud abode upon tabernacle rested tents
cloud tarried long upon tabernacle many days then children israel kept charge lord journeyed
so cloud few days upon tabernacle according commandment lord abode tents journeyed
so cloud abode even morning taken then journeyed whether by day or night
or whether two days month year cloud tarried upon tabernacle remaining thereon children israel abode tents journeyed taken
at commandment lord rested tents journeyed kept charge by hand moses
lord spake moses saying
make thee two trumpets silver whole piece shalt thou mayest use calling assembly journeying camps
blow assembly assemble themselves thee at door tabernacle congregation
if blow one trumpet then princes heads thousands israel gather themselves thee
ye blow alarm then camps lie on east parts go forward
ye blow alarm second time then camps lie on south side take journey journeys
congregation gathered together ye blow sound alarm
sons aaron priests blow trumpets you ordinance ever throughout your generations
if ye go war your land against enemy oppresseth you then blow alarm trumpets remembered before lord god saved enemies
also day your gladness solemn days beginnings months ye blow trumpets over burnt offerings sacrifices peace may you memorial before god am lord
came pass on twentieth day second month year cloud taken off tabernacle testimony

moses said hobab son raguel midianite moses' father law we journeying place lord give you come thou us do thee good hath spoken concerning israel
said go depart mine own land kindred
said leave us pray thee forasmuch thou knowest how we encamp wilderness mayest instead eyes
if thou go us yea what goodness lord do same we thee
departed mount lord three days' journey ark covenant went before search out resting place
cloud lord upon by day went out camp
came pass ark set forward moses said rise lord let thine enemies scattered hate thee flee before
rested said return o lord many thousands israel
people complained displeased lord heard anger kindled fire burnt among consumed uttermost parts camp
people cried moses prayed lord fire quenched
called name place taberah because fire lord burnt among
mixt multitude among fell lusting children israel also wept again said who give us flesh eat
we remember fish did eat egypt freely cucumbers melons leeks onions garlick
now our soul dried away there nothing at beside manna before eyes
manna coriander seed colour thereof bdellium
people went about gathered ground mills or beat mortar baked pans made cakes taste fresh oil
dew fell upon camp night manna
then moses heard people weep throughout families every man door tent anger lord kindled greatly also displeased
moses said lord wherefore hast thou afflicted thy servant found favour sight layest burden people upon
conceived people begotten thou shouldest say carry thy bosom nursing father beareth sucking child land swarest fathers
whence should flesh give people weep saying us we may eat
am able bear people alone because too heavy
if thou deal thus kill pray thee out hand found favour thy sight let see wretchedness
lord said moses gather seventy men elders israel whom thou knowest people officers over bring tabernacle congregation may stand there thee
come down talk thee there take spirit upon put bear burden people thou thyself alone
say thou people sanctify yourselves against morrow ye eat flesh wept ears lord saying who give us well egypt therefore you
ye eat one day nor two days five neither ten twenty
even whole month until come out at your nostrils loathsome you because ye despised lord among wept before saying why came we forth egypt
moses said people among whom am six hundred thousand footmen thou hast give flesh may eat whole month
flocks herds slain suffice or fish sea gathered together
lord said moses lord's hand waxed short thou shalt see now whether word come pass thee or
moses went out told people words lord gathered seventy men elders set round about tabernacle
lord came down cloud spake took spirit upon gave seventy elders pass rested prophesied did cease
there remained two men camp name one eldad other medad spirit rested upon written went out tabernacle prophesied
there ran young man told moses said eldad medad do prophesy camp
joshua son nun servant moses one young men answered said lord forbid
moses said enviest thou sake would god lord's people prophets lord put spirit upon
moses gat camp elders israel
there went forth wind lord brought quails sea let fall by camp day's journey on side other round about two cubits high upon face earth
people stood day night next gathered quails least ten homers spread abroad themselves round about camp
while flesh yet between teeth ere chewed wrath lord kindled against people smote very great plague
called name place kibrothhattaavah because there buried people lusted
people journeyed kibrothhattaavah hazeroth abode at
miriam aaron spake against moses because ethiopian woman whom had married
said hath lord indeed spoken only by moses also us heard
now man moses very meek above men upon face earth
lord spake suddenly moses aaron miriam come out ye three tabernacle congregation came
lord came down pillar cloud stood door tabernacle called aaron miriam both forth
said hear now words if there prophet among you lord make myself known vision speak dream
servant moses so who faithful mine house
speak mouth even apparently dark speeches similitude lord behold wherefore then ye afraid against servant moses
anger lord kindled against departed
cloud departed off tabernacle behold miriam became leprous white snow aaron looked upon she
aaron said moses alas lord beseech thee lay sin upon us wherein we done foolishly sinned
let her one dead whom flesh half consumed cometh out mother's womb
moses cried lord saying heal her now o god beseech thee
lord said moses if her father had spit face should she ashamed seven days let shut out camp after received again
miriam shut out camp seven days people journeyed till brought again
afterward people removed hazeroth pitched wilderness paran
lord spake moses saying
send thou men may search land canaan give children israel every tribe fathers ye man one ruler among
moses by commandment lord sent wilderness paran those men heads children israel
these names tribe reuben shammua son zaccur
tribe simeon shaphat son hori

these names men moses sent spy out land called oshea son nun jehoshua
moses sent spy out land canaan said get you way southward go mountain
see land what people dwelleth therein whether strong or weak few many
what land dwell whether good or bad cities tents strong holds
what land whether fat or lean there wood therein ye good courage bring fruit now time firstripe grapes
so went searched land wilderness zin rehob men come hamath
ascended by south came hebron where ahiman sheshai talmai children anak now built seven years before zoan egypt
came brook eshcol cut down thence branch one cluster grapes bare between two upon staff brought pomegranates figs
place called brook eshcol because cluster grapes children israel cut down thence
returned searching land after forty days
went came moses aaron congregation children israel wilderness paran kadesh brought back word shewed fruit land
told said we came land whither thou sentest us surely floweth milk honey fruit
nevertheless people strong dwell land cities walled very great moreover we saw children anak there
amalekites dwell land south hittites jebusites amorites mountains canaanites by sea coast jordan
caleb stilled people before moses said let us go at once possess we well able overcome
men went said we able go against people stronger than
brought evil report land had searched children israel saying through we gone search eateth inhabitants thereof people saw men great stature
there we saw giants sons anak come our own sight grasshoppers so
congregation lifted voice cried people wept night
children israel murmured against moses aaron whole congregation said would god we had died land egypt or wilderness
wherefore hath lord brought us land fall by sword our wives children should prey better return egypt
said one another let us make captain return egypt
then moses aaron fell on faces before assembly congregation children israel
joshua son nun caleb jephunneh searched land rent clothes
spake company children israel saying land we passed through search exceeding good
if lord delight us then bring land give floweth milk honey
only rebel ye against lord neither fear people land bread us defence departed
congregation bade stone stones glory lord appeared tabernacle before children israel
lord said moses how long people provoke ere believe signs shewed among
smite pestilence disinherit make thee greater nation mightier than
moses said lord then egyptians hear thou broughtest people thy might among
tell inhabitants land heard thou lord art among people seen face thy cloud standeth over goest before by day time pillar fire night
now if thou shalt kill people one man then nations heard fame thee speak saying
because lord able bring people land sware therefore hath slain wilderness
now beseech thee let power lord great according thou hast spoken saying
lord longsuffering great mercy forgiving iniquity transgression by no means clearing guilty visiting fathers upon children third fourth generation
pardon beseech thee iniquity people according greatness thy mercy thou hast forgiven egypt even until now
lord said pardoned according thy word
truly live earth filled glory lord
because those men seen glory miracles did egypt wilderness tempted now these ten times hearkened voice
surely see land sware fathers neither any provoked
servant caleb because had another spirit hath followed fully bring land whereinto went seed possess
now amalekites canaanites dwelt valley morrow turn you get wilderness by way red sea
lord spake moses aaron saying
how long bear evil congregation murmur against heard murmurings children israel
say truly live saith lord ye spoken mine ears so do you
your carcases fall wilderness numbered you according whole number twenty years old upward murmured against
doubtless ye come land concerning sware make you dwell therein save caleb son jephunneh joshua nun
your little ones ye said should prey bring know land despised
you your carcases fall wilderness
your children wander wilderness forty years bear whoredoms until carcases wasted
after number days ye searched land even forty each day year bear your iniquities years know breach promise
lord said surely do evil congregation gathered together against wilderness consumed there die
men moses sent search land who returned made congregation murmur against by bringing slander upon
even those men did bring evil report upon land died by plague before lord
joshua son nun caleb jephunneh men went search land lived still
moses told these sayings children israel people mourned greatly
rose early morning gat top mountain saying lo we here go place lord hath promised sinned
moses said wherefore now do ye transgress commandment lord prosper
go lord among you ye smitten before your enemies
amalekites canaanites there before you ye fall by sword because turned away lord therefore
presumed go hill top nevertheless ark covenant lord moses departed out camp
then amalekites came down canaanites dwelt hill smote discomfited even hormah
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel say ye come land your habitations give you
make offering by fire lord burnt or sacrifice performing vow freewill your solemn feasts sweet savour herd flock
then offereth offering lord bring meat tenth deal flour mingled fourth part hin oil
fourth part hin wine drink offering shalt thou prepare burnt or sacrifice one lamb
or ram thou shalt prepare meat offering two tenth deals flour mingled third part hin oil
drink offering thou shalt offer third part hin wine sweet savour lord
thou preparest bullock burnt offering or sacrifice performing vow peace offerings lord
then bring bullock meat offering three tenth deals flour mingled half hin oil
thou shalt bring drink offering half hin wine made by fire sweet savour lord
thus done one bullock or ram lamb kid
according number ye prepare so do every one
born country do these things after manner offering made by fire sweet savour lord
if stranger sojourn you or whosoever among your generations offer offering made by fire sweet savour lord ye do so
one ordinance both you congregation also stranger sojourneth ever your generations ye so before lord
one law manner you stranger sojourneth
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel say ye come land whither bring you
then ye eat bread land offer heave offering lord
ye offer cake first your dough heave offering do threshingfloor so
first your dough ye give lord heave offering generations
if ye erred observed these commandments lord hath spoken moses
even lord hath commanded you by hand moses day henceforward among your generations
then if ought committed by ignorance without knowledge congregation offer one young bullock burnt offering sweet savour lord meat drink according manner kid goats sin
priest make atonement congregation children israel forgiven ignorance bring offering sacrifice made by fire lord sin before
forgiven congregation children israel stranger sojourneth among seeing people ignorance
if any soul sin through ignorance then bring she goat first year offering
priest make atonement soul sinneth ignorantly by ignorance before lord forgiven
ye one law sinneth through ignorance both born among children israel stranger sojourneth
soul doeth ought presumptuously whether born land or stranger same reproacheth lord cut off among people
because hath despised word lord broken commandment soul utterly cut off iniquity upon
while children israel wilderness found man gathered sticks upon sabbath day
found gathering sticks brought moses aaron congregation
put ward because declared what should done
lord said moses man surely put death congregation stone stones without camp
congregation brought without camp stoned stones died lord commanded moses
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel bid make fringes borders garments throughout generations put upon fringe ribband blue
you fringe ye may look upon remember commandments lord do seek after your own heart eyes use go whoring
ye may remember do commandments holy your god
am lord your god brought you out land egypt

moses heard fell upon face

do take you censers korah company
put fire therein incense before lord morrow man whom doth choose holy ye take too much upon you sons levi
moses said korah hear pray you ye sons levi

lord spake aaron behold also given thee charge mine heave offerings hallowed things children israel by reason anointing thy sons ordinance ever
thine most holy things reserved fire every oblation their's meat offering sin trespass render thee thy sons

every thing devoted israel thine
every thing openeth matrix flesh bring lord whether men or beasts thine nevertheless firstborn man shalt thou surely redeem firstling unclean

lord spake moses aaron saying
ordinance law lord hath commanded saying speak children israel bring thee red heifer without spot wherein no blemish upon never came yoke

one burn heifer sight her skin flesh blood dung

man clean gather ashes heifer lay without camp place kept congregation children israel water separation purification sin
gathereth ashes heifer wash clothes unclean until even children israel stranger sojourneth among statute ever
toucheth dead body any man unclean seven days
purify himself on third day seventh clean if then
whosoever toucheth dead body any man purifieth himself defileth tabernacle lord soul cut off israel because water separation sprinkled upon unclean uncleanness yet
law man dieth tent come unclean seven days
every open vessel hath no covering bound upon unclean
whosoever toucheth one slain sword open fields or dead body bone man grave unclean seven days
unclean person take ashes burnt heifer purification sin running water put thereto vessel
clean person take hyssop dip water sprinkle upon tent vessels persons there touched bone or one slain dead grave
clean person sprinkle upon unclean on third day seventh purify himself wash clothes bathe water at even
man unclean purify himself soul cut off among congregation because hath defiled sanctuary lord water separation been sprinkled upon
perpetual statute sprinkleth water separation wash clothes toucheth unclean until even
whatsoever unclean person toucheth soul until even

there no water congregation gathered themselves together against moses aaron
people chode moses spake saying would god we had died our brethren before lord
why ye brought congregation lord wilderness we our cattle should die there

take rod gather thou assembly together aaron thy brother speak ye rock before eyes give forth water shalt bring out so congregation beasts drink

water meribah because children israel strove lord sanctified
moses sent messengers kadesh king edom thus saith thy brother israel thou knowest travail hath befallen us
how our fathers went down egypt we dwelt long time egyptians vexed us
we cried lord heard our voice sent angel hath brought us forth out egypt behold kadesh city uttermost thy border
let us pass pray thee through thy country we fields or vineyards neither drink water wells go by king's high way turn right hand nor left until passed borders
edom said thou shalt pass by lest come out against thee sword
children israel said we go by high way if cattle drink thy water then pay only without doing any thing else through on feet
said thou shalt go through edom came out against much people strong hand
thus edom refused give israel passage through border wherefore turned away

lord spake moses aaron mount hor by coast land edom saying

journeyed mount hor by way red sea compass land edom soul people much discouraged because

therefore people came moses said we sinned spoken against lord thee pray take away serpents us prayed

came balaam said thus saith balak son zippor let nothing pray thee hinder coming
promote thee very great honour do whatsoever thou sayest come therefore pray curse people
balaam answered said servants balak if would give house full silver gold cannot go beyond word lord god do less or more
now therefore pray you tarry ye also here night may know what lord say more
god came balaam at night said if men come call thee rise go yet word say shalt thou do
balaam rose morning saddled ass went princes moab
god's anger kindled because went angel lord stood way adversary against now riding upon ass two servants
ass saw angel lord standing way sword drawn hand turned aside out went field balaam smote turn her
angel lord stood path vineyards wall being on side
ass saw angel lord she thrust herself wall crushed balaam's foot against smote her again
angel lord went further stood narrow place where no way turn either right hand or left
ass saw angel lord she fell down under balaam balaam's anger kindled smote staff
lord opened mouth ass she said balaam what done thee thou hast smitten these three times
balaam said ass because thou hast mocked would there sword mine hand now kill thee
ass said balaam am thine upon thou hast ridden ever since day wont do so thee nay
then lord opened eyes balaam saw angel standing way sword drawn hand bowed down head fell flat on face
angel lord said wherefore hast thou smitten thine ass these three times behold went out withstand thee because thy way perverse before
ass saw turned these three times unless she had surely now also slain thee saved her alive
balaam said angel lord sinned knew thou stoodest way against now therefore if displease thee get back again
angel lord said balaam go men only word speak thee thou shalt so went princes balak
balak heard balaam come went out meet city moab border arnon utmost coast
balak said balaam did earnestly send thee call wherefore camest thou am able indeed promote honour
balaam said balak lo am come thee now any power at say thing word god putteth mouth speak

lord spake moses saying
these land divided inheritance according number names

our father died wilderness company gathered themselves together against lord korah own sin had no sons
why should name our father done away among family because hath no son give us therefore possession brethren
moses brought cause before lord
lord spake moses saying
daughters zelophehad speak right thou shalt surely give possession inheritance among father's brethren cause father pass
thou shalt speak children israel saying if man die no son then ye cause inheritance pass daughter
if no daughter then ye give inheritance brethren
if no brethren then ye give inheritance father's
if father no brethren then ye give inheritance kinsman next family possess children israel statute judgment lord commanded moses
lord said moses get thee mount abarim see land given children israel
thou hast seen also shalt gathered thy people aaron brother
ye rebelled against commandment desert zin strife congregation sanctify at water before eyes meribah kadesh wilderness
moses spake lord saying
let lord god spirits flesh set man over congregation
may go out before lead bring congregation lord sheep no shepherd

set before eleazar priest congregation give charge sight
thou shalt put some thine honour upon congregation children israel may obedient

laid hands upon gave charge lord commanded by hand moses
lord spake moses saying
command children israel say offering bread sacrifices made by fire sweet savour ye observe offer due season
thou shalt say offering made by fire ye offer lord two lambs first year without spot day continual burnt
one lamb shalt thou offer morning other at even
tenth part ephah flour meat offering mingled fourth hin beaten oil
continual burnt offering ordained mount sinai sweet savour sacrifice made by fire lord
drink offering thereof fourth part hin one lamb holy place shalt thou cause strong wine poured lord
other lamb shalt thou offer at even meat offering morning drink thereof sacrifice made by fire sweet savour lord
on sabbath day two lambs first year without spot tenth deals flour meat offering mingled oil drink thereof
burnt offering every sabbath beside continual drink
beginnings your months ye offer burnt offering lord two young bullocks one ram seven lambs first year without spot
three tenth deals flour meat offering mingled oil one bullock two ram
several tenth deal flour mingled oil meat offering one lamb burnt sweet savour sacrifice made by fire lord
drink offerings half hin wine bullock third part ram fourth lamb burnt offering every month throughout months year
one kid goats sin offering lord offered beside continual burnt drink
fourteenth day first month passover lord
fifteenth day month feast seven days unleavened bread eaten
first day holy convocation ye do no manner servile work therein

one goat sin offering make atonement you
ye offer these beside burnt offering morning continual

these things ye do lord your set feasts beside vows freewill offerings burnt meat drink peace
moses told children israel according lord commanded
moses spake heads tribes concerning children israel saying thing lord hath commanded
if man vow lord or swear oath bind soul bond break word do according proceedeth out mouth
if woman also vow lord bind herself by bond being her father's house youth
her father hear vow bond wherewith she hath bound soul hold peace at then vows stand every
if her father disallow day heareth any vows or bonds wherewith she hath bound soul stand lord forgive because disallowed
if she had at husband vowed or uttered ought out her lips wherewith bound soul
her husband heard held peace at day then vows stand bonds wherewith she bound soul
if her husband disallowed on day heard then make vow she vowed uttered lips wherewith bound soul none effect lord forgive
every vow widow her divorced wherewith bound souls stand against
if she vowed her husband's house or bound soul by bond oath
her husband heard held peace at disallowed then vows stand every bond wherewith she bound soul
if her husband hath utterly made void on day heard then whatsoever proceeded out lips concerning vows or bond soul stand lord forgive
every vow binding oath afflict soul her husband may establish or make void
if her husband altogether hold peace at day then establisheth vows or bonds upon confirmeth because held heard
if any ways make void after hath heard then bear her iniquity
these statutes lord commanded moses between man wife father daughter being yet her youth father's house
lord spake moses saying
avenge children israel midianites afterward shalt thou gathered thy people
moses spake people saying arm some yourselves war let go against midianites avenge lord midian
every tribe thousand throughout tribes israel ye send war
so there delivered out thousands israel thousand every tribe twelve armed war
moses sent war thousand every tribe phinehas son eleazar priest holy instruments trumpets blow hand
warred against midianites lord commanded moses slew males
slew kings midian beside rest slain namely evi rekem zur hur reba five balaam also son beor sword
children israel took women midian captives little ones spoil cattle flocks goods
burnt cities wherein dwelt goodly castles fire
took spoil prey both men beasts
brought captives prey spoil moses eleazar priest congregation children israel camp at plains moab by jordan near jericho
moses eleazar priest princes congregation went forth meet without camp
moses wroth officers host captains over thousands hundreds came battle
moses said ye saved women alive
behold these caused children israel through counsel balaam commit trespass against lord matter peor there plague among congregation
now therefore kill every male among little ones woman hath known man by lying
women children known man by lying keep alive yourselves
do ye abide without camp seven days whosoever hath killed any person touched slain purify both yourselves your captives on third day seventh
purify your raiment made skins work goats' hair things wood
eleazar priest said men war went battle ordinance law lord commanded moses
only gold silver brass iron tin lead
every thing may abide fire ye make go through clean nevertheless purified water separation abideth
ye wash your clothes on seventh day clean afterward come camp
lord spake moses saying
take sum prey taken both man beast thou eleazar priest chief fathers congregation
divide prey two parts between took war upon who went out battle congregation
levy tribute lord men war went out battle one soul five hundred both persons beeves asses sheep

thus did your fathers sent kadeshbarnea see land

lord's anger kindled same time sware saying
surely none men came out egypt twenty years old upward see land sware abraham isaac jacob because wholly followed
save caleb son jephunneh kenezite joshua nun wholly followed lord
lord's anger kindled against israel made wander wilderness forty years until generation had done evil sight lord consumed
behold ye risen your fathers' stead increase sinful men augment yet fierce anger lord toward israel
if ye turn away after yet again leave wilderness destroy people
came near said we build sheepfolds here our cattle cities little ones
we ourselves go ready armed before children israel until brought place our little ones dwell fenced cities because inhabitants land
we return our houses until children israel inherited every man inheritance
we inherit on yonder side jordan or forward because our inheritance fallen us eastward
moses said if ye do thing go armed before lord war
go you armed over jordan before lord until hath driven out enemies
land subdued before lord then afterward ye return guiltless israel your possession
if ye do so behold sinned against lord sure your sin find you out

departed rameses first month on fifteenth day morrow after passover children israel went out high hand sight egyptians

removed etham turned again pihahiroth before baalzephon pitched migdol

removed marah came elim twelve fountains water threescore ten palm trees pitched there
removed elim encamped by red sea
removed red sea encamped wilderness sin
took journey out wilderness sin encamped dophkah
departed dophkah encamped alush
removed alush encamped at rephidim where no water people drink

aaron hundred twenty three years old died mount hor
king arad canaanite dwelt south land canaan heard coming children israel

departed zalmonah pitched punon

lord spake moses plains moab by jordan near jericho saying
speak children israel say ye passed over jordan land canaan
then ye drive out inhabitants land before you destroy pictures molten images quite pluck down high places
ye dispossess inhabitants land dwell therein given you possess
ye divide land by lot inheritance among your families more give fewer less every man's place where falleth according tribes fathers inherit
if ye drive out inhabitants land before you then come pass those let remain pricks your eyes thorns sides vex wherein dwell
moreover come pass do you thought
lord spake moses saying
command children israel say ye come land canaan fall you inheritance even coasts thereof
then your south quarter wilderness zin along by coast edom border outmost salt sea eastward
your border turn south ascent akrabbim pass on zin going forth thereof kadeshbarnea go hazaraddar azmon
border fetch compass azmon river egypt goings out at sea

lord spake moses plains moab by jordan near jericho saying
command children israel give levites inheritance possession cities dwell ye also suburbs round about
cities dwell suburbs cattle goods beasts
suburbs cities ye give levites reach wall city outward thousand cubits round about
ye measure without city on east side two thousand cubits south west north midst suburbs cities
among cities ye give levites there six refuge appoint manslayer may flee thither add forty two
so cities ye give levites forty eight suburbs
cities ye give possession children israel many few every one levites according inheritance inheriteth
lord spake moses saying
speak children israel say ye come over jordan land canaan
then ye appoint you cities refuge slayer may flee thither killeth any person at unawares
you cities refuge avenger manslayer die until stand before congregation judgment
these cities ye give six refuge
ye give three cities on side jordan land canaan refuge
these six cities refuge both children israel stranger sojourner among every one killeth any person unawares may flee thither
if smite instrument iron so die murderer surely put death
if smite throwing stone wherewith may die murderer surely put death
or if smite hand weapon wood wherewith may die murderer surely put death
revenger blood himself slay murderer meeteth
if thrust hatred or hurl at by laying wait die
or enmity smite hand die smote surely put death murderer revenger blood slay meeteth
if thrust suddenly without enmity or cast upon any thing laying wait
or any stone wherewith man may die seeing cast upon enemy neither sought harm
then congregation judge between slayer revenger blood according these judgments
congregation deliver slayer out hand revenger blood restore city refuge whither fled abide death high priest anointed holy oil
if slayer at any time come without border city refuge whither fled
revenger blood find without borders city refuge kill slayer guilty
because should remained city refuge until death high priest after slayer return land possession
so these things statute judgment you throughout your generations dwellings
whoso killeth any person murderer put death by mouth witnesses one witness testify against cause die
moreover ye take no satisfaction life murderer guilty death surely put
ye take no satisfaction fled city refuge should come again dwell land until death priest
so ye pollute land wherein blood defileth cannot cleansed shed therein by
defile therefore land ye inhabit wherein dwell lord among children israel
chief fathers families children gilead son machir manasseh sons joseph came near spake before moses princes israel
said lord commanded give land inheritance by lot children israel zelophehad our brother daughters
if married any sons other tribes children israel then inheritance taken our fathers put tribe whereunto received so lot
jubile children israel then inheritance put tribe whereunto received so taken away our fathers

thing lord doth command concerning daughters zelophehad saying let marry whom think best only family tribe father
so inheritance children israel remove tribe every one keep himself fathers

spake you at time saying am able bear myself alone
lord your god hath multiplied you behold ye day stars heaven multitude
lord god your fathers make you thousand times so many more ye bless hath promised
how can myself alone bear your cumbrance burden strife
take you wise men understanding known among your tribes make rulers over
ye answered said thing thou hast spoken good us do
so took chief your tribes wise men known made heads over you captains thousands hundreds fifties tens officers among
charged your judges at time saying hear causes between brethren judge righteously every man brother stranger
ye respect persons judgment hear small well great afraid face man god's cause too hard you bring
commanded you at time things ye should do
we departed horeb went through great terrible wilderness ye saw by way mountain amorites lord our god commanded us came kadeshbarnea
said you ye come mountain amorites lord our god doth give us
behold lord thy god hath set land before thee go possess fathers said fear neither discouraged
ye came near every one you said we send men before us search out land bring word again by what way must go cities come
saying pleased well took twelve men you one tribe
turned went mountain came valley eshcol searched out
took fruit land hands brought down us word again said good lord our god doth give
notwithstanding ye would go rebelled against commandment lord your god
ye murmured your tents said because lord hated us hath brought forth out land egypt deliver hand amorites destroy
whither we go our brethren discouraged heart saying people greater taller than cities great walled heaven moreover seen sons anakims there
then said you dread neither afraid
lord your god goeth before you fight according did egypt eyes
wilderness where thou hast seen how lord thy god bare thee man doth bear son way ye went until came place
yet thing ye did believe lord your god
who went way before you search out place pitch your tents fire by night shew what ye should go cloud day
lord heard voice your words wroth sware saying
surely there one these men evil generation see good land sware give your fathers
save caleb son jephunneh see give land hath trodden upon children because wholly followed lord
also lord angry your sakes saying thou shalt go thither
joshua son nun standeth before thee go thither encourage cause israel inherit
moreover your little ones ye said should prey children day had no knowledge between good evil go thither give possess
you turn take your journey wilderness by way red sea
then ye answered said we sinned against lord go fight according our god commanded us had girded on every man weapons war ready hill
lord said say go neither fight am among you lest ye smitten before your enemies
so spake you ye would hear rebelled against commandment lord went presumptuously hill
amorites dwelt mountain came out against you chased bees do destroyed seir even hormah
ye returned wept before lord would hearken your voice nor give ear you
so ye abode kadesh many days according there
then we turned took our journey wilderness by way red sea lord spake compassed mount seir many days
lord spake saying
ye compassed mountain long enough turn you northward
command thou people saying ye pass through coast your brethren children esau dwell seir afraid you take good heed yourselves therefore
meddle give you land no so much foot breadth because given mount seir esau possession
ye buy meat money may eat also water drink
lord thy god hath blessed thee works hand knoweth walking through great wilderness these forty years been thou hast lacked nothing
we passed by our brethren children esau dwelt seir through way plain elath eziongaber turned wilderness moab
lord said distress moabites neither contend battle give thee land possession because given ar children lot
emims dwelt therein times past people great many tall anakims
also accounted giants anakims moabites call emims

now rise said get you over brook zered we went
space we came kadeshbarnea until come over brook zered thirty eight years generation men war wasted out among host lord sware

so came pass men war consumed dead among people

thou art pass over through ar coast moab day
thou comest nigh over against children ammon distress nor meddle give thee land any possession because given lot

day begin put dread thee fear upon nations under whole heaven who hear report tremble anguish because
sent messengers out wilderness kedemoth sihon king heshbon words peace saying
let pass through thy land go along by high way neither turn right hand nor left
thou shalt sell meat money may eat give water drink only pass through on feet
children esau dwell seir moabites ar did until pass over jordan land lord our god giveth us

lord said behold begun give sihon land before thee begin possess thou mayest inherit
then sihon came out against us people fight at jahaz
lord our god delivered before us we smote sons people
we took cities at time utterly destroyed men women little ones every city left none remain
only cattle we took prey ourselves spoil cities
aroer by brink river arnon city even gilead there one too strong us lord our god delivered
only land children ammon thou camest nor any place river jabbok cities mountains whatsoever lord our god forbad us
then we turned went way bashan og king came out against us people battle at edrei
lord said fear deliver people land thy hand thou shalt do didst sihon king amorites dwelt at heshbon
so lord our god delivered hands og also king bashan people we smote until none left remaining
we took cities at time there city threescore region argob kingdom og bashan
these cities fenced high walls gates bars beside unwalled towns great many

your wives little ones cattle know ye much abide cities given you

ye fear lord your god fight you
besought lord at time saying
o lord god thou hast begun shew thy servant greatness mighty hand what there heaven or earth can do according works might
pray thee let go over see good land beyond jordan goodly mountain lebanon
lord wroth your sakes would hear said let suffice thee speak no more matter
get thee top pisgah lift thine eyes westward northward southward eastward behold thou shalt go over jordan
charge joshua encourage strengthen go over before people cause inherit land thou shalt see
so we abode valley over against bethpeor
now therefore hearken o israel statutes judgments teach you do ye may live go possess land lord god your fathers giveth
ye add word command you neither diminish ought may keep commandments lord your god
your eyes seen what lord did because baalpeor men followed thy god hath destroyed among you
ye did cleave lord your god alive every one you day
behold taught you statutes judgments even lord god commanded ye should do so land whither go possess
keep therefore do your wisdom understanding sight nations hear these statutes say surely great nation wise people
what nation there so great who hath god nigh lord our things we call upon
what nation there so great hath statutes judgments righteous law set before you day
only take heed thyself keep thy soul diligently lest thou forget things thine eyes seen depart heart days life teach sons sons'
specially day thou stoodest before lord thy god horeb said gather people together make hear words may learn fear days live upon earth teach children
ye came near stood under mountain burned fire midst heaven darkness clouds thick
lord spake you out midst fire ye heard voice words saw no similitude only
declared you covenant commanded perform even ten commandments wrote upon two tables stone
lord commanded at time teach you statutes judgments ye might do land whither go over possess
take ye therefore good heed yourselves saw no manner similitude on day lord spake you horeb out midst fire
lest ye corrupt yourselves make you graven image similitude any figure likeness male or female
likeness any beast on earth winged fowl flieth air
likeness any thing creepeth on ground fish waters beneath earth
lest thou lift thine eyes heaven seest sun moon stars even host shouldest driven worship serve lord thy god hath divided nations under whole
lord hath taken you brought forth out iron furnace even egypt people inheritance ye day
furthermore lord angry your sakes sware should go over jordan good land thy god giveth thee inheritance
must die land go over jordan ye possess good
take heed yourselves lest ye forget covenant lord your god made you make graven image or likeness any thing thy hath forbidden thee
lord thy god consuming fire even jealous
thou shalt beget children children's ye remained long land corrupt yourselves make graven image or likeness any thing do evil sight lord thy god provoke anger
call heaven earth witness against you day ye soon utterly perish off land whereunto go over jordan possess prolong your days upon destroyed
lord scatter you among nations ye left few number heathen whither lead
there ye serve gods work men's hands wood stone neither see nor hear eat smell
if thence thou shalt seek lord thy god find heart soul
thou art tribulation these things come upon thee even latter days if turn lord thy god shalt obedient voice
lord thy god merciful forsake thee neither destroy nor forget covenant fathers sware
ask now days past before thee since day god created man upon earth one side heaven other whether there hath been any such thing great or heard like

if one found slain land lord thy god giveth thee possess lying field known who hath
then thy elders judges come forth measure cities round about slain
city next slain man even elders take heifer hath been wrought drawn yoke
elders city bring down heifer rough valley neither eared nor sown strike off heifer's neck there
priests sons levi come near lord thy god hath chosen minister bless name by word every controversy stroke tried
elders city next slain man wash hands over heifer beheaded valley
answer say our hands shed blood neither eyes seen
merciful o lord thy people israel whom thou hast redeemed lay innocent blood israel's charge forgiven
so shalt thou put away guilt innocent blood among you do right sight lord
thou goest forth war against thine enemies lord thy god hath delivered hands hast taken captive
seest among captives beautiful woman hast desire her thou wouldest thy wife
then thou shalt bring her home thine house she shave head pare nails
she put raiment her captivity off remain thine house bewail father mother full month after thou shalt go husband thy wife
if thou no delight her then shalt let go whither she sell at money make merchandise because hast humbled
if man two wives one beloved another hated born children both firstborn son hers
then maketh sons inherit hath may make son beloved firstborn before hated indeed
acknowledge son hated firstborn by giving double portion hath beginning strength right
if man stubborn rebellious son obey voice father or mother chastened hearken
then father mother lay hold on bring out elders city gate place
say elders city our son stubborn rebellious obey voice glutton drunkard
men city stone stones die so shalt thou put evil away among you israel hear fear
if man committed sin worthy death put thou hang on tree
body remain night upon tree thou shalt any wise bury day hanged accursed god thy land defiled lord giveth thee inheritance
thou shalt see thy brother's ox or sheep go astray hide thyself any case bring again brother
if thy brother nigh thee or thou know then shalt bring thine own house until seek after restore again
like manner shalt thou do ass so raiment lost thing thy brother's hath hast found likewise mayest hide thyself
thou shalt see thy brother's ass or ox fall down by way hide thyself surely help lift again
woman wear pertaineth man neither put on woman's garment do so abomination lord thy god
if bird's nest chance before thee way any tree or on ground whether young ones eggs dam sitting upon thou shalt take
thou shalt any wise let dam go take young thee may well mayest prolong thy days
thou buildest new house then shalt make battlement thy roof bring blood upon thine if any man fall thence
thou shalt sow thy vineyard divers seeds lest fruit seed hast sown defiled
thou shalt plow ox ass together
thou shalt wear garment divers sorts woollen linen together
thou shalt make thee fringes upon four quarters thy vesture wherewith coverest thyself
if any man take wife go her hate
give occasions speech against her bring evil name upon say took woman came found maid
then father damsel her mother take bring forth tokens damsel's virginity elders city gate
damsel's father say elders gave daughter man wife hateth her
lo hath given occasions speech against her saying found thy daughter maid yet these tokens daughter's virginity spread cloth before elders city
elders city take man chastise
amerce hundred shekels silver give father damsel because hath brought evil name upon virgin israel she wife may put her away days
if thing true tokens virginity found damsel
then bring out damsel door her father's house men city stone stones she die because hath wrought folly israel play whore so shalt thou put evil away among you
if man found lying woman married husband then both die lay so shalt thou put away evil israel
if damsel virgin betrothed husband man find her city lie
then ye bring both out gate city stone stones die damsel because she cried being man hath humbled neighbour's wife so thou shalt put away evil among you
if man find betrothed damsel field force her lie then only lay die
damsel thou shalt do nothing there no sin worthy death man riseth against neighbour slayeth even so matter
found her field betrothed damsel cried there none save
if man find damsel virgin betrothed lay hold on her lie found

host goeth forth against thine enemies then keep thee every wicked thing

evening cometh on wash himself water sun down come camp again

thou shalt paddle upon thy weapon wilt ease thyself abroad dig therewith turn back cover cometh thee

thou shalt deliver master servant escaped thee

there no whore daughters israel nor sodomite sons

according we hearkened moses things so hearken thee only lord thy god
whosoever doth rebel against thy commandment hearken words thou commandest put death only strong good courage
joshua son nun sent out shittim two men spy secretly saying go view land even jericho went came harlot's house named rahab lodged there
told king jericho saying behold there came men hither night children israel search out country
king jericho sent rahab saying bring forth men come thee entered thine house search out country
woman took two men hid said thus there came wist whence
came pass about time shutting gate dark men went out whither wot pursue after quickly ye overtake
she had brought roof house hid stalks flax laid order upon
men pursued after way jordan fords soon gone out shut gate
before laid down she came upon roof
she said men know lord hath given you land your terror fallen upon us inhabitants faint because
we heard how lord dried water red sea you ye came out egypt what did two kings amorites on other side jordan sihon og whom utterly destroyed
soon we had heard these things our hearts did melt neither there remain any more courage man because you lord your god heaven above earth beneath
now therefore pray you swear by lord since shewed kindness ye also shew father's house give true token
ye save alive father mother brethren sisters deliver our lives death
men answered her our life your's if ye utter business lord hath given us land we deal kindly truly thee
then she let down by cord through window her house upon town wall dwelt
she said get you mountain lest pursuers meet hide yourselves there three days until returned afterward may ye go your way
men said her we blameless thine oath thou hast made us swear
behold we come land thou shalt bind line scarlet thread window didst let us down by bring thy father mother brethren father's household home thee
whosoever go out doors thy house street blood upon head we guiltless thee on our if any hand
if thou utter our business then we quit thine oath hast made us swear
she said according your words so sent away departed bound scarlet line window
went came mountain abode there three days until pursuers returned sought throughout way found
so two men returned descended mountain passed over came joshua son nun told things befell
said joshua truly lord hath delivered our hands land even inhabitants country do faint because us
joshua rose early morning removed shittim came jordan children israel lodged there before passed over
came pass after three days officers went through host
commanded people saying ye see ark covenant lord your god priests levites bearing then remove place go after
yet there space between you about two thousand cubits by measure come near ye may know way must go passed heretofore
joshua said people sanctify yourselves morrow lord do wonders among you
joshua spake priests saying take ark covenant pass over before people took went
lord said joshua day begin magnify thee sight israel may know moses so
thou shalt command priests bear ark covenant saying ye come brink water jordan stand still
joshua said children israel come hither hear words lord your god
joshua said hereby ye know living god among you without fail drive out before canaanites hittites hivites perizzites girgashites amorites jebusites
behold ark covenant lord earth passeth over before you jordan
now therefore take you twelve men out tribes israel every tribe man
come pass soon soles feet priests bear ark lord earth rest waters jordan cut off down above stand upon heap
came pass people removed tents over jordan priests bearing ark covenant before
bare ark come jordan feet priests dipped brim water overfloweth banks time harvest
waters came down above stood rose upon heap very far city adam beside zaretan those toward sea plain even salt failed cut off people passed over right against jericho
priests bare ark covenant lord stood firm on dry ground midst jordan israelites passed over until people clean
came pass people clean passed over jordan lord spake joshua saying
take you twelve men out people every tribe man
command ye saying take you hence out midst jordan place where priests' feet stood firm twelve stones carry over leave lodging lodge night
then joshua called twelve men whom had prepared children israel out every tribe man
joshua said pass over before ark lord your god midst jordan take ye every man you stone upon shoulder according number tribes children israel
may sign among you your children ask fathers time come saying what mean ye by these stones
then ye answer waters jordan cut off before ark covenant lord passed over these stones memorial children israel ever
children israel did so joshua commanded took twelve stones out midst jordan lord spake according number tribes carried over place where lodged laid down there
joshua set twelve stones midst jordan place where feet priests bare ark covenant stood there day
priests bare ark stood midst jordan until every thing finished lord commanded joshua speak people according moses hasted passed over
came pass people clean passed over ark lord priests presence

about forty thousand prepared war passed over before lord battle plains jericho
on day lord magnified joshua sight israel feared moses days life
lord spake joshua saying
command priests bear ark testimony come out jordan
joshua therefore commanded priests saying come ye out jordan
came pass priests bare ark covenant lord come out midst jordan soles priests' feet lifted dry land waters returned place flowed over banks did before
people came out jordan on tenth day first month encamped gilgal east border jericho
those twelve stones took out jordan did joshua pitch gilgal
spake children israel saying your ask fathers time come what mean these stones
then ye let your children know saying israel came over jordan on dry land
lord your god dried waters jordan before you until ye passed over did red sea us we gone
people earth might know hand lord mighty ye fear your god ever
came pass kings amorites on side jordan westward canaanites by sea heard lord had dried waters before children israel until we passed over heart melted neither there spirit any more because
at time lord said joshua make thee sharp knives circumcise again children israel second
joshua made sharp knives circumcised children israel at hill foreskins
cause why joshua did circumcise people came out egypt males even men war died wilderness by way after
now people came out circumcised born wilderness by way forth egypt had
children israel walked forty years wilderness till people men war came out egypt consumed because obeyed voice lord whom sware would shew land fathers give us floweth milk honey
children whom raised stead joshua circumcised uncircumcised because had by way
came pass had done circumcising people abode places camp till whole
lord said joshua day rolled away reproach egypt off you wherefore name place called gilgal
children israel encamped gilgal kept passover on fourteenth day month at even plains jericho
did eat old corn land on morrow after passover unleavened cakes parched selfsame day
manna ceased on morrow after had eaten old corn land neither children israel any more did eat fruit canaan year
came pass joshua by jericho lifted eyes looked behold there stood man over against sword drawn hand went said art thou us or our adversaries
said nay captain host lord am now come joshua fell on face earth did worship what saith servant
captain lord's host said joshua loose thy shoe off foot place whereon thou standest holy did so
now jericho straitly shut because children israel none went out came
lord said joshua see given thine hand jericho king thereof mighty men valour
ye compass city men war go round about once thus shalt thou do six days
seven priests bear before ark trumpets rams' horns seventh day ye compass city times blow
come pass make long blast ram's horn ye hear sound trumpet people shout great wall city fall down flat ascend every man straight before
joshua son nun called priests said take ark covenant let seven bear trumpets rams' horns before lord
said people pass on compass city let armed before ark lord
came pass joshua had spoken people seven priests bearing trumpets rams' horns passed on before lord blew ark covenant followed
armed men went before priests blew trumpets rereward came after ark going on blowing
joshua had commanded people saying ye shout nor make any noise your voice neither word proceed out mouth until day bid you then
so ark lord compassed city going about once came camp lodged
joshua rose early morning priests took ark lord
seven priests bearing trumpets rams' horns before ark lord went on continually blew armed men rereward came after going blowing
second day compassed city once returned camp so did six days
came pass on seventh day rose early about dawning compassed city after same manner seven times only
came pass at seventh time priests blew trumpets joshua said people shout lord hath given you city
city accursed even therein lord only rahab harlot live she her house because hid messengers we sent
ye any wise keep yourselves accursed thing lest make take camp israel curse trouble
silver gold vessels brass iron consecrated lord come treasury
so people shouted priests blew trumpets came pass heard sound trumpet great shout wall fell down flat went city every man straight before took
utterly destroyed city both man woman young old ox sheep ass edge sword
joshua had said two men spied out country go harlot's house bring thence woman she hath ye sware her
young men spies went brought out rahab her father mother brethren she had kindred left without camp israel
burnt city fire therein only silver gold vessels brass iron put treasury house lord
joshua saved rahab harlot alive her father's household she had dwelleth israel even day because hid messengers sent spy out jericho
joshua adjured at time saying cursed man before lord riseth buildeth city jericho lay foundation thereof firstborn youngest son set gates
so lord joshua fame noised throughout country
children israel committed trespass accursed thing achan son carmi zabdi zerah tribe judah took anger lord kindled against
joshua sent men jericho ai beside bethaven on east side bethel spake saying go view country went viewed
returned joshua said let people go about two or three thousand men smite ai make labour thither few
so there went thither people about three thousand men fled before ai
men ai smote about thirty six chased before gate even shebarim going down wherefore hearts people melted became water
joshua rent clothes fell earth upon face before ark lord until eventide elders israel put dust heads
joshua said alas o lord god wherefore hast thou at brought people over jordan deliver us hand amorites destroy would we had been content dwelt on other side
o lord what say israel turneth backs before enemies
canaanites inhabitants land hear environ us round cut off our name earth what wilt thou do thy great
lord said joshua get thee wherefore liest thou thus upon thy face
israel hath sinned also transgressed covenant commanded even taken accursed thing stolen dissembled put among own stuff
therefore children israel could stand before enemies turned backs because accursed neither you any more except ye destroy among
sanctify people say yourselves against morrow thus saith lord god israel there accursed thing midst thee o thou canst stand before thine enemies until ye take away among you
morning therefore ye brought according your tribes tribe lord taketh come families thereof family take by households household man
taken accursed thing burnt fire hath because transgressed covenant lord wrought folly israel
so joshua rose early morning brought israel by tribes tribe judah taken
brought family judah took zarhites man by zabdi taken

achan answered joshua said indeed sinned against lord god israel thus done

took out midst tent brought joshua children israel laid before lord

raised over great heap stones day so lord turned fierceness anger wherefore name place called valley achor
lord said joshua fear neither thou dismayed take people war thee arise go ai see given thy hand king city land
thou shalt do ai her king didst jericho only spoil thereof cattle ye take prey yourselves lay thee ambush city behind

commanded saying behold ye lie wait against city even behind go very far ready

come out after us till we drawn city say flee before at first therefore
then ye rise ambush seize upon city lord your god deliver hand
ye taken city set on fire according commandment lord do see commanded you

had set people even host on north city liers wait west joshua went night midst valley

joshua israel made if beaten before fled by way wilderness
people ai called together pursue after pursued joshua drawn away city
there man left ai or bethel went out after israel city open pursued
lord said joshua stretch out spear thy hand toward ai give thine stretched had city
ambush arose quickly out place ran soon had stretched hand entered city took hasted set on fire
men ai looked behind saw behold smoke city ascended heaven had no power flee way or people fled wilderness turned back upon pursuers
joshua israel saw ambush had taken city smoke ascended then turned again slew men ai
other issued out city against so midst israel some on side smote let none remain or escape
king ai took alive brought joshua
came pass israel had made end slaying inhabitants ai field wilderness wherein chased fallen on edge sword until consumed israelites returned smote
so fell day both men women twelve thousand even ai

only cattle spoil city israel took prey themselves according word lord commanded joshua
joshua burnt ai made heap ever even desolation day
king ai hanged on tree until eventide soon sun down joshua commanded should take carcase cast at entering gate city raise thereon great heap stones remaineth day
then joshua built altar lord god israel mount ebal
moses servant lord commanded children israel written book law altar whole stones over no man hath lift any iron offered thereon burnt offerings sacrificed peace
wrote there upon stones copy law moses presence children israel
