inhabitants gibeon heard what joshua had done jericho ai
did work wilily went made if had been ambassadors took old sacks upon asses wine bottles rent bound
old shoes clouted upon feet garments bread provision dry mouldy
went joshua camp at gilgal said men israel we come far country now therefore make ye league us
men israel said hivites peradventure ye dwell among us how we make league you
said joshua we thy servants who ye whence come
said very far country thy servants come because name lord god we heard fame did egypt
did two kings amorites beyond jordan sihon king heshbon og bashan at ashtaroth
wherefore our elders inhabitants country spake us saying take victuals you journey go meet say we your servants therefore now make ye league
our bread we took hot provision out houses on day came forth go you now behold dry mouldy
these bottles wine we filled new behold rent our garments shoes become old by reason very long journey
men took victuals asked counsel at mouth lord
joshua made peace league let live princes congregation sware
came pass at end three days after had made league heard neighbours dwelt among
children israel journeyed came cities on third day now gibeon chephirah beeroth kirjathjearim
children israel smote because princes congregation had sworn by lord god murmured against
princes said congregation we sworn by lord god israel now therefore may touch
we do even let live lest wrath upon us because oath sware
princes said let live hewers wood drawers water congregation had promised
joshua called spake saying wherefore ye beguiled us we very far you dwell among
now therefore ye cursed there none you freed being bondmen hewers wood drawers water house god
answered joshua said because certainly told thy servants how lord god commanded servant moses give you land destroy inhabitants before therefore we sore afraid our lives done thing
now behold we thine hand seemeth good right thee do us
so did delivered out hand children israel slew
joshua made day hewers wood drawers water congregation altar lord even place should choose
now came pass adonizedek king jerusalem had heard how joshua taken ai utterly destroyed done jericho her so inhabitants gibeon made peace israel among
feared greatly because gibeon great city one royal cities greater than ai men thereof mighty
wherefore adonizedek king jerusalem sent hoham hebron piram jarmuth japhia lachish debir eglon saying
come help we may smite gibeon hath made peace joshua children israel
therefore five kings amorites king jerusalem hebron jarmuth lachish eglon gathered themselves together went hosts encamped before gibeon made war against
men gibeon sent joshua camp gilgal saying slack thy hand servants come us quickly save help kings amorites dwell mountains gathered together against
so joshua ascended gilgal people war mighty men valour
lord said joshua fear delivered thine hand there man stand before thee
joshua therefore came suddenly went gilgal night
lord discomfited before israel slew great slaughter at gibeon chased along way goeth bethhoron smote azekah makkedah
came pass fled before israel going down bethhoron lord cast great stones heaven upon azekah died more hailstones than whom children slew sword
then spake joshua lord day delivered amorites before children israel said sight sun stand thou still upon gibeon moon valley ajalon
sun stood still moon stayed until people had avenged themselves upon enemies written book jasher so midst heaven hasted go down about whole day
there no day like before or after lord hearkened voice man fought israel
joshua returned israel camp gilgal
these five kings fled hid themselves cave at makkedah
told joshua saying five kings found hid cave at makkedah
joshua said roll great stones upon mouth cave set men by keep
stay ye pursue after your enemies smite hindmost suffer enter cities lord god hath delivered hand
came pass joshua children israel had made end slaying very great slaughter till consumed rest remained entered fenced cities
people returned camp joshua at makkedah peace none moved tongue against any children israel
then said joshua open mouth cave bring out those five kings
did so brought forth those five kings out cave king jerusalem hebron jarmuth lachish eglon
came pass brought out those kings joshua called men israel said captains war went come near put your feet upon necks these
joshua said fear nor dismayed strong good courage thus lord do your enemies against whom ye fight
afterward joshua smote slew hanged on five trees hanging upon until evening
came pass at time going down sun joshua commanded took off trees cast cave wherein had been hid laid great stones cave's mouth remain until very day

goeth down westward coast japhleti bethhoron nether gezer goings out thereof at sea
so children joseph manasseh ephraim took inheritance
border children ephraim according families thus even inheritance on east side atarothaddar bethhoron upper
border went out toward sea michmethah on north side about eastward taanathshiloh passed by east janohah
went down janohah ataroth naarath came jericho out at jordan
border went out tappuah westward river kanah goings thereof at sea inheritance tribe children ephraim by families
separate cities children ephraim among inheritance manasseh villages
drave out canaanites dwelt gezer dwell among ephraimites day serve under tribute
there also lot tribe manasseh firstborn joseph wit machir father gilead because man war therefore had bashan
there also lot rest children manasseh by families abiezer helek asriel shechem hepher shemida these male son joseph
zelophehad son hepher gilead machir manasseh had no sons daughters these names mahlah noah hoglah milcah tirzah
came near before eleazar priest joshua son nun princes saying lord commanded moses give us inheritance among our brethren therefore according commandment gave father
there fell ten portions manasseh beside land gilead bashan on other side jordan
because daughters manasseh had inheritance among sons rest manasseh's land gilead
coast manasseh asher michmethah lieth before shechem border went along on right hand inhabitants entappuah
now manasseh had land tappuah on border belonged children ephraim
coast descended river kanah southward these cities ephraim among manasseh also on north side outgoings at sea
southward ephraim's northward manasseh's sea border met together asher on north issachar east
manasseh had issachar asher bethshean her towns ibleam inhabitants dor endor taanach megiddo even three countries
yet children manasseh could drive out inhabitants those cities canaanites would dwell land
yet came pass children israel waxen strong put canaanites tribute did utterly drive out
children joseph spake joshua saying why hast thou given one lot portion inherit seeing am great people forasmuch lord hath blessed hitherto
joshua answered if thou great people then get thee wood country cut down thyself there land perizzites giants mount ephraim too narrow
children joseph said hill enough us canaanites dwell land valley chariots iron both who bethshean her towns jezreel
joshua spake house joseph even ephraim manasseh saying thou art great people hast power shalt one lot only
mountain thine wood thou shalt cut down outgoings drive out canaanites though iron chariots strong
whole congregation children israel assembled together at shiloh set tabernacle there land subdued before
there remained among children israel seven tribes had yet received inheritance
joshua said children israel how long ye slack go possess land lord god your fathers hath given you
give out among you three men each tribe send rise go through land describe according inheritance come again
divide seven parts judah abide coast on south house joseph coasts north
ye therefore describe land seven parts bring description hither may cast lots you here before lord our god
levites no part among you priesthood lord inheritance gad reuben half tribe manasseh received beyond jordan on east moses servant gave
men arose went away joshua charged describe land saying go walk through come again may here cast lots you before lord shiloh
men went passed through land described by cities seven parts book came again joshua host at shiloh
joshua cast lots shiloh before lord there divided land children israel according divisions
lot tribe children benjamin came according families coast forth between judah joseph
border on north side jordan went jericho through mountains westward goings out thereof at wilderness bethaven
border went over thence toward luz side bethel southward descended atarothadar near hill lieth on south nether bethhoron
border drawn thence compassed corner sea southward hill lieth before bethhoron goings out thereof at kirjathbaal kirjathjearim city children judah west quarter
south quarter end kirjathjearim border went out on west well waters nephtoah
border came down end mountain lieth before valley son hinnom giants on north descended side jebusi south enrogel
drawn north went forth enshemesh toward geliloth over against going adummim descended stone bohan son reuben
passed along toward side over against arabah northward went down

lord also spake joshua saying
speak children israel saying appoint out you cities refuge whereof spake by hand moses
slayer killeth any person unawares unwittingly may flee thither your refuge avenger blood
doth flee one those cities stand at entering gate city declare cause ears elders take give place may dwell among
if avenger blood pursue after then deliver slayer hand because smote neighbour unwittingly hated beforetime
dwell city until stand before congregation judgment death high priest those days then slayer return come own house whence fled
appointed kedesh galilee mount naphtali shechem ephraim kirjatharba hebron mountain judah
on other side jordan by jericho eastward assigned bezer wilderness upon plain out tribe reuben ramoth gilead gad golan bashan manasseh
these cities appointed children israel stranger sojourneth among whosoever killeth any person at unawares might flee thither die by hand avenger blood until stood before congregation
then came near heads fathers levites eleazar priest joshua son nun tribes children israel
spake at shiloh land canaan saying lord commanded by hand moses give us cities dwell suburbs thereof our cattle
children israel gave levites out inheritance at commandment lord these cities suburbs

lord gave israel land sware give fathers possessed dwelt therein
lord gave rest round about according sware fathers there stood man enemies before delivered hand
there failed ought any good thing lord had spoken house israel came pass
then joshua called reubenites gadites half tribe manasseh
said ye kept moses servant lord commanded you obeyed voice
ye left your brethren these many days day kept charge commandment lord god
now lord your god hath given rest brethren promised therefore return ye get you tents land possession moses servant gave on other side jordan
take diligent heed do commandment law moses servant lord charged you love your god walk ways keep commandments cleave serve heart soul
so joshua blessed sent away went tents
now one half tribe manasseh moses had given possession bashan other thereof gave joshua among brethren on side jordan westward sent away also tents then blessed
spake saying return much riches your tents very cattle silver gold brass iron raiment divide spoil enemies brethren
children reuben gad half tribe manasseh returned departed israel out shiloh land canaan go country gilead possession whereof possessed according word lord by hand moses
came borders jordan land canaan children reuben gad half tribe manasseh built there altar by great see
children israel heard say behold reuben gad half tribe manasseh built altar over against land canaan borders jordan at passage
children israel heard whole congregation gathered themselves together at shiloh go war against
children israel sent reuben gad half tribe manasseh land gilead phinehas son eleazar priest
ten princes each chief house prince throughout tribes israel one head fathers among thousands
came children reuben gad half tribe manasseh land gilead spake saying
thus saith whole congregation lord what trespass ye committed against god israel turn away day following builded you altar might rebel
iniquity peor too little us we cleansed until day although there plague congregation lord
ye must turn away day following lord seeing rebel against morrow wroth whole congregation israel
notwithstanding if land your possession unclean then pass ye over lord wherein lord's tabernacle dwelleth take among us rebel against nor building you altar beside our god
did achan son zerah commit trespass accursed thing wrath fell on congregation israel man perished alone iniquity
then children reuben gad half tribe manasseh answered said heads thousands israel
lord god gods knoweth israel know if rebellion or transgression against save us day
we built us altar turn following lord or if offer thereon burnt offering meat peace offerings let himself require
if we rather done fear thing saying time come your children might speak our what ye do lord god israel
lord hath made jordan border between us you ye children reuben gad no part so your make our cease fearing
therefore we said let us now prepare build altar burnt offering nor sacrifice
may witness between us you our generations after we might do service lord before burnt offerings sacrifices peace your children say time come ye no part
therefore said we should so say us or our generations time come may again behold pattern altar lord fathers made burnt offerings nor sacrifices witness between you
god forbid we should rebel against lord turn day following build altar burnt offerings meat or sacrifices beside our before tabernacle
phinehas priest princes congregation heads thousands israel heard words children reuben gad manasseh spake pleased
phinehas son eleazar priest said children reuben gad manasseh day we perceive lord among us because ye committed trespass against now delivered israel out hand
phinehas son eleazar priest princes returned children reuben gad out land gilead canaan israel brought word again
thing pleased children israel blessed god did intend go against battle destroy land wherein reuben gad dwelt
children reuben gad called altar ed witness between us lord god
came pass long time after lord had given rest israel enemies round about joshua waxed old stricken age
joshua called israel elders heads judges officers said am old stricken age
ye seen lord your god hath done these nations because you fought
behold divided you by lot these nations remain inheritance your tribes jordan cut off even great sea westward
lord your god expel before you drive out sight ye possess land hath promised
ye therefore very courageous keep do written book law moses turn aside therefrom right hand or left
ye come among these nations remain you neither make mention name gods nor cause swear by serve bow yourselves
cleave lord your god ye done day
lord hath driven out before you great nations strong no man been able stand day
one man you chase thousand lord your god fighteth hath promised
take good heed therefore yourselves ye love lord your god
else if ye do any wise go back cleave remnant these nations even remain among you make marriages
know certainty lord your god no more drive out any these nations before you snares traps scourges sides thorns eyes until ye perish off good land hath given
behold day am going way earth ye know your hearts souls one thing hath failed good things lord god spake concerning you come pass thereof
therefore come pass good things upon you lord your god promised so bring evil until destroyed off land hath given
ye transgressed covenant lord your god commanded you gone served other gods bowed yourselves then anger kindled against perish quickly off good land hath given
joshua gathered tribes israel shechem called elders heads judges officers presented themselves before god
joshua said people thus saith lord god israel your fathers dwelt on other side flood old time even terah father abraham nachor served gods
took your father abraham other side flood led throughout land canaan multiplied seed gave isaac
gave isaac jacob esau mount seir possess children went down egypt
sent moses also aaron plagued egypt according did among afterward brought you out
brought your fathers out egypt ye came sea egyptians pursued after chariots horsemen red
cried lord put darkness between you egyptians brought sea upon covered your eyes seen what done egypt ye dwelt wilderness long season
brought you land amorites dwelt on other side jordan fought gave your hand ye might possess destroyed before
then balak son zippor king moab arose warred against israel sent called balaam beor curse you
would hearken balaam therefore blessed you still so delivered out hand
ye went over jordan came jericho men fought against you amorites perizzites canaanites hittites girgashites hivites jebusites delivered your hand
sent hornet before you drave out even two kings amorites thy sword nor bow
given you land ye did labour cities built dwell vineyards oliveyards planted do eat
now therefore fear lord serve sincerity truth put away gods your fathers served on other side flood egypt ye
if seem evil you serve lord choose day whom ye whether gods your fathers served on other side flood or amorites whose land dwell house we
people answered said god forbid we should forsake lord serve other gods
lord our god brought us fathers out land egypt house bondage did those great signs sight preserved way wherein we went among people through whom passed
lord drave out before us people even amorites dwelt land therefore we also serve our god
joshua said people ye cannot serve lord holy god jealous forgive your transgressions nor sins
if ye forsake lord serve strange gods then turn do you hurt consume after hath done good
people said joshua nay we serve lord
joshua said people ye witnesses against yourselves chosen you lord serve we
now therefore put away said strange gods among you incline your heart lord god israel
people said joshua lord our god we serve voice obey
so joshua made covenant people day set statute ordinance shechem
joshua wrote these words book law god took great stone set there under oak by sanctuary lord
joshua said people behold stone witness us hath heard words lord spake therefore you lest ye deny your god
so joshua let people depart every man inheritance
came pass after these things joshua son nun servant lord died being hundred ten years old
buried border inheritance timnathserah mount ephraim on north side hill gaash
israel served lord days joshua elders overlived had known works done
bones joseph children israel brought out egypt buried shechem parcel ground jacob bought sons hamor father hundred pieces silver became inheritance
eleazar son aaron died buried hill pertained phinehas given mount ephraim
now after death joshua came pass children israel asked lord saying who go us against canaanites first fight
lord said judah go behold delivered land hand
judah said simeon brother come lot we may fight against canaanites likewise go thee thy so went
judah went lord delivered canaanites perizzites hand slew bezek ten thousand men
found adonibezek bezek fought against slew canaanites perizzites
adonibezek fled pursued after caught cut off thumbs great toes
adonibezek said threescore ten kings having thumbs great toes cut off gathered meat under table done so god hath requited brought jerusalem there died
now children judah had fought against jerusalem taken smitten edge sword set city on fire
afterward children judah went down fight against canaanites dwelt mountain south valley
judah went against canaanites dwelt hebron now name before kirjatharba slew sheshai ahiman talmai
thence went against inhabitants debir name before kirjathsepher
caleb said smiteth kirjathsepher taketh give achsah daughter wife
othniel son kenaz caleb's younger brother took gave achsah daughter wife
came pass she moved ask her father field lighted off ass caleb said what wilt thou
she said give blessing thou hast given south land also springs water caleb gave her upper nether
children kenite moses' father law went out city palm trees judah wilderness lieth south arad dwelt among people
judah went simeon brother slew canaanites inhabited zephath utterly destroyed name city called hormah
also judah took gaza coast thereof askelon ekron
lord judah drave out inhabitants mountain could drive valley because had chariots iron
gave hebron caleb moses said expelled thence three sons anak
children benjamin did drive out jebusites inhabited jerusalem dwell day
house joseph also went against bethel lord
house joseph sent descry bethel now name city before luz
spies saw man come forth out city said shew us we pray thee entrance mercy
shewed entrance city smote edge sword let go man family
man went land hittites built city called name thereof luz day
neither did manasseh drive out inhabitants bethshean her towns nor taanach dor ibleam megiddo canaanites would dwell land
came pass israel strong put canaanites tribute did utterly drive out
neither did ephraim drive out canaanites dwelt gezer among
neither did zebulun drive out inhabitants kitron nor nahalol canaanites dwelt among became tributaries
neither did asher drive out inhabitants accho nor zidon ahlab achzib helbah aphik rehob
asherites dwelt among canaanites inhabitants land did drive out
neither did naphtali drive out inhabitants bethshemesh nor bethanath dwelt among canaanites land nevertheless became tributaries
amorites forced children dan mountain would suffer come down valley
amorites would dwell mount heres aijalon shaalbim yet hand house joseph prevailed so became tributaries
coast amorites going akrabbim rock upward
angel lord came gilgal bochim said made you go out egypt brought land sware your fathers never break covenant
ye make no league inhabitants land throw down altars obeyed voice why done
wherefore also said drive out before you thorns your sides gods snare
came pass angel lord spake these words children israel people lifted voice wept
called name place bochim sacrificed there lord
joshua had let people go children israel went every man inheritance possess land
people served lord days joshua elders outlived who had seen great works did israel
joshua son nun servant lord died being hundred ten years old
buried border inheritance timnathheres mount ephraim on north side hill gaash
also generation gathered fathers there arose another after knew lord nor yet works had done israel
children israel did evil sight lord served baalim
forsook lord god fathers brought out land egypt followed other gods people round about bowed themselves provoked anger
forsook lord served baal ashtaroth
anger lord hot against israel delivered hands spoilers spoiled sold enemies round about so could any longer stand before
whithersoever went out hand lord against evil had said sworn greatly distressed
nevertheless lord raised judges delivered out hand those spoiled
yet would hearken judges went whoring after other gods bowed themselves turned quickly out way fathers walked obeying commandments lord did so
lord raised judges then judge delivered out hand enemies days repented because groanings by reason oppressed vexed
came pass judge dead returned corrupted themselves more than fathers following other gods serve bow down ceased own doings nor stubborn way
anger lord hot against israel said because people hath transgressed covenant commanded fathers hearkened voice
also henceforth drive out any before nations joshua left died
through may prove israel whether keep way lord walk therein fathers did or
therefore lord left those nations without driving out hastily neither delivered hand joshua
now these nations lord left prove israel by even many had known wars canaan
only generations children israel might know teach war at least such before knew nothing thereof
namely five lords philistines canaanites sidonians hivites dwelt mount lebanon baalhermon entering hamath
prove israel by know whether would hearken commandments lord commanded fathers hand moses
children israel dwelt among canaanites hittites amorites perizzites hivites jebusites
took daughters wives gave sons served gods
children israel did evil sight lord forgat god served baalim groves
therefore anger lord hot against israel sold hand chushanrishathaim king mesopotamia children served eight years
children israel cried lord raised deliverer who delivered even othniel son kenaz caleb's younger brother
spirit lord came upon judged israel went out war delivered chushanrishathaim king mesopotamia hand prevailed against
land had rest forty years othniel son kenaz died
children israel did evil again sight lord strengthened eglon king moab against because had done
gathered children ammon amalek went smote israel possessed city palm trees
so children israel served eglon king moab eighteen years
children israel cried lord raised deliverer ehud son gera benjamite man lefthanded by sent present eglon king moab
ehud made dagger had two edges cubit length did gird under raiment upon right thigh
brought present eglon king moab very fat man
had made end offer present sent away people bare
himself turned again quarries by gilgal said secret errand thee o king who keep silence stood went out
ehud came sitting summer parlour had himself alone said message god thee arose out seat
ehud put forth left hand took dagger right thigh thrust belly
haft also went after blade fat closed upon so could draw dagger out belly dirt came
then ehud went forth through porch shut doors parlour upon locked
gone out servants came saw behold doors parlour locked said surely covereth feet summer chamber
tarried till ashamed behold opened doors parlour therefore took key lord fallen down dead on earth
ehud escaped while tarried passed beyond quarries seirath
came pass come blew trumpet mountain ephraim children israel went down mount before
said follow after lord hath delivered your enemies moabites hand went down took fords jordan toward moab suffered man pass over
slew moab at time about ten thousand men lusty valour there escaped man
so moab subdued day under hand israel land had rest fourscore years
after shamgar son anath slew philistines six hundred men ox goad also delivered israel
children israel again did evil sight lord ehud dead
lord sold hand jabin king canaan reigned hazor captain whose host sisera dwelt harosheth gentiles
children israel cried lord had nine hundred chariots iron twenty years mightily oppressed
deborah prophetess wife lapidoth she judged israel at time
she dwelt under palm tree deborah between ramah bethel mount ephraim children israel came her judgment
she sent called barak son abinoam out kedeshnaphtali said hath lord god israel commanded saying go draw toward mount tabor take thee ten thousand men children naphtali zebulun
draw thee river kishon sisera captain jabin's army chariots multitude deliver thine hand
barak said her if thou wilt go then
she said surely go thee notwithstanding journey thou takest thine honour lord sell sisera hand woman deborah arose went barak kedesh
barak called zebulun naphtali kedesh went ten thousand men at feet deborah
now heber kenite children hobab father law moses had severed himself kenites pitched tent plain zaanaim by kedesh
shewed sisera barak son abinoam gone mount tabor
sisera gathered together chariots even nine hundred iron people harosheth gentiles river kishon
deborah said barak day lord hath delivered sisera thine hand gone out before thee so went down mount tabor ten thousand men after
lord discomfited sisera chariots host edge sword before barak so lighted down off chariot fled away on feet
barak pursued after chariots host harosheth gentiles sisera fell upon edge sword there man left
howbeit sisera fled away on feet tent jael wife heber kenite there peace between jabin king hazor house
jael went out meet sisera said turn lord fear had turned her tent she covered mantle
said her give pray thee little water drink am thirsty she opened bottle milk gave covered
again said her stand door tent any man doth come enquire thee say there here thou shalt no
then jael heber's wife took nail tent hammer her hand went softly smote temples fastened ground fast asleep weary so died
behold barak pursued sisera jael came out meet said come shew thee man whom thou seekest her tent lay dead nail temples
so god subdued on day jabin king canaan before children israel
hand children israel prospered prevailed against jabin king canaan until had destroyed
then sang deborah barak son abinoam on day saying
praise ye lord avenging israel people willingly offered themselves
hear o ye kings give ear princes even sing lord praise god israel
lord thou wentest out seir marchedst field edom earth trembled heavens dropped clouds also water
mountains melted before lord even sinai god israel
days shamgar son anath jael highways unoccupied travellers walked through byways
inhabitants villages ceased israel until deborah arose mother
chose new gods then war gates there shield or spear seen among forty thousand israel
heart toward governors israel offered themselves willingly among people bless ye lord
speak ye ride on white asses sit judgment walk by way
delivered noise archers places drawing water there rehearse righteous acts lord even toward inhabitants villages israel then people go down gates
awake deborah utter song arise barak lead thy captivity captive thou son abinoam
then made remaineth dominion over nobles among people lord mighty
out ephraim there root against amalek after thee benjamin among thy people machir came down governors zebulun handle pen writer
princes issachar deborah even also barak sent on foot valley divisions reuben there great thoughts heart
why abodest thou among sheepfolds hear bleatings flocks divisions reuben there great searchings heart
gilead abode beyond jordan why did dan remain ships asher continued on sea shore breaches
zebulun naphtali people jeoparded lives death high places field
kings came fought then canaan taanach by waters megiddo took no gain money
fought heaven stars courses against sisera
river kishon swept away ancient o soul thou hast trodden down strength
then horsehoofs broken by means pransings mighty ones
curse ye meroz said angel lord bitterly inhabitants thereof because came help against mighty
blessed above women jael wife heber kenite she tent
asked water she gave milk brought forth butter lordly dish
she put her hand nail right workmen's hammer smote sisera off head had pierced stricken through temples
at her feet bowed fell lay down where there dead
mother sisera looked out at window cried through lattice why chariot so long coming tarry wheels chariots
her wise ladies answered yea she returned answer herself
sped divided prey every man damsel or two sisera divers colours needlework on both sides meet necks take spoil
so let thine enemies perish o lord love sun goeth forth might land had rest forty years
children israel did evil sight lord delivered hand midian seven years
hand midian prevailed against israel because midianites children made dens mountains caves strong holds
so israel had sown midianites came amalekites children east even against
encamped against destroyed increase earth till thou come gaza left no sustenance israel neither sheep nor ox ass
came cattle tents grasshoppers multitude both camels without number entered land destroy
israel greatly impoverished because midianites children cried lord
came pass children israel cried lord because midianites
lord sent prophet children israel said thus saith god brought you egypt forth out house bondage
delivered you out hand egyptians oppressed drave before gave land
said you am lord your god fear gods amorites whose land ye dwell obeyed voice
there came angel lord sat under oak ophrah pertained joash abiezrite son gideon threshed wheat by winepress hide midianites
angel lord appeared said thee thou mighty man valour
gideon said oh lord if us why then befallen where miracles our fathers told saying did bring egypt now hath forsaken delivered hands midianites
lord looked upon said go thy might thou shalt save israel hand midianites sent thee
said oh lord wherewith save israel behold family poor manasseh am least father's house
lord said surely thee thou shalt smite midianites one man
said if now found grace thy sight then shew sign thou talkest
depart hence pray thee until come bring forth present set before said tarry thou again
gideon went made ready kid unleavened cakes ephah flour flesh put basket broth pot brought out under oak presented
angel god said take flesh unleavened cakes lay upon rock pour out broth did so
then angel lord put forth end staff hand touched flesh unleavened cakes there rose fire out rock consumed departed sight
gideon perceived angel lord said alas o god because seen face
lord said peace thee fear thou shalt die
then gideon built altar there lord called jehovahshalom day yet ophrah abiezrites
came pass same night lord said take thy father's young bullock even second seven years old throw down altar baal father hath cut grove by
build altar lord thy god upon top rock ordered place take second bullock offer burnt sacrifice wood grove thou shalt cut down
then gideon took ten men servants did lord had said so because feared father's household city could do by day night
men city arose early morning behold altar baal cast down grove cut by second bullock offered upon built
said one another who hath done thing enquired asked gideon son joash
then men city said joash bring out thy son may die because hath cast down altar baal cut grove by
joash said stood against ye plead baal save let put death whilst yet morning if god himself because one hath cast down altar
therefore on day called jerubbaal saying let baal plead against because hath thrown down altar
then midianites amalekites children east gathered together went over pitched valley jezreel
spirit lord came upon gideon blew trumpet abiezer gathered after
sent messengers throughout manasseh who also gathered after asher zebulun naphtali came meet
gideon said god if thou wilt save israel by mine hand hast
behold put fleece wool floor if dew on only dry upon earth beside then know thou wilt save israel by mine hand hast said
so rose early on morrow thrust fleece together wringed dew out bowl full water
gideon said god let thine anger hot against speak once prove pray thee fleece now dry only upon ground there dew
god did so night dry upon fleece only there dew on ground
then jerubbaal who gideon people rose early pitched beside well harod so host midianites on north side by hill moreh valley
lord said gideon people thee too many give midianites hands lest israel vaunt themselves against saying mine own hand hath saved
now therefore go proclaim ears people saying whosoever fearful afraid let return depart early mount gilead there returned twenty two thousand remained ten
lord said gideon people yet too many bring down water try thee there whom say go same whomsoever
so brought down people water lord said gideon every one lappeth tongue dog shalt thou set by himself likewise boweth upon knees drink
number lapped putting hand mouth three hundred men rest people bowed down upon knees drink water
lord said gideon by three hundred men lapped save you deliver midianites thine hand let other people go every man place
so people took victuals hand trumpets sent rest israel every man tent retained those three hundred men host midian beneath valley
came pass same night lord said arise get thee down host delivered thine hand
if thou fear go down phurah thy servant host
thou shalt hear what say afterward thine hands strengthened go down host then went phurah servant outside armed men
midianites amalekites children east lay along valley like grasshoppers multitude camels without number sand by sea side
gideon come behold there man told dream fellow said dreamed lo cake barley bread tumbled host midian came tent smote fell overturned lay along
fellow answered said nothing else save sword gideon son joash man israel hand hath god delivered midian host
so gideon heard telling dream interpretation thereof worshipped returned host israel said arise lord hath delivered your hand midian
divided three hundred men companies put trumpet every man's hand empty pitchers lamps within
said look on do likewise behold come outside camp so ye
blow trumpet then ye trumpets also on every side camp say sword lord gideon
so gideon hundred men came outside camp beginning middle watch had newly set blew trumpets brake pitchers hands
three companies blew trumpets brake pitchers held lamps left hands right blow withal cried sword lord gideon
stood every man place round about camp host ran cried fled
three hundred blew trumpets lord set every man's sword against fellow even throughout host fled bethshittah zererath border abelmeholah tabbath
men israel gathered themselves together out naphtali asher manasseh pursued after midianites
gideon sent messengers throughout mount ephraim saying come down against midianites take before waters bethbarah jordan then men gathered themselves together took
took two princes midianites oreb zeeb slew upon rock at winepress pursued midian brought heads gideon on other side jordan
men ephraim said why hast thou served us thus calledst wentest fight midianites did chide sharply
said what done now comparison you gleaning grapes ephraim better than vintage abiezer
god hath delivered your hands princes midian oreb zeeb what able do comparison you then anger abated toward had said
gideon came jordan passed over three hundred men faint yet pursuing
said men succoth give pray you loaves bread people follow faint am pursuing after zebah zalmunna kings midian
princes succoth said hands zebah zalmunna now thine hand we should give bread army
gideon said therefore lord hath delivered zebah zalmunna mine hand then tear your flesh thorns wilderness briers
went thence penuel spake likewise men answered succoth had
spake also men penuel saying come again peace break down tower
now zebah zalmunna karkor hosts about fifteen thousand men left children east there fell hundred twenty drew sword
gideon went by way dwelt tents on east nobah jogbehah smote host secure
zebah zalmunna fled pursued after took two kings midian discomfited host
gideon son joash returned battle before sun
caught young man men succoth enquired described princes elders thereof even threescore seventeen
came men succoth said behold zebah zalmunna whom ye did upbraid saying hands now thine hand we should give bread thy weary
took elders city thorns wilderness briers taught men succoth
beat down tower penuel slew men city
then said zebah zalmunna what manner men whom ye slew at tabor answered thou art so each one resembled children king
said brethren even sons mother lord liveth if ye had saved alive would slay you
said jether firstborn slay youth drew sword feared because yet
then zebah zalmunna said rise thou fall upon us man so strength gideon arose slew took away ornaments on camels' necks
then men israel said gideon rule thou over us both thy son son's also hast delivered hand midian
gideon said rule over you neither son lord
gideon said would desire request you ye give every man earrings prey had golden because ishmaelites
answered we willingly give spread garment did cast therein every man earrings prey
weight golden earrings requested thousand seven hundred shekels gold beside ornaments collars purple raiment on kings midian chains about camels' necks
gideon made ephod thereof put city even ophrah israel went thither whoring after thing became snare house
thus midian subdued before children israel so lifted heads no more country quietness forty years days gideon
jerubbaal son joash went dwelt own house
gideon had threescore ten sons body begotten many wives
concubine shechem she also bare son whose name called abimelech
gideon son joash died good old age buried sepulchre father ophrah abiezrites
came pass soon gideon dead children israel turned again went whoring after baalim made baalberith god
children israel remembered lord god who had delivered out hands enemies on every side
neither shewed kindness house jerubbaal namely gideon according goodness had israel
abimelech son jerubbaal went shechem mother's brethren communed family house father saying
speak pray you ears men shechem whether better either sons jerubbaal threescore ten persons reign over or one remember also am your bone flesh
mother's brethren spake ears men shechem these words hearts inclined follow abimelech said our brother
gave threescore ten pieces silver out house baalberith wherewith abimelech hired vain light persons followed
went father's house at ophrah slew brethren sons jerubbaal being threescore ten persons upon one stone notwithstanding yet jotham youngest son left hid himself
men shechem gathered together house millo went made abimelech king by plain pillar
told jotham went stood top mount gerizim lifted voice cried said hearken ye men shechem god may you
trees went forth on time anoint king over said olive tree reign thou us
olive tree said should leave fatness wherewith by honour god man go promoted over trees
trees said fig tree come thou reign over us
fig tree said should forsake sweetness good fruit go promoted over trees
then said trees vine come thou reign over us
vine said should leave wine cheereth god man go promoted over trees
then said trees bramble come thou reign over us
bramble said trees if truth ye anoint king over you then come put your trust shadow let fire out devour cedars lebanon
now therefore if ye done truly sincerely made abimelech king dealt well jerubbaal house according deserving hands
father fought you adventured life far delivered out hand midian
ye risen against father's house day slain sons threescore ten persons upon one stone made abimelech son maidservant king over men shechem because your brother
if ye then dealt truly sincerely jerubbaal house day rejoice abimelech let also you
if let fire come out abimelech devour men shechem house millo
jotham ran away fled went beer dwelt there fear abimelech brother
abimelech had reigned three years over israel
then god sent evil spirit between abimelech men shechem dealt treacherously
cruelty done threescore ten sons jerubbaal might come blood laid upon abimelech brother slew men shechem aided killing brethren
men shechem set liers wait top mountains robbed came along way by told abimelech
gaal son ebed came brethren went over shechem men put confidence
went out fields gathered vineyards trode grapes made merry house god did eat drink cursed abimelech
gaal son ebed said who abimelech shechem we should serve jerubbaal zebul officer men hamor father why
would god people under hand then remove abimelech said increase thine army come out
zebul ruler city heard words gaal son ebed anger kindled
sent messengers abimelech privily saying behold gaal son ebed brethren come shechem fortify city against thee
now therefore by night thou people thee lie wait field
morning soon sun thou shalt rise early set upon city behold people come out against thee then mayest do find occasion
abimelech rose people by night laid wait against shechem four companies
gaal son ebed went out stood entering gate city abimelech rose people lying wait
gaal saw people said zebul behold there come down top mountains thou seest shadow if men
gaal spake again said see there come people down by middle land another company along plain meonenim
then said zebul where now thy mouth wherewith thou saidst who abimelech we should serve people hast despised go out pray fight
gaal went out before men shechem fought abimelech
abimelech chased fled before many overthrown wounded even entering gate
abimelech dwelt at arumah zebul thrust out gaal brethren should dwell shechem
came pass on morrow people went out field told abimelech
took people divided three companies laid wait field looked behold come forth out city rose against smote
abimelech company rushed forward stood entering gate city two other companies ran upon people fields slew
abimelech fought against city day took slew people therein beat down sowed salt
men tower shechem heard entered hold house god berith
told abimelech men tower shechem gathered together
abimelech gat mount zalmon people took axe hand cut down bough trees laid on shoulder said what ye seen do make haste done
people likewise cut down every man bough followed abimelech put hold set on fire upon so men tower shechem died also about thousand women
then went abimelech thebez encamped against took
there strong tower within city thither fled men women shut gat top
abimelech came tower fought against went hard door burn fire
certain woman cast piece millstone upon abimelech's head brake skull
then called hastily young man armourbearer said draw thy sword slay men say woman slew thrust through died
men israel saw abimelech dead departed every man place
thus god rendered wickedness abimelech did father slaying seventy brethren
evil men shechem did god render upon heads came curse jotham son jerubbaal
after abimelech there arose defend israel tola son puah dodo man issachar dwelt shamir mount ephraim
judged israel twenty three years died buried shamir
after arose jair gileadite judged israel twenty two years
had thirty sons rode on ass colts cities called havothjair day land gilead
jair died buried camon
children israel did evil again sight lord served baalim ashtaroth gods syria zidon moab ammon philistines forsook
anger lord hot against israel sold hands philistines children ammon
year vexed oppressed children israel eighteen years on other side jordan land amorites gilead
moreover children ammon passed over jordan fight also against judah benjamin house ephraim so israel sore distressed
children israel cried lord saying we sinned against thee both because forsaken our god also served baalim
lord said children israel did deliver you egyptians amorites ammon philistines
zidonians also amalekites maonites did oppress you ye cried delivered out hand
yet ye forsaken served other gods wherefore deliver you no more
go cry gods ye chosen let deliver you time your tribulation
children israel said lord we sinned do thou us whatsoever seemeth good thee deliver only pray day
put away strange gods among served lord soul grieved misery israel
then children ammon gathered together encamped gilead israel assembled themselves mizpeh
people princes gilead said one another what man begin fight against children ammon head over inhabitants
now jephthah gileadite mighty man valour son harlot gilead begat
gilead's wife bare sons wife's grew thrust out jephthah said thou shalt inherit our father's house art son strange woman
then jephthah fled brethren dwelt land tob there gathered vain men went out
came pass process time children ammon made war against israel
so children ammon made war against israel elders gilead went fetch jephthah out land tob
said jephthah come our captain we may fight children ammon
jephthah said elders gilead did ye hate expel out father's house why come now distress
elders gilead said jephthah therefore we turn again thee now thou mayest go us fight against children ammon our head over inhabitants
jephthah said elders gilead if ye bring home again fight against children ammon lord deliver before your head
elders gilead said jephthah lord witness between us if we do so according thy words
then jephthah went elders gilead people made head captain over uttered words before lord mizpeh
jephthah sent messengers king children ammon saying what hast thou do art come against fight land
king children ammon answered messengers jephthah because israel took away land came out egypt arnon even jabbok jordan now therefore restore those lands again peaceably
jephthah sent messengers again king children ammon
said thus saith jephthah israel took away land moab nor children ammon
israel came egypt walked through wilderness red sea kadesh
then israel sent messengers king edom saying let pray thee pass through thy land would hearken thereto like manner moab consent abode kadesh
then went along through wilderness compassed land edom moab came by east side pitched on other arnon within border
israel sent messengers sihon king amorites heshbon said let us pass we pray thee through thy land place
sihon trusted israel pass through coast gathered people together pitched jahaz fought against
lord god israel delivered sihon people hand smote so possessed land amorites inhabitants country
possessed coasts amorites arnon even jabbok wilderness jordan
so now lord god israel hath dispossessed amorites before people shouldest thou possess
wilt thou possess chemosh thy god giveth thee so whomsoever lord our drive out before us we
now art thou any thing better than balak son zippor king moab did ever strive against israel or fight
while israel dwelt heshbon her towns aroer cities along by coasts arnon three hundred years why therefore did ye recover within time
wherefore sinned against thee thou doest wrong war lord judge day between children israel ammon
howbeit king children ammon hearkened words jephthah sent
then spirit lord came upon jephthah passed over gilead manasseh mizpeh children ammon
jephthah vowed vow lord said if thou shalt without fail deliver children ammon mine hands
then whatsoever cometh forth doors house meet return peace children ammon surely lord's offer burnt offering
so jephthah passed over children ammon fight against lord delivered hands
smote aroer even till thou come minnith twenty cities plain vineyards very great slaughter thus children ammon subdued before israel
jephthah came mizpeh house behold daughter out meet timbrels dances she only child beside her had neither son nor
came pass saw her rent clothes said alas daughter thou hast brought very low art one trouble opened mouth lord cannot go back
she said father if thou hast opened thy mouth lord do according hath proceeded out forasmuch taken vengeance thee thine enemies even children ammon
she said her father let thing done alone two months may go down upon mountains bewail virginity fellows
said go sent her away two months she went companions bewailed virginity upon mountains
came pass at end two months she returned her father who did according vow had vowed knew no man custom israel
daughters israel went yearly lament daughter jephthah gileadite four days year
men ephraim gathered themselves together went northward said jephthah wherefore passedst thou over fight against children ammon didst call us go thee we burn thine house upon fire
jephthah said people at great strife children ammon called you ye delivered out hands
saw ye delivered put life hands passed over against children ammon lord hand wherefore then come day fight
then jephthah gathered together men gilead fought ephraim smote because said ye gileadites fugitives among ephraimites manassites
gileadites took passages jordan before ephraimites so those escaped said let go over men gilead art thou ephraimite if nay
then said say now shibboleth sibboleth could frame pronounce right took slew at passages jordan there fell time ephraimites forty two thousand
jephthah judged israel six years then died gileadite buried one cities gilead
after ibzan bethlehem judged israel
had thirty sons daughters whom sent abroad took judged israel seven years
then died ibzan buried at bethlehem
after elon zebulonite judged israel ten years
elon zebulonite died buried aijalon country zebulun
after abdon son hillel pirathonite judged israel
had forty sons thirty nephews rode on threescore ten ass colts judged israel eight years
abdon son hillel pirathonite died buried pirathon land ephraim mount amalekites
children israel did evil again sight lord delivered hand philistines forty years
there certain man zorah family danites whose name manoah wife barren bare
angel lord appeared woman said her behold now thou art barren bearest shalt conceive bear son
now therefore beware pray thee drink wine nor strong eat any unclean thing
lo thou shalt conceive bear son no razor come on head child nazarite god womb begin deliver israel out hand philistines
then woman came told her husband saying man god countenance like angel very terrible asked whence neither name
said behold thou shalt conceive bear son now drink no wine nor strong neither eat any unclean thing child nazarite god womb day death
then manoah intreated lord said o let man god thou didst send come again us teach what we do child born
god hearkened voice manoah angel came again woman she sat field her husband
woman made haste ran shewed her husband said behold man hath appeared came other day
manoah arose went after wife came man said art thou spakest woman am
manoah said now let thy words come pass how we order child do
angel lord said manoah woman let her beware
she may eat any thing cometh vine neither let her drink wine or strong nor unclean commanded observe
manoah said angel lord pray thee let us detain until we made ready kid
angel lord said manoah though thou detain eat thy bread if wilt offer burnt offering must knew
manoah said angel lord what thy name sayings come pass we may do thee honour
angel lord said why askest thou thus after name seeing secret
so manoah took kid meat offering offered upon rock lord angel did wondrously wife looked on
came pass flame went toward heaven off altar angel lord ascended manoah wife looked on fell faces ground
angel lord did no more appear manoah wife then knew
manoah said wife we surely die because seen god
wife said if lord pleased kill us would received burnt offering meat at our hands neither shewed these things nor time told such
woman bare son called name samson child grew lord blessed
spirit lord began move at times camp dan between zorah eshtaol
samson went down timnath saw woman daughters philistines
came told father mother said seen woman timnath daughters philistines now therefore get her wife
then father mother said there never woman among daughters thy brethren or people thou goest take wife uncircumcised philistines samson get her she pleaseth well
father mother knew lord sought occasion against philistines at time had dominion over israel
then went samson down father mother timnath came vineyards behold young lion roared against
spirit lord came mightily upon rent would kid had nothing hand told father or mother what done
went down talked woman she pleased samson well
after time returned take her turned aside see carcase lion behold there swarm bees honey
took thereof hands went on eating came father mother gave did eat told had taken honey out carcase lion
so father went down woman samson made there feast used young men do
came pass saw brought thirty companions
samson said now put forth riddle you if ye can certainly declare within seven days feast find out then give thirty sheets change garments
if ye cannot declare then give thirty sheets change garments said put forth thy riddle we may hear
said out eater came forth meat strong sweetness could three days expound riddle
came pass on seventh day said samson's wife entice thy husband may declare us riddle lest we burn thee father's house fire ye called take so
samson's wife wept before said thou dost hate lovest hast put forth riddle children people told her behold father nor mother tell thee
she wept before seven days while feast lasted came pass on seventh day told her because lay sore upon riddle children people
men city said on seventh day before sun went down what sweeter than honey stronger lion if ye had plowed heifer found out riddle
spirit lord came upon went down ashkelon slew thirty men took spoil gave change garments expounded riddle anger kindled father's house
samson's wife given companion whom had used friend
came pass within while after time wheat harvest samson visited wife kid said go chamber her father would suffer
her father said verily thought thou hadst utterly hated therefore gave thy companion younger sister fairer than she take pray thee instead
samson said concerning now more blameless than philistines though do displeasure
samson went caught three hundred foxes took firebrands turned tail put firebrand midst between two tails
had set brands on fire let go standing corn philistines burnt both shocks also vineyards olives
then philistines said who hath done answered samson son law timnite because had taken wife given her companion came burnt father fire
samson said though ye done yet avenged you after cease
smote hip thigh great slaughter went down dwelt top rock etam
then philistines went pitched judah spread themselves lehi
men judah said why ye come against us answered bind samson we do hath done
then three thousand men judah went top rock etam said samson knowest thou philistines rulers over us what hast done did so
said we come down bind thee may deliver hand philistines samson swear ye fall upon yourselves
spake saying no we bind thee fast deliver hand surely kill bound two new cords brought rock
came lehi philistines shouted against spirit lord mightily upon cords arms became flax burnt fire bands loosed off hands
found new jawbone ass put forth hand took slew thousand men therewith
samson said jawbone ass heaps upon jaw slain thousand men
came pass had made end speaking cast away jawbone out hand called place ramathlehi
sore athirst called on lord said thou hast given great deliverance hand thy servant now die thirst fall uncircumcised
god clave hollow place jaw there came water thereout had drunk spirit again revived wherefore called name thereof enhakkore lehi day
judged israel days philistines twenty years
then went samson gaza saw there harlot her
told gazites saying samson come hither compassed laid wait night gate city quiet morning day we kill
samson lay till midnight arose at took doors gate city two posts went away bar put upon shoulders carried top hill before hebron
came pass afterward loved woman valley sorek whose name delilah
lords philistines came her said entice see wherein great strength lieth by what means we may prevail against bind afflict give thee every one us eleven hundred pieces silver
delilah said samson tell pray thee wherein thy great strength lieth wherewith thou mightest bound afflict
samson said her if bind seven green withs never dried then weak another man
then lords philistines brought her seven green withs had been dried she bound
now there men lying wait abiding her chamber she said philistines upon thee samson brake withs thread tow broken toucheth fire so strength known
delilah said samson behold thou hast mocked told lies now tell pray thee wherewith mightest bound
said her if bind fast new ropes never occupied then weak another man
delilah therefore took new ropes bound therewith said philistines upon thee samson there liers wait abiding chamber brake off arms like thread
delilah said samson hitherto thou hast mocked told lies tell wherewith mightest bound her if weavest seven locks head web
she fastened pin said philistines upon thee samson awaked out sleep went away beam web
she said how canst thou say love thee thine heart hast mocked these three times told wherein thy great strength lieth
came pass she pressed daily her words urged so soul vexed death
told her heart said there hath come razor upon mine head been nazarite god mother's womb if shaven then strength go become weak like any other man
delilah saw had told her heart she sent called lords philistines saying come once hath shewed then came brought money hand
she made sleep upon her knees called man caused shave off seven locks head began afflict strength went
she said philistines upon thee samson awoke out sleep go at other times before shake myself wist lord departed
philistines took put out eyes brought down gaza bound fetters brass did grind prison house
howbeit hair head began grow again after shaven
then lords philistines gathered together offer great sacrifice dagon god rejoice said our hath delivered samson enemy hand
people saw praised god said our hath delivered hands enemy destroyer country slew many us
came pass hearts merry said call samson may make us sport called out prison house made set between pillars
samson said lad held by hand suffer may feel pillars whereupon house standeth lean upon
now house full men women lords philistines there upon roof about three thousand beheld while samson made sport
samson called lord said o god remember pray thee strengthen only once may at avenged philistines two eyes
samson took hold two middle pillars upon house stood on borne one right hand other left
samson said let die philistines bowed himself might house fell upon lords people therein so dead slew at death more than life
then brethren house father came down took brought buried between zorah eshtaol buryingplace manoah judged israel twenty years
there man mount ephraim whose name micah
said mother eleven hundred shekels silver taken thee about thou cursedst spakest also mine ears behold took blessed lord son
had restored eleven hundred shekels silver mother said wholly dedicated lord hand son make graven image molten now therefore restore thee
yet restored money mother took two hundred shekels silver gave founder who made thereof graven image molten house micah
man micah had house gods made ephod teraphim consecrated one sons who became priest
those days there no king israel every man did right own eyes
there young man out bethlehemjudah family judah who levite sojourned
man departed out city bethlehemjudah sojourn where could find place came mount ephraim house micah journeyed
micah said whence comest thou am levite bethlehemjudah go sojourn where may find place
micah said dwell father priest give thee ten shekels silver by year suit apparel thy victuals so levite went
levite content dwell man young one sons
micah consecrated levite young man became priest house
then said micah now know lord do good seeing levite priest
those days there no king israel tribe danites sought inheritance dwell day had fallen among tribes
children dan sent family five men coasts valour zorah eshtaol spy out land search said go who came mount ephraim house micah lodged there
by house micah knew voice young man levite turned thither said who brought thee hither what makest thou place hast here
said thus dealeth micah hath hired am priest
said ask counsel we pray thee god may know whether our way go prosperous
priest said go peace before lord your way wherein ye
then five men departed came laish saw people therein how dwelt careless after manner zidonians quiet secure there no magistrate land might put shame any thing far had business man
came brethren zorah eshtaol said what say ye
said arise we may go against seen land behold very good ye still slothful enter possess
ye go come people secure large land god hath given your hands place where there no want any thing earth
there went thence family danites out zorah eshtaol six hundred men appointed weapons war
went pitched kirjathjearim judah wherefore called place mahanehdan day behold behind
passed thence mount ephraim came house micah
then answered five men went spy out country laish said brethren do ye know there these houses ephod teraphim graven image molten now therefore consider what
turned thitherward came house young man levite even micah saluted
six hundred men appointed weapons war children dan stood by entering gate
five men went spy out land came thither took graven image ephod teraphim molten priest stood entering gate six hundred appointed weapons war
these went micah's house fetched carved image ephod teraphim molten then said priest what do ye
said hold thy peace lay thine hand upon mouth go us father priest better thee house one man or thou tribe family israel
priest's heart glad took ephod teraphim graven image went midst people
so turned departed put little ones cattle carriage before
good way house micah men houses near micah's gathered together overtook children dan
cried children dan turned faces said micah what aileth thee thou comest such company
said ye taken away gods made priest gone what more say aileth thee
children dan said let thy voice heard among us lest angry fellows run upon thee thou lose life lives household
children dan went way micah saw too strong turned back house
took things micah had made priest came laish people at quiet secure smote edge sword burnt city fire
there no deliverer because far zidon had business any man valley lieth by bethrehob built city dwelt therein
called name city dan after father who born israel howbeit laish at first
children dan set graven image jonathan son gershom manasseh sons priests tribe until day captivity land
set micah's graven image made time house god shiloh
came pass those days there no king israel certain levite sojourning on side mount ephraim who took concubine out bethlehemjudah
concubine played whore against went away her father's house bethlehemjudah there four whole months
her husband arose went after speak friendly bring again having servant couple asses she brought father's house father damsel saw rejoiced meet
father law damsel's retained abode three days so did eat drink lodged there
came pass on fourth day arose early morning rose depart damsel's father said son law comfort thine heart morsel bread afterward go your way
sat down did eat drink both together damsel's father had said man content pray thee tarry night let thine heart merry
man rose depart father law urged therefore lodged there again
arose early morning on fifth day depart damsel's father said comfort thine heart pray thee tarried until afternoon did eat both
man rose depart concubine servant father law damsel's said behold now day draweth toward evening pray you tarry night groweth end lodge here thine heart may merry morrow get early on your way thou mayest go home
man would tarry night rose departed came over against jebus jerusalem there two asses saddled concubine also
by jebus day far spent servant said master come pray thee let us turn city jebusites lodge
master said we turn aside hither city stranger children israel pass over gibeah
said servant come let us draw near one these places lodge night gibeah or ramah
passed on went way sun down upon by gibeah belongeth benjamin
turned aside thither go lodge gibeah went sat down street city there no man took house lodging
behold there came old man work out field at even also mount ephraim sojourned gibeah men place benjamites
had lifted eyes saw wayfaring man street city old said whither goest thou whence comest
said we passing bethlehemjudah toward side mount ephraim thence am went now going house lord there no man receiveth
yet there both straw provender our asses bread wine also thy handmaid young man servants no want any thing
old man said peace thee howsoever let thy wants lie upon only lodge street
so brought house gave provender asses washed feet did eat drink
now making hearts merry behold men city certain sons belial beset house round about beat at door spake master old man saying bring forth came thine we may know
man master house went out said nay brethren pray you do so wickedly seeing come mine folly
behold here daughter maiden concubine bring out now humble ye do what seemeth good you man so vile thing
men would hearken so man took concubine brought her forth knew abused night until morning day began spring let go
then came woman dawning day fell down at door man's house where her lord till light
her lord rose morning opened doors house went out go way behold woman concubine fallen down at door hands upon threshold
said her let us going none answered then man took upon ass rose gat place
come house took knife laid hold on concubine divided her together bones twelve pieces sent coasts israel
so saw said there no such deed done nor seen day children israel came out land egypt consider take advice speak your minds
then children israel went out congregation gathered together one man dan even beersheba land gilead lord mizpeh
chief people even tribes israel presented themselves assembly god four hundred thousand footmen drew sword
now children benjamin heard israel gone mizpeh then said tell us how wickedness
levite husband woman slain answered said came gibeah belongeth benjamin concubine lodge
men gibeah rose against beset house round about upon by night thought slain concubine forced she dead
took concubine cut her pieces sent throughout country inheritance israel committed lewdness folly
behold ye children israel give here your advice counsel
people arose one man saying we any us go tent neither turn house
now thing we do gibeah go by lot against
we take ten men hundred throughout tribes israel thousand out fetch victual people may do come gibeah benjamin according folly wrought
so men israel gathered against city knit together one man
tribes israel sent men through tribe benjamin saying what wickedness done among you
now therefore deliver us men children belial gibeah we may put death away evil israel benjamin would hearken voice brethren
children benjamin gathered themselves together out cities gibeah go battle against israel
children benjamin numbered at time out cities twenty six thousand men drew sword beside inhabitants gibeah seven hundred chosen
among people there seven hundred chosen men lefthanded every one could sling stones at hair breadth miss
men israel beside benjamin numbered four hundred thousand drew sword these war
children israel arose went house god asked counsel said us go first battle against benjamin lord judah
children israel rose morning encamped against gibeah
men israel went out battle against benjamin put themselves array fight at gibeah
children benjamin came forth out gibeah destroyed down ground israelites day twenty two thousand men
people men israel encouraged themselves set battle again array place where put first day
children israel went wept before lord until even asked counsel saying go again battle against benjamin brother said
children israel came near against benjamin second day
benjamin went forth against out gibeah second day destroyed down ground children israel again eighteen thousand men these drew sword
then children israel people went came house god wept sat there before lord fasted day until even offered burnt offerings peace
children israel enquired lord ark covenant god there those days
phinehas son eleazar aaron stood before those days saying yet again go out battle against children benjamin brother or cease lord said morrow deliver thine hand
israel set liers wait round about gibeah
children israel went against benjamin on third day put themselves array gibeah at other times
children benjamin went out against people drawn away city began smite kill at other times highways one goeth house god gibeah field about thirty men israel
children benjamin said smitten down before us at first israel let flee draw city highways
men israel rose out place put themselves array at baaltamar liers wait came forth places even meadows gibeah
there came against gibeah ten thousand chosen men out israel battle sore knew evil near
lord smote benjamin before israel children destroyed benjamites day twenty five thousand hundred men these drew sword
so children benjamin saw smitten men israel gave place benjamites because trusted liers wait had set beside gibeah
liers wait hasted rushed upon gibeah drew themselves along smote city edge sword
now there appointed sign between men israel liers wait should make great flame smoke rise out city
men israel retired battle benjamin began smite kill about thirty persons said surely smitten down before us first
flame began arise out city pillar smoke benjamites looked behind behold ascended heaven
men israel turned again benjamin amazed saw evil come upon
therefore turned backs before men israel way wilderness battle overtook came out cities destroyed midst
thus inclosed benjamites round about chased trode down ease over against gibeah toward sunrising
there fell benjamin eighteen thousand men these valour
turned fled toward wilderness rock rimmon gleaned highways five thousand men pursued hard after gidom slew two
so fell day benjamin twenty five thousand men drew sword these valour
six hundred men turned fled wilderness rock rimmon abode four months
men israel turned again upon children benjamin smote edge sword well every city beast came hand also set on fire cities
now men israel had sworn mizpeh saying there any us give daughter benjamin wife
people came house god abode there till even before lifted voices wept sore
said o lord god israel why come pass there should day one tribe lacking
came pass on morrow people rose early built there altar offered burnt offerings peace
children israel said who there among tribes came congregation lord had made great oath concerning mizpeh saying surely put death
children israel repented benjamin brother said there one tribe cut off day
how we do wives remain seeing sworn by lord give our daughters
said what one there tribes israel came mizpeh lord behold none camp jabeshgilead assembly
people numbered behold there none inhabitants jabeshgilead
congregation sent thither twelve thousand men valiantest commanded saying go smite inhabitants jabeshgilead edge sword women children
thing ye do utterly destroy every male woman hath lain by man
found among inhabitants jabeshgilead four hundred young virgins had known no man by lying any male brought camp shiloh land canaan
whole congregation sent some speak children benjamin rock rimmon call peaceably
benjamin came again at time gave wives had saved alive women jabeshgilead yet so sufficed
people repented benjamin because lord had made breach tribes israel
then elders congregation said how we do wives remain seeing women destroyed out benjamin
said there must inheritance escaped benjamin tribe destroyed out israel
howbeit we may give wives our daughters children israel sworn saying cursed giveth wife benjamin
then said behold there feast lord shiloh yearly place on north side bethel east highway goeth shechem south lebonah
therefore commanded children benjamin saying go lie wait vineyards
see behold if daughters shiloh come out dance dances then ye vineyards catch you every man wife go land benjamin
fathers or brethren come us complain we say favourable our sakes because reserved each man wife war ye did give at time should guilty
children benjamin did so took wives according number danced whom caught went returned inheritance repaired cities dwelt
children israel departed thence at time every man tribe family went out inheritance
those days there no king israel every man did right own eyes
now came pass days judges ruled there famine land certain man bethlehemjudah went sojourn country moab wife two sons
name man elimelech wife naomi two sons mahlon chilion ephrathites bethlehemjudah came country moab continued there
elimelech naomi's husband died she left her two sons
took wives women moab name one orpah other ruth dwelled there about ten years
mahlon chilion died also both woman left her two sons husband
then she arose her daughters law might return country moab had heard how lord visited people giving bread
wherefore she went forth out place where her two daughters law on way return land judah
naomi said her two daughters law go return each mother's house lord deal kindly you ye dealt dead
lord grant you ye may find rest each house her husband then she kissed lifted voice wept
said her surely we return thee thy people
naomi said turn again daughters why ye go there yet any more sons womb may your husbands
turn again daughters go your way am too old husband if should say hope also night bear sons
would ye tarry till grown stay having husbands nay daughters grieveth much your sakes hand lord gone out against
lifted voice wept again orpah kissed her mother law ruth clave
she said behold thy sister law gone back her people gods return thou after
ruth said intreat leave thee or return following after whither thou goest go where lodgest lodge thy people god
where thou diest die there buried lord do so more also if ought death part thee
she saw stedfastly minded go her then left speaking
so two went until came bethlehem pass come city moved about said naomi
she said call naomi mara almighty hath dealt very bitterly
went out full lord hath brought home again empty why then call ye naomi seeing testified against almighty afflicted
so naomi returned ruth moabitess her daughter law out country moab came bethlehem beginning barley harvest
naomi had kinsman her husband's mighty man wealth family elimelech name boaz
ruth moabitess said naomi let now go field glean ears corn after whose sight find grace she her daughter
she went came gleaned field after reapers her hap light on part belonging boaz who kindred elimelech
behold boaz came bethlehem said reapers lord you answered bless thee
then said boaz servant set over reapers whose damsel
servant set over reapers answered said moabitish damsel came back naomi out country moab
she said pray you let glean gather after reapers among sheaves so came hath continued even morning until now tarried little house
then said boaz ruth hearest thou daughter go glean another field neither hence abide here fast by maidens
let thine eyes on field do reap go thou after charged young men touch thee art athirst vessels drink drawn
then she fell on her face bowed herself ground said why found grace thine eyes thou shouldest take knowledge seeing am stranger
boaz answered said her hath fully been shewed thou hast done thy mother law since death thine husband how left father land nativity art come people knewest heretofore
lord recompense thy work full reward given thee god israel under whose wings thou art come trust
then she said let find favour thy sight lord thou hast comforted spoken friendly thine handmaid though like one handmaidens
boaz said her at mealtime come thou hither eat bread dip thy morsel vinegar she sat beside reapers reached parched corn did sufficed left
she risen glean boaz commanded young men saying let her even among sheaves reproach
let fall also some handfuls purpose her leave she may glean rebuke
so she gleaned field until even beat out had about ephah barley
she took went city her mother law saw what had gleaned brought forth gave reserved after sufficed
her mother law said where hast thou gleaned day wroughtest blessed did take knowledge thee she shewed whom had wrought man's name boaz
naomi said her daughter law blessed lord who hath left off kindness living dead man near kin us one our next kinsmen
ruth moabitess said also thou shalt keep fast by young men until ended harvest
naomi said ruth her daughter law good thou go out maidens meet thee any other field
so she kept fast by maidens boaz glean end barley harvest wheat dwelt her mother law
then naomi her mother law said daughter seek rest thee may well
now boaz our kindred whose maidens thou wast behold winnoweth barley night threshingfloor
wash thyself therefore anoint thee put thy raiment upon get down floor make known man until done eating drinking
lieth down thou shalt mark place where lie go uncover feet lay thee tell what do
she said her thou sayest do
she went down floor did according her mother law bade
boaz had eaten drunk heart merry went lie down at end heap corn she came softly uncovered feet laid her
came pass at midnight man afraid turned himself behold woman lay feet
said who art thou she answered am ruth thine handmaid spread therefore thy skirt over near kinsman
said blessed thou lord daughter hast shewed more kindness latter end than at beginning inasmuch followedst young men whether poor or rich
now daughter fear do thee thou requirest city people doth know art virtuous woman
