now true am thy near kinsman howbeit there nearer than
tarry night morning if perform thee part kinsman well let do kinsman's then lord liveth lie down until
she lay at feet until morning rose before one could know another said let known woman came floor
also said bring vail thou hast upon thee hold she held measured six measures barley laid on her went city
she came her mother law said who art thou daughter told man had done
she said these six measures barley gave go empty thy mother law
then said she sit still daughter until thou know how matter fall man rest finished thing day
then went boaz gate sat down there behold kinsman whom spake came by said ho such one turn aside sit here turned
took ten men elders city said sit ye down here sat
said kinsman naomi come again out country moab selleth parcel land our brother elimelech's
thought advertise thee saying buy before inhabitants elders people if thou wilt redeem then tell may know there none beside am after said
then said boaz what day thou buyest field hand naomi must buy also ruth moabitess wife dead raise name upon inheritance
kinsman said cannot redeem myself lest mar mine own inheritance thou right thyself
now manner former time israel concerning redeeming changing confirm things man plucked off shoe gave neighbour testimony
therefore kinsman said boaz buy thee so drew off shoe
boaz said elders people ye witnesses day bought elimelech's chilion's mahlon's hand naomi
moreover ruth moabitess wife mahlon purchased raise name dead upon inheritance cut off among brethren gate place ye witnesses day
people gate elders said we witnesses lord make woman come thine house like rachel leah two did build israel do thou worthily ephratah famous bethlehem
let thy house like pharez whom tamar bare judah seed lord give thee young woman
so boaz took ruth she wife went her lord gave conception bare son
women said naomi blessed lord hath left thee day without kinsman name may famous israel
thee restorer thy life nourisher thine old age daughter law loveth better than seven sons hath born
naomi took child laid her bosom became nurse
women her neighbours gave name saying there son born naomi called obed father jesse david
now these generations pharez begat hezron
hezron begat ram amminadab
amminadab begat nahshon salmon
salmon begat boaz obed
obed begat jesse david
now there certain man ramathaimzophim mount ephraim name elkanah son jeroham elihu tohu zuph ephrathite
had two wives name one hannah other peninnah children no
man went out city yearly worship sacrifice lord hosts shiloh two sons eli hophni phinehas priests there
time elkanah offered gave peninnah wife her sons daughters portions
hannah gave worthy portion loved lord had shut her womb
her adversary also provoked sore make fret because lord had shut womb
did so year by she went house lord provoked her therefore wept eat
then said elkanah her husband hannah why weepest thou eatest thy heart grieved am better thee than ten sons
so hannah rose after had eaten shiloh drunk now eli priest sat upon seat by post temple lord
she bitterness soul prayed lord wept sore
she vowed vow said o lord hosts if thou wilt indeed look on affliction thine handmaid remember forget give man child then days life there no razor come upon head
came pass she continued praying before lord eli marked her mouth
now hannah she spake her heart only lips moved voice heard therefore eli thought had been drunken
eli said her how long wilt thou drunken put away thy wine thee
hannah answered said no lord am woman sorrowful spirit drunk neither wine nor strong drink poured out soul before
count thine handmaid daughter belial out abundance complaint grief spoken hitherto
then eli answered said go peace god israel grant thee thy petition thou hast asked
she said let thine handmaid find grace thy sight so woman went her way did eat countenance no more sad
rose morning early worshipped before lord returned came house ramah elkanah knew hannah wife remembered her
wherefore came pass time come about after hannah had conceived she bare son called name samuel saying because asked lord
man elkanah house went offer lord yearly sacrifice vow
hannah went she said her husband go until child weaned then bring may appear before lord there abide ever
elkanah her husband said do what seemeth thee good tarry until thou weaned only lord establish word so woman abode gave son suck she
she had weaned took her three bullocks one ephah flour bottle wine brought house lord shiloh child young
slew bullock brought child eli
she said oh lord thy soul liveth am woman stood by thee here praying
child prayed lord hath given petition asked
therefore also lent lord long liveth worshipped there
hannah prayed said heart rejoiceth lord mine horn exalted mouth enlarged over enemies because rejoice thy salvation
there none holy lord beside thee neither any rock like our god
talk no more so exceeding proudly let arrogancy come out your mouth lord god knowledge by actions weighed
bows mighty men broken stumbled girded strength
full hired out themselves bread hungry ceased so barren hath born seven she many children waxed feeble
lord killeth maketh alive bringeth down grave
lord maketh poor rich bringeth low lifteth
raiseth poor out dust lifteth beggar dunghill set among princes make inherit throne glory pillars earth lord's hath world upon
keep feet saints wicked silent darkness by strength no man prevail
adversaries lord broken pieces out heaven thunder upon judge ends earth give strength king exalt horn anointed
elkanah went ramah house child did minister lord before eli priest
now sons eli belial knew lord
priests' custom people any man offered sacrifice priest's servant came while flesh seething fleshhook three teeth hand
struck pan or kettle caldron pot fleshhook brought priest took himself so did shiloh israelites came thither
also before burnt fat priest's servant came said man sacrificed give flesh roast priest sodden thee raw
if any man said let fail burn fat presently then take much thy soul desireth would answer nay thou shalt give now by force
wherefore sin young men very great before lord abhorred offering
samuel ministered before lord being child girded linen ephod
moreover mother made little coat brought year she came her husband offer yearly sacrifice
eli blessed elkanah wife said lord give thee seed woman loan lent went own home
lord visited hannah so she conceived bare three sons two daughters child samuel grew before
now eli very old heard sons did israel how lay women assembled at door tabernacle congregation
said why do ye such things hear your evil dealings by people
nay sons no good report hear ye make lord's people transgress
if one man sin against another judge lord who intreat notwithstanding hearkened voice father because would slay
child samuel grew on favour both lord also men
there came man god eli said thus saith lord did plainly appear house thy father egypt pharaoh's
did choose out tribes israel priest offer upon mine altar burn incense wear ephod before give house thy father offerings made by fire children
wherefore kick ye at sacrifice mine offering commanded habitation honourest thy sons above make yourselves fat chiefest offerings israel people
wherefore lord god israel saith said indeed thy house father should walk before ever now far honour despise lightly esteemed
behold days come cut off thine arm thy father's house there old man
thou shalt see enemy habitation wealth god give israel there old man thine house ever
man thine whom cut off mine altar consume eyes grieve heart increase house die flower age
sign thee come upon thy two sons on hophni phinehas one day die both
raise faithful priest do according mine heart mind build sure house walk before anointed ever
come pass every one left thine house crouch piece silver morsel bread say put pray thee priests' offices may eat
child samuel ministered lord before eli word precious those days there no open vision
came pass at time eli laid down place eyes began wax dim could see
ere lamp god went out temple lord where ark samuel laid down sleep
lord called samuel answered here am
ran eli said here am thou calledst called lie down again went lay
lord called yet again samuel arose went eli said here am thou didst call answered son lie down
now samuel did yet know lord neither word revealed
lord called samuel again third time arose went eli said here am thou didst call perceived had child
therefore eli said samuel go lie down if call thee thou shalt say speak lord thy servant heareth so went lay place
lord came stood called at other times samuel then answered speak thy servant heareth
lord said samuel behold do thing israel at both ears every one heareth tingle
day perform against eli things spoken concerning house begin also make end
told judge house ever iniquity knoweth because sons made themselves vile restrained
therefore sworn house eli iniquity eli's purged sacrifice nor offering ever
samuel lay until morning opened doors house lord feared shew eli vision
then eli called samuel said son answered here am
said what thing lord hath thee pray hide god do so more also if thou any things
samuel told every whit hid nothing said lord let do what seemeth good
samuel grew lord did let none words fall ground
israel dan even beersheba knew samuel established prophet lord
lord appeared again shiloh revealed himself samuel by word
word samuel came israel now went out against philistines battle pitched beside ebenezer aphek
philistines put themselves array against israel joined battle smitten before slew army field about four thousand men
people come camp elders israel said wherefore hath lord smitten us day before philistines let fetch ark covenant out shiloh cometh among may save hand our enemies
so people sent shiloh might bring thence ark covenant lord hosts dwelleth between cherubims two sons eli hophni phinehas there god
ark covenant lord came camp israel shouted great shout so earth rang again
philistines heard noise shout said what meaneth great camp hebrews understood ark lord come
philistines afraid said god come camp woe us there hath been such thing heretofore
woe us who deliver out hand these mighty gods smote egyptians plagues wilderness
strong quit yourselves like men o ye philistines servants hebrews been you fight
philistines fought israel smitten fled every man tent there very great slaughter fell thirty thousand footmen
ark god taken two sons eli hophni phinehas slain
there ran man benjamin out army came shiloh same day clothes rent earth upon head
came lo eli sat upon seat by wayside watching heart trembled ark god man city told cried out
eli heard noise crying said what meaneth tumult man came hastily told
now eli ninety eight years old eyes dim could see
man said eli am came out army fled day what there done son
messenger answered said israel fled before philistines there hath been also great slaughter among people thy two sons hophni phinehas dead ark god taken
came pass made mention ark god fell off seat backward by side gate neck brake died old man heavy had judged israel forty years
daughter law phinehas' wife child near delivered she heard tidings ark god taken her father husband dead bowed herself travailed pains came upon
about time her death women stood by said fear thou hast born son she answered neither did regard
she named child ichabod saying glory departed israel because ark god taken her father law husband
she said glory departed israel ark god taken
philistines took ark god brought ebenezer ashdod
philistines took ark god brought house dagon set by
ashdod arose early on morrow behold dagon fallen upon face earth before ark lord took set place again
arose early on morrow morning behold dagon fallen upon face ground before ark lord head both palms hands cut off threshold only stump left
therefore neither priests dagon nor any come dagon's house tread on threshold ashdod day
hand lord heavy upon ashdod destroyed smote emerods even coasts thereof
men ashdod saw so said ark god israel abide us hand sore upon dagon our
sent therefore gathered lords philistines said what we do ark god israel answered let carried about gath thither
so after had carried about hand lord against city very great destruction smote men both small emerods secret parts
therefore sent ark god ekron came pass ekronites cried out saying brought about israel us slay our people
so sent gathered together lords philistines said send away ark god israel let go again own place slay us our people there deadly destruction throughout city hand very heavy
men died smitten emerods cry city went heaven
ark lord country philistines seven months
philistines called priests diviners saying what we do ark lord tell us wherewith send place
said if ye send away ark god israel empty any wise return trespass offering then healed known you why hand removed
then said what trespass offering we return answered five golden emerods mice according number lords philistines one plague on you your
wherefore ye make images your emerods mice mar land give glory god israel peradventure lighten hand off you gods
wherefore then do ye harden your hearts egyptians pharaoh hardened had wrought wonderfully among did let people go departed
now therefore make new cart take two milch kine on there hath come no yoke tie bring calves home
take ark lord lay upon cart put jewels gold ye return trespass offering coffer by side thereof send away may go
see if goeth by way own coast bethshemesh then hath done us great evil we know hand smote chance happened
men did so took two milch kine tied cart shut calves at home
laid ark lord upon cart coffer mice gold images emerods
kine took straight way bethshemesh went along highway lowing turned aside right hand or left lords philistines after border
bethshemesh reaping wheat harvest valley lifted eyes saw ark rejoiced see
cart came field joshua bethshemite stood there where great stone clave wood offered kine burnt offering lord
levites took down ark lord coffer wherein jewels gold put on great stone men bethshemesh offered burnt offerings sacrificed sacrifices same day
five lords philistines had seen returned ekron same day
these golden emerods philistines returned trespass offering lord ashdod one gaza askelon gath ekron
golden mice according number cities philistines belonging five lords both fenced country villages even great stone abel whereon set down ark lord remaineth day field joshua bethshemite
smote men bethshemesh because had looked ark lord even people fifty thousand threescore ten lamented smitten many great slaughter
men bethshemesh said who able stand before holy lord god whom go us
sent messengers inhabitants kirjathjearim saying philistines brought again ark lord come ye down fetch you
men kirjathjearim came fetched ark lord brought house abinadab hill sanctified eleazar son keep
came pass while ark abode kirjathjearim time long twenty years house israel lamented after lord
samuel spake house israel saying if ye do return lord your hearts then put away strange gods ashtaroth among you prepare serve only deliver out hand philistines
then children israel did put away baalim ashtaroth served lord only
samuel said gather israel mizpeh pray you lord
gathered together mizpeh drew water poured out before lord fasted on day said there we sinned against samuel judged children israel
philistines heard children israel gathered together mizpeh lords went against afraid
children israel said samuel cease cry lord our god us save out hand philistines
samuel took sucking lamb offered burnt offering wholly lord cried israel heard
samuel offering burnt philistines drew near battle against israel lord thundered great thunder on day upon discomfited smitten before
men israel went out mizpeh pursued philistines smote until came under bethcar
then samuel took stone set between mizpeh shen called name ebenezer saying hitherto hath lord helped us
so philistines subdued came no more coast israel hand lord against days samuel
cities philistines had taken israel restored ekron even gath coasts thereof did deliver out hands there peace between amorites
samuel judged israel days life
went year circuit bethel gilgal mizpeh judged israel those places
return ramah there house judged israel built altar lord
came pass samuel old made sons judges over israel
now name firstborn joel second abiah judges beersheba
sons walked ways turned aside after lucre took bribes perverted judgment
then elders israel gathered themselves together came samuel ramah
said behold thou art old thy sons walk ways now make us king judge like nations
thing displeased samuel said give us king judge prayed lord
lord said samuel hearken voice people say thee rejected should reign over
according works done since day brought out egypt even wherewith forsaken served other gods so do also thee
now therefore hearken voice howbeit yet protest solemnly shew manner king reign over
samuel told words lord people asked king
said manner king reign over you take your sons appoint himself chariots horsemen some run before
appoint captains over thousands fifties set ear ground reap harvest make instruments war chariots
take your daughters confectionaries cooks bakers
take your fields vineyards oliveyards even best give servants
take tenth your seed vineyards give officers servants
take your menservants maidservants goodliest young men asses put work
take tenth your sheep ye servants
ye cry out day because your king chosen you lord hear
nevertheless people refused obey voice samuel said nay we king over us
we also may like nations our king judge us go out before fight battles
samuel heard words people rehearsed ears lord
lord said samuel hearken voice make king men israel go ye every man city
now there man benjamin whose name kish son abiel zeror bechorath aphiah benjamite mighty power
had son whose name saul choice young man goodly there among children israel goodlier person than shoulders upward higher any people
asses kish saul's father lost said saul son take now one servants thee arise go seek
passed through mount ephraim land shalisha found then shalim there benjamites
come land zuph saul said servant let us return lest father leave caring asses take thought
said behold now there city man god honourable saith cometh surely pass let us go thither peradventure can shew our way we should
then said saul servant behold if we go what bring man bread spent our vessels there present god
servant answered saul again said behold here at hand fourth part shekel silver give man god tell us our way
beforetime israel man went enquire god thus spake come let us go seer now called prophet
then said saul servant well come let us go so went city where man god
went hill city found young maidens going out draw water said seer here
answered said behold before you make haste now came day city there sacrifice people high place
soon ye come city straightway find before go high place eat people until because doth bless sacrifice afterwards bidden now therefore get you about time
went city come behold samuel came out against go high place
now lord had told samuel ear day before saul came saying
morrow about time send thee man out land benjamin thou shalt anoint captain over people israel may save hand philistines looked upon because cry come
samuel saw saul lord said behold man whom spake thee same reign over people
then saul drew near samuel gate said tell pray thee where seer's house
samuel answered saul said am seer go before high place ye eat day morrow let thee tell thine heart
thine asses lost three days ago set thy mind on found whom desire israel thee father's house
saul answered said am benjamite smallest tribes israel family least families tribe benjamin wherefore then speakest thou so
samuel took saul servant brought parlour made sit chiefest place among bidden about thirty persons
samuel said cook bring portion gave thee set by
cook took shoulder upon set before saul samuel said behold left thee eat time hath been kept since invited people so did day
come down high place city samuel communed saul upon top house
arose early came pass about spring day samuel called saul top house saying may send thee away went out both abroad
going down end city samuel said saul bid servant pass on before us passed stand thou still while may shew thee word god
then samuel took vial oil poured upon head kissed said because lord hath anointed thee captain over inheritance
thou art departed day then shalt find two men by rachel's sepulchre border benjamin at zelzah say thee asses wentest seek found lo thy father hath left care sorroweth you saying what do son
then shalt thou go on forward thence come plain tabor there meet thee three men going god bethel one carrying kids another loaves bread bottle wine
salute thee give two loaves bread thou shalt receive hands
after thou shalt come hill god where garrison philistines pass art thither city meet company prophets coming down high place psaltery tabret pipe harp before prophesy
spirit lord come upon thee thou shalt prophesy turned another man
let these signs come thee thou do occasion serve god
thou shalt go down before gilgal behold come thee offer burnt offerings sacrifice sacrifices peace seven days tarry till shew what do
so had turned back go samuel god gave another heart those signs came pass day
came thither hill behold company prophets met spirit god upon prophesied among
came pass knew beforetime saw behold prophesied among prophets then people said one another what come son kish saul also
one same place answered said who father therefore became proverb saul also among prophets
had made end prophesying came high place
saul's uncle said servant whither went ye seek asses we saw no where came samuel
saul's uncle said tell pray thee what samuel you
saul said uncle told us plainly asses found matter kingdom whereof samuel spake
samuel called people together lord mizpeh
said children israel thus saith lord god brought out egypt delivered you hand egyptians kingdoms oppressed
ye day rejected your god who himself saved you out adversities tribulations said nay set king over us now therefore present yourselves before lord by tribes thousands
samuel had caused tribes israel come near tribe benjamin taken
had caused tribe benjamin come near by families family matri taken saul son kish sought could found
therefore enquired lord further if man should yet come thither answered behold hath hid himself among stuff
ran fetched thence stood among people higher than any shoulders upward
samuel said people see ye whom lord hath chosen there none like among shouted god save king
then samuel told people manner kingdom wrote book laid before lord sent away every man house
saul also went home gibeah there band men whose hearts god had touched
children belial said how man save us despised brought no presents held peace
then nahash ammonite came encamped against jabeshgilead men jabesh said make covenant us we serve thee
nahash ammonite answered on condition make covenant you may thrust out your right eyes lay reproach upon israel
elders jabesh said give us seven days' respite we may send messengers coasts israel then if there no man save come out thee
then came messengers gibeah saul told tidings ears people lifted voices wept
behold saul came after herd out field said what aileth people weep told tidings men jabesh
spirit god came upon saul heard those tidings anger kindled greatly
took yoke oxen hewed pieces sent throughout coasts israel by hands messengers saying whosoever cometh forth after saul samuel so done fear lord fell on people came out one consent
numbered bezek children israel three hundred thousand men judah thirty
said messengers came thus ye say men jabeshgilead morrow by time sun hot help shewed jabesh glad
therefore men jabesh said morrow we come out you ye do us seemeth good
so on morrow saul put people three companies came midst host morning watch slew ammonites until heat day pass remained scattered two left together
people said samuel who saul reign over us bring men we may put death
saul said there man put death day lord hath wrought salvation israel
then said samuel people come let us go gilgal renew kingdom there
people went gilgal there made saul king before lord sacrificed sacrifices peace offerings men israel rejoiced greatly
samuel said israel behold hearkened your voice ye made king over you
now behold king walketh before you am old grayheaded sons walked childhood day
behold here am witness against before lord anointed whose ox taken or ass whom defrauded oppressed hand received any bribe blind mine eyes therewith restore you
said thou hast defrauded us nor oppressed neither taken ought any man's hand
said lord witness against you anointed day ye found ought hand answered
samuel said people lord advanced moses aaron brought your fathers out land egypt
now therefore stand still may reason you before lord righteous acts did your fathers
jacob come egypt your fathers cried lord then sent moses aaron brought forth out made dwell place
forgat lord god sold hand sisera captain host hazor philistines king moab fought against
cried lord said we sinned because forsaken served baalim ashtaroth now deliver us out hand our enemies serve thee
lord sent jerubbaal bedan jephthah samuel delivered you out hand your enemies on every side ye dwelled safe
ye saw nahash king children ammon came against you said nay reign over us lord your god
now therefore behold king whom ye chosen desired lord hath set over you
if ye fear lord serve obey voice rebel against commandment then both also king reigneth over you continue following your god
if ye obey voice lord rebel against commandment then hand you your fathers
now therefore stand see great thing lord do before your eyes
wheat harvest day call lord send thunder rain ye may perceive see your wickedness great done sight asking you king
so samuel called lord sent thunder rain day people greatly feared
people said samuel pray thy servants lord god we die added our sins evil ask us king
samuel said people fear ye done wickedness yet turn aside following lord serve your heart
turn ye aside then should go after vain things cannot profit nor deliver
lord forsake people great name's sake because hath pleased make you
moreover god forbid should sin against lord ceasing pray you teach good right way
only fear lord serve truth your heart consider how great things hath done you
if ye still do wickedly consumed both your king
saul reigned one year had two years over israel
saul chose three thousand men israel whereof two michmash mount bethel jonathan gibeah benjamin rest people sent every man tent
jonathan smote garrison philistines geba heard saul blew trumpet throughout land saying let hebrews hear
israel heard say saul had smitten garrison philistines also abomination people called together after gilgal
philistines gathered themselves together fight israel thirty thousand chariots six horsemen people sand on sea shore multitude came pitched michmash eastward bethaven
men israel saw strait people distressed then did hide themselves caves thickets rocks high places pits
some hebrews went over jordan land gad gilead saul yet gilgal people followed trembling
tarried seven days according set time samuel had appointed came gilgal people scattered
saul said bring hither burnt offering peace offerings offered
came pass soon had made end offering burnt behold samuel saul went out meet might salute
samuel said what hast thou done saul because saw people scattered camest within days appointed philistines gathered themselves together at michmash
therefore said philistines come down now upon gilgal made supplication lord forced myself offered burnt offering
samuel said saul thou hast done foolishly kept commandment lord thy god commanded thee now would established kingdom upon israel ever
now thy kingdom continue lord hath sought man after own heart commanded captain over people because thou hast kept thee
samuel arose gat gilgal gibeah benjamin saul numbered people present about six hundred men
saul jonathan son people present abode gibeah benjamin philistines encamped michmash
spoilers came out camp philistines three companies one company turned way leadeth ophrah land shual
another company turned way bethhoron border looketh valley zeboim toward wilderness
now there no smith found throughout land israel philistines said lest hebrews make swords or spears
israelites went down philistines sharpen every man share coulter axe mattock
yet had file mattocks coulters forks axes sharpen goads
so came pass day battle there neither sword nor spear found hand any people saul jonathan son
garrison philistines went out passage michmash
now came pass upon day jonathan son saul said young man bare armour come let us go over philistines' garrison on other side told father
saul tarried uttermost part gibeah under pomegranate tree migron people about six hundred men
ahiah son ahitub ichabod's brother phinehas eli lord's priest shiloh wearing ephod people knew jonathan gone
between passages by jonathan sought go over philistines' garrison there sharp rock on one side other name bozez seneh
forefront one situate northward over against michmash other southward gibeah
jonathan said young man bare armour come let us go over garrison these uncircumcised may lord work there no restraint save by many or few
armourbearer said do thine heart turn thee behold am according thy
then said jonathan behold we pass over these men discover ourselves
if say thus us tarry until we come you then stand still our place go
if say thus come us then we go lord hath delivered our hand sign
both discovered themselves garrison philistines said behold hebrews come forth out holes where had hid
men garrison answered jonathan armourbearer said come us we shew you thing after lord hath delivered hand israel
jonathan climbed upon hands feet armourbearer after fell before slew
first slaughter jonathan armourbearer made about twenty men within half acre land yoke oxen might plow
there trembling host field among people garrison spoilers also trembled earth quaked so very great
watchmen saul gibeah benjamin looked behold multitude melted away went on beating down one another
then said saul people number now see who gone us had numbered behold jonathan armourbearer there
saul said ahiah bring hither ark god at time children israel
came pass while saul talked priest noise host philistines went on increased said withdraw thine hand
saul people assembled themselves came battle behold every man's sword against fellow there very great discomfiture
moreover hebrews philistines before time went camp country round about even also turned israelites saul jonathan
likewise men israel had hid themselves mount ephraim heard philistines fled even also followed hard after battle
so lord saved israel day battle passed over bethaven
men israel distressed day saul had adjured people saying cursed man eateth any food until evening may avenged on mine enemies so none tasted
land came wood there honey upon ground
people come wood behold honey dropped no man put hand mouth feared oath
jonathan heard father charged people oath wherefore put forth end rod hand dipped honeycomb mouth eyes enlightened
then answered one people said thy father straitly charged oath saying cursed man eateth any food day faint
then said jonathan father hath troubled land see pray you how mine eyes been enlightened because tasted little honey
how much more if haply people had eaten freely day spoil enemies found there been now greater slaughter among philistines
smote philistines day michmash aijalon people very faint
people flew upon spoil took sheep oxen calves slew on ground did eat blood
then told saul saying behold people sin against lord eat blood said ye transgressed roll great stone day
saul said disperse yourselves among people say bring hither every man ox sheep slay here eat sin against lord eating blood brought night slew there
saul built altar lord same first
saul said let us go down after philistines by night spoil until morning light leave man do whatsoever seemeth good thee then priest draw near hither god
saul asked counsel god go down after philistines wilt thou deliver hand israel answered day
saul said draw ye near hither chief people know see wherein sin hath been day
lord liveth saveth israel though jonathan son surely die there man among people answered
then said israel ye on one side jonathan son other people saul do what seemeth good thee
therefore saul said lord god israel give perfect lot jonathan taken people escaped
saul said cast lots between jonathan son taken
then saul said jonathan tell what thou hast done told did taste little honey end rod mine hand lo must die
saul answered god do so more also thou shalt surely die jonathan
people said saul jonathan die who hath wrought great salvation israel god forbid lord liveth there one hair head fall ground day so rescued died
then saul went following philistines own place
so saul took kingdom over israel fought against enemies on every side moab children ammon edom kings zobah philistines whithersoever turned himself vexed
gathered host smote amalekites delivered israel out hands spoiled
now sons saul jonathan ishui melchishua names two daughters these name firstborn merab younger michal
name saul's wife ahinoam daughter ahimaaz captain host abner son ner uncle
kish father saul ner abner son abiel
there sore war against philistines days saul saw any strong man or valiant took
samuel also said saul lord sent anoint thee king over people israel now therefore hearken thou voice words
thus saith lord hosts remember amalek did israel how laid wait way came egypt
now go smite amalek utterly destroy spare slay both man woman infant suckling ox sheep camel ass
saul gathered people together numbered telaim two hundred thousand footmen ten men judah
saul came city amalek laid wait valley
saul said kenites go depart get you down among amalekites lest destroy ye shewed kindness children israel came out egypt so departed
saul smote amalekites havilah until thou comest shur over against egypt
took agag king amalekites alive utterly destroyed people edge sword
saul people spared agag best sheep oxen fatlings lambs good would utterly destroy every thing vile refuse destroyed
then came word lord samuel saying
repenteth set saul king turned back following hath performed commandments grieved samuel cried lord night
samuel rose early meet saul morning told saying came carmel behold set place gone about passed on down gilgal
samuel came saul said blessed thou lord performed commandment
samuel said what meaneth then bleating sheep mine ears lowing oxen hear
saul said brought amalekites people spared best sheep oxen sacrifice lord thy god rest we utterly destroyed
then samuel said saul stay tell thee what lord hath night say on
samuel said thou wast little thine own sight made head tribes israel lord anointed thee king over
lord sent thee on journey said go utterly destroy sinners amalekites fight against until consumed
wherefore then didst thou obey voice lord fly upon spoil evil sight
saul said samuel yea obeyed voice lord gone way sent brought agag king amalek utterly destroyed amalekites
people took spoil sheep oxen chief things should been utterly destroyed sacrifice lord thy god gilgal
samuel said hath lord great delight burnt offerings sacrifices obeying voice behold obey better than sacrifice hearken fat rams
rebellion sin witchcraft stubbornness iniquity idolatry because thou hast rejected word lord hath also thee being king
saul said samuel sinned transgressed commandment lord thy words because feared people obeyed voice
now therefore pray thee pardon sin turn again may worship lord
samuel said saul return thee thou hast rejected word lord hath being king over israel
samuel turned about go away laid hold upon skirt mantle rent
samuel said lord hath rent kingdom israel thee day given neighbour thine better than thou
also strength israel lie nor repent man should
then said sinned yet honour now pray thee before elders people israel turn again may worship lord thy god
so samuel turned again after saul worshipped lord
then said samuel bring ye hither agag king amalekites came delicately surely bitterness death past
samuel said thy sword hath made women childless so mother among hewed agag pieces before lord gilgal
then samuel went ramah saul house gibeah
samuel came no more see saul until day death nevertheless mourned lord repented had made king over israel
lord said samuel how long wilt thou mourn saul seeing rejected reigning over israel fill thine horn oil go send thee jesse bethlehemite provided king among sons
samuel said how can go if saul hear kill lord take heifer thee say am come sacrifice
call jesse sacrifice shew thee what thou shalt do anoint whom name
samuel did lord spake came bethlehem elders town trembled at coming said comest thou peaceably
said peaceably am come sacrifice lord sanctify yourselves sanctified jesse sons called
came pass come looked on eliab said surely lord's anointed before
lord said samuel look on countenance or height stature because refused seeth man looketh outward appearance heart
then jesse called abinadab made pass before samuel said neither hath lord chosen
then jesse made shammah pass by said neither hath lord chosen
again jesse made seven sons pass before samuel said lord hath chosen these
samuel said jesse here thy children there remaineth yet youngest behold keepeth sheep send fetch we sit down till come hither
sent brought now ruddy withal beautiful countenance goodly look lord said arise anoint
then samuel took horn oil anointed midst brethren spirit lord came upon david day forward so rose went ramah
spirit lord departed saul evil troubled
saul's servants said behold now evil spirit god troubleth thee
let our lord now command thy servants before thee seek out man who cunning player on harp come pass evil spirit god upon play hand thou shalt well
saul said servants provide now man can play well bring
then answered one servants said behold seen son jesse bethlehemite cunning playing mighty valiant man war prudent matters comely person lord
wherefore saul sent messengers jesse said send david thy son sheep
jesse took ass laden bread bottle wine kid sent by david son saul
david came saul stood before loved greatly became armourbearer
saul sent jesse saying let david pray thee stand before hath found favour sight
came pass evil spirit god upon saul david took harp played hand so refreshed well departed
now philistines gathered together armies battle at shochoh belongeth judah pitched between azekah ephesdammim
saul men israel gathered together pitched by valley elah set battle array against philistines
philistines stood on mountain one side israel other there valley between
there went out champion camp philistines named goliath gath whose height six cubits span
had helmet brass upon head armed coat mail weight five thousand shekels
had greaves brass upon legs target between shoulders
staff spear like weaver's beam spear's head weighed six hundred shekels iron one bearing shield went before
stood cried armies israel said why ye come out set your battle array am philistine servants saul choose you man let down
if able fight kill then we your servants prevail against ye our serve us
philistine said defy armies israel day give man we may fight together
saul israel heard those words philistine dismayed greatly afraid
now david son ephrathite bethlehemjudah whose name jesse had eight sons man went among men old days saul
three eldest sons jesse went followed saul battle names eliab firstborn next abinadab third shammah
david youngest three eldest followed saul
david went returned saul feed father's sheep at bethlehem
philistine drew near morning evening presented himself forty days
jesse said david son take now thy brethren ephah parched corn these ten loaves run camp
carry these ten cheeses captain thousand look how thy brethren fare take pledge
now saul men israel valley elah fighting philistines
david rose early morning left sheep keeper took went jesse had commanded came trench host going forth fight shouted battle
israel philistines had put battle array army against
david left carriage hand keeper ran army came saluted brethren
talked behold there came champion philistine gath goliath by name out armies philistines spake according same words david heard
men israel saw man fled sore afraid
men israel said ye seen man come surely defy who killeth king enrich great riches give daughter make father's house free
david spake men stood by saying what done man killeth philistine taketh away reproach israel who uncircumcised should defy armies living god
people answered after manner saying so done man killeth
eliab eldest brother heard spake men eliab's anger kindled against david said why camest thou down hither whom hast left those few sheep wilderness know thy pride naughtiness thine heart art come mightest see battle
david said what now done there cause
turned toward another spake after same manner people answered again former
words heard david spake rehearsed before saul sent
david said saul let no man's heart fail because thy servant go fight philistine
saul said david thou art able go against philistine fight youth man war
david said saul thy servant kept father's sheep there came lion bear took lamb out flock
went out after smote delivered mouth arose against caught by beard slew
thy servant slew both lion bear uncircumcised philistine one seeing hath defied armies living god
david said moreover lord delivered out paw lion bear deliver hand philistine saul go thee
saul armed david armour put helmet brass upon head also coat mail
david girded sword upon armour assayed go had proved said saul cannot these put off
took staff hand chose five smooth stones out brook put shepherd's bag had even scrip sling drew near philistine
philistine came on drew near david man bare shield went before
philistine looked about saw david disdained youth ruddy fair countenance
philistine said david am dog thou comest staves cursed by gods
philistine said david come give thy flesh fowls air beasts field
then said david philistine thou comest sword spear shield come thee name lord hosts god armies israel whom hast defied
day lord deliver thee mine hand smite take thine head give carcases host philistines fowls air wild beasts earth may know there god israel
assembly know lord saveth sword spear battle lord's give you our hands
came pass philistine arose drew nigh meet david hasted ran toward army
david put hand bag took thence stone slang smote philistine forehead sunk fell upon face earth
so david prevailed over philistine sling stone smote slew there no sword hand
therefore david ran stood upon philistine took sword drew out sheath thereof slew cut off head therewith philistines saw champion dead fled
men israel judah arose shouted pursued philistines until thou come valley gates ekron wounded fell down by way shaaraim even gath
children israel returned chasing after philistines spoiled tents
david took head philistine brought jerusalem put armour tent
saul saw david go forth against philistine said abner captain host whose son youth thy soul liveth o king cannot tell
king said enquire thou whose son stripling
david returned slaughter philistine abner took brought before saul head hand
saul said whose son art thou young man david answered am thy servant jesse bethlehemite
came pass had made end speaking saul soul jonathan knit david loved own
saul took day would let go no more home father's house
then jonathan david made covenant because loved own soul
jonathan stripped himself robe upon gave david garments even sword bow girdle
david went out whithersoever saul sent behaved himself wisely set over men war accepted sight people also saul's servants
came pass david returned slaughter philistine women out cities israel singing dancing meet king saul tabrets joy instruments musick
women answered one another played said saul hath slain thousands david ten
saul very wroth saying displeased said ascribed david ten thousands what can more kingdom
saul eyed david day forward
came pass on morrow evil spirit god upon saul prophesied midst house david played hand at other times there javelin saul's
saul cast javelin said smite david even wall avoided out presence twice
saul afraid david because lord departed
therefore saul removed made captain over thousand went out came before people
david behaved himself wisely ways lord
wherefore saul saw behaved himself very wisely afraid
israel judah loved david because went out came before
saul said david behold elder daughter merab her give thee wife only thou valiant fight lord's battles let mine hand upon philistines
david said saul who am what life or father's family israel should son law king
came pass at time merab saul's daughter should been given david she adriel meholathite wife
michal saul's daughter loved david told saul thing pleased
saul said give her she may snare hand philistines against wherefore david thou shalt day son law one twain
saul commanded servants saying commune david secretly say behold king hath delight thee love now therefore king's son law
saul's servants spake those words ears david said seemeth you light thing king's son law seeing am poor man lightly esteemed
servants saul told saying on manner spake david
saul said thus ye say david king desireth any dowry hundred foreskins philistines avenged king's enemies thought make fall by hand
servants told david these words pleased well king's son law days expired
wherefore david arose went men slew philistines two hundred brought foreskins gave full tale king might king's son law saul michal daughter wife
saul saw knew lord david michal saul's daughter loved
saul yet more afraid david became david's enemy continually
then princes philistines went forth came pass after david behaved himself more wisely than servants saul so name much set by
saul spake jonathan son servants should kill david
jonathan saul's son delighted much david told saying saul father seeketh kill thee now therefore pray take heed thyself until morning abide secret place hide
go out stand beside father field where thou art commune thee what see tell
jonathan spake good david saul father said let king sin against servant because hath sinned thee works been theeward very
did put life hand slew philistine lord wrought great salvation israel thou sawest didst rejoice wherefore then wilt sin against innocent blood slay david without cause
saul hearkened voice jonathan sware lord liveth slain
jonathan called david shewed those things brought saul presence times past
there war again david went out fought philistines slew great slaughter fled
evil spirit lord upon saul sat house javelin hand david played
saul sought smite david even wall javelin slipped away out saul's presence smote fled escaped night
saul also sent messengers david's house watch slay morning michal wife told saying if thou save thy life night morrow shalt slain
so michal let david down through window went fled escaped
michal took image laid bed put pillow goats' hair bolster covered cloth
saul sent messengers take david she said sick
saul sent messengers again see david saying bring bed may slay
messengers come behold there image bed pillow goats' hair bolster
saul said michal why hast thou deceived so sent away mine enemy escaped answered let go should kill thee
so david fled escaped came samuel ramah told saul had done went dwelt naioth
told saul saying behold david at naioth ramah
saul sent messengers take david saw company prophets prophesying samuel standing appointed over spirit god upon also prophesied
told saul sent other messengers prophesied likewise again third time also
then went also ramah came great well sechu asked said where samuel david one behold at naioth
went thither naioth ramah spirit god upon also on prophesied until came
stripped off clothes also prophesied before samuel like manner lay down naked day night wherefore say saul among prophets
david fled naioth ramah came said before jonathan what done mine iniquity sin thy father seeketh life
said god forbid thou shalt die behold father do nothing either great or small shew why should hide thing so
david sware moreover said thy father certainly knoweth found grace thine eyes saith let jonathan know lest grieved truly lord liveth soul there step between death
then said jonathan david whatsoever thy soul desireth even do thee
david said jonathan behold morrow new moon should fail sit king at meat let go may hide myself field third day even
if thy father at miss then say david earnestly asked leave might run bethlehem city there yearly sacrifice family
if say thus well thy servant peace very wroth then sure evil determined by
therefore thou shalt deal kindly thy servant hast brought covenant lord thee notwithstanding if there iniquity slay thyself why shouldest bring father
jonathan said far thee if knew certainly evil determined by father come upon then would tell
then said david jonathan who tell or what if thy father answer thee roughly
jonathan said david come let us go out field went both
jonathan said david o lord god israel sounded father about morrow any time or third day behold if there good toward then send thee shew
lord do so much more jonathan if please father thee evil then shew send away thou mayest go peace hath been
thou shalt only while yet live shew kindness lord die
also thou shalt cut off thy kindness house ever no lord hath enemies david every one face earth
so jonathan made covenant house david saying let lord even require at hand david's enemies
jonathan caused david swear again because loved own soul
then jonathan said david morrow new moon thou shalt missed because thy seat empty
thou hast stayed three days then shalt go down quickly come place where didst hide thyself business hand remain by stone ezel
shoot three arrows on side thereof though shot at mark
behold send lad saying go find out arrows if expressly say on side thee take then come thou there peace no hurt lord liveth
if say thus young man behold arrows beyond thee go thy way lord hath sent away
touching matter thou spoken behold lord between thee ever
so david hid himself field new moon come king sat down eat meat
king sat upon seat at other times even by wall jonathan arose abner saul's side david's place empty
nevertheless saul spake any thing day thought something hath befallen clean surely
came pass on morrow second day month david's place empty saul said jonathan son wherefore cometh jesse meat neither yesterday nor
jonathan answered saul david earnestly asked leave go bethlehem
said let go pray thee our family hath sacrifice city brother commanded there now if found favour thine eyes get away see brethren therefore cometh king's table
then saul's anger kindled against jonathan said thou son perverse rebellious woman do know hast chosen jesse thine own confusion thy mother's nakedness
long son jesse liveth upon ground thou shalt established nor thy kingdom wherefore now send fetch surely die
jonathan answered saul father said wherefore slain what hath done
saul cast javelin at smite whereby jonathan knew determined father slay david
so jonathan arose table fierce anger did eat no meat second day month grieved david because father had done shame
came pass morning jonathan went out field at time appointed david little lad
said lad run find out now arrows shoot ran shot arrow beyond
lad come place arrow jonathan had shot cried after said beyond thee
jonathan cried after lad make speed haste stay jonathan's gathered arrows came master
lad knew any thing only jonathan david matter
jonathan gave artillery lad said go carry city
soon lad gone david arose out place toward south fell on face ground bowed himself three times kissed one another wept until exceeded
jonathan said david go peace forasmuch we sworn both us name lord saying between thee seed thy ever arose departed went city
then came david nob ahimelech priest afraid at meeting said why art thou alone no man thee
david said ahimelech priest king hath commanded business let no man know any thing whereabout send thee what appointed servants such place
now therefore what under thine hand give five loaves bread mine or there present
priest answered david said there no common bread under mine hand hallowed if young men kept themselves at least women
david answered priest said truth women been kept us about these three days since came out vessels young men holy bread manner common yea though sanctified day vessel
so priest gave hallowed bread there no shewbread taken before lord put hot day away
now certain man servants saul there day detained before lord name doeg edomite chiefest herdmen belonged
david said ahimelech there here under thine hand spear or sword neither brought nor weapons because king's business required haste
priest said sword goliath philistine whom thou slewest valley elah behold here wrapped cloth behind ephod if wilt take there no other save david none like give
david arose fled day fear saul went achish king gath
servants achish said david king land did sing one another dances saying saul hath slain thousands ten
david laid these words heart sore afraid achish king gath
changed behaviour before feigned himself mad hands scrabbled on doors gate let spittle fall down upon beard
then said achish servants lo ye see man mad wherefore brought
need mad men ye brought fellow play man presence come house
david therefore departed thence escaped cave adullam brethren father's house heard went down thither
every one distress debt discontented gathered themselves became captain over there about four hundred men
david went thence mizpeh moab said king let father mother pray thee come forth you till know what god do
brought before king moab dwelt while david hold
prophet gad said david abide hold depart get thee land judah then departed came forest hareth
saul heard david discovered men now abode gibeah under tree ramah having spear hand servants standing about
then saul said servants stood about hear now ye benjamites son jesse give every one you fields vineyards make captains thousands hundreds
you conspired against there none sheweth son hath made league jesse sorry or stirred servant lie wait at day
then answered doeg edomite set over servants saul said saw son jesse coming nob ahimelech ahitub
enquired lord gave victuals sword goliath philistine
then king sent call ahimelech priest son ahitub father's house priests nob came
saul said hear now thou son ahitub answered here am lord
saul said why ye conspired against thou son jesse hast given bread sword enquired god should rise lie wait at day
then ahimelech answered king said who so faithful among thy servants david king's son law goeth at bidding honourable thine house
did then begin enquire god far let king impute any thing servant nor house father thy knew nothing less or more
king said thou shalt surely die ahimelech thy father's house
king said footmen stood about turn slay priests lord because hand also david knew fled did shew servants would put forth fall upon
king said doeg turn thou fall upon priests edomite turned fell slew on day fourscore five persons did wear linen ephod
nob city priests smote edge sword both men women children sucklings oxen asses sheep
one sons ahimelech son ahitub named abiathar escaped fled after david
abiathar shewed david saul had slain lord's priests
david said abiathar knew day doeg edomite there would surely tell saul occasioned death persons thy father's house
abide thou fear seeketh life thy shalt safeguard
then told david saying behold philistines fight against keilah rob threshingfloors
therefore david enquired lord saying go smite these philistines said save keilah
david's men said behold we afraid here judah how much more then if come keilah against armies philistines
then david enquired lord yet again answered said arise go down keilah deliver philistines thine hand
so david men went keilah fought philistines brought away cattle smote great slaughter saved inhabitants
came pass abiathar son ahimelech fled david keilah down ephod hand
told saul david come keilah said god hath delivered mine hand shut by entering town gates bars
saul called people together war go down keilah besiege david men
david knew saul secretly practised mischief against said abiathar priest bring hither ephod
then said david o lord god israel thy servant hath certainly heard saul seeketh come keilah destroy city sake
men keilah deliver hand saul come down thy servant hath heard o lord god israel beseech thee tell said
then said david men keilah deliver hand saul lord thee
then david men about six hundred arose departed out keilah went whithersoever could go told saul escaped forbare forth
david abode wilderness strong holds remained mountain ziph saul sought every day god delivered hand
david saw saul come out seek life wilderness ziph wood
jonathan saul's son arose went david wood strengthened hand god
said fear hand saul father find thee thou shalt king over israel next also knoweth
two made covenant before lord david abode wood jonathan went house
then came ziphites saul gibeah saying doth david hide himself us strong holds wood hill hachilah on south jeshimon
now therefore o king come down according desire thy soul our part deliver king's hand
saul said blessed ye lord compassion on
go pray you prepare yet know see place where haunt who hath seen there told dealeth very subtilly
see therefore take knowledge lurking places where hideth himself come ye again certainty go you pass if land search out throughout thousands judah
arose went ziph before saul david men wilderness maon plain on south jeshimon
saul also men went seek told david wherefore came down rock abode wilderness maon heard pursued after
saul went on side mountain david men made haste get away fear compassed round about take
there came messenger saul saying haste thee come philistines invaded land
wherefore saul returned pursuing after david went against philistines therefore called place selahammahlekoth
david went thence dwelt strong holds at engedi
came pass saul returned following philistines told saying behold david wilderness engedi
then saul took three thousand chosen men out israel went seek david upon rocks wild goats
came sheepcotes by way where cave saul went cover feet david men remained sides
men david said behold day lord thee deliver thine enemy hand thou mayest do seem good then arose cut off skirt saul's robe privily
came pass afterward david's heart smote because had cut off saul's skirt
said men lord forbid should do thing master lord's anointed stretch forth mine hand against seeing
so david stayed servants these words suffered rise against saul rose out cave went on way
david also arose afterward went out cave cried after saul saying lord king looked behind stooped face earth bowed himself
david said saul wherefore hearest thou men's words saying behold seeketh thy hurt
behold day thine eyes seen how lord had delivered thee mine hand cave some bade kill eye spared said put forth against lord's anointed
moreover father see yea skirt thy robe hand cut off killed thee know thou there neither evil nor transgression mine sinned against yet huntest soul take
lord judge between thee avenge mine hand upon
saith proverb ancients wickedness proceedeth wicked mine hand upon thee
after whom king israel come out dost thou pursue dead dog flea
lord therefore judge between thee see plead cause deliver out thine hand
came pass david had made end speaking these words saul said thy voice son lifted wept
said david thou art more righteous than hast rewarded good whereas thee evil
thou hast shewed day how dealt well forasmuch lord had delivered thine hand killedst
if man find enemy let go well away wherefore lord reward thee good thou hast done day
now behold know well thou shalt surely king kingdom israel established thine hand
swear now therefore by lord thou wilt cut off seed after destroy name out father's house
david sware saul went home men gat hold
samuel died israelites gathered together lamented buried house at ramah david arose went down wilderness paran
there man maon whose possessions carmel very great had three thousand sheep goats shearing
now name man nabal wife abigail she woman good understanding beautiful countenance churlish evil doings house caleb
david heard wilderness nabal did shear sheep
david sent out ten young men said get you carmel go nabal greet name
thus ye say liveth prosperity peace both thee thine house thou hast
now heard thou hast shearers thy shepherds us we hurt neither there ought missing while carmel
ask thy young men shew thee wherefore let find favour thine eyes we come good day give pray whatsoever cometh hand servants son david
david's young men came spake nabal according those words name david ceased
nabal answered david's servants said who david son jesse there many now days break away every man master
then take bread water flesh killed shearers give men whom know whence
so david's young men turned way went again came told those sayings
david said men gird ye on every man sword girded also there went after about four hundred two abode by stuff
one young men told abigail nabal's wife saying behold david sent messengers out wilderness salute our master railed on
men very good us we hurt neither missed any thing long conversant fields
wall us both by night day while we keeping sheep
now therefore know consider what thou wilt do evil determined against our master household such son belial man cannot speak
then abigail made haste took two hundred loaves bottles wine five sheep ready dressed measures parched corn clusters raisins cakes figs laid on asses
she said her servants go on before behold come after you told husband nabal
so she rode on ass came down by covert hill behold david men against her met
now david had said surely vain kept fellow hath wilderness so nothing missed pertained requited evil good
so more also do god enemies david if leave pertain by morning light any pisseth against wall
abigail saw david she hasted lighted off ass fell before on her face bowed herself ground
fell at feet said upon lord let iniquity thine handmaid pray thee speak audience hear words
let lord pray thee regard man belial even nabal name so folly thine handmaid saw young men whom thou didst send
now therefore lord liveth thy soul seeing hath withholden thee coming shed blood avenging thyself thine own hand let enemies seek evil nabal
now blessing thine handmaid hath brought lord let even given young men follow
pray thee forgive trespass thine handmaid lord certainly make sure house because fighteth battles evil hath been found thy days
yet man risen pursue thee seek thy soul lord bound bundle life god souls thine enemies sling out middle
come pass lord done according good hath spoken concerning thee appointed ruler over israel
no grief thee nor offence heart lord either thou hast shed blood causeless or hath avenged himself dealt well then remember thine handmaid
david said abigail blessed lord god israel sent thee day meet
blessed thy advice thou hast kept day coming shed blood avenging myself mine own hand
very deed lord god israel liveth hath kept back hurting thee except thou hadst hasted come meet surely there had been left nabal by morning light any pisseth against wall
so david received her hand she had brought said go peace thine house see hearkened thy voice accepted person
abigail came nabal behold held feast house like king nabal's heart merry within very drunken wherefore she told nothing less or more until morning light
came pass morning wine gone out nabal wife had told these things heart died within became stone
came pass about ten days after lord smote nabal died
david heard nabal dead said blessed lord hath pleaded cause reproach hand kept servant evil returned wickedness upon own head sent communed abigail take her wife
servants david come abigail carmel spake her saying sent us thee take wife
she arose bowed herself on her face earth said behold let thine handmaid servant wash feet servants lord
abigail hasted arose rode upon ass five damsels hers went after her she messengers david became wife
david also took ahinoam jezreel both wives
saul had given michal daughter david's wife phalti son laish gallim
ziphites came saul gibeah saying doth david hide himself hill hachilah before jeshimon
then saul arose went down wilderness ziph having three thousand chosen men israel seek david
saul pitched hill hachilah before jeshimon by way david abode wilderness saw came after
david therefore sent out spies understood saul come very deed
david arose came place where saul had pitched beheld lay abner son ner captain host trench people round about
then answered david said ahimelech hittite abishai son zeruiah brother joab saying who go down saul camp thee
so david abishai came people by night behold saul lay sleeping within trench spear stuck ground at bolster abner round about
then said abishai david god hath delivered thine enemy hand day now therefore let smite pray thee spear even earth at once second time
david said abishai destroy who can stretch forth hand against lord's anointed guiltless
david said furthermore lord liveth smite or day come die descend battle perish
lord forbid should stretch forth mine hand against lord's anointed pray thee take thou now spear at bolster cruse water let us go
so david took spear cruse water saul's bolster gat away no man saw nor knew neither awaked asleep because deep sleep lord fallen upon
then david went over other side stood on top hill afar off great space being between
david cried people abner son ner saying answerest thou then answered said who art criest king
david said abner art thou valiant man who like thee israel wherefore then hast kept thy lord king there came one people destroy
thing good thou hast done lord liveth ye worthy die because kept your master lord's anointed now see where king's spear cruse water at bolster
saul knew david's voice said thy son david lord o king
said wherefore doth lord thus pursue after servant what done or evil mine hand
now therefore pray thee let lord king hear words servant if stirred against accept offering children men cursed before driven out day abiding inheritance saying go serve other gods
now therefore let blood fall earth before face lord king israel come out seek flea one doth hunt partridge mountains
then said saul sinned return son david no more do thee harm because soul precious thine eyes day behold played fool erred exceedingly
david answered said behold king's spear let one young men come over fetch
lord render every man righteousness faithfulness delivered thee hand day would stretch forth mine against lord's anointed
behold thy life much set by day mine eyes so let lord deliver out tribulation
then saul said david blessed thou son shalt both do great things also still prevail so went on way returned place
david said heart now perish one day by hand saul there nothing better than should speedily escape land philistines despair seek any more coast israel so out
david arose passed over six hundred men achish son maoch king gath
david dwelt achish at gath men every man household even two wives ahinoam jezreelitess abigail carmelitess nabal's wife
told saul david fled gath sought no more again
david said achish if now found grace thine eyes let give place some town country may dwell there why should thy servant royal city thee
then achish gave ziklag day wherefore pertaineth kings judah
time david dwelt country philistines full year four months
david men went invaded geshurites gezrites amalekites those nations old inhabitants land thou goest shur even egypt
david smote land left neither man nor woman alive took away sheep oxen asses camels apparel returned came achish
achish said whither ye made road day david against south judah jerahmeelites kenites
david saved neither man nor woman alive bring tidings gath saying lest should tell on us so did manner while dwelleth country philistines
achish believed david saying hath made people israel utterly abhor therefore servant ever
came pass those days philistines gathered armies together warfare fight israel achish said david know thou assuredly shalt go out battle thy men
david said achish surely thou shalt know what thy servant can do therefore make thee keeper mine head ever
now samuel dead israel had lamented buried ramah even own city saul put away those familiar spirits wizards out land
philistines gathered themselves together came pitched shunem saul israel gilboa
saul saw host philistines afraid heart greatly trembled
saul enquired lord answered neither by dreams nor urim prophets
then said saul servants seek woman hath familiar spirit may go her enquire behold there at endor
saul disguised himself put on other raiment went two men came woman by night said pray thee divine familiar spirit bring whom name
woman said behold thou knowest what saul hath done how cut off those familiar spirits wizards out land wherefore then layest snare life cause die
saul sware her by lord saying liveth there no punishment happen thee thing
then said woman whom bring thee samuel
woman saw samuel she cried loud voice spake saul saying why hast thou deceived art
king said her afraid what sawest thou woman saul saw gods ascending out earth
said her what form she old man cometh covered mantle saul perceived samuel stooped face ground bowed himself
samuel said saul why hast thou disquieted bring answered am sore distressed philistines make war against god departed answereth no more neither by prophets nor dreams therefore called thee mayest known what do
then said samuel wherefore dost thou ask seeing lord departed thee become thine enemy
lord hath done spake by rent kingdom out thine hand given thy neighbour even david
because thou obeyedst voice lord nor executedst fierce wrath upon amalek therefore hath done thing thee day
moreover lord also deliver israel thee hand philistines morrow shalt thou thy sons host
then saul fell straightway along on earth sore afraid because words samuel there no strength had eaten bread day nor night
woman came saul saw sore troubled said behold thine handmaid hath obeyed thy voice put life hand hearkened words thou spakest
now therefore pray thee hearken thou also voice thine handmaid let set morsel bread before eat mayest strength goest on thy way
refused said eat servants together woman compelled hearkened voice so arose earth sat upon bed
woman had fat calf house she hasted killed took flour kneaded did bake unleavened bread thereof
she brought before saul servants did eat then rose went away night
now philistines gathered together armies aphek israelites pitched by fountain jezreel
lords philistines passed on by hundreds thousands david men rereward achish
then said princes philistines what do these hebrews here achish david servant saul king israel hath been days or years found no fault since fell day
princes philistines wroth said make fellow return may go again place thou hast appointed let down us battle lest adversary wherewith should reconcile himself master heads these men
david whom sang one another dances saying saul slew thousands ten
then achish called david said surely lord liveth thou hast been upright thy going out coming host good sight found evil thee since day nevertheless lords favour
wherefore now return go peace thou displease lords philistines
david said achish what done hast thou found thy servant so long been thee day may go fight against enemies lord king
achish answered said david know thou art good sight angel god notwithstanding princes philistines go us battle
wherefore now rise early morning thy master's servants come thee soon ye light depart
so david men rose early depart morning return land philistines went jezreel
came pass david men come ziklag on third day amalekites had invaded south smitten burned fire
had taken women captives therein slew any either great or small carried away went on way
so david men came city behold burned fire wives sons daughters taken captives
then david people lifted voice wept until had no more power weep
david's two wives taken captives ahinoam jezreelitess abigail wife nabal carmelite
david greatly distressed people spake stoning because soul grieved every man sons daughters encouraged himself lord god
david said abiathar priest ahimelech's son pray thee bring hither ephod brought thither
david enquired at lord saying pursue after troop overtake answered thou shalt surely without fail recover
so david went six hundred men came brook besor where those left behind stayed
david pursued four hundred men two abode behind so faint could go over brook besor
found egyptian field brought david gave bread did eat made drink water
gave piece cake figs two clusters raisins had eaten spirit came again no bread nor drunk any water three days nights
david said whom belongest thou whence art am young man egypt servant amalekite master left because three days agone fell sick
we made invasion upon south cherethites coast belongeth judah caleb burned ziklag fire
david said canst thou bring down company swear by god wilt neither kill nor deliver hands master thee
had brought down behold spread abroad upon earth eating drinking dancing because great spoil taken out land philistines judah
david smote twilight even evening next day there escaped man save four hundred young men rode upon camels fled
david recovered amalekites had carried away rescued two wives
there nothing lacking neither small nor great sons daughters spoil any thing had taken david recovered
david took flocks herds drave before those other cattle said david's spoil
david came two hundred men so faint could follow whom had made also abide at brook besor went forth meet people near saluted
then answered wicked men belial those went david said because us we give ought spoil recovered save every man wife children may lead away depart
then said david ye do so brethren lord hath given us who preserved delivered company came against our hand
who hearken you matter part goeth down battle so tarrieth by stuff alike
so day forward made statute ordinance israel
david came ziklag sent spoil elders judah even friends saying behold present you enemies lord
bethel south ramoth jattir
aroer siphmoth eshtemoa
rachal cities jerahmeelites kenites
hormah chorashan athach
hebron places where david himself men wont haunt
now philistines fought against israel men fled before fell down slain mount gilboa
philistines followed hard upon saul sons slew jonathan abinadab malchishua saul's
battle went sore against saul archers hit wounded
then said saul armourbearer draw thy sword thrust through therewith lest these uncircumcised come abuse would sore afraid therefore took fell upon
armourbearer saw saul dead fell likewise upon sword died
so saul died three sons armourbearer men same day together
men israel on other side valley jordan saw fled saul sons dead forsook cities philistines came dwelt
came pass on morrow philistines strip slain found saul three sons fallen mount gilboa
cut off head stripped armour sent land philistines round about publish house idols among people
put armour house ashtaroth fastened body wall bethshan
inhabitants jabeshgilead heard philistines had done saul
valiant men arose went night took body saul bodies sons wall bethshan came jabesh burnt there
took bones buried under tree at jabesh fasted seven days
now came pass after death saul david returned slaughter amalekites had abode two days ziklag
came even pass on third day behold man out camp saul clothes rent earth upon head so david fell did obeisance
david said whence comest thou out camp israel am escaped
david said how went matter pray thee tell answered people fled battle many also fallen dead saul jonathan son
david said young man told how knowest thou saul jonathan son dead
young man told said happened by chance upon mount gilboa behold saul leaned spear lo chariots horsemen followed hard after
looked behind saw called answered here am
said who art thou answered am amalekite
said again stand pray thee upon slay anguish come because life yet whole
so stood upon slew because sure could live after fallen took crown head bracelet on arm brought hither lord
then david took hold on clothes rent likewise men
mourned wept fasted until even saul jonathan son people lord house israel because fallen by sword
david said young man told whence art thou answered am son stranger amalekite
david said how wast thou afraid stretch forth thine hand destroy lord's anointed
david called one young men said go near fall upon smote died
david said thy blood upon head mouth hath testified against thee saying slain lord's anointed
david lamented lamentation over saul jonathan son
also bade teach children judah use bow behold written book jasher
beauty israel slain upon thy high places how mighty fallen
tell gath publish streets askelon lest daughters philistines rejoice uncircumcised triumph
ye mountains gilboa let there no dew neither rain upon you nor fields offerings shield mighty vilely cast away saul though had been anointed oil
blood slain fat mighty bow jonathan turned back sword saul returned empty
saul jonathan lovely pleasant lives death divided swifter than eagles stronger lions
ye daughters israel weep over saul who clothed you scarlet other delights put on ornaments gold upon your apparel
how mighty fallen midst battle o jonathan thou wast slain thine high places
am distressed thee brother jonathan very pleasant hast thou been thy love wonderful passing women
how mighty fallen weapons war perished
came pass after david enquired lord saying go any cities judah said whither hebron
so david went thither two wives also ahinoam jezreelitess abigail nabal's wife carmelite
men did david bring every man household dwelt cities hebron
men judah came there anointed david king over house told saying jabeshgilead buried saul
david sent messengers men jabeshgilead said blessed ye lord shewed kindness your even saul buried
now lord shew kindness truth you also requite because ye done thing
therefore now let your hands strengthened ye valiant master saul dead also house judah anointed king over
abner son ner captain saul's host took ishbosheth saul brought over mahanaim
made king over gilead ashurites jezreel ephraim benjamin israel
ishbosheth saul's son forty years old began reign over israel reigned two house judah followed david
time david king hebron over house judah seven years six months
abner son ner servants ishbosheth saul went out mahanaim gibeon
joab son zeruiah servants david went out met together by pool gibeon sat down one on side other
abner said joab let young men now arise play before us
then there arose went over by number twelve benjamin pertained ishbosheth son saul servants david
caught every one fellow by head thrust sword fellow's side so fell down together wherefore place called helkathhazzurim gibeon
there very sore battle day abner beaten men israel before servants david
there three sons zeruiah joab abishai asahel light foot wild roe
asahel pursued after abner going turned right hand nor left following
then abner looked behind said art thou asahel answered am
abner said turn thee aside thy right hand or left lay hold on one young men take armour asahel would following
abner said again asahel turn thee aside following wherefore should smite ground how then hold face joab thy brother
howbeit refused turn aside wherefore abner hinder end spear smote under fifth rib came out behind fell down there died same place pass many where asahel stood still
