joab also abishai pursued after abner sun went down come hill ammah lieth before giah by way wilderness gibeon
children benjamin gathered themselves together after abner became one troop stood on top hill
then abner called joab said sword devour ever knowest thou bitterness latter end how long ere bid people return following brethren
joab said god liveth unless thou hadst spoken surely then morning people had gone every one following brother
so joab blew trumpet people stood still pursued after israel no more neither fought any
abner men walked night through plain passed over jordan went bithron came mahanaim
joab returned following abner had gathered people together there lacked david's servants nineteen men asahel
servants david had smitten benjamin abner's men so three hundred threescore died
took asahel buried sepulchre father bethlehem joab men went night came hebron at break day
now there long war between house saul david waxed stronger weaker
david sons born hebron firstborn amnon ahinoam jezreelitess
second chileab abigail wife nabal carmelite third absalom son maacah daughter talmai king geshur
fourth adonijah son haggith fifth shephatiah abital
sixth ithream by eglah david's wife these born david hebron
came pass while there war between house saul david abner made himself strong
saul had concubine whose name rizpah daughter aiah ishbosheth said abner wherefore hast thou gone father's
then abner very wroth words ishbosheth said am dog's head against judah do shew kindness day house saul thy father brethren friends delivered thee hand david thou chargest fault concerning woman
so do god abner more also except lord hath sworn david even
translate kingdom house saul set throne david over israel judah dan even beersheba
could answer abner word again because feared
abner sent messengers david on behalf saying whose land also make thy league behold hand thee bring about israel
said well make league thee one thing require thou shalt see face except first bring michal saul's daughter comest
david sent messengers ishbosheth saul's son saying deliver wife michal espoused hundred foreskins philistines
ishbosheth sent took her husband even phaltiel son laish
her husband went along weeping behind bahurim then said abner go return returned
abner had communication elders israel saying ye sought david times past king over you
now then do lord hath spoken david saying by hand servant save people israel out philistines enemies
abner also spake ears benjamin went speak david hebron seemed good israel whole house
so abner came david hebron twenty men made feast
abner said david arise go gather israel lord king may make league thee thou mayest reign over thine heart desireth sent away went peace
behold servants david joab came pursuing troop brought great spoil abner hebron had sent away gone peace
joab host come told saying abner son ner came king hath sent away gone peace
then joab came king said what hast thou done behold abner thee why sent away quite gone
thou knowest abner son ner came deceive thee know thy going out coming doest
joab come out david sent messengers after abner brought again well sirah knew
abner returned hebron joab took aside gate speak quietly smote there under fifth rib died blood asahel brother
afterward david heard said kingdom guiltless before lord ever blood abner son ner
let rest on head joab father's house there fail one hath issue or leper leaneth staff falleth sword lacketh bread
so joab abishai brother slew abner because had slain asahel at gibeon battle
david said joab people rend your clothes gird you sackcloth mourn before abner king himself followed bier
buried abner hebron king lifted voice wept at grave people
king lamented over abner said died fool dieth
thy hands bound nor feet put fetters man falleth before wicked men so fellest thou people wept again over
people came cause david eat meat while yet day sware saying so do god more also if taste bread or ought else till sun down
people took notice pleased whatsoever king did
people israel understood day king slay abner son ner
king said servants know ye there prince great man fallen day israel
am day weak though anointed king these men sons zeruiah too hard lord reward doer evil according wickedness
saul's son heard abner dead hebron hands feeble israelites troubled
saul's son had two men captains bands name one baanah other rechab sons rimmon beerothite children benjamin beeroth also reckoned
beerothites fled gittaim sojourners there until day
jonathan saul's son had lame feet five years old tidings came saul out jezreel nurse took fled pass she made haste flee fell became name mephibosheth
sons rimmon beerothite rechab baanah went came about heat day house ishbosheth who lay on bed at noon
came thither midst house though would fetched wheat smote under fifth rib rechab baanah brother escaped
came house lay on bed bedchamber smote slew beheaded took head gat away through plain night
brought head ishbosheth david hebron said king behold son saul thine enemy sought thy life lord hath avenged day seed
david answered rechab baanah brother sons rimmon beerothite said lord liveth who hath redeemed soul out adversity
one told saying behold saul dead thinking brought good tidings took hold slew ziklag who thought would given reward
how much more wicked men slain righteous person own house upon bed therefore now require blood your hand take you away earth
david commanded young men slew cut off hands feet hanged over pool hebron took head ishbosheth buried sepulchre abner
then came tribes israel david hebron spake saying behold we thy bone flesh
also time past saul king over us thou wast leddest out broughtest israel lord said thee shalt feed people captain
so elders israel came king hebron david made league before lord anointed over
david thirty years old began reign reigned forty
hebron reigned over judah seven years six months jerusalem thirty three israel
king men went jerusalem jebusites inhabitants land spake david saying except thou take away blind lame shalt come hither thinking cannot
nevertheless david took strong hold zion same city
david said on day whosoever getteth gutter smiteth jebusites lame blind hated david's soul chief captain wherefore come house
so david dwelt fort called city built round about millo inward
david went on grew great lord god hosts
hiram king tyre sent messengers david cedar trees carpenters masons built house
david perceived lord had established king over israel exalted kingdom people israel's sake
david took more concubines wives out jerusalem after come hebron there yet sons daughters born
these names those born jerusalem shammua shobab nathan solomon
ibhar also elishua nepheg japhia
elishama eliada eliphalet
philistines heard had anointed david king over israel came seek went down hold
philistines also came spread themselves valley rephaim
david enquired lord saying go philistines wilt thou deliver mine hand said doubtless thine
david came baalperazim smote there said lord hath broken forth upon mine enemies before breach waters therefore called name place
there left images david men burned
philistines came yet again spread themselves valley rephaim
david enquired lord said thou shalt go fetch compass behind come upon over against mulberry trees
let thou hearest sound going tops mulberry trees then shalt bestir thyself lord go out before thee smite host philistines
david did so lord had commanded smote philistines geba until thou come gazer
again david gathered together chosen men israel thirty thousand
david arose went people baale judah bring thence ark god whose name called by lord hosts dwelleth between cherubims
set ark god upon new cart brought out house abinadab gibeah uzzah ahio sons drave
brought out house abinadab at gibeah accompanying ark god ahio went before
david house israel played before lord on manner instruments made fir wood even harps psalteries timbrels cornets cymbals
came nachon's threshingfloor uzzah put forth hand ark god took hold oxen shook
anger lord kindled against uzzah god smote there error died by ark
david displeased because lord had made breach upon uzzah called name place perezuzzah day
david afraid lord day said how ark come
so david would remove ark lord city carried aside house obededom gittite
ark lord continued house obededom gittite three months blessed household
told king david saying lord hath blessed house obededom pertaineth because ark god so went brought city gladness
so bare ark lord had gone six paces sacrificed oxen fatlings
david danced before lord might girded linen ephod
so david house israel brought ark lord shouting sound trumpet
ark lord came city david michal saul's daughter looked through window saw king leaping dancing before she despised her heart
brought ark lord set place midst tabernacle david had pitched offered burnt offerings peace before
soon david had made end offering burnt offerings peace blessed people name lord hosts
dealt among people even whole multitude israel well women men every one cake bread good piece flesh flagon wine so departed house
then david returned bless household michal daughter saul came out meet said how glorious king israel day who uncovered himself eyes handmaids servants one vain fellows shamelessly uncovereth
david said michal before lord chose thy father house appoint ruler over people israel therefore play
yet more vile than thus base mine own sight maidservants thou hast spoken had honour
therefore michal daughter saul had no child day her death
came pass king sat house lord had given rest round about enemies
king said nathan prophet see now dwell house cedar ark god dwelleth within curtains
nathan said king go do thine heart lord thee
came pass night word lord nathan saying
go tell servant david thus saith lord shalt thou build house dwell
whereas dwelt any house since time brought children israel out egypt even day walked tent tabernacle
places wherein walked children israel spake word any tribes whom commanded feed people saying why build ye house cedar
now therefore so shalt thou say servant david thus saith lord hosts took thee sheepcote following sheep ruler over people israel
thee whithersoever thou wentest cut off thine enemies out thy sight made great name like men earth
moreover appoint place people israel plant may dwell own move no more neither children wickedness afflict any beforetime
since time commanded judges over people israel caused thee rest thine enemies also lord telleth make house
thy days fulfilled thou shalt sleep fathers set seed after thee proceed out bowels establish kingdom
build house name stablish throne kingdom ever
father son if commit iniquity chasten rod men stripes children
mercy depart away took saul whom put before thee
thine house thy kingdom established ever before thee throne
according these words vision so did nathan speak david
then went king david sat before lord said who am o god what house thou hast brought hitherto
yet small thing thy sight o lord god thou hast spoken also servant's house great while come manner man
what can david say more thee thou lord god knowest thy servant
thy word's sake according thine own heart hast thou done these great things make servant know
wherefore thou art great o lord god there none like thee neither any beside according we heard our ears
what one nation earth like thy people even israel whom god went redeem himself make name do you great things terrible land before thou redeemedst thee egypt nations gods
thou hast confirmed thyself thy people israel thee ever lord art become god
now o lord god word thou hast spoken concerning thy servant house establish ever do said
let thy name magnified ever saying lord hosts god over israel house servant david established before thee
thou o lord hosts god israel hast revealed thy servant saying build thee house therefore hath found heart pray prayer
now o lord god thou art thy words true hast promised goodness servant
therefore now let please thee bless house thy servant may continue ever before thou o lord god hast spoken blessing blessed
after came pass david smote philistines subdued took methegammah out hand
smote moab measured line casting down ground even two lines put death one full keep alive so moabites became david's servants brought gifts
david smote also hadadezer son rehob king zobah went recover border at river euphrates
david took thousand chariots seven hundred horsemen twenty footmen houghed chariot horses reserved
syrians damascus came succour hadadezer king zobah david slew two twenty thousand men
then david put garrisons syria damascus syrians became servants brought gifts lord preserved whithersoever went
david took shields gold on servants hadadezer brought jerusalem
betah berothai cities hadadezer king david took exceeding much brass
toi king hamath heard david had smitten host hadadezer
then toi sent joram son king david salute bless because had fought against hadadezer smitten wars brought vessels silver gold brass
also king david did dedicate lord silver gold had dedicated nations subdued
syria moab children ammon philistines amalek spoil hadadezer son rehob king zobah
david gat name returned smiting syrians valley salt being eighteen thousand men
put garrisons edom throughout became david's servants lord preserved david whithersoever went
david reigned over israel executed judgment justice people
joab son zeruiah over host jehoshaphat ahilud recorder
zadok son ahitub ahimelech abiathar priests seraiah scribe
benaiah son jehoiada over both cherethites pelethites david's sons chief rulers
david said there yet any left house saul may shew kindness jonathan's sake
there house saul servant whose name ziba had called david king said art thou thy
king said there yet any house saul may shew kindness god ziba jonathan hath son lame on feet
king said where ziba behold house machir son ammiel lodebar
then king david sent fetched out house machir son ammiel lodebar
now mephibosheth son jonathan saul come david fell on face did reverence said answered behold thy servant
david said fear surely shew thee kindness jonathan thy father's sake restore land saul father thou shalt eat bread at table continually
bowed himself said what thy servant thou shouldest look upon such dead dog am
then king called ziba saul's servant said given thy master's son pertained saul house
thou therefore thy sons servants till land shalt bring fruits master's son may food eat mephibosheth bread alway at table now ziba had fifteen twenty
then said ziba king according lord hath commanded servant so thy do mephibosheth eat at table one king's sons
mephibosheth had young son whose name micha dwelt house ziba servants
so mephibosheth dwelt jerusalem did eat continually at king's table lame on both feet
came pass after king children ammon died hanun son reigned stead
then said david shew kindness hanun son nahash father shewed sent comfort by hand servants david's came land children ammon
princes children ammon said hanun lord thinkest thou david doth honour thy father hath sent comforters thee rather servants search city spy out overthrow
wherefore hanun took david's servants shaved off one half beards cut garments middle even buttocks sent away
told david sent meet because men greatly ashamed king said tarry at jericho until your beards grown then return
children ammon saw stank before david sent hired syrians bethrehob zoba twenty thousand footmen king maacah men ishtob twelve
david heard sent joab host mighty men
children ammon came out put battle array at entering gate syrians zoba rehob ishtob maacah by themselves field
joab saw front battle against before behind chose choice men israel put array syrians
rest people delivered hand abishai brother might put array against children ammon
said if syrians too strong then thou shalt help children ammon thee come
good courage let us play men our people cities god lord do seemeth
joab drew nigh people battle against syrians fled before
children ammon saw syrians fled then also before abishai entered city so joab returned came jerusalem
syrians saw smitten before israel gathered themselves together
hadarezer sent brought out syrians beyond river came helam shobach captain host went before
told david gathered israel together passed over jordan came helam syrians set themselves array against fought
syrians fled before israel david slew men seven hundred chariots forty thousand horsemen smote shobach captain host who died there
kings servants hadarezer saw smitten before israel made peace served so syrians feared help children ammon any more
came pass after year expired at time kings go forth battle david sent joab servants israel destroyed children ammon besieged rabbah tarried still jerusalem
came pass eveningtide david arose off bed walked upon roof king's house saw woman washing herself very beautiful look
david sent enquired after woman one said bathsheba daughter eliam wife uriah hittite
david sent messengers took her she came lay purified uncleanness returned house
woman conceived sent told david said am child
david sent joab saying send uriah hittite
uriah come david demanded how joab did people war prospered
david said uriah go down thy house wash feet departed out king's there followed mess meat king
uriah slept at door king's house servants lord went down
had told david saying uriah went down house said camest thou thy journey why then didst go thine
uriah said david ark israel judah abide tents lord joab servants encamped open fields then go mine house eat drink lie wife thou livest thy soul liveth do thing
david said uriah tarry here day also morrow let thee depart so abode jerusalem
david had called did eat drink before made drunk at even went out lie on bed servants lord down house
came pass morning david wrote letter joab sent by hand uriah
wrote letter saying set ye uriah forefront hottest battle retire may smitten die
came pass joab observed city assigned uriah place where knew valiant men
men city went out fought joab there fell some people servants david uriah hittite died also
then joab sent told david things concerning war
charged messenger saying thou hast made end telling matters war king
if so king's wrath arise say thee wherefore approached ye nigh city did fight knew would shoot wall
who smote abimelech son jerubbesheth did woman cast piece millstone upon wall died thebez why went ye nigh then say thou thy servant uriah hittite dead also
so messenger went came shewed david joab had sent
messenger said david surely men prevailed against us came out field we upon even entering gate
shooters shot off wall upon thy servants some king's dead servant uriah hittite also
then david said messenger thus shalt thou say joab let thing displease thee sword devoureth one well another make thy battle more strong against city overthrow encourage
wife uriah heard her husband dead she mourned
mourning past david sent fetched her house she became wife bare son thing had done displeased lord
lord sent nathan david came said there two men one city rich other poor
rich man had exceeding many flocks herds
poor man had nothing save one little ewe lamb bought nourished grew together children did eat own meat drank cup lay bosom daughter
there came traveller rich man spared take own flock herd dress wayfaring come took poor man's lamb dressed
david's anger greatly kindled against man said nathan lord liveth hath done thing surely die
restore lamb fourfold because did thing had no pity
nathan said david thou art man thus saith lord god israel anointed thee king over delivered out hand saul
gave thee thy master's house wives bosom israel judah if had been too little would moreover given such things
wherefore hast thou despised commandment lord do evil sight killed uriah hittite sword taken wife thy slain children ammon
now therefore sword never depart thine house because thou hast despised taken wife uriah hittite thy
thus saith lord behold raise evil against thee out thine own house take thy wives before eyes give neighbour lie sight sun
thou didst secretly do thing before israel sun
david said nathan sinned against lord also hath put away thy sin thou shalt die
howbeit because by deed thou hast given great occasion enemies lord blaspheme child also born thee surely die
nathan departed house lord struck child uriah's wife bare david very sick
david therefore besought god child fasted went lay night upon earth
elders house arose went raise earth would neither did eat bread
came pass on seventh day child died servants david feared tell dead said behold while yet alive we spake would hearken our voice how then vex himself if
david saw servants whispered perceived child dead therefore said
then david arose earth washed anointed himself changed apparel came house lord worshipped own required set bread before did eat
then said servants what thing thou hast done didst fast weep child while alive dead rise eat bread
said while child yet alive fasted wept who can tell whether god gracious may live
now dead wherefore should fast can bring back again go return
david comforted bathsheba wife went her lay she bare son called name solomon lord loved
sent by hand nathan prophet called name jedidiah because lord
joab fought against rabbah children ammon took royal city
joab sent messengers david said fought against rabbah taken city waters
now therefore gather rest people together encamp against city take lest called after name
david gathered people together went rabbah fought against took
took king's crown off head weight whereof talent gold precious stones set on david's brought forth spoil city great abundance
brought forth people therein put under saws harrows iron axes made pass through brickkiln thus did cities children ammon so david returned jerusalem
came pass after absalom son david had fair sister whose name tamar amnon loved her
amnon so vexed fell sick sister tamar she virgin thought hard do any thing her
amnon had friend whose name jonadab son shimeah david's brother very subtil man
said why art thou being king's son lean day wilt tell amnon love tamar brother absalom's sister
jonadab said lay thee down on thy bed make thyself sick father cometh see say pray let sister tamar come give meat dress sight may eat at her hand
so amnon lay down made himself sick king come see said pray thee let tamar sister make couple cakes sight may eat at her hand
then david sent home tamar saying go now thy brother amnon's house dress meat
so tamar went her brother amnon's house laid down she took flour kneaded made cakes sight did bake
she took pan poured out before refused eat amnon said men went every man
amnon said tamar bring meat chamber may eat thine hand took cakes she had made brought her brother
she had brought eat took hold her said come lie sister
she answered nay brother do force no such thing ought done israel thou folly
whither cause shame go thee thou shalt one fools israel now therefore pray speak king withhold
howbeit would hearken her voice being stronger than she forced lay
then amnon hated her exceedingly so hatred wherewith greater than love had loved said arise gone
she said there no cause evil sending away greater than other thou didst would hearken her
then called servant ministered said put now woman out bolt door after her
she had garment divers colours upon her such robes king's daughters virgins apparelled then servant brought out bolted door after
tamar put ashes on her head rent garment divers colours laid hand went crying
absalom her brother said hath amnon thy been thee hold now peace sister regard thing so tamar remained desolate absalom's house
king david heard these things very wroth
absalom spake brother amnon neither good nor bad hated because had forced sister tamar
came pass after two full years absalom had sheepshearers baalhazor beside ephraim invited king's sons
absalom came king said behold now thy servant hath sheepshearers let beseech thee servants go
king said absalom nay son let us now go lest we chargeable thee pressed howbeit would blessed
then said absalom if pray thee let brother amnon go us king why should
absalom pressed let amnon king's sons go
now absalom had commanded servants saying mark ye amnon's heart merry wine say you smite amnon then kill fear courageous valiant
servants absalom did amnon had commanded then king's sons arose every man gat upon mule fled
came pass while way tidings david saying absalom hath slain king's sons there one left
then king arose tare garments lay on earth servants stood by clothes rent
jonadab son shimeah david's brother answered said let lord suppose slain young men king's sons amnon only dead by appointment absalom hath been determined day forced sister tamar
now therefore let lord king take thing heart think king's sons dead amnon only
absalom fled young man kept watch lifted eyes looked behold there came much people by way hill side behind
jonadab said king behold king's sons come thy servant so
came pass soon had made end speaking behold king's sons lifted voice wept king also servants very sore
absalom fled went talmai son ammihud king geshur david mourned every day
so absalom fled went geshur there three years
soul king david longed go forth absalom comforted concerning amnon seeing dead
now joab son zeruiah perceived king's heart toward absalom
joab sent tekoah fetched thence wise woman said her pray thee feign thyself mourner put on now mourning apparel anoint oil had long time mourned dead
come king speak on manner so joab put words her mouth
woman tekoah spake king she fell on her face ground did obeisance said help o
king said her what aileth thee she answered am indeed widow woman mine husband dead
thy handmaid had two sons strove together field there none part one smote other slew
behold whole family risen against thine handmaid said deliver smote brother we may kill life whom slew destroy heir also so quench coal left leave husband neither name nor remainder upon earth
king said woman go thine house give charge concerning thee
woman tekoah said king lord o iniquity on father's house throne guiltless
king said whosoever saith ought thee bring touch any more
then said she pray thee let king remember lord thy god thou wouldest suffer revengers blood destroy any more lest son liveth there one hair fall earth
then woman said let thine handmaid pray thee speak one word lord king say on
woman said wherefore then hast thou thought such thing against people god king doth speak one faulty fetch home again banished
we must needs die water spilt on ground cannot gathered again neither doth god respect any person yet devise means banished expelled
now therefore am come speak thing lord king because people made afraid thy handmaid said may perform request
king hear deliver handmaid out hand man would destroy son together inheritance god
then thine handmaid said word lord king now comfortable angel god so discern good bad therefore thy thee
then king answered said woman hide pray thee thing ask let lord now speak
king said hand joab thee woman answered thy soul liveth lord none can turn right or left ought hath spoken servant bade put these words mouth thine handmaid
fetch about form speech hath thy servant joab done thing lord wise according wisdom angel god know things earth
king said joab behold now done thing go therefore bring young man absalom again
joab fell ground on face bowed himself thanked king said day thy servant knoweth found grace sight lord o hath fulfilled request
so joab arose went geshur brought absalom jerusalem
king said let turn own house see face so absalom returned saw king's
israel there none so much praised absalom beauty sole foot even crown head no blemish
polled head at every year's end because hair heavy on therefore weighed two hundred shekels after king's weight
absalom there born three sons one daughter whose name tamar she woman fair countenance
so absalom dwelt two full years jerusalem saw king's face
therefore absalom sent joab king would come again second time
therefore said servants see joab's field near mine hath barley there go set on fire absalom's
then joab arose came absalom house said wherefore thy servants set field on fire
absalom answered joab behold sent thee saying come hither may send king say wherefore am geshur had been good there still now therefore let see king's face if any iniquity kill
so joab came king told had called absalom bowed himself on face ground before kissed
came pass after absalom prepared chariots horses fifty men run before
absalom rose early stood beside way gate so any man had controversy came king judgment then called said what city art thou thy servant one tribes israel
absalom said see thy matters good right there no man deputed king hear thee
absalom said moreover oh made judge land every man hath any suit or cause might come would do justice
so any man came nigh do obeisance put forth hand took kissed
on manner did absalom israel came king judgment so stole hearts men
came pass after forty years absalom said king pray thee let go pay vow vowed lord hebron
thy servant vowed vow while abode at geshur syria saying if lord bring again indeed jerusalem then serve
king said go peace so arose went hebron
absalom sent spies throughout tribes israel saying soon ye hear sound trumpet then say reigneth hebron
absalom went two hundred men out jerusalem called simplicity knew any thing
absalom sent ahithophel gilonite david's counsellor city even giloh while offered sacrifices conspiracy strong people increased continually
there came messenger david saying hearts men israel after absalom
david said servants at jerusalem arise let us flee we else escape absalom make speed depart lest overtake suddenly bring evil upon smite city edge sword
king's servants said king behold thy ready do whatsoever lord appoint
king went forth household after left ten women concubines keep house
king went forth people after tarried place far off
servants passed on beside cherethites pelethites gittites six hundred men came after gath before king
then said king ittai gittite wherefore goest thou also us return thy place abide art stranger exile
whereas thou camest yesterday should day make thee go down us seeing whither may return take back thy brethren mercy truth
ittai answered king said lord liveth surely what place whether death or life even there also thy servant
david said ittai go pass over gittite passed men little ones
country wept loud voice people passed over king also himself brook kidron toward way wilderness
lo zadok also levites bearing ark covenant god set down abiathar went until people had done passing out city
king said zadok carry back ark god city if find favour eyes lord bring again shew both habitation
if thus say no delight thee behold here am let do seemeth good
king said also zadok priest art thou seer return city peace your two sons you ahimaaz thy son jonathan abiathar
see tarry plain wilderness until there come word you certify
zadok therefore abiathar carried ark god again jerusalem tarried there
david went by ascent mount olivet wept had head covered barefoot people every man weeping
one told david saying ahithophel among conspirators absalom said o lord pray thee turn counsel foolishness
came pass david come top mount where worshipped god behold hushai archite meet coat rent earth upon head
whom david said if thou passest on then shalt burden
if thou return city say absalom thy servant o king been father's hitherto so now also then mayest defeat counsel ahithophel
hast thou there thee zadok abiathar priests therefore what thing soever shalt hear out king's house tell
behold there two sons ahimaaz zadok's son jonathan abiathar's by ye send every thing can hear
so hushai david's friend came city absalom jerusalem
david little past top hill behold ziba servant mephibosheth met couple asses saddled upon two hundred loaves bread bunches raisins summer fruits bottle wine
king said ziba what meanest thou by these asses king's household ride on bread summer fruit young men eat wine such faint wilderness may drink
king said where thy master's son ziba behold abideth at jerusalem day house israel restore kingdom father
then said king ziba behold thine pertained mephibosheth humbly beseech thee may find grace thy sight lord o
king david came bahurim behold thence out man family house saul whose name shimei son gera forth cursed still
cast stones at david servants king people mighty men on right hand left
thus said shimei cursed come out thou bloody man belial
lord hath returned upon thee blood house saul whose stead thou hast reigned delivered kingdom hand absalom thy son behold art taken mischief because bloody man
then said abishai son zeruiah king why should dead dog curse lord let go over pray thee take off head
king said what do you ye sons zeruiah so let curse because lord hath david who then say wherefore hast thou done
david said abishai servants behold son came forth bowels seeketh life how much more now may benjamite do let alone curse lord hath bidden
may lord look on mine affliction requite good cursing day
david men went by way shimei along on hill's side over against cursed threw stones at cast dust
king people came weary refreshed themselves there
absalom people men israel came jerusalem ahithophel
came pass hushai archite david's friend come absalom said god save king
absalom said hushai thy kindness friend why wentest thou
hushai said absalom nay whom lord people men israel choose abide
again whom should serve presence son served thy father's so
then said absalom ahithophel give counsel among you what we do
ahithophel said absalom go thy father's concubines hath left keep house israel hear thou art abhorred father then hands thee strong
so spread absalom tent upon top house went father's concubines sight israel
counsel ahithophel counselled those days if man had enquired at oracle god so both david absalom
moreover ahithophel said absalom let now choose out twelve thousand men arise pursue after david night
come upon while weary weak handed make afraid people flee smite king only
bring back people thee man whom thou seekest if returned so peace
saying pleased absalom well elders israel
then said absalom call now hushai archite also let us hear likewise what saith
hushai come absalom spake saying ahithophel hath spoken after manner we do if speak thou
hushai said absalom counsel ahithophel hath given good at time
said hushai thou knowest thy father men mighty chafed minds bear robbed her whelps field man war lodge people
behold hid now some pit or other place come pass overthrown at first whosoever heareth say there slaughter among people follow absalom
also valiant whose heart lion utterly melt israel knoweth thy father mighty man men
therefore counsel israel generally gathered thee dan even beersheba sand by sea multitude thou go battle thine own person
so we come upon some place where found light dew falleth on ground men there left much one
moreover if gotten city then israel bring ropes we draw river until there one small stone found
absalom men israel said counsel hushai archite better than ahithophel lord had appointed defeat good intent might bring evil upon
then said hushai zadok abiathar priests thus did ahithophel counsel absalom elders israel counselled
now therefore send quickly tell david saying lodge night plains wilderness speedily pass over lest king swallowed people
now jonathan ahimaaz stayed by enrogel might seen come city wench went told king david
nevertheless lad saw told absalom went both away quickly came man's house bahurim had well court whither down
woman took spread covering over well's mouth ground corn thereon thing known
absalom's servants came woman house said where ahimaaz jonathan gone over brook water had sought could find returned jerusalem
came pass after departed out well went told king david said arise quickly over water thus hath ahithophel counselled against you
then david arose people passed over jordan by morning light there lacked one gone
ahithophel saw counsel followed saddled ass arose gat home house city put household order hanged himself died buried sepulchre father
then david came mahanaim absalom passed over jordan men israel
absalom made amasa captain host instead joab man's son whose name ithra israelite went abigail daughter nahash sister zeruiah joab's mother
so israel absalom pitched land gilead
came pass david come mahanaim shobi son nahash rabbah children ammon machir ammiel lodebar barzillai gileadite rogelim
brought beds basons earthen vessels wheat barley flour parched corn beans lentiles pulse
honey butter sheep cheese kine david people eat said hungry weary thirsty wilderness
david numbered people set captains thousands hundreds over
david sent forth third part people under hand joab abishai son zeruiah joab's brother ittai gittite king said surely go you myself also
people answered thou shalt go forth if we flee away care us neither half die now art worth ten thousand therefore better succour out city
king said what seemeth you best do stood by gate side people came out hundreds thousands
king commanded joab abishai ittai saying deal gently sake young man even absalom people heard gave captains charge concerning
so people went out field against israel battle wood ephraim
where people israel slain before servants david there great slaughter day twenty thousand men
battle there scattered over face country wood devoured more people day than sword
absalom met servants david rode upon mule went under thick boughs great oak head caught hold taken between heaven earth away
certain man saw told joab said behold absalom hanged oak
joab said man told behold thou sawest why didst smite there ground would given thee ten shekels silver girdle
man said joab though should receive thousand shekels silver mine hand yet would put forth against king's son our hearing king charged thee abishai ittai saying beware none touch young absalom
otherwise should wrought falsehood against mine own life there no matter hid king thou thyself wouldest set
then said joab may tarry thus thee took three darts hand thrust through heart absalom while yet alive midst oak
ten young men bare joab's armour compassed about smote absalom slew
joab blew trumpet people returned pursuing after israel held back
took absalom cast great pit wood laid very heap stones upon israel fled every one tent
now absalom lifetime had taken reared himself pillar king's dale said no son keep name remembrance called after own day absalom's place
then said ahimaaz son zadok let now run bear king tidings how lord hath avenged enemies
joab said thou shalt bear tidings day another no because king's son dead
then said joab cushi go tell king what thou hast seen bowed himself ran
then said ahimaaz son zadok yet again joab howsoever let pray thee also run after cushi wherefore wilt thou seeing hast no tidings ready
howsoever said let run then ahimaaz ran by way plain overran cushi
david sat between two gates watchman went roof over gate wall lifted eyes looked behold man running alone
watchman cried told king said if alone there tidings mouth came apace drew near
watchman saw another man running called porter said behold alone king also bringeth tidings
watchman said thinketh running foremost like ahimaaz son zadok king good man cometh tidings
ahimaaz called said king well fell down earth upon face before blessed lord thy god hath delivered men lifted hand against
king said young man absalom safe ahimaaz answered joab sent king's servant thy saw great tumult knew what
king said turn aside stand here turned stood still
behold cushi came said tidings lord king hath avenged thee day rose against
king said cushi young man absalom safe answered enemies lord rise against thee do hurt
king much moved went chamber over gate wept thus said o son absalom would god had died thee
told joab behold king weepeth mourneth absalom
victory day turned mourning people heard say how king grieved son
people gat by stealth day city being ashamed steal away flee battle
king covered face cried loud voice o son absalom
joab came house king said thou hast shamed day faces thy servants saved life lives sons daughters wives concubines
thou lovest thine enemies hatest thy friends hast declared day regardest neither princes nor servants perceive if absalom had lived we died then pleased thee well
now therefore arise go forth speak comfortably thy servants swear by lord if thou there tarry one thee night worse than evil befell youth until
then king arose sat gate told people saying behold doth sit came before israel had fled every man tent
people at strife throughout tribes israel saying king saved us out hand our enemies delivered philistines now fled land absalom
absalom whom we anointed over us dead battle now therefore why speak ye word bringing king back
king david sent zadok abiathar priests saying speak elders judah why ye last bring back house seeing speech israel come even
ye brethren bones flesh wherefore then last bring back king
say ye amasa art thou bone flesh god do so more also if captain host before continually room joab
bowed heart men judah even one man so sent word king return thou thy servants
so king returned came jordan judah gilgal go meet conduct over
shimei son gera benjamite bahurim hasted came down men judah meet king david
there thousand men benjamin ziba servant house saul fifteen sons twenty servants went over jordan before king
there went over ferry boat carry king's household do what thought good shimei son gera fell down before king come jordan
said king let lord impute iniquity neither do thou remember thy servant did perversely day went out jerusalem should take heart
thy servant doth know sinned therefore behold am come first day house joseph go down meet lord king
abishai son zeruiah answered said shimei put death because cursed lord's anointed
david said what do you ye sons zeruiah should day adversaries there any man put death israel know am king over
therefore king said shimei thou shalt die sware
mephibosheth son saul came down meet king had neither dressed feet nor trimmed beard washed clothes day departed until again peace
came pass come jerusalem meet king said wherefore wentest thou mephibosheth
answered lord o king servant deceived thy said saddle ass may ride thereon go because lame
hath slandered thy servant lord king angel god do therefore what good thine eyes
father's house dead men before lord king yet didst thou set thy servant among did eat at thine own table what right therefore cry any more
king said why speakest thou any more thy matters ziba divide land
mephibosheth said king yea let take forasmuch lord come again peace own house
barzillai gileadite came down rogelim went over jordan king conduct
now barzillai very aged man even fourscore years old had provided king sustenance while lay at mahanaim great
king said barzillai come thou over feed thee jerusalem
barzillai said king how long live should go jerusalem
am day fourscore years old can discern between good evil thy servant taste what eat or drink hear any more voice singing men women wherefore then should yet burden lord king
thy servant go little way over jordan king why should recompense such reward
let thy servant pray thee turn back again may die mine own city buried by grave father mother behold chimham go over lord king do what seem good
king answered chimham go over do seem good thee whatsoever thou shalt require
people went over jordan king come kissed barzillai blessed returned own place
then king went on gilgal chimham people judah conducted also half israel
behold men israel came king said why our brethren judah stolen thee away brought household david's over jordan
men judah answered israel because king near kin us wherefore then ye angry matter we eaten at king's cost or hath given any gift
men israel answered judah said we ten parts king also more right david than ye why then did despise us our advice should first had bringing back words fiercer
there happened man belial whose name sheba son bichri benjamite blew trumpet said we no part david neither inheritance jesse every tents o israel
so every man israel went after david followed sheba son bichri men judah clave king jordan even jerusalem
david came house at jerusalem king took ten women concubines whom had left keep put ward fed went so shut day death living widowhood
then said king amasa assemble men judah within three days thou here present
so amasa went assemble men judah tarried longer than set time had appointed
david said abishai now sheba son bichri do us more harm than did absalom take thou thy lord's servants pursue after lest get fenced cities escape
there went out after joab's men cherethites pelethites mighty jerusalem pursue sheba son bichri
at great stone gibeon amasa went before joab's garment had put on girded upon girdle sword fastened loins sheath thereof forth fell out
joab said amasa art thou health brother took by beard right hand kiss
amasa took no heed sword joab's hand so smote therewith fifth rib shed out bowels ground struck again died joab abishai brother pursued after sheba son bichri
one joab's men stood by said favoureth joab david let go after
amasa wallowed blood midst highway man saw people stood still removed out field cast cloth upon every one came by
removed out highway people went on after joab pursue sheba son bichri
went through tribes israel abel bethmaachah berites gathered together also after
came besieged abel bethmaachah cast bank against city stood trench people joab battered wall throw down
then cried wise woman out city hear say pray you joab come near hither may speak thee
come near her woman said art thou joab answered am then she hear words thine handmaid do
then she spake saying wont speak old time surely ask counsel at abel so ended matter
am one peaceable faithful israel thou seekest destroy city mother why wilt swallow inheritance lord
joab answered said far should swallow or destroy
matter so man mount ephraim sheba son bichri by name hath lifted hand against king even david deliver only depart city woman said joab behold head thrown thee over wall
then woman went people her wisdom cut off head sheba son bichri cast out joab blew trumpet retired city every man tent returned jerusalem king
now joab over host israel benaiah son jehoiada cherethites pelethites
adoram over tribute jehoshaphat son ahilud recorder
sheva scribe zadok abiathar priests
ira also jairite chief ruler about david
then there famine days david three years year after enquired lord answered saul bloody house because slew gibeonites
king called gibeonites said now children israel remnant amorites had sworn saul sought slay zeal judah
wherefore david said gibeonites what do you wherewith make atonement ye may bless inheritance lord
gibeonites said we no silver nor gold saul house neither us shalt thou kill any man israel what ye say do you
answered king man consumed us devised against we should destroyed remaining any coasts israel
let seven men sons delivered us we hang lord gibeah saul whom did choose king said give
king spared mephibosheth son jonathan saul because lord's oath between david

delivered hands gibeonites hanged hill before lord fell seven together put death days harvest first beginning barley

moreover philistines had yet war again israel david went down servants fought against waxed faint
ishbibenob sons giant weight whose spear weighed three hundred shekels brass being girded new sword thought slain david

came pass after there again battle philistines at gob then sibbechai hushathite slew saph sons giant
there again battle gob philistines where elhanan son jaareoregim bethlehemite slew brother goliath gittite staff whose spear like weaver's beam
there yet battle gath where man great stature had on every hand six fingers foot toes four twenty number also born giant
defied israel jonathan son shimea brother david slew
these four born giant gath fell by hand david servants
david spake lord words song day had delivered out hand enemies saul
said lord rock fortress deliverer
god rock trust shield horn salvation high tower refuge saviour thou savest violence
call on lord who worthy praised so saved mine enemies
waves death compassed floods ungodly men made afraid
sorrows hell compassed about snares death prevented
distress called upon lord cried god did hear voice out temple cry enter ears
then earth shook trembled foundations heaven moved because wroth
there went smoke out nostrils fire mouth devoured coals kindled by
bowed heavens also came down darkness under feet
rode upon cherub did fly seen wings wind
made darkness pavilions round about dark waters thick clouds skies
through brightness before coals fire kindled
lord thundered heaven most high uttered voice
sent out arrows scattered lightning discomfited
channels sea appeared foundations world discovered at rebuking lord blast breath nostrils
sent above took drew out many waters
delivered strong enemy hated too
prevented day calamity lord stay
brought forth also large place delivered because delighted
lord rewarded according righteousness cleanness hands hath recompensed
kept ways lord wickedly departed god
judgments before statutes did depart
also upright before kept myself mine iniquity
therefore lord hath recompensed according righteousness cleanness eye sight
merciful thou wilt shew thyself upright man
pure thou wilt shew thyself froward unsavoury
afflicted people thou wilt save thine eyes upon haughty mayest bring down
thou art lamp o lord lighten darkness
by thee run through troop god leaped over wall
god way perfect word lord tried buckler trust
who god save lord rock our
god strength power maketh way perfect
maketh feet like hinds' setteth upon high places
teacheth hands war so bow steel broken by mine arms
thou hast also given shield thy salvation gentleness hath made great
thou hast enlarged steps under so feet did slip
pursued mine enemies destroyed turned again until had consumed
consumed wounded could arise yea fallen under feet
thou hast girded strength battle rose against subdued under
thou hast also given necks mine enemies might destroy hate
looked there none save even lord answered
then did beat small dust earth stamp mire street spread abroad
thou also hast delivered strivings people kept head heathen knew serve
strangers submit themselves soon hear obedient
strangers fade away afraid out close places
lord liveth blessed rock exalted god salvation
god avengeth bringeth down people under
bringeth forth mine enemies thou also hast lifted on high above rose against delivered violent man
therefore give thanks thee o lord among heathen sing praises thy name
tower salvation king sheweth mercy anointed david seed evermore
now these last words david son jesse said man who raised on high anointed god jacob sweet psalmist israel
spirit lord spake by word tongue
god israel said rock spake ruleth over men must just ruling fear

david morning word lord came prophet gad david's seer saying
go say david thus saith lord offer thee three things choose one may do
so gad came david told said seven years famine come thee thy land or wilt thou flee three months before thine enemies while pursue there days' pestilence now advise see what answer return sent
david said gad am great strait let us fall now hand lord mercies man
so lord sent pestilence upon israel morning even time appointed there died people dan beersheba seventy thousand men
angel stretched out hand upon jerusalem destroy lord repented evil said destroyed people enough stay now thine by threshingplace araunah jebusite

gad came day david said go rear altar lord threshingfloor araunah jebusite
david according saying gad went lord commanded
araunah looked saw king servants coming on toward went out bowed himself before face upon ground
araunah said wherefore lord king come servant david buy threshingfloor thee build altar plague may stayed people
araunah said david let lord king take offer what seemeth good behold here oxen burnt sacrifice threshing instruments other wood
these things did araunah king give said lord thy god accept thee
king said araunah nay surely buy thee at price neither offer burnt offerings lord god doth cost nothing so david bought threshingfloor oxen fifty shekels silver
david built there altar lord offered burnt offerings peace so intreated land plague stayed israel
now king david old stricken years covered clothes gat no heat
wherefore servants said let there sought lord king young virgin her stand before cherish lie thy bosom may get heat
so sought fair damsel throughout coasts israel found abishag shunammite brought her king
damsel very fair cherished king ministered knew her
then adonijah son haggith exalted himself saying king prepared chariots horsemen fifty men run before
father had displeased at any time saying why hast thou done so also very goodly man mother bare after absalom
conferred joab son zeruiah abiathar priest following adonijah helped

nathan prophet benaiah mighty men solomon brother called
wherefore nathan spake bathsheba mother solomon saying hast thou heard adonijah son haggith doth reign david our lord knoweth
now therefore come let pray thee give counsel thou mayest save thine own life thy son solomon
go get thee king david say didst thou lord o swear thine handmaid saying assuredly solomon thy son reign after sit upon throne why then doth adonijah
behold while thou yet talkest there king also come after thee confirm thy words

now behold adonijah reigneth lord king thou knowest
hath slain oxen fat cattle sheep abundance called sons king abiathar priest joab captain host solomon thy servant

also solomon sitteth on throne kingdom
moreover king's servants came bless our lord king david saying god make name solomon better than thy throne greater bowed himself upon bed
also thus said king blessed lord god israel hath given one sit on throne day mine eyes even seeing
guests adonijah afraid rose went every man way
adonijah feared because solomon arose went caught hold on horns altar
told solomon saying behold adonijah feareth king lo hath caught hold on horns altar let swear day slay servant sword
solomon said if shew himself worthy man there hair fall earth wickedness found die
so king solomon sent brought down altar came bowed himself said go thine house
now days david drew nigh should die charged solomon son saying
go way earth thou strong therefore shew thyself man
keep charge lord thy god walk ways statutes commandments judgments testimonies written law moses thou mayest prosper doest whithersoever turnest thyself
lord may continue word spake concerning saying if thy children take heed way walk before truth heart soul there fail thee said man on throne israel
moreover thou knowest also what joab son zeruiah did two captains hosts israel abner ner amasa jether whom slew shed blood war peace put upon girdle about loins shoes on feet

now therefore hold guiltless thou art wise man knowest what oughtest do hoar head bring down grave blood
so david slept fathers buried city
days david reigned over israel forty years seven hebron thirty three jerusalem
then sat solomon upon throne david father kingdom established greatly
adonijah son haggith came bathsheba mother solomon she said comest thou peaceably
said moreover somewhat say thee she on
said thou knowest kingdom mine israel set faces on should reign howbeit turned about become brother's lord
now ask one petition thee deny she said say on
said speak pray thee solomon king say nay give abishag shunammite wife
bathsheba said well speak thee king
bathsheba therefore went king solomon speak adonijah rose meet her bowed himself sat down on throne caused seat set king's mother she right hand
then she said desire one small petition thee pray say nay king her ask on mother
she said let abishag shunammite given adonijah thy brother wife
king solomon answered said mother why dost thou ask abishag shunammite adonijah kingdom also mine elder brother even abiathar priest joab son zeruiah
then king solomon sware by lord saying god do so more also if adonijah spoken word against own life
now therefore lord liveth hath established set on throne david father who made house promised adonijah put death day

so solomon thrust out abiathar being priest lord might fulfil word spake concerning house eli shiloh
then tidings came joab had turned after adonijah though absalom fled tabernacle lord caught hold on horns altar
told king solomon joab fled tabernacle lord behold by altar then sent benaiah son jehoiada saying go fall upon

king said do hath fall upon bury thou mayest take away innocent blood joab shed house father
lord return blood upon own head who fell two men more righteous better than slew sword father david knowing thereof wit abner son ner captain host israel amasa jether judah
blood therefore return upon head joab seed ever david house throne there peace lord

king sent called shimei said build thee house jerusalem dwell there go forth thence any whither

came pass at end three years two servants shimei ran away achish son maachah king gath told saying behold thy

told solomon shimei had gone jerusalem gath come again
king sent called shimei said did make thee swear by lord protested saying know certain on day thou goest out walkest abroad any whither shalt surely die saidst word heard good
why then hast thou kept oath lord commandment charged thee
king said moreover shimei thou knowest wickedness thine heart privy didst david father therefore lord return thy upon own head
king solomon blessed throne david established before lord ever
so king commanded benaiah son jehoiada went out fell upon died kingdom established hand solomon
solomon made affinity pharaoh king egypt took pharaoh's daughter brought her city david until had end building own house lord wall jerusalem round about
only people sacrificed high places because there no house built name lord until those days
solomon loved lord walking statutes david father only sacrificed burnt incense high places
king went gibeon sacrifice there great high place thousand burnt offerings did solomon offer upon altar
gibeon lord appeared solomon dream by night god said ask what give thee
solomon said thou hast shewed thy servant david father great mercy according walked before thee truth righteousness uprightness heart kept kindness given son sit on throne day
now o lord god thou hast made thy servant king instead david father am little child know how go out or come
thy servant midst people thou hast chosen great cannot numbered nor counted multitude
give therefore thy servant understanding heart judge people may discern between good bad who able so great
speech pleased lord solomon had asked thing
god said because thou hast asked thing thyself long life neither riches nor thine enemies understanding discern judgment
behold done according thy words lo given thee wise understanding heart so there none like before neither after any arise
also given thee thou hast asked both riches honour so there any among kings like thy days
if thou wilt walk ways keep statutes commandments thy father david did then lengthen days
solomon awoke behold dream came jerusalem stood before ark covenant lord offered burnt offerings peace made feast servants
then came there two women harlots king stood before
one woman said o lord dwell house delivered child her
came pass third day after delivered woman also we together there no stranger us house save two
woman's child died night because she overlaid
she arose at midnight took son beside while thine handmaid slept laid her bosom dead child
rose morning give child suck behold dead had considered son did bear
other woman said nay living son dead thy no thus spake before king
then said king one saith son liveth thy dead other nay living
king said bring sword brought before
king said divide living child two give half one other
then spake woman whose living child king her bowels yearned upon son she said o lord give no wise slay other let neither mine nor thine divide
then king answered said give her living child no wise slay she mother thereof
israel heard judgment king had judged feared saw wisdom god do
so king solomon over israel

had dominion over region on side river tiphsah even azzah kings peace sides round about

those officers provided victual king solomon came solomon's table every man month lacked nothing
barley also straw horses dromedaries brought place where officers every man according charge
god gave solomon wisdom understanding exceeding much largeness heart even sand on sea shore
solomon's wisdom excelled children east country egypt
wiser than men ethan ezrahite heman chalcol darda sons mahol fame nations round about
spake three thousand proverbs songs five
spake trees cedar tree lebanon even hyssop springeth out wall also beasts fowl creeping things fishes
there came people hear wisdom solomon kings earth had heard
hiram king tyre sent servants solomon had heard anointed room father ever lover david
solomon sent hiram saying
thou knowest how david father could build house name lord god wars about on every side until put under soles feet
now lord god hath given rest on every side so there neither adversary nor evil occurrent
behold purpose build house name lord god spake david father saying thy son whom set upon throne room
now therefore command thou hew cedar trees out lebanon servants thy thee give hire according shalt appoint knowest there among us any can skill timber like sidonians
came pass hiram heard words solomon rejoiced greatly said blessed lord day hath given david wise son over great people
hiram sent solomon saying considered things thou sentest do thy desire concerning timber cedar fir
servants bring down lebanon sea convey by floats place thou shalt appoint cause discharged there receive accomplish desire giving food household
so hiram gave solomon cedar trees fir according desire
solomon gave hiram twenty thousand measures wheat food household pure oil thus year by
lord gave solomon wisdom promised there peace between hiram two made league together
king solomon raised levy out israel thirty thousand men
sent lebanon ten thousand month by courses two months at home adoniram over levy
solomon had threescore ten thousand bare burdens fourscore hewers mountains
beside chief solomon's officers over work three thousand hundred ruled people wrought
king commanded brought great stones costly hewed lay foundation house
solomon's builders hiram's did hew stonesquarers so prepared timber stones build house
came pass four hundred eightieth year after children israel come out land egypt fourth solomon's reign over month zif second began build house lord
house king solomon built lord length thereof threescore cubits breadth twenty height thirty
porch before temple house twenty cubits length thereof according breadth ten
house made windows narrow lights
against wall house built chambers round about walls both temple oracle made
nethermost chamber five cubits broad middle six third seven without wall house made narrowed rests round about beams should fastened walls
house building built stone made ready before brought thither so there neither hammer nor axe any tool iron heard while
door middle chamber right side house went winding stairs out third
so built house finished covered beams boards cedar
then built chambers against house five cubits high rested on timber cedar
word lord came solomon saying
concerning house thou art building if wilt walk statutes execute judgments keep commandments then perform word thee spake david thy father
dwell among children israel forsake people
so solomon built house finished
built walls house within boards cedar both floor cieling covered on inside wood planks fir
built twenty cubits on sides house both floor walls boards cedar even within oracle most holy place
house temple before forty cubits long
cedar house within carved knops open flowers there no stone seen
oracle prepared house within set there ark covenant lord
oracle forepart twenty cubits length breadth height thereof overlaid pure gold so covered altar cedar
so solomon overlaid house within pure gold made partition by chains before oracle
whole house overlaid gold until had finished also altar by oracle
within oracle made two cherubims olive tree each ten cubits high
five cubits one wing cherub other uttermost part ten
other cherub ten cubits both cherubims one measure size
height one cherub ten cubits so other
set cherubims within inner house stretched forth wings so wing one touched wall other cherub another midst
overlaid cherubims gold
carved walls house round about figures cherubims palm trees open flowers within without
floor house overlaid gold within without
entering oracle made doors olive tree lintel side posts fifth part wall
two doors also olive tree carved upon carvings cherubims palm trees open flowers overlaid gold spread
so also made door temple posts olive tree fourth part wall
two doors fir tree leaves one door folding other
carved thereon cherubims palm trees open flowers covered gold fitted upon work
built inner court three rows hewed stone row cedar beams
fourth year foundation house lord laid month zif
eleventh year month bul eighth house finished throughout parts thereof according fashion so seven years building
solomon building own house thirteen years finished
built also house forest lebanon length thereof hundred cubits breadth fifty height thirty upon four rows cedar pillars beams
covered cedar above upon beams lay on forty five pillars fifteen row
there windows three rows light against ranks
doors posts square windows light against three ranks
made porch pillars length thereof fifty cubits breadth thirty before other thick beam
then made porch throne where might judge even judgment covered cedar one side floor other
house where dwelt had another court within porch like work solomon made also pharaoh's daughter whom taken wife
these costly stones according measures hewed sawed saws within without even foundation coping so on outside toward great court
foundation costly stones even great ten cubits eight
above costly stones after measures hewed cedars
great court round about three rows hewed stones row cedar beams both inner house lord porch
king solomon sent fetched hiram out tyre
widow's son tribe naphtali father man tyre worker brass filled wisdom understanding cunning work works came king solomon wrought
cast two pillars brass eighteen cubits high apiece line twelve did compass either about
made two chapiters molten brass set upon tops pillars height one chapiter five cubits other
nets checker work wreaths chain chapiters upon top pillars seven one chapiter other
made pillars two rows round about upon one network cover chapiters top pomegranates so did other chapiter
chapiters upon top pillars lily work porch four cubits
chapiters upon two pillars had pomegranates also above over against belly by network hundred rows round about other chapiter
set pillars porch temple right pillar called name thereof jachin left boaz
upon top pillars lily work so finished
made molten sea ten cubits one brim other round about height five line thirty did compass
under brim round about there knops compassing ten cubit sea cast two rows
stood upon twelve oxen three looking toward north west south east sea set above hinder parts inward
hand breadth thick brim thereof wrought like cup flowers lilies contained two thousand baths
made ten bases brass four cubits length one base breadth thereof three height
work bases on manner had borders between ledges
on borders between ledges lions oxen cherubims upon there base above beneath certain additions made thin work
every base had four brasen wheels plates brass corners thereof undersetters under laver molten at side addition
mouth within chapiter above cubit thereof round after work base half also upon gravings borders foursquare
under borders four wheels axletrees joined base height wheel cubit half
work wheels like chariot wheel axletrees naves felloes spokes molten
there four undersetters corners one base very itself
top base there round compass half cubit high on ledges thereof borders same
on plates ledges thereof borders graved cherubims lions palm trees according proportion every one additions round about
after manner made ten bases had one casting measure size
then made ten lavers brass one laver contained forty baths every four cubits upon bases
put five bases on right side house left set sea eastward over against south
hiram made lavers shovels basons so end doing work king solomon house lord
two pillars bowls chapiters on top networks cover upon

ten bases lavers on
one sea twelve oxen under
pots shovels basons these vessels hiram made king solomon house lord bright brass
plain jordan did king cast clay ground between succoth zarthan
solomon left vessels unweighed because exceeding many neither weight brass found out
solomon made vessels pertained house lord altar gold table whereupon shewbread
candlesticks pure gold five on right side left before oracle flowers lamps tongs
bowls snuffers basons spoons censers pure gold hinges both doors inner house most holy place wit temple
so ended work king solomon made house lord brought things david father had dedicated even silver gold vessels did put among treasures
then solomon assembled elders israel heads tribes chief fathers children king jerusalem might bring ark covenant lord out city david zion
men israel assembled themselves king solomon at feast month ethanim seventh
elders israel came priests took ark
brought ark lord tabernacle congregation holy vessels even those did priests levites bring
king solomon congregation israel assembled before ark sacrificing sheep oxen could told nor numbered multitude
priests brought ark covenant lord place oracle house most holy even under wings cherubims
cherubims spread forth two wings over place ark covered staves thereof above
drew out staves ends seen holy place before oracle without there day
there nothing ark save two tables stone moses put at horeb lord made covenant children israel came out land egypt
came pass priests come out holy place cloud filled house lord
so priests could stand minister because cloud glory lord had filled house
then spake solomon lord said would dwell thick darkness
surely built thee house dwell settled place abide ever
king turned face about blessed congregation israel stood
said blessed lord god israel spake mouth david father hath hand fulfilled saying
since day brought forth people israel out egypt chose no city tribes build house name might therein david over
heart david father build house name lord god israel
lord said david father whereas thine heart build house name thou didst well
nevertheless thou shalt build house thy son come forth out loins name
lord hath performed word spake am risen room david father sit on throne israel promised built house name god
set there place ark wherein covenant lord made our fathers brought out land egypt
solomon stood before altar lord presence congregation israel spread forth hands toward heaven
said lord god israel there no like thee heaven above or on earth beneath who keepest covenant mercy thy servants walk before heart
who hast kept thy servant david father thou promisedst spakest also mouth fulfilled thine hand day
therefore now lord god israel keep thy servant david father thou promisedst saying there fail thee man sight sit on throne so children take heed way walk before hast walked
now o god israel let thy word pray thee verified thou spakest servant david father
god indeed dwell on earth behold heaven heavens cannot contain thee how much less house builded
yet thou respect prayer thy servant supplication o lord god hearken cry prayeth before thee day
thine eyes may open toward house night day even place thou hast said name there mayest hearken prayer thy servant make
hearken thou supplication thy servant people israel pray toward place hear heaven dwelling hearest forgive
if any man trespass against neighbour oath laid upon cause swear come before thine altar house
then hear thou heaven do judge thy servants condemning wicked bring way upon head justifying righteous give according righteousness
thy people israel smitten down before enemy because sinned against thee turn again confess name pray make supplication house
then hear thou heaven forgive sin thy people israel bring again land gavest fathers
heaven shut there no rain because sinned against thee if pray toward place confess thy name turn sin thou afflictest
then hear thou heaven forgive sin thy servants people israel teach good way wherein should walk give rain upon land hast given inheritance
if there land famine pestilence blasting mildew locust or caterpiller enemy besiege cities whatsoever plague sickness
what prayer supplication soever made by any man or thy people israel know every plague own heart spread forth hands toward house
then hear thou heaven thy dwelling place forgive do give every man according ways whose heart knowest even only hearts children men
may fear thee days live land thou gavest our fathers
moreover concerning stranger thy people israel cometh out far country name's sake
hear thy great name strong hand stretched out arm come pray toward house
hear thou heaven thy dwelling place do according stranger calleth thee people earth may know name fear israel house builded called by
if thy people go out battle against enemy whithersoever thou shalt send pray lord toward city hast chosen house built name
then hear thou heaven prayer supplication maintain cause
if sin against thee there no man sinneth thou angry deliver enemy so carry away captives land far or near
yet if bethink themselves land whither carried captives repent make supplication thee saying we sinned done perversely committed wickedness
so return thee heart soul land enemies led away captive pray toward thou gavest fathers city hast chosen house built thy name
then hear thou prayer supplication heaven thy dwelling place maintain cause
forgive thy people sinned against thee transgressions wherein transgressed give compassion before who carried captive may on
thy people thine inheritance thou broughtest forth out egypt midst furnace iron
thine eyes may open supplication thy servant people israel hearken call thee
thou didst separate among people earth thine inheritance spakest by hand moses thy servant broughtest our fathers out egypt o lord god
so solomon had made end praying prayer supplication lord arose before altar kneeling on knees hands spread heaven
stood blessed congregation israel loud voice saying
blessed lord hath given rest people israel according promised there failed one word good promise by hand moses servant
lord our god us fathers let leave nor forsake
may incline our hearts walk ways keep commandments statutes judgments commanded fathers
let these words wherewith made supplication before lord nigh our god day night maintain cause servant people israel at times matter require
people earth may know lord god there none else
let your heart therefore perfect lord our god walk statutes keep commandments at day
king israel offered sacrifice before lord
solomon offered sacrifice peace offerings lord two twenty thousand oxen hundred sheep so king children israel dedicated house
same day did king hallow middle court before house lord there offered burnt offerings meat fat peace because brasen altar too little receive
at time solomon held feast israel great congregation entering hamath river egypt before lord our god seven days even fourteen
on eighth day sent people away blessed king went tents joyful glad heart goodness lord had done david servant israel
came pass solomon had finished building house lord king's solomon's desire pleased do
lord appeared solomon second time had at gibeon
lord said heard thy prayer supplication thou hast made before hallowed house built put name there ever mine eyes heart perpetually
if thou wilt walk before david thy father walked integrity heart uprightness do according commanded thee keep statutes judgments
then establish throne thy kingdom upon israel ever promised david father saying there fail thee man
if ye at turn following or your children keep commandments statutes set before you go serve other gods worship
then cut off israel out land given house hallowed name cast sight proverb byword among people
at house high every one passeth by astonished hiss say why hath lord done thus land
answer because forsook lord god who brought forth fathers out land egypt taken hold upon other gods worshipped served therefore hath evil
came pass at end twenty years solomon had built two houses house lord king's
now hiram king tyre had furnished solomon cedar trees fir gold according desire then gave twenty cities land galilee
hiram came out tyre see cities solomon had given pleased
said what cities these thou hast given brother called land cabul day
hiram sent king sixscore talents gold
reason levy king solomon raised build house lord own millo wall jerusalem hazor megiddo gezer

children israel did solomon make no bondmen men war servants princes captains rulers chariots horsemen
these chief officers over solomon's work five hundred fifty bare rule people wrought
pharaoh's daughter came out city david her house solomon had built then did build millo

king solomon made navy ships eziongeber beside eloth on shore red sea land edom
hiram sent navy servants shipmen had knowledge sea solomon
came ophir fetched thence gold four hundred twenty talents brought king solomon
queen sheba heard fame solomon concerning name lord she came prove hard questions
she came jerusalem very great train camels bare spices much gold precious stones come solomon communed her heart
solomon told her questions there any thing hid king
queen sheba had seen solomon's wisdom house built
meat table sitting servants attendance ministers apparel cupbearers ascent by went house lord there no more spirit her
she said king true report heard mine own land thy acts wisdom
howbeit believed words until came mine eyes had seen behold half told thy wisdom prosperity exceedeth fame heard
happy thy men these servants stand continually before thee hear wisdom
blessed lord thy god delighted thee set on throne israel because loved ever therefore made king do judgment justice
she gave king hundred twenty talents gold spices very great store precious stones there came no more such abundance these queen sheba solomon
navy also hiram brought gold ophir great plenty almug trees precious stones
king made almug trees pillars house lord king's harps also psalteries singers there came no such nor seen day
king solomon gave queen sheba her desire whatsoever she asked beside royal bounty so turned went own country servants
now weight gold came solomon one year six hundred threescore talents
beside had merchantmen traffick spice merchants kings arabia governors country
king solomon made two hundred targets beaten gold six shekels went one target
made three hundred shields beaten gold pound went one shield king put house forest lebanon
moreover king made great throne ivory overlaid best gold
throne had six steps top round behind there stays on either side place seat two lions stood beside
twelve lions stood there on one side other upon six steps like made any kingdom

king had at sea navy tharshish hiram once three years came bringing gold silver ivory apes peacocks
so king solomon exceeded kings earth riches wisdom
earth sought solomon hear wisdom god had put heart
brought every man present vessels silver gold garments armour spices horses mules rate year by
