lord angry solomon because heart turned god israel had appeared twice
had commanded concerning thing should go after other gods kept lord
wherefore lord said solomon forasmuch done thee thou hast kept covenant statutes commanded surely rend kingdom give thy servant
notwithstanding thy days do david father's sake rend out hand son
howbeit rend away kingdom give one tribe thy son david servant's sake jerusalem's chosen
lord stirred adversary solomon hadad edomite king's seed edom
came pass david edom joab captain host gone bury slain after had smitten every male
six months did joab remain there israel until had cut off every male edom
hadad fled certain edomites father's servants go egypt being yet little child
arose out midian came paran took men egypt pharaoh king gave house appointed victuals land
hadad found great favour sight pharaoh so gave wife sister own tahpenes queen
sister tahpenes bare genubath son whom weaned pharaoh's house household among sons pharaoh
hadad heard egypt david slept fathers joab captain host dead said pharaoh let depart may go mine own country
then pharaoh said what hast thou lacked behold seekest go thine own country answered nothing howbeit let any wise

gathered men became captain over band david slew zobah went damascus dwelt therein reigned
adversary israel days solomon beside mischief hadad did abhorred reigned over syria
jeroboam son nebat ephrathite zereda solomon's servant whose mother's name zeruah widow woman even lifted hand against king
cause lifted hand against king solomon built millo repaired breaches city david father
man jeroboam mighty valour solomon seeing young industrious made ruler over charge house joseph
came pass at time jeroboam went out jerusalem prophet ahijah shilonite found way had clad himself new garment two alone field

said jeroboam take thee ten pieces thus saith lord god israel behold rend kingdom out hand solomon give tribes

time solomon reigned jerusalem over israel forty years
solomon slept fathers buried city david father rehoboam son reigned stead
rehoboam went shechem israel come make king
came pass jeroboam son nebat who yet egypt heard fled presence king solomon dwelt
sent called jeroboam congregation israel came spake rehoboam saying
thy father made our yoke grievous now therefore make thou service heavy put upon us lighter we serve thee
said depart yet three days then come again people departed
king rehoboam consulted old men stood before solomon father while yet lived said how do ye advise may answer people
spake saying if thou wilt servant people day serve answer speak good words then thy servants ever
forsook counsel old men had given consulted young grown stood before
said what counsel give ye we may answer people who spoken saying make yoke thy father did put upon us lighter
young men grown spake saying thus shalt thou speak people thee thy father made our yoke heavy make lighter us say little finger thicker than father's loins
now whereas father did lade you heavy yoke add your hath chastised whips chastise scorpions
so jeroboam people came rehoboam third day king had appointed saying come again
king answered people roughly forsook old men's counsel gave
spake after counsel young men saying father made your yoke heavy add also chastised you whips chastise scorpions
wherefore king hearkened people cause lord might perform saying spake by ahijah shilonite jeroboam son nebat
so israel saw king hearkened people answered saying what portion we david neither inheritance son jesse your tents o now see thine own house departed
children israel dwelt cities judah rehoboam reigned over
then king rehoboam sent adoram who over tribute israel stoned stones died therefore made speed get chariot flee jerusalem
so israel rebelled against house david day
came pass israel heard jeroboam come again sent called congregation made king over there none followed house david tribe judah only
rehoboam come jerusalem assembled house judah tribe benjamin hundred fourscore thousand chosen men warriors fight against israel bring kingdom again son solomon
word god came shemaiah man saying
speak rehoboam son solomon king judah house benjamin remnant people saying
thus saith lord ye go nor fight against your brethren children israel return every man house thing hearkened therefore word returned depart according

if people go do sacrifice house lord at jerusalem then heart turn again even rehoboam king judah kill
whereupon king took counsel made two calves gold said too much you go jerusalem behold thy gods o israel brought thee out land egypt
set one bethel other put dan
thing became sin people went worship before one even dan
made house high places priests lowest people sons levi
jeroboam ordained feast eighth month on fifteenth day like judah offered upon altar so did bethel sacrificing calves had made placed priests high places
so offered upon altar had made bethel fifteenth day eighth month even devised own heart ordained feast children israel burnt incense
behold there came man god out judah by word lord bethel jeroboam stood altar burn incense
cried against altar word lord said o thus saith behold child born house david josiah by name upon thee offer priests high places burn incense men's bones burnt
gave sign same day saying lord hath spoken behold altar rent ashes upon poured out
came pass king jeroboam heard saying man god had cried against altar bethel put forth hand lay hold on dried so could pull again
altar also rent ashes poured out according sign man god had given by word lord
king answered said man god intreat now face lord thy pray hand may restored again besought king's became before
king said man god come home refresh thyself give thee reward
man god said king if thou wilt give half thine house go thee neither eat bread nor drink water place
so charged by word lord saying eat no bread nor drink water turn again same way thou camest
so went another way returned by came bethel
now there dwelt old prophet bethel sons came told works man god had done day words spoken king also father
father said what way went sons had seen man god came judah
said sons saddle ass so saddled rode thereon
went after man god found sitting under oak said art thou camest judah am
then said come home eat bread
said may return thee nor go neither eat bread drink water place
said by word lord thou shalt eat no bread nor drink water there turn again go way camest
said am prophet also thou art angel spake by word lord saying bring back thee thine house may eat bread drink water lied
so went back did eat bread house drank water
came pass sat at table word lord prophet brought back
cried man god came judah saying thus saith lord forasmuch thou hast disobeyed mouth kept commandment thy commanded thee
camest back hast eaten bread drunk water place lord did say thee eat no drink thy carcase come sepulchre fathers
came pass after had eaten bread drunk saddled ass wit prophet whom brought back
gone lion met by way slew carcase cast ass stood also
behold men passed by saw carcase cast way lion standing came told city where old prophet dwelt
prophet brought back way heard thereof said man god who disobedient word lord therefore hath delivered lion torn slain according spake
spake sons saying saddle ass saddled
went found carcase cast way ass lion standing by had eaten nor torn
prophet took carcase man god laid upon ass brought back old came city mourn bury
laid carcase own grave mourned over saying alas brother
came pass after had buried spake sons saying am dead then bury sepulchre wherein man god lay bones beside
saying cried by word lord against altar bethel houses high places cities samaria surely come pass
after thing jeroboam returned evil way made again lowest people priests high places whosoever would consecrated became one
thing became sin house jeroboam even cut off destroy face earth
at time abijah son jeroboam fell sick
jeroboam said wife arise pray thee disguise thyself thou known get shiloh behold there ahijah prophet told should king over people
take thee ten loaves cracknels cruse honey go tell what become child
jeroboam's wife did so arose went shiloh came house ahijah could see eyes set by reason age
lord said ahijah behold wife jeroboam cometh ask thing thee her son sick thus shalt thou say she feign herself another woman
so ahijah heard sound her feet she came at door said come thou wife jeroboam why feignest thyself another am sent thee heavy tidings
go tell jeroboam thus saith lord god israel forasmuch exalted thee among people made prince over
rent kingdom away house david gave thee yet thou hast been servant who kept commandments followed heart do only right mine eyes
hast done evil above before thee thou gone made other gods molten images provoke anger cast behind thy back
therefore behold bring evil upon house jeroboam cut off pisseth against wall shut left israel take away remnant man taketh dung till gone
dieth jeroboam city dogs eat field fowls air lord hath spoken
arise thou therefore get thee thine own house thy feet enter city child die
israel mourn bury only jeroboam come grave because there found some good thing toward lord god house
moreover lord raise king over israel who cut off house jeroboam day what even now
lord smite israel reed shaken water root out good land gave fathers scatter beyond river because made groves provoking anger
give israel because sins jeroboam who did sin made

took away sodomites out land removed idols fathers had made

there war between asa baasha king israel days
baasha king israel went against judah built ramah might suffer any go out or come asa
then asa took silver gold left treasures house lord king's delivered hand servants king sent benhadad son tabrimon hezion syria dwelt at damascus saying

did evil sight lord walked way father sin wherewith made israel

even third year asa king judah did baasha slay reigned stead

there war between asa baasha king israel days

did evil sight lord walked way jeroboam sin wherewith made israel

forasmuch exalted thee out dust made prince over people israel thou hast walked way jeroboam sin provoke anger sins

so baasha slept fathers buried tirzah elah son reigned stead
also by hand prophet jehu son hanani came word lord against baasha house even evil did sight provoking anger work hands being like jeroboam because killed
twenty sixth year asa king judah began elah son baasha reign over israel tirzah two years
servant zimri captain half chariots conspired against tirzah drinking himself drunk house arza steward
zimri went smote killed twenty seventh year asa king judah reigned stead
came pass began reign soon sat on throne slew house baasha left one pisseth against wall neither kinsfolks nor friends
thus did zimri destroy house baasha according word lord spake against by jehu prophet
sins baasha elah son by sinned made israel sin provoking lord god anger vanities
now rest acts elah did written book chronicles kings israel
twenty seventh year asa king judah did zimri reign seven days tirzah people encamped against gibbethon belonged philistines
people encamped heard say zimri hath conspired also slain king wherefore israel made omri captain host over day camp
omri went gibbethon israel besieged tirzah
came pass zimri saw city taken went palace king's house burnt over fire died
sins sinned doing evil sight lord walking way jeroboam sin did make israel
now rest acts zimri treason wrought written book chronicles kings israel
then people israel divided two parts half followed tibni son ginath make king omri
people followed omri prevailed against tibni son ginath so died reigned
thirty first year asa king judah began omri reign over israel twelve years six reigned tirzah
bought hill samaria shemer two talents silver built on called name city after owner
omri wrought evil eyes lord did worse than before
walked way jeroboam son nebat sin wherewith made israel provoke lord god anger vanities
now rest acts omri did might shewed written book chronicles kings israel
so omri slept fathers buried samaria ahab son reigned stead
thirty eighth year asa king judah began ahab son omri reign over israel reigned samaria twenty two years
ahab son omri did evil sight lord above before
came pass if had been light thing walk sins jeroboam son nebat took wife jezebel daughter ethbaal king zidonians went served baal worshipped
reared altar baal house had built samaria
ahab made grove did more provoke lord god israel anger than kings before
days did hiel bethelite build jericho laid foundation thereof abiram firstborn set gates youngest son segub according word lord spake by joshua nun
elijah tishbite who inhabitants gilead said ahab lord god israel liveth before whom stand there dew nor rain these years according word
word lord came saying
get thee hence turn eastward hide thyself by brook cherith before jordan
thou shalt drink brook commanded ravens feed thee there
so went did according word lord dwelt by brook cherith before jordan
ravens brought bread flesh morning evening drank brook
came pass after while brook dried because there had been no rain land
word lord came saying
arise get thee zarephath belongeth zidon dwell there behold commanded widow woman sustain
so arose went zarephath came gate city behold widow woman there gathering sticks called her said fetch pray thee little water vessel may drink
she going fetch called her said bring pray thee morsel bread thine hand
she said lord thy god liveth cake handful meal barrel little oil cruse behold am gathering two sticks may go dress son we eat die
elijah said her fear go do thou hast make thereof little cake first bring after thee thy son
thus saith lord god israel barrel meal waste neither cruse oil fail until day sendeth rain upon earth
she went did according saying elijah her house eat many days
barrel meal wasted neither did cruse oil fail according word lord spake by elijah
came pass after these things son woman mistress house fell sick sickness so sore there no breath left
she said elijah what do thee o thou man god art come call sin remembrance slay son
said her give thy son took out bosom carried loft where abode laid upon own bed
cried lord said o god hast thou also brought evil upon widow whom sojourn by slaying her son
stretched himself upon child three times cried lord said o god pray thee let child's soul come again
lord heard voice elijah soul child came again revived
elijah took child brought down out chamber house delivered mother said see thy son liveth
woman said elijah now by know thou art man god word lord thy mouth truth
came pass after many days word lord elijah third year saying go shew thyself ahab send rain upon earth
elijah went shew himself ahab there sore famine samaria
ahab called obadiah governor house now feared lord greatly
so jezebel cut off prophets lord obadiah took hundred hid by fifty cave fed bread water
ahab said obadiah go land fountains water brooks peradventure we may find grass save horses mules alive lose beasts
so divided land between pass throughout ahab went one way by himself obadiah another
obadiah way behold elijah met knew fell on face said art thou lord
answered am go tell thy lord behold elijah here
said what sinned thou wouldest deliver thy servant hand ahab slay
lord thy god liveth there no nation or kingdom whither hath sent seek thee said took oath found
now thou sayest go tell thy lord behold elijah here
come pass soon am gone thee spirit lord carry whither know so tell ahab cannot find slay thy servant fear youth
told lord what did jezebel slew prophets how hid hundred men lord's by fifty cave fed bread water
now thou sayest go tell thy lord behold elijah here slay
elijah said lord hosts liveth before whom stand surely shew myself day
so obadiah went meet ahab told elijah
came pass ahab saw elijah said art thou troubleth israel
answered troubled israel thou thy father's house ye forsaken commandments lord hast followed baalim
now therefore send gather israel mount carmel prophets baal four hundred fifty groves eat at jezebel's table
so ahab sent children israel gathered prophets together mount carmel
elijah came people said how long halt ye between two opinions if lord god follow baal then answered word
then said elijah people even only remain prophet lord baal's prophets four hundred fifty men
let therefore give us two bullocks choose one bullock themselves cut pieces lay on wood put no fire under dress other
call ye on name your gods lord god answereth by fire let people answered said well spoken
elijah said prophets baal choose you one bullock yourselves dress first ye many call on name your gods put no fire under
took bullock given dressed called on name baal morning even until noon saying o hear us there no voice nor any answered leaped upon altar made
came pass at noon elijah mocked said cry aloud god either talking or pursuing journey peradventure sleepeth must awaked
cried aloud cut themselves after manner knives lancets till blood gushed out upon
came pass midday past prophesied until time offering evening sacrifice there neither voice nor any answer regarded
elijah said people come near came repaired altar lord broken down
elijah took twelve stones according number tribes sons jacob whom word lord came saying israel thy name
stones built altar name lord made trench about great would contain two measures seed
put wood order cut bullock pieces laid on said fill four barrels water pour burnt sacrifice
said do second time did third
water ran round about altar filled trench also
came pass at time offering evening sacrifice elijah prophet near said lord god abraham isaac israel let known day thou art am thy servant done these things word
hear o lord people may know thou art god hast turned heart back again
then fire lord fell consumed burnt sacrifice wood stones dust licked water trench
people saw fell on faces said lord god
elijah said take prophets baal let one escape took brought down brook kishon slew there
elijah said ahab get thee eat drink there sound abundance rain
so ahab went eat drink elijah top carmel cast himself down upon earth put face between knees
said servant go now look toward sea went looked there nothing again seven times
came pass at seventh time said behold there ariseth little cloud out sea like man's hand go say ahab prepare thy chariot get thee down rain stop
came pass mean while heaven black clouds wind there great rain ahab rode went jezreel
hand lord on elijah girded loins ran before ahab entrance jezreel
ahab told jezebel elijah had done withal how slain prophets sword
then jezebel sent messenger elijah saying so let gods do more also if make thy life one by morrow about time
saw arose went life came beersheba belongeth judah left servant there
himself went day's journey wilderness came sat down under juniper tree requested might die said enough now o lord take away life am better than fathers
lay slept under juniper tree behold then angel touched said arise eat
looked behold there cake baken on coals cruse water at head did eat drink laid down again
angel lord came again second time touched said arise eat because journey too great thee
arose did eat drink went strength meat forty days nights horeb mount god
came thither cave lodged there behold word lord said what doest thou here elijah
said been very jealous lord god hosts children israel forsaken thy covenant thrown down thine altars slain prophets sword even only am left seek life take away
said go forth stand upon mount before lord behold passed by great strong wind rent mountains brake pieces rocks after earthquake
after earthquake fire lord still small voice
so elijah heard wrapped face mantle went out stood entering cave behold there came voice said what doest thou here
said been very jealous lord god hosts because children israel forsaken thy covenant thrown down thine altars slain prophets sword even only am left seek life take away
lord said go return on thy way wilderness damascus thou comest anoint hazael king over syria
jehu son nimshi shalt thou anoint king over israel elisha shaphat abelmeholah prophet thy room
come pass escapeth sword hazael jehu slay elisha
yet left seven thousand israel knees bowed baal every mouth hath kissed
so departed thence found elisha son shaphat who plowing twelve yoke oxen before twelfth elijah passed by cast mantle upon
left oxen ran after elijah said let pray thee kiss father mother then follow go back again what done
returned back took yoke oxen slew boiled flesh instruments gave people did eat then arose went after elijah ministered
benhadad king syria gathered host together there thirty two kings horses chariots went besieged samaria warred against
sent messengers ahab king israel city said thus saith benhadad
thy silver gold mine wives also children even goodliest
king israel answered said lord o according thy saying am thine
messengers came again said thus speaketh benhadad saying although sent thee thou shalt deliver thy silver gold wives children
yet send servants thee morrow about time search thine house houses thy whatsoever pleasant eyes put hand take away
then king israel called elders land said mark pray you see how man seeketh mischief sent wives children silver gold denied
elders people said hearken nor consent
wherefore said messengers benhadad tell lord king thou didst send thy servant at first do thing may departed brought word again
benhadad sent said gods do so more also if dust samaria suffice handfuls people follow
king israel answered said tell let girdeth on harness boast himself putteth off
came pass benhadad heard message drinking kings pavilions said servants set yourselves array themselves against city
behold there came prophet ahab king israel saying thus saith lord hast thou seen great multitude deliver thine hand day shalt know am
ahab said by whom thus saith lord even young men princes provinces then who order battle answered thou
then numbered young men princes provinces two hundred thirty after people even children israel being seven thousand
went out at noon benhadad drinking himself drunk pavilions kings thirty two helped
young men princes provinces went out first benhadad sent told saying there come samaria
said whether come out peace take alive or war
so these young men princes provinces came out city army followed
slew every one man syrians fled israel pursued benhadad king syria escaped on horse horsemen
king israel went out smote horses chariots slew syrians great slaughter
prophet came king israel said go strengthen thyself mark see what thou doest at return year syria come against thee
servants king syria said gods hills therefore stronger than we let us fight against plain surely
do thing take kings away every man out place put captains rooms
number thee army like thou hast lost horse chariot we fight against plain surely stronger than hearkened voice did so
came pass at return year benhadad numbered syrians went aphek fight against israel
children israel numbered present went against pitched before like two little flocks kids syrians filled country
there came man god spake king israel said thus saith lord because syrians hills valleys therefore deliver great multitude thine hand ye know am
pitched one over against other seven days so seventh day battle joined children israel slew syrians hundred thousand footmen
rest fled aphek city there wall fell upon twenty seven thousand men left benhadad came inner chamber
servants said behold now we heard kings house israel merciful let us pray thee put sackcloth on our loins ropes upon heads go out king peradventure save thy life
so girded sackcloth on loins put ropes heads came king israel said thy servant benhadad saith pray thee let live yet alive brother
now men did diligently observe whether any thing would come hastily catch said thy brother benhadad then go ye bring came forth caused chariot
benhadad said cities father took thy restore thou shalt make streets thee damascus made samaria then ahab send away covenant so sent
certain man sons prophets said neighbour word lord smite pray thee refused
then said because thou hast obeyed voice lord behold soon art departed lion slay thee found slew
then found another man said smite pray thee smote so smiting wounded
so prophet departed waited king by way disguised himself ashes upon face
king passed by cried said thy servant went out midst battle behold man turned aside brought keep if any means missing then life or else thou shalt pay talent silver
thy servant busy here there gone king israel said so judgment thyself hast decided
hasted took ashes away face king israel discerned prophets
said thus saith lord because thou hast let go out thy hand man whom appointed utter destruction therefore life people
king israel went house heavy displeased came samaria
came pass after these things naboth jezreelite had vineyard jezreel hard by palace ahab king samaria
ahab spake naboth saying give thy vineyard may garden herbs because near house thee better than or if seem good worth money
naboth said ahab lord forbid should give inheritance fathers thee
ahab came house heavy displeased because word naboth jezreelite had spoken said give thee inheritance fathers laid down upon bed turned away face would eat no bread
jezebel wife came said why thy spirit so sad thou eatest no bread
said her because spake naboth jezreelite give thy vineyard money or else if please thee another answered
jezebel wife said dost thou now govern kingdom israel arise eat bread let thine heart merry give thee vineyard naboth jezreelite
so she wrote letters ahab's name sealed seal sent elders nobles city dwelling naboth
she wrote letters saying proclaim fast set naboth on high among people
set two men sons belial before bear witness against saying thou didst blaspheme god king then carry out stone may die
men city even elders nobles who inhabitants did jezebel had sent written letters she
proclaimed fast set naboth on high among people
there came two men children belial sat before witnessed against even naboth presence people saying did blaspheme god king then carried forth out city stoned stones died
then sent jezebel saying naboth stoned dead
came pass jezebel heard naboth stoned dead said ahab arise take possession vineyard jezreelite refused give thee money alive
came pass ahab heard naboth dead rose go down vineyard jezreelite take possession
word lord came elijah tishbite saying
arise go down meet ahab king israel samaria behold vineyard naboth whither gone possess
thou shalt speak saying thus saith lord hast killed also taken possession place where dogs licked blood naboth lick thy even thine
ahab said elijah hast thou found o mine enemy answered thee because sold thyself work evil sight lord
behold bring evil upon thee take away thy posterity cut off ahab pisseth against wall shut left israel
make thine house like jeroboam son nebat baasha ahijah provocation wherewith thou hast provoked anger made israel sin
jezebel also spake lord saying dogs eat by wall jezreel
dieth ahab city dogs eat field fowls air
there none like ahab did sell himself work wickedness sight lord whom jezebel wife stirred
did very abominably following idols according things amorites whom lord cast out before children israel
came pass ahab heard those words rent clothes put sackcloth upon flesh fasted lay went softly
word lord came elijah tishbite saying
seest thou how ahab humbleth himself before because bring evil days son's upon house
continued three years without war between syria israel
came pass third year jehoshaphat king judah down israel
king israel said servants know ye ramoth gilead our's we still take out hand syria
said jehoshaphat wilt thou go battle ramothgilead king israel am art people thy horses
jehoshaphat said king israel enquire pray thee at word lord day
then king israel gathered prophets together about four hundred men said go against ramothgilead battle or forbear lord deliver hand
jehoshaphat said there here prophet lord besides we might enquire
king israel said jehoshaphat there yet one man micaiah son imlah by whom we may enquire lord hate doth prophesy good concerning evil let say so
then king israel called officer said hasten hither micaiah son imlah
king israel jehoshaphat judah sat each on throne having put robes void place entrance gate samaria prophets prophesied before
zedekiah son chenaanah made horns iron said thus saith lord these shalt thou push syrians until consumed
prophets prophesied so saying go ramothgilead prosper lord deliver king's hand
messenger gone call micaiah spake saying behold now words prophets declare good king one mouth let thy word pray thee like speak
micaiah said lord liveth what saith speak
so came king said micaiah we go against ramothgilead battle or forbear answered prosper lord deliver hand
king said how many times adjure thee thou tell nothing true name lord
said saw israel scattered upon hills sheep shepherd lord these no master let return every man house peace
king israel said jehoshaphat did tell thee would prophesy no good concerning evil
said hear thou therefore word lord saw sitting on throne host heaven standing by right hand left
lord said who persuade ahab may go fall at ramothgilead one on manner another
there came forth spirit stood before lord said persuade
lord said wherewith go forth lying spirit mouth prophets thou shalt persuade prevail also do so
now therefore behold lord hath put lying spirit mouth these thy prophets spoken evil concerning thee
zedekiah son chenaanah went near smote micaiah on cheek said way spirit lord speak thee
micaiah said behold thou shalt see day go inner chamber hide thyself
king israel said take micaiah carry back amon governor city joash king's son
say thus saith king put fellow prison feed bread affliction water until come peace
micaiah said if thou return at peace lord hath spoken by hearken o people every one you
so king israel jehoshaphat judah went ramothgilead
king israel said jehoshaphat disguise myself enter battle put thou on thy robes disguised himself went
king syria commanded thirty two captains had rule over chariots saying fight neither small nor great save only israel
came pass captains chariots saw jehoshaphat said surely king israel turned aside fight against cried out
came pass captains chariots perceived king israel turned back pursuing
certain man drew bow at venture smote king israel between joints harness wherefore said driver chariot turn thine hand carry out host am wounded
battle increased day king stayed chariot against syrians died at even blood ran out wound midst
there went proclamation throughout host about going down sun saying every man city own country
so king died brought samaria buried
one washed chariot pool samaria dogs licked blood armour according word lord spake
now rest acts ahab did ivory house made cities built written book chronicles kings israel
so ahab slept fathers ahaziah son reigned stead
jehoshaphat son asa began reign over judah fourth year ahab king israel
jehoshaphat thirty five years old began reign reigned twenty jerusalem mother's name azubah daughter shilhi
walked ways asa father turned aside doing right eyes lord nevertheless high places taken away people offered burnt incense yet
jehoshaphat made peace king israel
now rest acts jehoshaphat might shewed how warred written book chronicles kings judah
remnant sodomites remained days father asa took out land
there then no king edom deputy
jehoshaphat made ships tharshish go ophir gold went broken at eziongeber
then said ahaziah son ahab jehoshaphat let servants go thy ships would
jehoshaphat slept fathers buried city david father jehoram son reigned stead
ahaziah son ahab began reign over israel samaria seventeenth year jehoshaphat king judah reigned two years
did evil sight lord walked way father mother jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin
served baal worshipped provoked anger lord god israel according father had done
then moab rebelled against israel after death ahab
ahaziah fell down through lattice upper chamber samaria sick sent messengers said go enquire baalzebub god ekron whether recover disease
angel lord said elijah tishbite arise go meet messengers king samaria say because there god israel ye enquire baalzebub ekron
now therefore thus saith lord thou shalt come down bed on art gone surely die elijah departed
messengers turned back said why ye now
said there came man meet us go turn again king sent you say thus saith lord because god israel thou sendest enquire baalzebub ekron therefore shalt come down bed on art gone surely die
said what manner man came meet you told these words
answered hairy man girt girdle leather about loins said elijah tishbite
then king sent captain fifty went behold sat on top hill spake thou man god hath said come down
elijah answered said captain fifty if man god then let fire come down heaven consume thee thy there came consumed
again also sent another captain fifty answered said o man god thus hath king come down quickly
elijah answered said if man god let fire come down heaven consume thee thy fifty came consumed
sent again captain third fifty went came fell on knees before elijah besought said o man god pray thee let life these thy servants precious sight
behold there came fire down heaven burnt two captains former fifties therefore let life now precious thy sight
angel lord said elijah go down afraid arose went king
said thus saith lord forasmuch thou hast sent messengers enquire baalzebub god ekron because there no israel word therefore shalt come down off bed on art gone surely die
so died according word lord elijah had spoken jehoram reigned stead second year son jehoshaphat king judah because no
now rest acts ahaziah did written book chronicles kings israel
came pass lord would take elijah heaven by whirlwind went elisha gilgal
elijah said elisha tarry here pray thee lord hath sent bethel liveth thy soul leave so went down
sons prophets at bethel came forth elisha said knowest thou lord take away thy master head day yea know hold ye your peace
elijah said elisha tarry here pray thee lord hath sent jericho liveth thy soul leave so came
sons prophets at jericho came elisha said knowest thou lord take away thy master head day answered yea know hold ye your peace
elijah said tarry pray thee here lord hath sent jordan liveth thy soul leave two went on
fifty men sons prophets went stood view afar off two by jordan
elijah took mantle wrapped together smote waters divided hither thither so two went over on dry ground
came pass gone over elijah said elisha ask what do thee before taken away pray let double portion thy spirit upon
said thou hast asked hard thing nevertheless if see am taken thee so
came pass still went on talked behold there appeared chariot fire horses parted both asunder elijah by whirlwind heaven
elisha saw cried father chariot israel horsemen thereof no more took hold own clothes rent two pieces
took also mantle elijah fell went back stood by bank jordan
took mantle elijah fell smote waters said where lord god also had smitten parted hither thither elisha went over
sons prophets view at jericho saw said spirit elijah doth rest on elisha came meet bowed themselves ground before
said behold now there thy servants fifty strong men let go we pray thee seek master lest peradventure spirit lord hath taken cast upon some mountain or valley ye send
urged till ashamed said send sent therefore fifty men sought three days found
came again tarried at jericho said did say you go
men city said elisha behold pray thee situation pleasant lord seeth water naught ground barren
said bring new cruse put salt therein brought
went forth spring waters cast salt there said thus saith lord healed these thence any more death or barren land
so waters healed day according saying elisha spake
went thence bethel going by way there came forth little children out city mocked said go thou bald head
turned back looked on cursed name lord there came forth two she bears out wood tare forty children
went thence mount carmel returned samaria
now jehoram son ahab began reign over israel samaria eighteenth year jehoshaphat king judah reigned twelve years
wrought evil sight lord like father mother put away image baal had made
nevertheless cleaved sins jeroboam son nebat made israel sin departed therefrom
mesha king moab sheepmaster rendered israel hundred thousand lambs rams wool
came pass ahab dead king moab rebelled against israel
king jehoram went out samaria same time numbered israel
went sent jehoshaphat king judah saying moab hath rebelled against wilt thou go battle said am art people thy horses
said way we go answered through wilderness edom
so king israel went judah edom fetched compass seven days' journey there no water host cattle followed
king israel said alas lord hath called these three kings together deliver hand moab
jehoshaphat said there here prophet lord we may enquire by one king israel's servants answered elisha son shaphat poured water on hands elijah
jehoshaphat said word lord so king israel edom went down
elisha said king israel what do thee get prophets thy father mother nay lord hath called these three kings together deliver hand moab
elisha said lord hosts liveth before whom stand surely regard presence jehoshaphat king judah would look toward thee nor see
now bring minstrel came pass played hand lord upon
said thus saith lord make valley full ditches
thus saith lord ye see wind neither rain yet valley filled water may drink both your cattle beasts
light thing sight lord deliver moabites also your hand
ye smite every fenced city choice fell good tree stop wells water mar piece land stones
came pass morning meat offering offered behold there water by way edom country filled
moabites heard kings come fight against gathered able put on armour upward stood border
rose early morning sun shone upon water moabites saw on other side red blood
said blood kings surely slain smitten one another now therefore moab spoil
came camp israel israelites rose smote moabites so fled before went forward smiting even country
beat down cities on every good piece land cast man stone filled stopped wells water felled trees only kirharaseth left stones thereof howbeit slingers went about smote
king moab saw battle too sore took seven hundred men drew swords break through even edom could
then took eldest son should reigned stead offered burnt offering upon wall there great indignation against israel departed returned own land
now there cried certain woman wives sons prophets elisha saying thy servant husband dead thou knowest did fear lord creditor come take two bondmen
elisha said her what do thee tell hast thou house she thine handmaid hath any thing save pot oil
then said go borrow thee vessels abroad thy neighbours even empty few
thou art come shalt shut door upon thee thy sons pour out those vessels set aside full
so she went shut door upon her sons who brought vessels poured out
came pass vessels full she said her son bring yet vessel there more oil stayed
then she came told man god said go sell oil pay thy debt live thou children rest
fell on day elisha passed shunem where great woman she constrained eat bread so oft by turned thither
she said her husband behold now perceive holy man god passeth by us continually
let us make little chamber pray thee on wall set there bed table stool candlestick cometh turn thither
fell on day came thither turned chamber lay there
said gehazi servant call shunammite had called her she stood before
said say now her behold thou hast been careful us care what done thee wouldest spoken king or captain host she answered dwell among mine own people
said what then done her gehazi answered verily she hath no child husband old
said call her had called she stood door
said about season according time life thou shalt embrace son she nay lord man god do lie thine handmaid
woman conceived bare son at season elisha had said her according time life
child grown fell on day went out father reapers
said father head lad carry mother
had taken brought mother sat on her knees till noon then died
she went laid on bed man god shut door upon out
she called her husband said send pray thee one young men asses may run man god come again
said wherefore wilt thou go day neither new moon nor sabbath she well
then she saddled ass said her servant drive go forward slack thy riding except bid thee
so she went came man god mount carmel pass saw her afar off said gehazi servant behold yonder shunammite
run now pray thee meet her say well thy husband child she answered
she came man god hill caught by feet gehazi near thrust her away said let alone soul vexed within lord hath hid told
then she said did desire son lord say do deceive
then said gehazi gird thy loins take staff thine hand go way if thou meet any man salute thee answer again lay upon face child
mother child said lord liveth thy soul leave thee arose followed her
gehazi passed on before laid staff upon face child there neither voice nor hearing wherefore went again meet told saying awaked
elisha come house behold child dead laid upon bed
went therefore shut door upon twain prayed lord
went lay upon child put mouth eyes hands stretched himself flesh waxed warm
then returned walked house fro went stretched himself upon child sneezed seven times opened eyes
called gehazi said call shunammite so her she come take thy son
then she went fell at feet bowed herself ground took her son out
elisha came again gilgal there dearth land sons prophets sitting before said servant set on great pot seethe pottage
one went out field gather herbs found wild vine gathered thereof gourds lap full came shred pot pottage knew
so poured out men eat came pass eating pottage cried said o thou man god there death pot could thereof
said then bring meal cast pot pour out people may eat there no harm
there came man baalshalisha brought god bread firstfruits twenty loaves barley full ears corn husk thereof said give people may eat
servitor said what should set before hundred men again give people may eat thus saith lord leave thereof
so set before did eat left thereof according word lord
now naaman captain host king syria great man master honourable because by lord had given deliverance also mighty valour leper
syrians had gone out by companies brought away captive land israel little maid she waited on naaman's wife
she said her mistress would god lord prophet samaria recover leprosy
one went told lord saying thus said maid land israel
king syria said go send letter israel departed took ten talents silver six thousand pieces gold changes raiment
brought letter king israel saying now come thee behold therewith sent naaman servant thou mayest recover leprosy
came pass king israel had read letter rent clothes said am god kill make alive man doth send recover leprosy wherefore consider pray you see how seeketh quarrel against
so elisha man god had heard king israel rent clothes sent saying wherefore hast thou thy let come now know there prophet
so naaman came horses chariot stood at door house elisha
elisha sent messenger saying go wash jordan seven times thy flesh come again thee thou shalt clean
naaman wroth went away said behold thought surely come out stand call on name lord god strike hand over place recover leper
abana pharpar rivers damascus better than waters israel may wash clean so turned went away rage
servants came near spake said father if prophet had bid thee do some great thing wouldest thou done how much rather then saith wash clean
then went down dipped himself seven times jordan according saying man god flesh came again like little child clean
returned man god company came stood before said behold now know there no earth israel therefore pray thee take blessing thy servant
said lord liveth before whom stand receive none urged take refused
naaman said there then pray thee given thy servant two mules' burden earth henceforth offer neither burnt offering nor sacrifice other gods lord
thing lord pardon thy servant master goeth house rimmon worship there leaneth on hand bow myself down
said go peace so departed little way
gehazi servant elisha man god said behold master hath spared naaman syrian receiving at hands brought lord liveth run after take somewhat
so gehazi followed after naaman saw running lighted down chariot meet said well
said well master hath sent saying behold even now there come mount ephraim two young men sons prophets give pray thee talent silver changes garments
naaman said content take two talents urged bound silver bags changes garments laid upon servants bare before
came tower took hand bestowed house let men go departed
went stood before master elisha said whence comest thou gehazi thy servant no whither
said went mine heart thee man turned again chariot meet time receive money garments oliveyards vineyards sheep oxen menservants maidservants
leprosy therefore naaman cleave thee thy seed ever went out presence leper white snow
sons prophets said elisha behold now place where we dwell thee too strait us
let us go we pray thee jordan take thence every man beam make place there where may dwell answered ye
one said content pray thee go thy servants answered
so went came jordan cut down wood
one felling beam axe head fell water cried said alas master borrowed
man god said where fell shewed place cut down stick cast thither iron did swim
therefore said take thee put out hand took
then king syria warred against israel took counsel servants saying such place camp
man god sent king israel saying beware thou pass such place thither syrians come down
king israel sent place man god told warned saved himself there once nor twice
therefore heart king syria sore troubled thing called servants said ye shew us israel
one servants said none lord o king elisha prophet israel telleth words thou speakest thy bedchamber
said go spy where may send fetch told saying behold dothan
therefore sent thither horses chariots great host came by night compassed city about
servant man god risen early gone forth behold host compassed city both horses chariots said alas master how we do
answered fear us more than
elisha prayed said lord pray thee open eyes may see opened young man saw behold mountain full horses chariots fire round about
came down elisha prayed lord said smite people pray thee blindness smote according word
elisha said way neither city follow bring you man whom ye seek led samaria
came pass come samaria elisha said lord open eyes these men may see opened saw behold midst
king israel said elisha saw father smite
answered thou shalt smite wouldest those whom hast taken captive thy sword bow set bread water before may eat drink go master
prepared great provision had eaten drunk sent away went master so bands syria came no more land israel
came pass after benhadad king syria gathered host went besieged samaria
there great famine samaria behold besieged until ass's head sold fourscore pieces silver fourth part cab dove's dung five
king israel passing by upon wall there cried woman saying help lord o
said if lord do help thee whence out barnfloor or winepress
king said her what aileth thee she answered woman give thy son we may eat day morrow
so we boiled son did eat said her on next day give thy may she hath hid
came pass king heard words woman rent clothes passed by upon wall people looked behold had sackcloth within flesh
then said god do so more also if head elisha son shaphat stand on day
elisha sat house elders king sent man before ere messenger came said see ye how son murderer hath take away mine head look cometh shut door hold fast at sound master's feet behind
while yet talked behold messenger came down said evil lord what should wait any longer
then elisha said hear ye word lord thus saith morrow about time measure fine flour sold shekel two measures barley gate samaria
then lord on whose hand king leaned answered man god said behold if would make windows heaven might thing thou shalt see thine eyes eat thereof
there four leprous men at entering gate said one another why sit we here until die
if we say enter city then famine die there sit still here also now therefore come let us fall host syrians save alive live kill
rose twilight go camp syrians come uttermost part syria behold there no man
lord had made host syrians hear noise chariots horses even great said one another lo king israel hath hired against us kings hittites egyptians come upon
wherefore arose fled twilight left tents horses asses even camp life
these lepers came uttermost part camp went one tent did eat drink carried thence silver gold raiment hid again entered another also
then said one another we do well day good tidings hold our peace if tarry till morning light some mischief come upon us now therefore may go tell king's household
so came called porter city told saying we camp syrians behold there no man neither voice horses tied asses tents
called porters told king's house within
king arose night said servants now shew you what syrians done us know we hungry therefore gone out camp hide themselves field saying come city catch alive get
one servants answered said let some take pray thee five horses remain left city behold multitude israel say even israelites consumed us send see
took therefore two chariot horses king sent after host syrians saying go see
went after jordan lo way full garments vessels syrians had cast away haste messengers returned told king
people went out spoiled tents syrians so measure fine flour sold shekel two measures barley according word lord
king appointed lord on whose hand leaned charge gate people trode upon died man god had said who spake came down
came pass man god had spoken king saying two measures barley shekel measure fine flour morrow about time gate samaria
lord answered man god said now behold if should make windows heaven might such thing thou shalt see thine eyes eat thereof
so fell out people trode upon gate died
then spake elisha woman whose son had restored life saying arise go thou thine household sojourn wheresoever canst lord hath called famine also come upon land seven years
woman arose did after saying man god she went her household sojourned land philistines seven years
came pass at seven years' end woman returned out land philistines she went forth cry king her house
king talked gehazi servant man god saying tell pray thee great things elisha hath done
came pass telling king how had restored dead body life behold woman whose son cried her house land gehazi said lord o whom elisha
king asked woman she told so appointed her certain officer saying restore hers fruits field since day left land even until now
elisha came damascus benhadad king syria sick told saying man god come hither
king said hazael take present thine hand go meet man god enquire lord by saying recover disease
so hazael went meet took present even every good thing damascus forty camels' burden came stood before said thy son benhadad king syria hath sent thee saying recover disease
elisha said go say thou mayest certainly recover howbeit lord hath shewed surely die
settled countenance stedfastly until ashamed man god wept
hazael said why weepeth lord answered because know evil thou wilt do children israel strong holds set on fire young men slay sword dash rip women child
hazael said what thy servant dog should do great thing elisha answered lord hath shewed thou shalt king over syria
so departed elisha came master who said what thee answered told thou shouldest surely recover
came pass on morrow took thick cloth dipped water spread face so died hazael reigned stead
fifth year joram son ahab king israel jehoshaphat being then judah jehoram began reign
thirty two years old began reign reigned eight jerusalem
walked way kings israel did house ahab daughter wife evil sight lord
yet lord would destroy judah david servant's sake promised give alway light children
days edom revolted under hand judah made king over themselves
so joram went over zair chariots rose by night smote edomites compassed about captains people fled tents
yet edom revolted under hand judah day then libnah at same time
rest acts joram did written book chronicles kings judah
joram slept fathers buried city david ahaziah son reigned stead
twelfth year joram son ahab king israel did ahaziah jehoram judah begin reign
two twenty years old ahaziah began reign reigned one year jerusalem mother's name athaliah daughter omri king israel
walked way house ahab did evil sight lord son law
went joram son ahab war against hazael king syria ramothgilead syrians wounded
king joram went back healed jezreel wounds syrians had given at ramah fought against hazael syria ahaziah son jehoram judah down see ahab because sick
elisha prophet called one children prophets said gird thy loins take box oil thine hand go ramothgilead
thou comest thither look out there jehu son jehoshaphat nimshi go make arise among brethren carry inner chamber
then take box oil pour on head say thus saith lord anointed thee king over israel open door flee tarry
so young man even prophet went ramothgilead
came behold captains host sitting said errand thee o captain jehu us
arose went house poured oil on head said thus saith lord god israel anointed thee king over people even
thou shalt smite house ahab thy master may avenge blood servants prophets lord at hand jezebel
whole house ahab perish cut off pisseth against wall shut left israel
make house ahab like jeroboam son nebat baasha ahijah
dogs eat jezebel portion jezreel there none bury her opened door fled
then jehu came forth servants lord one said well wherefore mad fellow thee ye know man communication
said false tell us now thus spake saying saith lord anointed thee king over israel
then hasted took every man garment put under on top stairs blew trumpets saying jehu king
so jehu son jehoshaphat nimshi conspired against joram now had kept ramothgilead israel because hazael king syria
king joram returned healed jezreel wounds syrians had given fought hazael syria jehu said if your minds then let none go forth nor escape out city tell
so jehu rode chariot went jezreel joram lay there ahaziah king judah come down see
there stood watchman on tower jezreel spied company jehu came said see joram take horseman send meet let say peace
so there went one on horseback meet said thus saith king peace jehu what hast thou do turn thee behind watchman told saying messenger came cometh again
then sent out second on horseback came said thus saith king peace jehu answered what hast thou do turn thee behind
watchman told saying came even cometh again driving like jehu son nimshi driveth furiously
joram said make ready chariot made king israel ahaziah judah went out each against jehu met portion naboth jezreelite
came pass joram saw jehu said peace answered what so long whoredoms thy mother jezebel her witchcrafts many
joram turned hands fled said ahaziah there treachery o
jehu drew bow full strength smote jehoram between arms arrow went out at heart sunk down chariot
then said jehu bidkar captain take cast portion field naboth jezreelite remember how thou rode together after ahab father lord laid burden upon
surely seen yesterday blood naboth sons saith lord requite thee plat now therefore take cast ground according word
ahaziah king judah saw fled by way garden house jehu followed after said smite also chariot did so at going gur ibleam megiddo died there
servants carried chariot jerusalem buried sepulchre fathers city david
eleventh year joram son ahab began ahaziah reign over judah
jehu come jezreel jezebel heard she painted her face tired head looked out at window
jehu entered at gate she said had zimri peace who slew master
lifted face window said who on side there looked out two or three eunuchs
said throw her down so threw some blood sprinkled on wall horses trode under foot
come did eat drink said go see now cursed woman bury her she king's daughter
went bury her found no more than skull feet palms hands
wherefore came again told said word lord spake by servant elijah tishbite saying portion jezreel dogs eat flesh jezebel
carcase jezebel dung upon face field portion jezreel so say
ahab had seventy sons samaria jehu wrote letters sent rulers jezreel elders brought ahab's children saying
now soon letter cometh you seeing your master's sons there chariots horses fenced city also armour
look even out best meetest your master's sons set on father's throne fight house
exceedingly afraid said behold two kings stood before how then we stand
over house city elders also bringers children sent jehu saying we thy servants do thou shalt bid us make any king good thine eyes
then wrote letter second time saying if ye mine hearken voice take heads men your master's sons come jezreel by morrow now king's being seventy persons great city brought
came pass letter took king's sons slew seventy persons put heads baskets sent jezreel
there came messenger told saying brought heads king's sons said lay ye two heaps at entering gate until morning
came pass morning went out stood said people ye righteous behold conspired against master slew who these
know now there fall earth nothing word lord spake concerning house ahab hath done by servant elijah
so jehu slew remained house ahab jezreel great men kinsfolks priests until left none remaining
arose departed came samaria at shearing house way
jehu met brethren ahaziah king judah said who ye answered we go down salute children queen
said take alive took slew at pit shearing house even two forty men neither left any
departed thence lighted on jehonadab son rechab coming meet saluted said thine heart right thy answered if give hand gave took chariot
said come see zeal lord so made ride chariot
came samaria slew remained ahab till had destroyed according saying lord spake elijah
jehu gathered people together said ahab served baal little serve much
now therefore call prophets baal servants priests let none wanting great sacrifice do whosoever live jehu did subtilty intent might destroy worshippers
jehu said proclaim solemn assembly baal proclaimed
jehu sent through israel worshippers baal came so there man left house full one end another
said over vestry bring forth vestments worshippers baal brought
jehu went jehonadab son rechab house baal said worshippers search look there here you none servants lord only
went offer sacrifices burnt offerings jehu appointed fourscore men without said if any whom brought your hands escape letteth go life
came pass soon had made end offering burnt jehu said guard captains go slay let none come forth smote edge sword cast out went city house baal
brought forth images out house baal burned
brake down image baal house made draught day
thus jehu destroyed baal out israel
howbeit sins jeroboam son nebat who made israel sin jehu departed after wit golden calves bethel dan
lord said jehu because thou hast done well executing right mine eyes house ahab according heart thy children fourth generation sit on throne israel
jehu took no heed walk law lord god israel heart departed sins jeroboam made sin
those days lord began cut israel short hazael smote coasts
jordan eastward land gilead gadites reubenites manassites aroer by river arnon even bashan
now rest acts jehu did might written book chronicles kings israel
jehu slept fathers buried samaria jehoahaz son reigned stead
time jehu reigned over israel samaria twenty eight years
athaliah mother ahaziah saw her son dead she arose destroyed seed royal
jehosheba daughter king joram sister ahaziah took joash son stole among king's sons slain hid even nurse bedchamber athaliah so
her hid house lord six years athaliah did reign over land
seventh year jehoiada sent fetched rulers over hundreds captains guard brought house lord made covenant took oath shewed king's son
commanded saying thing ye do third part you enter on sabbath even keepers watch king's house
third part at gate sur behind guard so ye keep watch house broken down
two parts you go forth on sabbath even keep watch house lord about king
ye compass king round about every man weapons hand cometh within ranges let slain goeth out
captains over hundreds did according things jehoiada priest commanded took every man men come on sabbath should go out came
captains over hundreds did priest give king david's spears shields temple lord
guard stood every man weapons hand round about king right corner temple left along by altar
brought forth king's son put crown upon gave testimony made king anointed clapped hands said god save
athaliah heard noise guard people she came temple lord
she looked behold king stood by pillar manner princes trumpeters people land rejoiced blew trumpets athaliah rent her clothes cried treason
jehoiada priest commanded captains hundreds officers host said her forth without ranges followeth kill sword had let slain house lord
laid hands on her she went by way horses came king's house there slain
jehoiada made covenant between lord king people should lord's also
people land went house baal brake down altars images pieces thoroughly slew mattan priest before appointed officers over lord
took rulers over hundreds captains guard people land brought down king house lord came by way gate king's sat on throne kings
people land rejoiced city quiet slew athaliah sword beside king's house
seven years old jehoash began reign
seventh year jehu jehoash began reign forty years reigned jerusalem mother's name zibiah beersheba
jehoash did right sight lord days wherein jehoiada priest instructed
high places taken away people still sacrificed burnt incense
jehoash said priests money dedicated things brought house lord even every one passeth account man set at cometh any man's heart bring
let priests take every man acquaintance repair breaches house wheresoever any breach found
so three twentieth year king jehoash priests had repaired breaches house
then king jehoash called jehoiada priest other priests said why repair ye breaches house now therefore receive no more money your acquaintance deliver
priests consented receive no more money people neither repair breaches house
jehoiada priest took chest bored hole lid set beside altar on right side one cometh house lord priests kept door put therein money brought
so saw there much money chest king's scribe high priest came put bags told found house lord
gave money being told hands did work had oversight house lord laid out carpenters builders wrought upon
masons hewers stone buy timber hewed repair breaches house lord laid out
howbeit there made house lord bowls silver snuffers basons trumpets any vessels gold or money brought
gave workmen repaired therewith house lord
moreover reckoned men whose hand delivered money bestowed on workmen dealt faithfully
trespass money sin brought house lord priests'
then hazael king syria went fought against gath took set face go jerusalem
jehoash king judah took hallowed things jehoshaphat jehoram ahaziah fathers kings had dedicated own gold found treasures house lord king's sent hazael syria went away jerusalem
rest acts joash did written book chronicles kings judah
servants arose made conspiracy slew joash house millo goeth down silla

three twentieth year joash son ahaziah king judah jehoahaz jehu began reign over israel samaria reigned seventeen years
did evil sight lord followed sins jeroboam son nebat made israel sin departed therefrom
anger lord kindled against israel delivered hand hazael king syria benhadad son days
jehoahaz besought lord hearkened saw oppression israel because king syria oppressed
lord gave israel saviour so went out under hand syrians children dwelt tents beforetime
nevertheless departed sins house jeroboam who made israel sin walked therein there remained grove also samaria
neither did leave people jehoahaz fifty horsemen ten chariots thousand footmen king syria had destroyed made like dust by threshing

now elisha fallen sick sickness whereof died joash king israel came down wept over face said o father chariot horsemen thereof
elisha said take bow arrows took
said king israel put thine hand upon bow elisha hands king's
said open window eastward opened then elisha shoot shot arrow lord's deliverance syria thou shalt smite syrians aphek till consumed
said take arrows took king israel smite upon ground smote thrice stayed
man god wroth said thou shouldest smitten five or six times then hadst syria till consumed whereas now shalt smite thrice
elisha died buried bands moabites invaded land at coming year
came pass burying man behold spied band men cast sepulchre elisha let down touched bones revived stood on feet
hazael king syria oppressed israel days jehoahaz
lord gracious had compassion on respect because covenant abraham isaac jacob would destroy neither cast presence yet
so hazael king syria died benhadad son reigned stead
jehoash son jehoahaz took again out hand benhadad hazael cities had taken father by war three times did joash beat recovered israel
second year joash son jehoahaz king israel reigned amaziah judah
twenty five years old began reign reigned nine jerusalem mother's name jehoaddan
did right sight lord yet like david father according things joash
howbeit high places taken away yet people did sacrifice burnt incense on
came pass soon kingdom confirmed hand slew servants had slain king father
children murderers slew according written book law moses wherein lord commanded saying fathers put death nor every man own sin
slew edom valley salt ten thousand took selah by war called name joktheel day
then amaziah sent messengers jehoash son jehoahaz jehu king israel saying come let us look one another face
jehoash king israel sent amaziah judah saying thistle lebanon cedar give thy daughter son wife there passed by wild beast trode down
thou hast indeed smitten edom thine heart hath lifted thee glory tarry at home why shouldest meddle thy hurt fall even judah
amaziah would hear therefore jehoash king israel went judah looked one another face at bethshemesh belongeth
judah put worse before israel fled every man tents
jehoash king israel took amaziah judah son ahaziah at bethshemesh came jerusalem brake down wall gate ephraim corner four hundred cubits
took gold silver vessels found house lord treasures king's hostages returned samaria

lord saw affliction israel very bitter there any shut nor left helper

twenty years old ahaz began reign reigned sixteen jerusalem did right sight lord god like david father
walked way kings israel yea made son pass through fire according abominations heathen whom lord cast out before children
sacrificed burnt incense high places on hills under every green tree
then rezin king syria pekah son remaliah israel came jerusalem war besieged ahaz could overcome
at time rezin king syria recovered elath drave jews syrians came dwelt there day
so ahaz sent messengers tiglathpileser king assyria saying am thy servant son come save out hand syria israel rise against
ahaz took silver gold found house lord treasures king's sent present king assyria
king assyria hearkened went against damascus took carried people captive kir slew rezin
king ahaz went damascus meet tiglathpileser assyria saw altar at sent urijah priest fashion pattern according workmanship thereof
urijah priest built altar according king ahaz had sent damascus so made against came
king come damascus saw altar approached offered thereon
burnt offering meat poured drink sprinkled blood peace offerings upon altar
brought also brasen altar before lord forefront house between put on north side
king ahaz commanded urijah priest saying upon great altar burn morning burnt offering evening meat king's sacrifice people land drink offerings sprinkle blood brasen enquire by
thus did urijah priest according king ahaz commanded
king ahaz cut off borders bases removed laver took down sea brasen oxen under put upon pavement stones
covert sabbath had built house king's entry without turned lord king assyria

ahaz slept fathers buried city david hezekiah son reigned stead
twelfth year ahaz king judah began hoshea son elah reign samaria over israel nine years
did evil sight lord kings israel before
against came shalmaneser king assyria hoshea became servant gave presents
king assyria found conspiracy hoshea had sent messengers so egypt brought no present done year by therefore shut bound prison
then king assyria came throughout land went samaria besieged three years
ninth year hoshea king assyria took samaria carried israel away placed halah habor by river gozan cities medes
so children israel had sinned against lord god brought out land egypt under hand pharaoh king feared other gods
walked statutes heathen whom lord cast out before children israel kings had made
children israel did secretly those things right against lord god built high places cities tower watchmen fenced city
set images groves every high hill under green tree
there burnt incense high places did heathen whom lord carried away before wrought wicked things provoke anger
served idols whereof lord had said ye do thing
yet lord testified against israel judah by prophets seers saying turn ye your evil ways keep commandments statutes according law commanded fathers sent you servants
notwithstanding would hear hardened necks like neck fathers did believe lord god
rejected statutes covenant made fathers testimonies testified against followed vanity became vain went after heathen round about concerning whom lord had charged should do like
left commandments lord god made molten images even two calves grove worshipped host heaven served baal
caused sons daughters pass through fire used divination enchantments sold themselves do evil sight lord provoke anger
therefore lord very angry israel removed out sight there none left tribe judah only
also judah kept commandments lord god walked statutes israel made
lord rejected seed israel afflicted delivered hand spoilers until had cast out sight
rent israel house david made jeroboam son nebat king drave following lord sin great
children israel walked sins jeroboam did departed
until lord removed israel out sight had said by servants prophets so carried away own land assyria day
king assyria brought men babylon cuthah ava hamath sepharvaim placed cities samaria instead children israel possessed dwelt thereof
so at beginning dwelling there feared lord therefore sent lions among slew some
wherefore spake king assyria saying nations thou hast removed placed cities samaria know manner god land therefore hath sent lions among behold slay because
then king assyria commanded saying carry thither one priests whom ye brought thence let go dwell there teach manner god land
then one priests whom had carried away samaria came dwelt bethel taught how should fear lord
howbeit every nation made gods own put houses high places samaritans had cities wherein dwelt
men babylon made succothbenoth cuth nergal hamath ashima
avites made nibhaz tartak sepharvites burnt children fire adrammelech anammelech gods sepharvaim
so feared lord made themselves lowest priests high places sacrificed houses
feared lord served own gods after manner nations whom carried away thence
day do after former manners fear lord neither statutes or ordinances law commandment commanded children jacob whom named israel
whom lord had made covenant charged saying ye fear other gods nor bow yourselves serve sacrifice
lord who brought you out land egypt great power stretched arm ye fear worship do sacrifice
statutes ordinances law commandment wrote you ye observe do evermore fear other gods
covenant made you ye forget neither fear other gods
lord your god ye fear deliver you out hand enemies
howbeit did hearken after former manner
so these nations feared lord served graven images both children children's did fathers do day
now came pass third year hoshea son elah king israel hezekiah ahaz judah began reign
twenty five years old began reign reigned nine jerusalem mother's name also abi daughter zachariah
did right sight lord according david father
removed high places brake images cut down groves pieces brasen serpent moses had made those days children israel did burn incense called nehushtan
trusted lord god israel so after none like among kings judah nor any before
clave lord departed following kept commandments commanded moses
lord prospered whithersoever went forth rebelled against king assyria served
smote philistines even gaza borders thereof tower watchmen fenced city
came pass fourth year king hezekiah seventh hoshea son elah israel shalmaneser assyria against samaria besieged
at end three years took even sixth year hezekiah ninth hoshea king israel samaria taken
king assyria did carry away israel put halah habor by river gozan cities medes
because obeyed voice lord god transgressed covenant moses servant commanded would hear nor do
now fourteenth year king hezekiah did sennacherib assyria come against fenced cities judah took
hezekiah king judah sent assyria lachish saying offended return thou puttest on bear appointed three hundred talents silver thirty gold
hezekiah gave silver found house lord treasures king's
at time did hezekiah cut off gold doors temple lord pillars king judah had overlaid gave assyria
king assyria sent tartan rabsaris rabshakeh lachish hezekiah great host against jerusalem went came come stood by conduit upper pool highway fuller's field
had called king there came out eliakim son hilkiah over household shebna scribe joah asaph recorder
rabshakeh said speak ye now hezekiah thus saith great king assyria what confidence wherein thou trustest
thou sayest vain words counsel strength war now on whom dost trust rebellest against
now behold thou trustest upon staff bruised reed even egypt on if man lean go hand pierce so pharaoh king trust
if ye say we trust lord our god whose high places altars hezekiah hath taken away said judah jerusalem worship before altar
now therefore pray thee give pledges lord king assyria deliver two thousand horses if thou able on thy part set riders upon
how then wilt thou turn away face one captain least master's servants put thy trust on egypt chariots horsemen
am now come without lord against place destroy said go land
then said eliakim son hilkiah shebna joah rabshakeh speak pray thee thy servants syrian language we understand talk us jews' ears people on wall
rabshakeh said hath master sent thy thee speak these words men sit on wall may eat own dung drink piss you
then rabshakeh stood cried loud voice jews' language spake saying hear word great king assyria
thus saith king let hezekiah deceive you able deliver out hand
neither let hezekiah make you trust lord saying surely deliver us city delivered hand king assyria
hearken hezekiah thus saith king assyria make agreement by present come out then eat ye every man own vine one fig tree drink waters cistern
until come take you away land like your own corn wine bread vineyards oil olive honey ye may live die hearken hezekiah persuadeth saying lord deliver us
hath any gods nations delivered at land out hand king assyria
where gods hamath arpad sepharvaim hena ivah delivered samaria out mine hand
who among gods countries delivered country out mine hand lord should deliver jerusalem
people held peace answered word king's commandment saying answer
then came eliakim son hilkiah over household shebna scribe joah asaph recorder hezekiah clothes rent told words rabshakeh
came pass king hezekiah heard rent clothes covered himself sackcloth went house lord
sent eliakim over household shebna scribe elders priests covered sackcloth isaiah prophet son amoz
said thus saith hezekiah day trouble rebuke blasphemy children come birth there strength bring forth
may lord thy god hear words rabshakeh whom king assyria master hath sent reproach living reprove heard wherefore lift prayer remnant left
so servants king hezekiah came isaiah
isaiah said thus ye say your master saith lord afraid words thou hast heard servants king assyria blasphemed
behold send blast upon hear rumour return own land cause fall by sword
so rabshakeh returned found king assyria warring against libnah had heard departed lachish
heard say tirhakah king ethiopia behold come out fight against thee sent messengers again hezekiah saying
thus ye speak hezekiah king judah saying let thy god whom thou trustest deceive thee jerusalem delivered hand assyria
behold thou hast heard what kings assyria done lands by destroying utterly shalt delivered
gods nations delivered fathers destroyed gozan haran rezeph children eden thelasar
where king hamath arpad city sepharvaim hena ivah
hezekiah received letter hand messengers read went house lord spread before
hezekiah prayed before lord said o god israel dwellest between cherubims thou art even alone kingdoms earth hast made heaven
lord bow down thine ear hear open eyes see words sennacherib hath sent reproach living god
truth lord kings assyria destroyed nations lands
cast gods fire no work men's hands wood stone therefore destroyed
now therefore o lord our god beseech thee save thou us out hand kingdoms earth may know art even only
then isaiah son amoz sent hezekiah saying thus saith lord god israel thou hast prayed against sennacherib king assyria heard
word lord hath spoken concerning virgin daughter zion despised thee laughed scorn jerusalem shaken her head at
whom hast thou reproached blasphemed against exalted thy voice lifted thine eyes on high even holy one israel
by thy messengers thou hast reproached lord said multitude chariots am come height mountains sides lebanon cut down tall cedar trees thereof choice fir enter lodgings borders forest carmel
digged drunk strange waters sole feet dried rivers besieged places
hast thou heard long ago how done ancient times formed now brought pass shouldest lay waste fenced cities ruinous heaps
therefore inhabitants small power dismayed confounded grass field green herb on housetops corn blasted before grown
know thy abode going out coming rage against
because thy rage against tumult come mine ears therefore put hook nose bridle lips turn thee back by way thou camest
sign thee ye eat year such things grow themselves second springeth same third sow reap plant vineyards fruits thereof
remnant escaped house judah yet again take root downward bear fruit upward
out jerusalem go forth remnant escape mount zion zeal lord hosts do
therefore thus saith lord concerning king assyria come city nor shoot arrow there before shield cast bank against
by way came same return come city saith lord
defend city save mine own sake servant david's
came pass night angel lord went out smote camp assyrians hundred fourscore five thousand arose early morning behold dead corpses
so sennacherib king assyria departed went returned dwelt at nineveh
came pass worshipping house nisroch god adrammelech sharezer sons smote sword escaped land armenia esarhaddon son reigned stead
those days hezekiah sick death prophet isaiah son amoz came said thus saith lord set thine house order thou shalt die live
then turned face wall prayed lord saying
beseech thee o lord remember now how walked before truth perfect heart done good thy sight hezekiah wept sore
came pass afore isaiah gone out middle court word lord saying
turn again tell hezekiah captain people thus saith lord god david thy father heard prayer seen tears behold heal thee on third day thou shalt go house
add thy days fifteen years deliver thee city out hand king assyria defend mine own sake servant david's
isaiah said take lump figs took laid on boil recovered

isaiah said sign shalt thou lord do thing hath spoken shadow go forward ten degrees or back
hezekiah answered light thing shadow go down ten degrees nay let return backward

at time berodachbaladan son baladan king babylon sent letters present hezekiah had heard been sick

said what seen thine house hezekiah answered things mine there nothing among treasures shewed

thy sons issue thee thou shalt beget take away eunuchs palace king babylon
