lord spake by servants prophets saying
because manasseh king judah hath done these abominations wickedly above amorites did before made also sin idols
therefore thus saith lord god israel behold am bringing such evil upon jerusalem judah whosoever heareth both ears tingle
stretch over jerusalem line samaria plummet house ahab wipe man wipeth dish wiping turning upside down

came pass eighteenth year king josiah sent shaphan son azaliah meshullam scribe house lord saying
go hilkiah high priest may sum silver brought house lord keepers door gathered people
let deliver hand doers work oversight house lord give repair breaches
carpenters builders masons buy timber hewn stone repair house
howbeit there no reckoning made money delivered hand because dealt faithfully

came pass king had heard words book law rent clothes
king commanded hilkiah priest ahikam son shaphan achbor michaiah scribe asahiah servant king's saying

she said thus saith lord god israel tell man sent you

because forsaken burned incense other gods might provoke anger works hands therefore wrath kindled against place quenched
king judah sent you enquire lord thus ye say saith god israel touching words thou hast heard
because thine heart tender thou hast humbled thyself before lord heardest what spake against place inhabitants thereof should become desolation curse rent thy clothes wept also heard thee saith
behold therefore gather thee thy fathers thou shalt gathered grave peace thine eyes see evil bring upon place brought king word again

city besieged eleventh year king zedekiah
on ninth day fourth month famine prevailed city there no bread people land
city broken men war fled by night way gate between two walls king's garden now chaldees against round about king went toward plain
army chaldees pursued after king overtook plains jericho scattered
so took king brought babylon riblah gave judgment upon
slew sons zedekiah before eyes put out bound fetters brass carried babylon

burnt house lord king's houses jerusalem every great man's fire
army chaldees captain guard brake down walls jerusalem round about
now rest people left city fugitives fell away king babylon remnant multitude did nebuzaradan captain guard carry

sons ham cush mizraim put canaan

pathrusim casluhim whom came philistines caphthorim

children amram aaron moses miriam sons also nadab abihu eleazar ithamar

uzzi begat zerahiah meraioth

ahimaaz begat azariah johanan

so saul died three sons house together

lord our god judgments earth
ye mindful always covenant word commanded thousand generations

went nation one kingdom another people

saying touch mine anointed do prophets no harm

declare glory among heathen marvellous works nations
great lord greatly praised also feared above gods
gods people idols lord made heavens
glory honour presence strength gladness place
give lord ye kindreds people glory strength

fear before earth world also stable moved

let sea roar fulness thereof fields rejoice therein
then trees wood sing out at presence lord because cometh judge earth
o give thanks lord good mercy endureth ever

people departed every man house david returned bless
now came pass david sat house said nathan prophet lo dwell cedars ark covenant lord remaineth under curtains
then nathan said david do thine heart god thee
came pass same night word god nathan saying
go tell david servant thus saith lord thou shalt build house dwell
dwelt house since day brought israel gone tent one tabernacle another
wheresoever walked israel spake word any judges whom commanded feed people saying why ye built house cedars
now therefore thus shalt thou say servant david saith lord hosts took thee sheepcote even following sheep shouldest ruler over people israel
been thee whithersoever thou hast walked cut off thine enemies before made name like great men earth
also ordain place people israel plant dwell moved no more neither children wickedness waste any at beginning
since time commanded judges over people israel moreover subdue thine enemies furthermore tell thee lord build house
come pass thy days expired thou must go fathers raise seed after thee sons establish kingdom
build house stablish throne ever
father son take mercy away took before thee
settle mine house kingdom ever throne established evermore
according these words vision so did nathan speak david
david king came sat before lord said who am o god what mine house thou hast brought hitherto
yet small thing thine eyes o god thou hast also spoken thy servant's house great while come regarded according estate man high degree lord
what can david speak more thee honour thy servant thou knowest
o lord thy servant's sake according thine own heart hast thou done greatness making known these great things
o lord there none like thee neither any god beside according we heard our ears
what one nation earth like thy people israel whom god went redeem own make thee name greatness terribleness by driving out nations before thou hast redeemed egypt
thy people israel didst thou make thine own ever lord becamest god
therefore now lord let thing thou hast spoken concerning thy servant house established ever do said
let even established thy name may magnified ever saying lord hosts god israel house david servant before thee
thou o god hast told thy servant wilt build house therefore hath found heart pray before thee
now lord thou art god hast promised goodness thy servant
now therefore let please thee bless house thy servant may before ever thou blessest o lord blessed
now after came pass david smote philistines subdued took gath her towns out hand
smote moab moabites became david's servants brought gifts
david smote hadarezer king zobah hamath went stablish dominion by river euphrates
david took thousand chariots seven horsemen twenty footmen also houghed chariot horses reserved hundred
syrians damascus came help hadarezer king zobah david slew two twenty thousand men
then david put garrisons syriadamascus syrians became david's servants brought gifts thus lord preserved whithersoever went
david took shields gold on servants hadarezer brought jerusalem
likewise tibhath chun cities hadarezer brought david very much brass wherewith solomon made brasen sea pillars vessels
now tou king hamath heard how david had smitten host hadarezer zobah
sent hadoram son king david enquire welfare congratulate because had fought against hadarezer smitten war tou manner vessels gold silver brass
also king david dedicated lord silver gold brought these nations edom moab children ammon philistines amalek
moreover abishai son zeruiah slew edomites valley salt eighteen thousand
put garrisons edom edomites became david's servants thus lord preserved david whithersoever went
so david reigned over israel executed judgment justice among people

zadok son ahitub abimelech abiathar priests shavsha scribe
benaiah son jehoiada over cherethites pelethites sons david chief about king
now came pass after nahash king children ammon died son reigned stead
david said shew kindness hanun son nahash because father shewed sent messengers comfort concerning so servants came land children ammon
princes children ammon said hanun thinkest thou david doth honour thy father hath sent comforters thee servants come search overthrow spy out land
wherefore hanun took david's servants shaved cut off garments midst hard by buttocks sent away
then there went certain told david how men served sent meet greatly ashamed king said tarry at jericho until your beards grown return
children ammon saw had made themselves odious david hanun sent thousand talents silver hire chariots horsemen out mesopotamia syriamaachah zobah
so hired thirty two thousand chariots king maachah people who came pitched before medeba children ammon gathered themselves together cities battle
david heard sent joab host mighty men
children ammon came out put battle array before gate city kings come by themselves field
now joab saw battle set against before behind chose out choice israel put array syrians
rest people delivered hand abishai brother set themselves array against children ammon
said if syrians too strong then thou shalt help children ammon thee
good courage let us behave ourselves valiantly our people cities god lord do sight
so joab people drew nigh before syrians battle fled
children ammon saw syrians fled likewise before abishai brother entered city then joab came jerusalem
syrians saw put worse before israel sent messengers drew forth beyond river shophach captain host hadarezer went
told david gathered israel passed over jordan came upon set battle array against so had put syrians fought
syrians fled before israel david slew seven thousand men fought chariots forty footmen killed shophach captain host
servants hadarezer saw put worse before israel made peace david became neither would syrians help children ammon any more
came pass after year expired at time kings go out battle joab led forth power army wasted country children ammon besieged rabbah david tarried jerusalem smote destroyed
david took crown king off head found weigh talent gold there precious stones set upon david's brought also exceeding much spoil out city
brought out people cut saws harrows iron axes even so dealt david cities children ammon returned jerusalem
came pass after there arose war at gezer philistines time sibbechai hushathite slew sippai children giant subdued
there war again philistines elhanan son jair slew lahmi brother goliath gittite whose spear staff like weaver's beam
yet again there war at gath where man great stature whose fingers toes four twenty six on each hand foot also son giant
defied israel jonathan son shimea david's brother slew
these born giant gath fell by hand david servants
satan stood against israel provoked david number
david said joab rulers people go number israel beersheba even dan bring may know
joab answered lord make people hundred times so many more king lord's servants why then doth require thing cause trespass israel
nevertheless king's word prevailed against joab wherefore departed went throughout israel came jerusalem
joab gave sum number people david israel thousand hundred men drew sword judah four threescore ten
levi benjamin counted among king's word abominable joab
god displeased thing therefore smote israel
david said god sinned greatly because done thing now beseech thee do away iniquity thy servant very foolishly
lord spake gad david's seer saying
go tell david saying thus saith lord offer thee three things choose one may do
so gad came david said thus saith lord choose thee
either three years' famine or months destroyed before thy foes while sword thine enemies overtaketh thee else days lord even pestilence land angel destroying throughout coasts israel now therefore advise thyself what word bring again sent
david said gad am great strait let fall now hand lord very mercies man
so lord sent pestilence upon israel there fell seventy thousand men
god sent angel jerusalem destroy destroying lord beheld repented evil said destroyed enough stay now thine hand stood by threshingfloor ornan jebusite
david lifted eyes saw angel lord stand between earth heaven having drawn sword hand stretched out over jerusalem then elders israel who clothed sackcloth fell upon faces
david said god commanded people numbered even sinned done evil indeed these sheep what let thine hand pray thee o lord on father's house thy should plagued
then angel lord commanded gad say david should go set altar threshingfloor ornan jebusite
david went at saying gad spake name lord
ornan turned back saw angel four sons hid themselves now threshing wheat
david came ornan looked saw went out threshingfloor bowed himself face ground
then david said ornan grant place threshingfloor may build altar therein lord thou shalt full price plague stayed people
ornan said david take thee let lord king do good eyes lo give oxen also burnt offerings threshing instruments wood wheat meat offering
king david said ornan nay verily buy full price take thine lord nor offer burnt offerings without cost
so david gave ornan place six hundred shekels gold by weight
david built there altar lord offered burnt offerings peace called upon answered heaven by fire offering
lord commanded angel put sword again sheath thereof
at time david saw lord had answered threshingfloor ornan jebusite then sacrificed there
tabernacle lord moses made wilderness altar burnt offering at season high place gibeon
david could go before enquire god afraid because sword angel lord
then david said house lord god altar burnt offering israel
david commanded gather together strangers land israel set masons hew wrought stones build house god
david prepared iron abundance nails doors gates joinings brass without weight
also cedar trees abundance zidonians tyre brought much wood david
david said solomon son young tender house builded lord must exceeding magnifical fame glory throughout countries therefore now make preparation so prepared abundantly before death
then called solomon son charged build house lord god israel
david said solomon son mind build house name lord god
word lord came saying thou hast shed blood abundantly made great wars shalt build house name because much upon earth sight
behold son born thee who man rest give enemies round about name solomon peace quietness israel days
build house name son father establish throne kingdom over israel ever
now son lord thee prosper thou build house thy god hath said
only lord give thee wisdom understanding charge concerning israel thou mayest keep law thy god
then shalt thou prosper if takest heed fulfil statutes judgments lord charged moses concerning israel strong good courage dread nor dismayed
now behold trouble prepared house lord hundred thousand talents gold silver brass iron without weight abundance timber also stone thou mayest add thereto
moreover there workmen thee abundance hewers workers stone timber manner cunning men every work
gold silver brass iron there no number arise therefore doing lord thee
david also commanded princes israel help solomon son saying
lord your god you hath given rest on every side inhabitants land mine hand subdued before people
now set your heart soul seek lord god arise therefore build ye sanctuary bring ark covenant holy vessels house built name
so david old full days made solomon son king over israel
gathered together princes israel priests levites

wherefore david blessed lord before congregation said thou god israel our father ever
thine o lord greatness power glory victory majesty heaven earth kingdom thou art exalted head above
both riches honour come thee thou reignest over thine hand power might make great give strength
now therefore our god we thank thee praise thy glorious name
who am what people we should able offer so willingly after sort things come thee thine own given
we strangers before thee sojourners our fathers days on earth shadow there none abiding
o lord our god store we prepared build thee house thine holy name cometh hand own
know also god thou triest heart hast pleasure uprightness mine willingly offered these things now seen joy thy people present here offer thee
o lord god abraham isaac israel our fathers keep ever imagination thoughts heart thy people prepare thee
give solomon son perfect heart keep thy commandments testimonies statutes do these things build palace made provision

lord magnified solomon exceedingly sight israel bestowed upon such royal majesty had been on any king before
thus david son jesse reigned over israel
time reigned over israel forty years seven hebron thirty three jerusalem
died good old age full days riches honour solomon son reigned stead

solomon son david strengthened kingdom lord god magnified exceedingly

night did god appear solomon said ask what give thee
solomon said god thou hast shewed great mercy david father made reign stead
now o lord god let thy promise david father established thou hast made king over people like dust earth multitude
give now wisdom knowledge may go out come before people who can judge thy so great
god said solomon because thine heart thou hast asked riches wealth or honour nor life enemies neither yet long wisdom knowledge thyself mayest judge people over whom made thee king
wisdom knowledge granted thee give riches wealth honour such none kings had been before neither there any after like

since day brought forth people out land egypt chose no city among tribes israel build house name might there neither any man ruler over
chosen jerusalem name might there david over people israel
now heart david father build house name lord god israel

notwithstanding thou shalt build house thy son come forth out loins name
lord therefore hath performed word spoken am risen room david father set on throne israel promised built house name god
put ark wherein covenant lord made children israel
stood before altar lord presence congregation israel spread forth hands
solomon had made brasen scaffold five cubits long broad three high set midst court upon stood kneeled down knees before congregation israel spread forth hands toward heaven
said o lord god israel there no like thee heaven nor earth keepest covenant shewest mercy thy servants walk before hearts
thou hast kept thy servant david father promised spakest mouth fulfilled thine hand day
now therefore o lord god israel keep thy servant david father thou hast promised saying there fail thee man sight sit upon throne yet so children take heed way walk law walked before
now then o lord god israel let thy word verified thou hast spoken servant david
god very deed dwell men on earth behold heaven heavens cannot contain thee how much less house built
respect therefore prayer thy servant supplication o lord god hearken cry prayeth before thee
thine eyes may open upon house day night place whereof thou hast said wouldest put thy name there hearken prayer servant prayeth toward
hearken therefore supplications thy servant people israel make toward place hear thou dwelling even heaven hearest forgive
if man sin against neighbour oath laid upon make swear come before thine altar house
then hear thou heaven do judge thy servants by requiting wicked recompensing way upon own head justifying righteous giving according righteousness
if thy people israel put worse before enemy because sinned against thee return confess name pray make supplication house
then hear thou heavens forgive sin thy people israel bring again land gavest fathers
heaven shut there no rain because sinned against thee yet if pray toward place confess thy name turn sin thou dost afflict
then hear thou heaven forgive sin thy servants people israel hast taught good way wherein should walk send rain upon land given inheritance
if there dearth land pestilence blasting or mildew locusts caterpillers enemies besiege cities whatsoever sore sickness
then what prayer or supplication soever made any man thy people israel every one know own sore grief spread forth hands house
then hear thou heaven thy dwelling place forgive render every man according ways whose heart knowest only hearts children men
may fear thee walk thy ways so long live land thou gavest our fathers
moreover concerning stranger thy people israel come far country great name's sake mighty hand stretched out arm if pray house
then hear thou heavens even thy dwelling place do according stranger calleth thee people earth may know name fear doth israel house built called by
if thy people go out war against enemies by way thou shalt send pray thee toward city hast chosen house built name
then hear thou heavens prayer supplication maintain cause
if sin against thee there no man sinneth thou angry deliver over before enemies carry away captives land far off or near
yet if bethink themselves land whither carried captive turn pray thee captivity saying we sinned done amiss dealt wickedly
if return thee heart soul land captivity whither carried captives pray toward thou gavest fathers city hast chosen house built thy name
then hear thou heavens even thy dwelling place prayer supplications maintain cause forgive people sinned against thee
now god let beseech thee thine eyes open ears attent prayer made place
now therefore arise o lord god thy resting place thou ark strength let priests clothed salvation saints rejoice goodness
o lord god turn away face thine anointed remember mercies david thy servant
now solomon had made end praying fire came down heaven consumed burnt offering sacrifices glory lord filled house
priests could enter house lord because glory had filled lord's
children israel saw how fire came down glory lord upon house bowed themselves faces ground pavement worshipped praised saying good mercy endureth ever
then king people offered sacrifices before lord
king solomon offered sacrifice twenty two thousand oxen hundred sheep so people dedicated house god
priests waited on offices levites also instruments musick lord david king had made praise because mercy endureth ever praised by ministry sounded trumpets before israel stood
moreover solomon hallowed middle court before house lord there offered burnt offerings fat peace because brasen altar had made able receive meat
also at same time solomon kept feast seven days israel very great congregation entering hamath river egypt
eighth day made solemn assembly kept dedication altar seven days feast
on three twentieth day seventh month sent people away tents glad merry heart goodness lord had shewed david solomon israel
thus solomon finished house lord king's came solomon's heart make own prosperously effected
lord appeared solomon by night said heard thy prayer chosen place myself house sacrifice
if shut heaven there no rain or command locusts devour land send pestilence among people
if people called by name humble themselves pray seek face turn wicked ways then hear heaven forgive sin heal land
now mine eyes open ears attent prayer made place
now chosen sanctified house name may there ever mine eyes heart perpetually
thee if thou wilt walk before david thy father walked do according commanded shalt observe statutes judgments
then stablish throne thy kingdom according covenanted david father saying there fail thee man ruler israel
if ye turn away forsake statutes commandments set before you go serve other gods worship
then pluck by roots out land given house sanctified name cast sight make proverb byword among nations
house high astonishment every one passeth by so say why hath lord done thus land
answered because forsook lord god fathers brought forth out land egypt laid hold on other gods worshipped served therefore hath evil upon
came pass at end twenty years wherein solomon had built house lord own
cities huram had restored solomon built caused children israel dwell there
solomon went hamathzobah prevailed against
built tadmor wilderness store cities hamath
also built bethhoron upper nether fenced cities walls gates bars
baalath store cities solomon had chariot horsemen desired build jerusalem lebanon throughout land dominion
people left hittites amorites perizzites hivites jebusites israel
children who left after land whom israel consumed did solomon make pay tribute until day
children israel did solomon make no servants work men war chief captains chariots horsemen
these chief king solomon's officers even two hundred fifty bare rule over people
solomon brought daughter pharaoh out city david house had built her said wife dwell king israel because places holy whereunto ark lord hath come
then solomon offered burnt offerings lord on altar had built before porch
even after certain rate every day offering according commandment moses on sabbaths new moons solemn feasts three times year feast unleavened bread weeks tabernacles
appointed according order david father courses priests service levites charges praise minister before duty every day required porters also by at gate so had man god commanded
departed commandment king priests levites concerning any matter or treasures
now work solomon prepared day foundation house lord until finished so perfected
then went solomon eziongeber eloth at sea side land edom
huram sent by hands servants ships had knowledge sea went solomon ophir took thence four hundred fifty talents gold brought king
queen sheba heard fame solomon she came prove hard questions at jerusalem very great company camels bare spices gold abundance precious stones come communed her heart
solomon told her questions there nothing hid
queen sheba had seen wisdom solomon house built
meat table sitting servants attendance ministers apparel cupbearers also ascent by went house lord there no more spirit her
she said king true report heard mine own land thine acts thy wisdom
howbeit believed words until came mine eyes had seen behold one half greatness thy wisdom told thou exceedest fame heard
happy thy men these servants stand continually before thee hear wisdom
blessed lord thy god delighted thee set on throne king because loved israel establish ever therefore made over do judgment justice
she gave king hundred twenty talents gold spices great abundance precious stones neither there any such spice queen sheba solomon
servants also huram solomon brought gold ophir algum trees precious stones
king made algum trees terraces house lord king's palace harps psalteries singers there none such seen before land judah
king solomon gave queen sheba her desire whatsoever she asked beside had brought so turned went away own land servants
now weight gold came solomon one year six hundred threescore talents
beside chapmen merchants brought kings arabia governors country gold silver solomon
king solomon made two hundred targets beaten gold six shekels went one target
three hundred shields made beaten gold shekels went one shield king put house forest lebanon
moreover king made great throne ivory overlaid pure gold
there six steps throne footstool gold fastened stays on each side sitting place two lions standing by
twelve lions stood there on one side other upon six steps like made any kingdom
drinking vessels king solomon gold house forest lebanon pure none silver any thing accounted days
king's ships went tarshish servants huram every three years once came bringing gold silver ivory apes peacocks
king solomon passed kings earth riches wisdom
kings earth sought presence solomon hear wisdom god had put heart
brought every man present vessels silver gold raiment harness spices horses mules rate year by
solomon had four thousand stalls horses chariots twelve horsemen whom bestowed chariot cities king at jerusalem
reigned over kings river even land philistines border egypt
king made silver jerusalem stones cedar trees sycomore low plains abundance
brought solomon horses out egypt lands
now rest acts solomon first last written book nathan prophet prophecy ahijah shilonite visions iddo seer against jeroboam son nebat
solomon reigned jerusalem over israel forty years
solomon slept fathers buried city david father rehoboam son reigned stead
rehoboam went shechem israel come make king
came pass jeroboam son nebat who egypt whither had fled presence solomon king heard returned out
sent called so jeroboam israel came spake rehoboam saying
thy father made our yoke grievous now therefore ease thou somewhat servitude heavy put upon us we serve thee
said come again after three days people departed
king rehoboam took counsel old men had stood before solomon father while yet lived saying what give ye return answer people
spake saying if thou kind people please speak good words thy servants ever
forsook counsel old men gave took young brought stood before
said what advice give ye we may return answer people spoken saying ease somewhat yoke thy father did put upon us
young men brought spake saying thus shalt thou answer people thee thy father made our yoke heavy make somewhat lighter us say little finger thicker than father's loins
whereas father put heavy yoke upon you more your chastised whips chastise scorpions
so jeroboam people came rehoboam on third day king bade saying come again
king answered roughly rehoboam forsook counsel old men
answered after advice young men saying father made your yoke heavy add thereto chastised you whips chastise scorpions
so king hearkened people cause god lord might perform word spake by hand ahijah shilonite jeroboam son nebat
israel saw king would hearken people answered saying what portion we david none inheritance son jesse every man your tents o now see thine own house so went
children israel dwelt cities judah rehoboam reigned over
then king rehoboam sent hadoram over tribute children israel stoned stones died made speed get chariot flee jerusalem
israel rebelled against house david day
rehoboam come jerusalem gathered house judah benjamin hundred fourscore thousand chosen men warriors fight against israel might bring kingdom again
word lord came shemaiah man god saying
speak rehoboam son solomon king judah israel benjamin saying
thus saith lord ye go nor fight against your brethren return every man house thing done obeyed words returned going jeroboam
rehoboam dwelt jerusalem built cities defence judah
built even bethlehem etam tekoa
bethzur shoco adullam
gath mareshah ziph
adoraim lachish azekah
zorah aijalon hebron judah benjamin fenced cities
fortified strong holds put captains store victual oil wine
every several city put shields spears made exceeding strong having judah benjamin on side
priests levites israel resorted out coasts
levites left suburbs possession came judah jerusalem jeroboam sons had cast off executing priest's office lord
ordained priests high places devils calves had made
after out tribes israel such set hearts seek lord god came jerusalem sacrifice fathers
so strengthened kingdom judah made rehoboam son solomon strong three years walked way david
rehoboam took mahalath daughter jerimoth son david wife abihail eliab jesse
bare children jeush shamariah zaham
after her took maachah daughter absalom bare abijah attai ziza shelomith
rehoboam loved maachah daughter absalom above wives concubines took eighteen threescore begat twenty eight sons daughters
rehoboam made abijah son maachah chief ruler among brethren thought make king
dealt wisely dispersed children throughout countries judah benjamin every fenced city gave victual abundance desired many wives
came pass rehoboam had established kingdom strengthened himself forsook law lord israel
came pass fifth year king rehoboam shishak egypt against jerusalem because had transgressed lord
twelve hundred chariots threescore thousand horsemen people without number came out egypt lubims sukkiims ethiopians
took fenced cities pertained judah came jerusalem
then came shemaiah prophet rehoboam princes judah gathered together jerusalem because shishak said thus saith lord ye forsaken therefore also left you hand
whereupon princes israel king humbled themselves said lord righteous
lord saw humbled themselves word came shemaiah saying therefore destroy grant some deliverance wrath poured out upon jerusalem by hand shishak
nevertheless servants may know service kingdoms countries
so shishak king egypt came against jerusalem took away treasures house lord king's carried also shields gold solomon had made
instead king rehoboam made shields brass committed hands chief guard kept entrance king's house
king entered house lord guard came fetched brought again chamber
humbled himself wrath lord turned would destroy altogether also judah things went well
so king rehoboam strengthened himself jerusalem reigned one forty years old began reign seventeen city lord had chosen out tribes israel put name there mother's naamah ammonitess
did evil because prepared heart seek lord
now acts rehoboam first last written book shemaiah prophet iddo seer concerning genealogies there wars between jeroboam continually
rehoboam slept fathers buried city david abijah son reigned stead
now eighteenth year king jeroboam began abijah reign over judah
reigned three years jerusalem mother's name also michaiah daughter uriel gibeah there war between abijah jeroboam
abijah set battle array army valiant men war even four hundred thousand chosen jeroboam also against eight being mighty valour
abijah stood upon mount zemaraim ephraim said hear thou jeroboam israel
ought ye know lord god israel gave kingdom over david ever even sons by covenant salt
yet jeroboam son nebat servant solomon david risen hath rebelled against lord
there gathered vain men children belial strengthened themselves against rehoboam son solomon young tenderhearted could withstand
now ye think withstand kingdom lord hand sons david great multitude there you golden calves jeroboam made gods
ye cast out priests lord sons aaron levites made you after manner nations other lands so whosoever cometh consecrate himself young bullock seven rams same may priest no gods
us lord our god we forsaken priests minister sons aaron levites wait upon business
burn lord every morning evening burnt sacrifices sweet incense shewbread also set order upon pure table candlestick gold lamps thereof we keep charge our god ye forsaken
behold god himself us our captain priests sounding trumpets cry alarm against you o children israel fight ye lord your fathers prosper
jeroboam caused ambushment come about behind so before judah
judah looked back behold battle before behind cried lord priests sounded trumpets
then men judah gave shout shouted came pass god smote jeroboam israel before abijah
children israel fled before judah god delivered hand
abijah people slew great slaughter so there fell down slain israel five hundred thousand chosen men
thus children israel brought under at time judah prevailed because relied upon lord god fathers
abijah pursued after jeroboam took cities bethel towns thereof jeshanah ephrain
neither did jeroboam recover strength again days abijah lord struck died
abijah waxed mighty married fourteen wives begat twenty two sons sixteen daughters
rest acts abijah ways sayings written story prophet iddo
so abijah slept fathers buried city david asa son reigned stead days land quiet ten years
asa did good right eyes lord god
took away altars strange gods high places brake down images cut groves
commanded judah seek lord god fathers do law commandment
also took away out cities judah high places images kingdom quiet before
built fenced cities judah land had rest no war those years because lord given
therefore said judah let us build these cities make about walls towers gates bars while land yet before because we sought lord our god hath given rest on every side so built prospered
asa had army men bare targets spears out judah three hundred thousand benjamin shields drew bows two fourscore these mighty valour
there came out against zerah ethiopian host thousand three hundred chariots mareshah
then asa went out against set battle array valley zephathah at mareshah
asa cried lord god said nothing thee help whether many or no power us o our we rest on thy name go against multitude thou art let man prevail
so lord smote ethiopians before asa judah fled
asa people pursued gerar ethiopians overthrown could recover themselves destroyed before lord host carried away very much spoil
smote cities round about gerar fear lord came upon spoiled there exceeding much spoil
smote also tents cattle carried away sheep camels abundance returned jerusalem
spirit god came upon azariah son oded
went out meet asa said hear ye judah benjamin lord you while if seek found forsake
now long season israel hath been without true god teaching priest law
trouble did turn lord god israel sought found
those times there no peace went out nor came great vexations upon inhabitants countries
nation destroyed city god did vex adversity
ye strong therefore let your hands weak work rewarded
asa heard these words prophecy oded prophet took courage put away abominable idols out land judah benjamin cities had taken mount ephraim renewed altar lord before porch
gathered judah benjamin strangers out ephraim manasseh simeon fell israel abundance saw lord god
so gathered themselves together at jerusalem third month fifteenth year reign asa
offered lord same time spoil had brought seven hundred oxen thousand sheep
entered covenant seek lord god fathers heart soul
whosoever would seek lord god israel should put death whether small or great man woman
sware lord loud voice shouting trumpets cornets
judah rejoiced at oath had sworn heart sought whole desire found lord gave rest round about
also concerning maachah mother asa king removed her being queen because she had made idol grove cut down stamped burnt at brook kidron
high places taken away out israel nevertheless heart asa perfect days
brought house god things father had dedicated himself silver gold vessels
there no more war five thirtieth year reign asa
six thirtieth year reign asa baasha king israel came against judah built ramah intent might let none go out or come
then asa brought out silver gold treasures house lord king's sent benhadad king syria dwelt at damascus saying
there league between thee father thy behold sent silver gold go break baasha king israel may depart
benhadad hearkened king asa sent captains armies against cities israel smote ijon dan abelmaim store naphtali
came pass baasha heard left off building ramah let work cease
then asa king took judah carried away stones ramah timber thereof wherewith baasha building built therewith geba mizpah
at time hanani seer came asa king judah said because thou hast relied on syria lord thy god therefore host escaped out thine hand
ethiopians lubims huge host very many chariots horsemen yet because thou didst rely on lord delivered thine hand
eyes lord run fro throughout whole earth shew himself strong behalf whose heart perfect toward herein thou hast done foolishly therefore henceforth shalt wars
then asa wroth seer put prison house rage because thing oppressed some people same time
behold acts asa first last lo written book kings judah israel
asa thirty ninth year reign diseased feet until disease exceeding great yet sought lord physicians
asa slept fathers died one fortieth year reign
buried own sepulchres had made himself city david laid bed filled sweet odours divers kinds spices prepared by apothecaries' art very great burning
jehoshaphat son reigned stead strengthened himself against israel
placed forces fenced cities judah set garrisons land ephraim asa father had taken
lord jehoshaphat because walked first ways father david sought baalim
sought lord god father walked commandments after doings israel
therefore lord stablished kingdom hand judah brought jehoshaphat presents had riches honour abundance
heart lifted ways lord moreover took away high places groves out judah
also third year reign sent princes even benhail obadiah zechariah nethaneel michaiah teach cities judah
sent levites even shemaiah nethaniah zebadiah asahel shemiramoth jehonathan adonijah tobijah tobadonijah elishama jehoram priests
taught judah had book law lord went about throughout cities people
fear lord fell upon kingdoms lands round about judah so made no war against jehoshaphat
also some philistines brought jehoshaphat presents tribute silver arabians flocks seven thousand hundred rams goats
jehoshaphat waxed great exceedingly built judah castles cities store
had much business cities judah men war mighty valour jerusalem
these numbers according house fathers judah captains thousands adnah chief mighty men valour three hundred thousand
next jehohanan captain two hundred fourscore thousand
next amasiah son zichri who willingly offered himself lord two hundred thousand mighty men valour
benjamin eliada mighty man valour armed men bow shield two hundred thousand
next jehozabad hundred fourscore thousand ready prepared war
these waited on king beside those whom put fenced cities throughout judah
now jehoshaphat had riches honour abundance joined affinity ahab
after certain years went down ahab samaria killed sheep oxen abundance people had persuaded go ramothgilead
ahab king israel said jehoshaphat judah wilt thou go ramothgilead answered am art people thy we thee war
jehoshaphat said king israel enquire pray thee at word lord day
therefore king israel gathered together prophets four hundred men said we go ramothgilead battle or forbear god deliver king's hand
jehoshaphat said there here prophet lord besides we might enquire
king israel said jehoshaphat there yet one man by whom we may enquire lord hate never prophesied good always evil same micaiah son imla let say so
king israel called one officers said fetch quickly micaiah son imla
king israel jehoshaphat judah sat either on throne clothed robes void place at entering gate samaria prophets prophesied before
zedekiah son chenaanah had made horns iron said thus saith lord these thou shalt push syria until consumed
prophets prophesied so saying go ramothgilead prosper lord deliver hand king
messenger went call micaiah spake saying behold words prophets declare good king one assent let thy word therefore pray thee like their's speak thou
micaiah said lord liveth even what god saith speak
come king said micaiah we go ramothgilead battle or forbear ye prosper delivered your hand
king said how many times adjure thee thou say nothing truth name lord
then said did see israel scattered upon mountains sheep no shepherd lord these master let return therefore every man house peace
king israel said jehoshaphat did tell thee would prophesy good evil
again said therefore hear word lord saw sitting upon throne host heaven standing on right hand left
lord said who entice ahab king israel may go fall at ramothgilead one spake saying after manner another
then there came out spirit stood before lord said entice wherewith
said go out lying spirit mouth prophets lord thou shalt entice also prevail do even so
now therefore behold lord hath put lying spirit mouth these thy prophets spoken evil against thee
then zedekiah son chenaanah came near smote micaiah upon cheek said way went spirit lord speak thee
micaiah said behold thou shalt see on day go inner chamber hide thyself
then king israel said take ye micaiah carry back amon governor city joash king's son
say thus saith king put fellow prison feed bread affliction water until return peace
micaiah said if thou certainly return peace then hath lord spoken by hearken ye people
so king israel jehoshaphat judah went ramothgilead
king israel said jehoshaphat disguise myself go battle put thou on thy robes so disguised himself went
now king syria had commanded captains chariots saying fight ye small or great save only israel
came pass captains chariots saw jehoshaphat said king israel therefore compassed about fight cried out lord helped god moved depart
came pass captains chariots perceived king israel turned back again pursuing
certain man drew bow at venture smote king israel between joints harness therefore said chariot turn thine hand thou mayest carry out host am wounded
battle increased day howbeit king israel stayed himself chariot against syrians until even about time sun going down died
jehoshaphat king judah returned house peace jerusalem
jehu son hanani seer went out meet said king jehoshaphat shouldest thou help ungodly love hate lord therefore wrath upon thee before
nevertheless there good things found thee thou hast taken away groves out land prepared thine heart seek god
jehoshaphat dwelt at jerusalem went out again through people beersheba mount ephraim brought back lord god fathers
set judges land throughout fenced cities judah city by
said judges take heed what ye do judge man lord who you judgment
wherefore now let fear lord upon you take heed do there no iniquity our god nor respect persons taking gifts
moreover jerusalem did jehoshaphat set levites priests chief fathers israel judgment lord controversies returned
charged saying thus ye do fear lord faithfully perfect heart
what cause soever come you your brethren dwell cities between blood law commandment statutes judgments ye even warn trespass against lord so wrath upon do
behold amariah chief priest over you matters lord zebadiah son ishmael ruler house judah king's also levites officers before deal courageously good
came pass after also children moab ammon other beside ammonites against jehoshaphat battle
then there came some told jehoshaphat saying cometh great multitude against thee beyond sea on side syria behold hazazontamar engedi
jehoshaphat feared set himself seek lord proclaimed fast throughout judah
judah gathered themselves together ask help lord even out cities came seek
jehoshaphat stood congregation judah jerusalem house lord before new court
said o lord god our fathers art thou heaven rulest over kingdoms heathen thine hand there power might so none able withstand thee
art thou our god who didst drive out inhabitants land before thy people israel gavest seed abraham friend ever
dwelt therein built thee sanctuary thy name saying
if evil cometh upon us sword judgment or pestilence famine we stand before house thy presence name cry thee our affliction then thou wilt hear help
now behold children ammon moab mount seir whom thou wouldest let israel invade came out land egypt turned destroyed
behold say how reward us come cast out thy possession thou hast given inherit
o our god wilt thou judge we no might against great company cometh us neither know what do eyes upon thee
judah stood before lord little ones wives children
then upon jahaziel son zechariah benaiah jeiel mattaniah levite sons asaph came spirit lord midst congregation
said hearken ye judah inhabitants jerusalem thou king jehoshaphat thus saith lord you afraid nor dismayed by reason great multitude battle your's god's
morrow go ye down against behold come by cliff ziz find at end brook before wilderness jeruel
ye need fight battle set yourselves stand still see salvation lord you o judah jerusalem fear nor dismayed morrow go out against
jehoshaphat bowed head face ground judah inhabitants jerusalem fell before lord worshipping
levites children kohathites korhites stood praise lord god israel loud voice on high
rose early morning went forth wilderness tekoa jehoshaphat stood said hear o judah ye inhabitants jerusalem believe lord your god so established prophets prosper
had consulted people appointed singers lord should praise beauty holiness went out before army say mercy endureth ever
began sing praise lord set ambushments against children ammon moab mount seir come judah smitten
children ammon moab stood against inhabitants mount seir utterly slay destroy had made end every one helped another
judah came toward watch tower wilderness looked multitude behold dead bodies fallen earth none escaped
jehoshaphat people came take away spoil found among abundance both riches dead bodies precious jewels stripped off themselves more than could carry three days gathering so much
on fourth day assembled themselves valley berachah there blessed lord therefore name same place called
then returned every man judah jerusalem jehoshaphat forefront go again joy lord had made rejoice over enemies
came jerusalem psalteries harps trumpets house lord
fear god on kingdoms those countries had heard lord fought against enemies israel
so realm jehoshaphat quiet god gave rest round about
jehoshaphat reigned over judah thirty five years old began reign twenty jerusalem mother's name azubah daughter shilhi
walked way asa father departed doing right sight lord
howbeit high places taken away yet people had prepared hearts god fathers
now rest acts jehoshaphat first last behold written book jehu son hanani who mentioned kings israel
after did jehoshaphat king judah join himself ahaziah israel who very wickedly
joined himself make ships go tarshish made eziongeber
then eliezer son dodavah mareshah prophesied against jehoshaphat saying because thou hast joined thyself ahaziah lord hath broken thy works ships able go tarshish
now jehoshaphat slept fathers buried city david jehoram son reigned stead
had brethren sons jehoshaphat azariah jehiel zechariah michael shephatiah these king israel
father gave great gifts silver gold precious things fenced cities judah kingdom jehoram because firstborn
now jehoram risen kingdom father strengthened himself slew brethren sword divers also princes israel
jehoram thirty two years old began reign reigned eight jerusalem
walked way kings israel like did house ahab had daughter wife wrought evil eyes lord
howbeit lord would destroy house david because covenant had made promised give light sons ever
days edomites revolted under dominion judah made themselves king
then jehoram went forth princes chariots rose by night smote edomites compassed captains
so edomites revolted under hand judah day same time also did libnah revolt because had forsaken lord god fathers
moreover made high places mountains judah caused inhabitants jerusalem commit fornication compelled thereto
there came writing elijah prophet saying thus saith lord god david thy father because thou hast walked ways jehoshaphat nor asa king judah
hast walked way kings israel made judah inhabitants jerusalem go whoring like whoredoms house ahab also slain thy brethren father's better than thyself
behold great plague lord smite thy people children wives goods
thou shalt great sickness by disease thy bowels until fall out reason day
moreover lord stirred against jehoram spirit philistines arabians near ethiopians
came judah brake carried away substance found king's house sons also wives so there never son left save jehoahaz youngest
after lord smote bowels incurable disease
came pass process time after end two years bowels fell out by reason sickness so died sore diseases people made no burning like fathers
thirty two years old began reign reigned jerusalem eight departed without being desired howbeit buried city david sepulchres kings
inhabitants jerusalem made ahaziah youngest son king stead band men came arabians camp had slain eldest so jehoram judah reigned
forty two years old ahaziah began reign reigned one year jerusalem mother's name also athaliah daughter omri
also walked ways house ahab mother counsellor do wickedly
wherefore did evil sight lord like house ahab counsellors after death father destruction
walked also after counsel went jehoram son ahab king israel war against hazael syria at ramothgilead syrians smote joram
returned healed jezreel because wounds given at ramah fought hazael king syria azariah son jehoram judah went down see ahab sick
destruction ahaziah god by coming joram come went out jehoram against jehu son nimshi whom lord had anointed cut off house ahab
came pass jehu executing judgment upon house ahab found princes judah sons brethren ahaziah ministered slew
sought ahaziah caught hid samaria brought jehu had slain buried because said son jehoshaphat who lord heart so house no power keep still kingdom
athaliah mother ahaziah saw her son dead she arose destroyed seed royal house judah
jehoshabeath daughter king took joash son ahaziah stole among king's sons slain put nurse bedchamber so jehoram wife jehoiada priest she sister hid athaliah slew
hid house god six years athaliah reigned over land
seventh year jehoiada strengthened himself took captains hundreds azariah son jeroham ishmael jehohanan obed maaseiah adaiah elishaphat zichri covenant
went about judah gathered levites out cities chief fathers israel came jerusalem
congregation made covenant king house god said behold king's son reign lord hath sons david
thing ye do third part you entering on sabbath priests levites porters doors
third part at king's house gate foundation people courts lord
let none come house lord save priests minister levites go holy people keep watch
levites compass king round about every man weapons hand whosoever else cometh house put death ye goeth out
so levites judah did according things jehoiada priest had commanded took every man men come on sabbath go out dismissed courses
moreover jehoiada priest delivered captains hundreds spears bucklers shields had been king david's house god
set people every man having weapon hand right side temple left along by altar king round about
then brought out king's son put upon crown gave testimony made king jehoiada sons anointed said god save
now athaliah heard noise people running praising king she came house lord
she looked behold king stood at pillar entering princes trumpets by people land rejoiced sounded also singers instruments musick such taught sing praise then athaliah rent her clothes said treason
then jehoiada priest brought out captains hundreds set over host said her forth ranges whoso followeth let slain sword slay house lord
so laid hands on her she come entering horse gate by king's house slew there
jehoiada made covenant between people king should lord's
then people went house baal brake down altars images pieces slew mattan priest before
also jehoiada appointed offices house lord by hand priests levites whom david had distributed offer burnt offerings written law moses rejoicing singing ordained
set porters at gates house lord none unclean any thing should enter
took captains hundreds nobles governors people land brought down king house lord came through high gate king's set upon throne kingdom
people land rejoiced city quiet after had slain athaliah sword
joash seven years old began reign reigned forty jerusalem mother's name also zibiah beersheba
joash did right sight lord days jehoiada priest
jehoiada took two wives begat sons daughters
came pass after joash minded repair house lord
gathered together priests levites said go out cities judah gather israel money repair house your god year see ye hasten matter howbeit hastened
king called jehoiada chief said why hast thou required levites bring out judah jerusalem collection according commandment moses servant lord congregation israel tabernacle witness
sons athaliah wicked woman had broken house god also dedicated things lord did bestow upon baalim
at king's commandment made chest set without gate house lord
made proclamation through judah jerusalem bring lord collection moses servant god laid upon israel wilderness
princes people rejoiced brought cast chest until had made end
now came pass at what time chest brought king's office by hand levites saw there much money scribe high priest's officer emptied took carried place again thus did day gathered abundance
king jehoiada gave such did work service house lord hired masons carpenters repair also wrought iron brass mend
so workmen wrought work perfected by set house god state strengthened
had finished brought rest money before king jehoiada whereof made vessels house lord even minister offer withal spoons gold silver offered burnt offerings continually days
jehoiada waxed old full days died hundred thirty years
buried city david among kings because had done good israel both toward god house
now after death jehoiada came princes judah made obeisance king then hearkened
left house lord god fathers served groves idols wrath came upon judah jerusalem trespass
yet sent prophets bring again lord testified against would give ear
spirit god came upon zechariah son jehoiada priest stood above people said thus saith why transgress ye commandments lord cannot prosper because forsaken hath also you
conspired against stoned stones at commandment king court house lord
thus joash king remembered kindness jehoiada father had done slew son died said lord look upon require
came pass at end year host syria against judah jerusalem destroyed princes people among sent spoil king damascus
army syrians came small company men lord delivered very great host hand because had forsaken god fathers so executed judgment against joash
departed left great diseases own servants conspired against blood sons jehoiada priest slew on bed died buried city david sepulchres kings
these conspired against zabad son shimeath ammonitess jehozabad shimrith moabitess
now concerning sons greatness burdens laid upon repairing house god behold written story book kings amaziah son reigned stead
amaziah twenty five years old began reign reigned nine jerusalem mother's name jehoaddan
did right sight lord perfect heart
now came pass kingdom established slew servants had killed king father
slew children did written law book moses where lord commanded saying fathers die neither every man own sin
moreover amaziah gathered judah together made captains over thousands hundreds according houses fathers throughout benjamin numbered twenty years old above found three hundred thousand choice men able go forth war could handle spear shield
hired also hundred thousand mighty men valour out israel talents silver
there came man god saying o king let army israel go thee lord wit children ephraim
if thou wilt go do strong battle god make thee fall before enemy hath power help cast down
amaziah said man god what we do hundred talents given army israel answered lord able give thee much more than
then amaziah separated wit army come out ephraim go home again wherefore anger greatly kindled against judah returned great
amaziah strengthened himself led forth people went valley salt smote children seir ten thousand
other ten thousand left alive did children judah carry away captive brought top rock cast down broken pieces
soldiers army amaziah sent back should go battle fell upon cities judah samaria even bethhoron smote three thousand took much spoil
now came pass after amaziah come slaughter edomites brought gods children seir set bowed down himself before burned incense
wherefore anger lord kindled against amaziah sent prophet said why hast thou sought after gods people could deliver own out thine hand
came pass talked king said art thou made king's counsel forbear why shouldest smitten then prophet forbare know god hath determined destroy thee because hast done hearkened
then amaziah king judah took advice sent joash son jehoahaz jehu israel saying come let us see one another face
joash king israel sent amaziah judah saying thistle lebanon cedar give thy daughter son wife there passed by wild beast trode down
thou sayest lo hast smitten edomites thine heart lifteth thee boast abide now at home why shouldest meddle hurt fall even judah
amaziah would hear came god might deliver hand enemies because sought after gods edom
so joash king israel went saw one another face both amaziah judah at bethshemesh belongeth
judah put worse before israel fled every man tent

now second year coming house god at jerusalem month began zerubbabel son shealtiel jeshua jozadak remnant brethren priests levites come out captivity appointed twenty years old upward set forward work lord
then stood jeshua sons brethren kadmiel judah together set forward workmen house god henadad levites
builders laid foundation temple lord set priests apparel trumpets levites sons asaph cymbals praise after ordinance david king israel
sang together by course praising giving thanks lord because good mercy endureth ever toward israel people shouted great shout praised foundation house laid
many priests levites chief fathers who ancient men had seen first house foundation laid before eyes wept loud voice shouted aloud joy
so people could discern noise shout joy weeping shouted loud heard afar off
now adversaries judah benjamin heard children captivity builded temple lord god israel
then came zerubbabel chief fathers said let us build you we seek your god ye do sacrifice since days esarhaddon king assur brought hither
zerubbabel jeshua rest chief fathers israel said ye nothing do us build house our god we ourselves together lord king cyrus persia hath commanded
then people land weakened hands judah troubled building
hired counsellors against frustrate purpose days cyrus king persia even until reign darius
reign ahasuerus beginning wrote accusation against inhabitants judah jerusalem
days artaxerxes wrote bishlam mithredath tabeel rest companions king persia writing letter written syrian tongue interpreted
rehum chancellor shimshai scribe wrote letter against jerusalem artaxerxes king sort
then wrote rehum chancellor shimshai scribe rest companions dinaites apharsathchites tarpelites apharsites archevites babylonians susanchites dehavites elamites
rest nations whom great noble asnappar brought over set cities samaria on side river at such time
copy letter sent even artaxerxes king thy servants men on side river at such time
known king jews came thee us come jerusalem building rebellious bad city set walls thereof joined foundations
known now king if city builded walls set again then pay toll tribute custom so thou shalt endamage revenue kings
now because we maintenance king's palace meet us see dishonour therefore sent certified king
search may made book records thy fathers so shalt thou find know city rebellious hurtful kings provinces moved sedition within same old time cause destroyed
we certify king if city builded again walls thereof set by means thou shalt no portion on side river
then sent king answer rehum chancellor shimshai scribe rest companions dwell samaria beyond river peace at such time
letter ye sent us hath been plainly read before
commanded search hath been made found city old time insurrection against kings rebellion sedition therein
there been mighty kings also over jerusalem ruled countries beyond river toll tribute custom paid
give ye now commandment cause these men cease city builded until another given
take heed now ye fail do why should damage grow hurt kings
now copy king artaxerxes' letter read before rehum shimshai scribe companions went haste jerusalem jews made cease by force power
then ceased work house god at jerusalem so second year reign darius king persia
then prophets haggai prophet zechariah son iddo prophesied jews judah jerusalem name god israel even
then rose zerubbabel son shealtiel jeshua jozadak began build house god at jerusalem prophets helping
at same time came tatnai governor on side river shetharboznai companions said thus who hath commanded you build house make wall
then said we after manner what names men make building
eye god upon elders jews could cause cease till matter came darius then returned answer by letter concerning
copy letter tatnai governor on side river shetharboznai companions apharsachites sent darius king
sent letter wherein written thus darius king peace
known king we went province judea house great god builded stones timber laid walls work goeth fast on prospereth hands
then asked we those elders said thus who commanded you build house make these walls
we asked names also certify thee might write men chief
thus returned us answer saying we servants god heaven earth build house builded these many years ago great king israel set
after our fathers had provoked god heaven wrath gave hand nebuchadnezzar king babylon chaldean who destroyed house carried people away
first year cyrus king babylon same made decree build house god
vessels also gold silver house god nebuchadnezzar took out temple jerusalem brought babylon those did cyrus king take delivered one whose name sheshbazzar whom had made governor
said take these vessels go carry temple jerusalem let house god builded place
then came same sheshbazzar laid foundation house god jerusalem since time even until now hath been building yet finished
now therefore if seem good king let there search made king's treasure house at babylon whether so decree cyrus build god jerusalem send pleasure us concerning matter
then darius king made decree search house rolls where treasures laid babylon
there found at achmetha palace province medes roll therein record thus written
first year cyrus king same made decree concerning house god at jerusalem let builded place where offered sacrifices foundations thereof strongly laid height threescore cubits breadth
three rows great stones row new timber let expenses given out king's house
also let golden silver vessels house god nebuchadnezzar took forth out temple at jerusalem brought babylon restored again every one place
now therefore tatnai governor beyond river shetharboznai your companions apharsachites ye far thence
let work house god alone governor jews elders build place
moreover make decree what ye do elders these jews building house god king's goods even tribute beyond river forthwith expenses given men hindered
need both young bullocks rams lambs burnt offerings god heaven wheat salt wine oil according appointment priests at jerusalem let given day by without fail
may offer sacrifices sweet savours god heaven pray life king sons
also made decree whosoever alter word let timber pulled down house being set hanged thereon dunghill
god hath caused name dwell there destroy kings people put hand alter house at jerusalem darius made decree let done speed
then tatnai governor on side river shetharboznai companions according darius king had sent so did speedily
elders jews builded prospered through prophesying haggai prophet zechariah son iddo finished according commandment god israel cyrus darius artaxerxes king persia
house finished on third day month adar sixth year reign darius king
children israel priests levites rest captivity kept dedication house god joy
offered at dedication house god hundred bullocks two rams four lambs sin offering israel twelve goats according number tribes
set priests divisions levites courses service god at jerusalem written book moses
children captivity kept passover upon fourteenth day first month
priests levites purified together pure killed passover children captivity brethren themselves
children israel come again out captivity such had separated themselves filthiness heathen land seek lord god did eat
kept feast unleavened bread seven days joy lord had made joyful turned heart king assyria strengthen hands work house god israel
now after these things reign artaxerxes king persia ezra son seraiah azariah hilkiah
son shallum zadok ahitub
son amariah azariah meraioth
son zerahiah uzzi bukki
son abishua phinehas eleazar aaron chief priest
ezra went babylon ready scribe law moses lord god israel had given king granted request according hand upon
there went some children israel priests levites singers porters nethinims jerusalem seventh year artaxerxes king
came jerusalem fifth month seventh year king
upon first day month began go babylon on fifth came jerusalem according good hand god
ezra had prepared heart seek law lord do teach israel statutes judgments
now copy letter king artaxerxes gave ezra priest scribe even words commandments lord statutes israel
artaxerxes king kings ezra priest scribe law god heaven perfect peace at such time
make decree people israel priests levites realm minded own freewill go jerusalem thee
forasmuch thou art sent king seven counsellors enquire concerning judah jerusalem according law thy god thine hand
carry silver gold king counsellors freely offered god israel whose habitation jerusalem
silver gold thou canst find province babylon freewill offering people priests willingly house god jerusalem
thou mayest buy speedily money bullocks rams lambs meat offerings drink offer upon altar house your god jerusalem
whatsoever seem good thee thy brethren do rest silver gold after your god
vessels also given thee service house thy god those deliver thou before jerusalem
whatsoever more needful house thy god thou shalt occasion bestow out king's treasure
even artaxerxes king do make decree treasurers beyond river whatsoever ezra priest scribe law god heaven require you done speedily
hundred talents silver measures wheat baths wine oil salt without prescribing how much
whatsoever commanded by god heaven let diligently done house why should there wrath against realm king sons
also we certify you touching any priests levites singers porters nethinims or ministers house god lawful impose toll tribute custom upon
thou ezra after wisdom thy god thine hand set magistrates judges may judge people beyond river such know laws teach ye
whosoever do law thy god king let judgment executed speedily upon whether death or banishment confiscation goods imprisonment
blessed lord god our fathers hath put such thing king's heart beautify house jerusalem
hath extended mercy before king counsellors king's mighty princes strengthened hand lord god upon gathered together out israel chief men go
these now chief fathers genealogy went babylon reign artaxerxes king
sons phinehas gershom ithamar daniel david hattush
sons shechaniah pharosh zechariah reckoned by genealogy males hundred fifty
sons pahathmoab elihoenai son zerahiah two hundred males
sons shechaniah son jahaziel three hundred males
sons also adin ebed son jonathan fifty males
sons elam jeshaiah son athaliah seventy males
sons shephatiah zebadiah son michael fourscore males
sons joab obadiah son jehiel two hundred eighteen males
sons shelomith son josiphiah hundred threescore males
sons bebai zechariah son twenty eight males
sons azgad johanan son hakkatan hundred ten males
last sons adonikam whose names these eliphelet jeiel shemaiah threescore males
sons also bigvai uthai zabbud seventy males
gathered together river runneth ahava there abode we tents three days viewed people priests found none sons levi
then sent eliezer ariel shemaiah elnathan jarib nathan zechariah meshullam chief men also joiarib understanding
sent commandment iddo chief at place casiphia told what should say brethren nethinims bring us ministers house our god
by good hand our god upon us brought man understanding sons mahli son levi israel sherebiah brethren eighteen
hashabiah jeshaiah sons merari brethren twenty
also nethinims whom david princes had appointed service levites two hundred twenty expressed by name
then proclaimed fast there at river ahava we might afflict ourselves before our god seek right way us little ones substance
ashamed require king band soldiers horsemen help us against enemy way because we had spoken saying hand our god upon good seek power wrath forsake
so we fasted besought our god intreated us
then separated twelve chief priests sherebiah hashabiah ten brethren
weighed silver gold vessels even offering house our god king counsellors lords israel there present had offered
even weighed hand six hundred fifty talents silver vessels gold
also twenty basons gold thousand drams two vessels fine copper precious
said ye holy lord vessels also silver gold freewill offering god your fathers
watch ye keep until weigh before chief priests levites fathers israel at jerusalem chambers house lord
so took priests levites weight silver gold vessels bring jerusalem house our god
then we departed river ahava on twelfth day first month go jerusalem hand our god upon us delivered enemy such lay wait by way
we came jerusalem abode there three days
now on fourth day silver gold vessels weighed house our god by hand meremoth son uriah priest eleazar phinehas jozabad jeshua noadiah binnui levites
by number weight every one written at time
also children those had been carried away come out captivity offered burnt offerings god israel twelve bullocks ninety six rams seventy seven lambs goats sin offering lord
delivered king's commissions lieutenants governors on side river furthered people house god
now these things done princes came saying people israel priests levites separated themselves lands doing according abominations even canaanites hittites perizzites jebusites ammonites moabites egyptians amorites
taken daughters themselves sons so holy seed mingled people those lands yea hand princes rulers hath been chief trespass
heard thing rent garment mantle plucked off hair head beard sat down astonied
then assembled every one trembled at words god israel because transgression those had been carried away sat astonied until evening sacrifice
at evening sacrifice arose heaviness having rent garment mantle fell upon knees spread out hands lord god
said o god am ashamed blush lift face thee our iniquities increased over head trespass grown heavens
since days our fathers we been great trespass day iniquities kings priests delivered hand lands sword captivity spoil confusion face
now little space grace hath been shewed lord our god leave us remnant escape give nail holy place may lighten eyes reviving bondage
we bondmen yet our god hath forsaken us bondage extended mercy sight kings persia give reviving set house repair desolations thereof wall judah jerusalem
now o our god what we say after forsaken thy commandments
thou hast commanded by thy servants prophets saying land ye go possess unclean filthiness people lands abominations filled one end another uncleanness
now therefore give your daughters sons neither take nor seek peace or wealth ever ye may strong eat good land leave inheritance children
after come upon us our evil deeds great trespass seeing thou god hast punished less than iniquities deserve given such deliverance
should we again break thy commandments join affinity people these abominations wouldest thou angry us till hadst consumed so there no remnant nor escaping
o lord god israel thou art righteous we remain yet escaped day behold before thee our trespasses cannot stand because
now ezra had prayed confessed weeping casting himself down before house god there assembled out israel very great congregation men women children people wept sore
shechaniah son jehiel one sons elam answered said ezra we trespassed against our god taken strange wives people land yet now there hope israel concerning thing
now therefore let us make covenant our god put away wives such born according counsel lord those tremble at commandment done law
arise matter belongeth thee we also good courage do
then arose ezra made chief priests levites israel swear should do according word sware
then ezra rose before house god went chamber johanan son eliashib came thither did eat no bread nor drink water mourned because transgression had been carried away
made proclamation throughout judah jerusalem children captivity should gather themselves together
whosoever would come within three days according counsel princes elders substance should forfeited himself separated congregation those had been carried away
then men judah benjamin gathered themselves together jerusalem within three days ninth month on twentieth day people sat street house god trembling because matter great rain
ezra priest stood said ye transgressed taken strange wives increase trespass israel
now therefore make confession lord god your fathers do pleasure separate yourselves people land strange wives
then congregation answered said loud voice thou hast so must we do
people many time much rain we able stand without neither work one day or two transgressed thing
let now our rulers congregation stand taken strange wives cities come at appointed times elders every city judges thereof until fierce wrath god matter turned us
only jonathan son asahel jahaziah tikvah employed about matter meshullam shabbethai levite helped
children captivity did so ezra priest certain chief fathers after house by names separated sat down first day tenth month examine matter
made end men had taken strange wives by first day month
among sons priests there found had taken strange wives namely jeshua son jozadak brethren maaseiah eliezer jarib gedaliah
gave hands would put away wives being guilty offered ram flock trespass
