flood breaketh out inhabitant even waters forgotten foot dried gone away men
earth out cometh bread under turned fire
stones place sapphires hath dust gold
there path no fowl knoweth vulture's eye hath seen
lion's whelps trodden nor fierce lion passed by
putteth forth hand upon rock overturneth mountains by roots
cutteth out rivers among rocks eye seeth every precious thing
bindeth floods overflowing thing hid bringeth forth light
where wisdom found place understanding
man knoweth price thereof neither found land living
depth saith sea
cannot gotten gold neither silver weighed price thereof
cannot valued gold ophir precious onyx or sapphire
gold crystal cannot equal exchange jewels fine
no mention made coral or pearls price wisdom above rubies
topaz ethiopia equal neither valued pure gold
whence then cometh wisdom where place understanding
seeing hid eyes living kept close fowls air
destruction death say we heard fame thereof our ears
god understandeth way thereof knoweth place
looketh ends earth seeth under whole heaven
make weight winds weigheth waters by measure
made decree rain way lightning thunder
then did see declare prepared yea searched out
man said behold fear lord wisdom depart evil understanding
moreover job continued parable said
oh months past days god preserved
candle shined upon head by light walked through darkness
days youth secret god upon tabernacle
almighty yet children about
washed steps butter rock poured out rivers oil
went out gate through city prepared seat street
young men saw hid themselves aged arose stood
princes refrained talking laid hand on mouth
nobles held peace tongue cleaved roof mouth
ear heard then blessed eye saw gave witness
because delivered poor cried fatherless had none help
blessing ready perish came upon caused widow's heart sing joy
put on righteousness clothed judgment robe diadem
eyes blind feet lame
father poor cause knew searched out
brake jaws wicked plucked spoil out teeth
then said die nest multiply days sand
root spread out by waters dew lay night upon branch
glory fresh bow renewed hand
men gave ear waited kept silence at counsel
after words spake again speech dropped upon
waited rain opened mouth wide latter
if laughed on believed light countenance cast down
chose out way sat chief dwelt king army one comforteth mourners
now younger than derision whose fathers would disdained set dogs flock
yea whereto might strength hands profit whom old age perished
want famine solitary fleeing wilderness former time desolate waste
who cut mallows by bushes juniper roots meat
driven forth among men cried after thief
dwell clifts valleys caves earth rocks
among bushes brayed under nettles gathered together
children fools yea base men viler than earth
now am song yea byword
abhor flee far spare spit face
because hath loosed cord afflicted also let loose bridle before
upon right hand rise youth push away feet raise against ways destruction
mar path set forward calamity no helper
came upon wide breaking waters desolation rolled themselves
terrors turned upon pursue soul wind welfare passeth away cloud
now soul poured out upon days affliction taken hold
bones pierced night season sinews take no rest
by great force disease garment changed bindeth about collar coat
hath cast mire am become like dust ashes
cry thee thou dost hear stand regardest
thou art become cruel thy strong hand opposest thyself against
thou liftest wind causest ride upon dissolvest substance
know thou wilt bring death house appointed living
howbeit stretch out hand grave though cry destruction
did weep trouble soul grieved poor
looked good then evil came waited light there darkness
bowels boiled rested days affliction prevented
went mourning without sun stood cried congregation
am brother dragons companion owls
skin black upon bones burned heat
harp also turned mourning organ voice weep
made covenant mine eyes why then should think upon maid
what portion god there above inheritance almighty on high
destruction wicked strange punishment workers iniquity
doth see ways count steps
if walked vanity or foot hath hasted deceit
let weighed even balance god may know mine integrity
if step hath turned out way mine heart walked after eyes any blot cleaved hands
then let sow another eat yea offspring rooted out
if mine heart been deceived by woman or laid wait at neighbour's door
then let wife grind another others bow down upon her
heinous crime yea iniquity punished by judges
fire consumeth destruction would root out mine increase
if did despise cause manservant or maidservant contended
what then do god riseth visiteth answer
did made womb make one fashion us
if withheld poor desire or caused eyes widow fail
or eaten morsel myself alone fatherless hath thereof
youth brought father guided her mother's womb
if seen any perish want clothing or poor without covering
if loins blessed warmed fleece sheep
if lifted hand against fatherless saw help gate
then let mine arm fall shoulder blade broken bone
destruction god terror by reason highness could endure
if made gold hope or said fine thou art confidence
if rejoiced because wealth great mine hand had gotten much
if beheld sun shined or moon walking brightness
heart hath been secretly enticed or mouth kissed hand
also iniquity punished by judge should denied god above
if rejoiced at destruction hated or lifted myself evil found
neither suffered mouth sin by wishing curse soul
if men tabernacle said oh we had flesh cannot satisfied
stranger did lodge street opened doors traveller
if covered transgressions adam by hiding mine iniquity bosom
did fear great multitude or contempt families terrify kept silence went out door
oh one would hear behold desire almighty answer mine adversary had written book
surely would take upon shoulder bind crown
would declare number steps prince go near
if land cry against or furrows likewise thereof complain
if eaten fruits thereof without money or caused owners lose life
let thistles grow instead wheat cockle barley words job ended
so these three men ceased answer job because righteous own eyes
then kindled wrath elihu son barachel buzite kindred ram against job because justified himself rather than god
also against three friends wrath kindled because had found no answer yet condemned job
now elihu had waited till job spoken because elder than
elihu saw there no answer mouth these three men then wrath kindled
elihu son barachel buzite answered said am young ye very old wherefore afraid durst shew you mine opinion
said days should speak multitude years teach wisdom
there spirit man inspiration almighty giveth understanding
great men always wise neither do aged understand judgment
therefore said hearken also shew mine opinion
behold waited your words gave ear reasons whilst ye searched out what say
yea attended you behold there none convinced job or answered words
lest ye should say we found out wisdom god thrusteth down man
now hath directed words against neither answer your speeches
amazed answered no more left off speaking
had waited spake stood still answered no more
said answer also part shew mine opinion
am full matter spirit within constraineth
behold belly wine hath no vent ready burst like new bottles
speak may refreshed open lips answer
let pray you accept any man's person neither give flattering titles man
know give flattering titles so doing maker would soon take away
wherefore job pray thee hear speeches hearken words
behold now opened mouth tongue hath spoken
words uprightness heart lips utter knowledge clearly
spirit god hath made breath almighty given life
if thou canst answer set thy words order before stand
behold am according thy wish god's stead also formed out clay
behold terror make thee afraid neither hand heavy upon
surely thou hast spoken mine hearing heard voice thy words saying
am clean without transgression innocent neither there iniquity
behold findeth occasions against counteth enemy
putteth feet stocks marketh paths
behold thou art just answer thee god greater than man
why dost thou strive against giveth account any matters
god speaketh once yea twice yet man perceiveth
dream vision night deep sleep falleth upon men slumberings bed
then openeth ears men sealeth instruction
may withdraw man purpose hide pride
keepeth back soul pit life perishing by sword
chastened also pain upon bed multitude bones strong
so life abhorreth bread soul dainty meat
flesh consumed away cannot seen bones stick out
yea soul draweth near grave life destroyers
if there messenger interpreter one among thousand shew man uprightness
then gracious saith deliver going down pit found ransom
flesh fresher than child's return days youth
pray god favourable see face joy render man righteousness
looketh upon men if any say sinned perverted right profited
deliver soul going pit life see light
lo these things worketh god oftentimes man
bring back soul pit enlightened light living
mark well o job hearken hold thy peace speak
if thou hast any thing say answer speak desire justify thee
if hearken hold thy peace teach thee wisdom
furthermore elihu answered said
hear words o ye wise men give ear knowledge
ear trieth words mouth tasteth meat
let us choose judgment know among ourselves what good
job hath said am righteous god taken away judgment
should lie against right wound incurable without transgression
what man like job who drinketh scorning water
goeth company workers iniquity walketh wicked men
hath said profiteth man nothing should delight himself god
therefore hearken ye men understanding far god should do wickedness almighty commit iniquity
work man render cause every find according ways
yea surely god do wickedly neither almighty pervert judgment
who hath given charge over earth or disposed whole world
if set heart upon man gather himself spirit breath
flesh perish together man turn again dust
if now thou hast understanding hear hearken voice words
even hateth right govern wilt thou condemn most just
fit say king thou art wicked princes ye ungodly
how much less accepteth persons princes nor regardeth rich more than poor work hands
moment die people troubled at midnight pass away mighty taken without hand
eyes upon ways man seeth goings
there no darkness nor shadow death where workers iniquity may hide themselves
lay upon man more than right should enter judgment god
break pieces mighty men without number set others stead
therefore knoweth works overturneth night so destroyed
striketh wicked men open sight others
because turned back would consider any ways
so cause cry poor come heareth afflicted
giveth quietness who then can make trouble hideth face behold whether done against nation or man only
hypocrite reign lest people ensnared
surely meet said god borne chastisement offend any more
see teach thou if done iniquity do no more
should according thy mind recompense whether thou refuse or choose therefore speak what knowest
let men understanding tell wise man hearken
job hath spoken without knowledge words wisdom
desire job may tried end because answers wicked men
addeth rebellion sin clappeth hands among us multiplieth words against god
elihu spake moreover said
thinkest thou right saidst righteousness more than god's
thou saidst what advantage thee profit if cleansed sin
answer thee thy companions
look heavens see behold clouds higher than thou
if thou sinnest what doest against or thy transgressions multiplied
if thou righteous what givest or receiveth thine hand
thy wickedness may hurt man thou art righteousness profit son
by reason multitude oppressions make oppressed cry out arm mighty
none saith where god maker who giveth songs night
who teacheth us more than beasts earth maketh wiser fowls heaven
there cry none giveth answer because pride evil men
surely god hear vanity neither almighty regard
although thou sayest shalt see yet judgment before therefore trust
now because so hath visited anger yet knoweth great extremity
therefore doth job open mouth vain multiplieth words without knowledge

suffer little shew thee yet speak on god's behalf
fetch knowledge afar ascribe righteousness maker
truly words false perfect knowledge thee
behold god mighty despiseth any strength wisdom
preserveth life wicked giveth right poor
withdraweth eyes righteous kings on throne yea doth establish ever exalted

then sheweth work transgressions exceeded
openeth also ear discipline commandeth return iniquity
if obey serve spend days prosperity years pleasures

die youth life among unclean
delivereth poor affliction openeth ears oppression
even so would removed thee out strait broad place where there no straitness should set on thy table full fatness

because there wrath beware lest take thee away stroke then great ransom cannot deliver
esteem thy riches no gold nor forces strength
desire night people cut off place
take heed regard iniquity hast thou chosen rather than affliction
behold god exalteth by power who teacheth like
who hath enjoined way or can say thou hast wrought iniquity
remember thou magnify work men behold
every man may see behold afar off
behold god great we know neither can number years searched out
maketh small drops water pour down rain according vapour thereof
clouds do drop distil upon man abundantly
also can any understand spreadings clouds or noise tabernacle
behold spreadeth light upon covereth bottom sea
by judgeth people giveth meat abundance
clouds covereth light commandeth shine by cloud cometh betwixt
noise thereof sheweth concerning cattle also vapour
at also heart trembleth moved out place
hear attentively noise voice sound goeth out mouth
directeth under whole heaven lightning ends earth
after voice roareth thundereth excellency stay heard
god thundereth marvellously voice great things doeth we cannot comprehend
saith snow thou on earth likewise small rain great strength
sealeth hand every man men may know work
then beasts go dens remain places
out south cometh whirlwind cold north
by breath god frost given breadth waters straitened
also by watering wearieth thick cloud scattereth bright
turned round about by counsels may do whatsoever commandeth upon face world earth
causeth come whether correction or land mercy
hearken o job stand still consider wondrous works god
dost thou know god disposed caused light cloud shine

how thy garments warm quieteth earth by south wind
hast thou spread out sky strong molten looking glass

told speak if man surely swallowed
now men see bright light clouds wind passeth cleanseth
fair weather cometh out north god terrible majesty
touching almighty we cannot find out excellent power judgment plenty justice afflict
men do therefore fear respecteth any wise heart
then lord answered job out whirlwind said
who darkeneth counsel by words without knowledge
gird now thy loins like man demand thee answer thou
where wast thou laid foundations earth declare if hast understanding
who hath laid measures thereof if thou knowest or stretched line upon
whereupon foundations thereof fastened or who laid corner stone
morning stars sang together sons god shouted joy
or who shut sea doors brake forth if had issued out womb
made cloud garment thereof thick darkness swaddlingband
brake decreed place set bars doors
said hitherto shalt thou come no further here thy proud waves stayed
hast thou commanded morning since thy days caused dayspring know place
might take hold ends earth wicked shaken out
turned clay seal stand garment
wicked light withholden high arm broken
hast thou entered springs sea or walked search depth
gates death been opened thee or hast thou seen doors shadow
hast thou perceived breadth earth declare if knowest
where way light dwelleth darkness place thereof
thou shouldest take bound thereof know paths house
knowest thou because wast then born or number thy days great
hast thou entered treasures snow or seen hail
reserved against time trouble day battle war
by what way light parted scattereth east wind upon earth
who hath divided watercourse overflowing waters or way lightning thunder
cause rain on earth where no man wilderness wherein there
satisfy desolate waste ground cause bud tender herb spring forth
hath rain father or who begotten drops dew
out whose womb came ice hoary frost heaven who hath gendered
waters hid stone face deep frozen
canst thou bind sweet influences pleiades or loose bands orion
canst thou bring forth mazzaroth season or guide arcturus sons
knowest thou ordinances heaven canst set dominion thereof earth
canst thou lift thy voice clouds abundance waters may cover thee
canst thou send lightnings may go say thee here we
who hath put wisdom inward parts or given understanding heart
who can number clouds wisdom or stay bottles heaven
dust groweth hardness clods cleave fast together
wilt thou hunt prey lion or fill appetite young lions
couch dens abide covert lie wait
who provideth raven food young ones cry god wander lack meat
knowest thou time wild goats rock bring forth or canst mark hinds do calve
canst thou number months fulfil or knowest time bring forth
bow themselves bring forth young ones cast out sorrows
young ones good liking grow corn go forth return
who hath sent out wild ass free or loosed bands
whose house made wilderness barren land dwellings
scorneth multitude city neither regardeth crying driver
range mountains pasture searcheth after every green thing
unicorn willing serve thee or abide by thy crib
canst thou bind unicorn band furrow or harrow valleys after thee
wilt thou trust because strength great or leave thy labour
wilt thou believe bring home thy seed gather barn
gavest thou goodly wings peacocks or feathers ostrich
leaveth her eggs earth warmeth dust
forgetteth foot may crush or wild beast break
she hardened against her young ones though hers labour vain without fear
because god hath deprived her wisdom neither imparted understanding
what time she lifteth herself on high scorneth horse rider
hast thou given horse strength clothed neck thunder
canst thou make afraid grasshopper glory nostrils terrible
paweth valley rejoiceth strength goeth on meet armed men
mocketh at fear affrighted neither turneth back sword
quiver rattleth against glittering spear shield
swalloweth ground fierceness rage neither believeth sound trumpet
saith among trumpets ha smelleth battle afar off thunder captains shouting
doth hawk fly by thy wisdom stretch her wings toward south
doth eagle mount at thy command make her nest on high
she dwelleth abideth on rock upon crag strong place
thence she seeketh prey her eyes behold afar off
her young ones also suck blood where slain there she

contendeth almighty instruct reproveth god let answer

then answered lord job out whirlwind said

wilt thou also disannul judgment condemn mayest righteous
hast thou arm like god or canst thunder voice

look on every one proud bring low tread down wicked place
hide dust together bind faces secret
then also confess thee thine own right hand can save
behold now behemoth made thee eateth grass ox
lo now strength loins force navel belly
moveth tail like cedar sinews stones wrapped together
bones strong pieces brass like bars iron
chief ways god made can make sword approach
surely mountains bring forth food where beasts field play
lieth under shady trees covert reed fens
shady trees cover shadow willows brook compass about
behold drinketh river hasteth trusteth can draw jordan mouth
taketh eyes nose pierceth through snares

make many supplications thee speak soft words
make covenant thee wilt thou take servant ever
wilt thou play bird or bind thy maidens
companions make banquet part among merchants
canst thou fill skin barbed irons or head fish spears
lay thine hand upon remember battle do no more
behold hope vain one cast down even at sight
none so fierce dare stir who then able stand before
who hath prevented should repay whatsoever under whole heaven mine
conceal parts nor power comely proportion
who can discover face garment or come double bridle
who can open doors face teeth terrible round about
scales pride shut together close seal
one so near another no air can come between
joined one another stick together cannot sundered
by neesings light doth shine eyes like eyelids morning
out mouth go burning lamps sparks fire leap
out nostrils goeth smoke seething pot or caldron
breath kindleth coals flame goeth out mouth
neck remaineth strength sorrow turned joy before
flakes flesh joined together firm themselves cannot moved
heart firm stone yea hard piece nether millstone
raiseth himself mighty afraid by reason breakings purify themselves

esteemeth iron straw brass rotten wood
arrow cannot make flee slingstones turned stubble

sharp stones under spreadeth pointed things upon mire
maketh deep boil like pot sea ointment
maketh path shine after one would think deep hoary
upon earth there like who made without fear
beholdeth high things king over children pride
then job answered lord said
know thou canst do every thing no thought can withholden thee

therefore take you now seven bullocks rams go servant job offer yourselves burnt offering pray accept lest deal after your folly ye spoken thing right like

lord turned captivity job prayed friends also gave twice much had before
then came there brethren sisters had been acquaintance before did eat bread house bemoaned comforted over evil lord brought upon every man also gave piece money one earring gold

had also seven sons three daughters
called name first jemima second kezia third kerenhappuch

after lived job hundred forty years saw sons sons' even four generations
so job died being old full days

ungodly so like chaff wind driveth away
therefore ungodly stand judgment nor sinners congregation righteous

why do heathen rage people imagine vain thing

sun also ariseth goeth down hasteth place where arose
wind goeth toward south turneth about north whirleth continually returneth again according circuits
rivers run sea yet full place whence come thither return again
things full labour man cannot utter eye satisfied seeing nor ear filled hearing
thing hath been done there no new under sun
there any thing whereof may said see new hath been already old time before us
there no remembrance former things neither any come those after

rabshakeh said say ye now hezekiah thus saith great king assyria what confidence wherein thou trustest
say sayest thou vain words counsel strength war now on whom dost trust rebellest against
lo thou trustest staff broken reed on egypt whereon if man lean go hand pierce so pharaoh king trust

behold graven thee upon palms hands thy walls continually before

children thou shalt after hast lost other say again thine ears place too strait give may dwell

thus saith lord where bill your mother's divorcement whom put away or creditors sold you behold iniquities ye yourselves transgressions mother

thus saith lord king's house judah thou art gilead head lebanon yet surely make thee wilderness cities inhabited

therefore thus saith lord concerning jehoiakim son josiah king judah lament saying ah brother or sister glory

say still despise lord hath said ye peace every one walketh after imagination own heart no evil come upon you
who hath stood counsel lord perceived heard word marked
behold whirlwind lord gone forth fury even grievous fall grievously upon head wicked
anger lord return until executed till performed thoughts heart latter days ye consider perfectly
sent these prophets yet ran spoken prophesied
if had stood counsel caused people hear words then should turned evil way doings
am god at hand saith lord afar off
can any hide himself secret places see saith lord do fill heaven earth
heard what prophets said prophesy lies name saying dreamed
how long heart prophets prophesy lies yea deceit own
think cause people forget name by dreams tell every man neighbour fathers forgotten baal

word like fire saith lord hammer breaketh rock pieces
therefore behold am against prophets saith lord steal words every one neighbour
behold am against prophets saith lord use tongues say

since ye say burden lord therefore thus saith because word sent you saying
therefore behold even utterly forget you forsake city gave your fathers cast out presence
bring everlasting reproach upon you perpetual shame forgotten

thus saith lord thy bruise incurable wound grievous
there none plead thy cause thou mayest bound hast no healing medicines
thy lovers forgotten thee seek wounded wound enemy chastisement cruel one multitude thine iniquity because sins increased

thus saith lord god israel made covenant your fathers day brought forth out land egypt house bondmen saying

then michaiah declared words had heard baruch read book ears people
therefore princes sent jehudi son nethaniah shelemiah cushi baruch saying take thine hand roll wherein thou hast read ears people come so neriah took came
said sit down now read our ears so baruch
now came pass had heard words afraid both one other said baruch we surely tell king these
asked baruch saying tell us now how didst thou write these words at mouth
then baruch answered pronounced these words mouth wrote ink book
then said princes baruch go hide thee thou jeremiah let no man know where ye
went king court laid roll chamber elishama scribe told words ears

now king sat winterhouse ninth month there fire on hearth burning before
came pass jehudi had read three or four leaves cut penknife cast fire on hearth until roll consumed
yet afraid nor rent garments neither king any servants heard these words
nevertheless elnathan delaiah gemariah had made intercession king would burn roll hear
king commanded jerahmeel son hammelech seraiah azriel shelemiah abdeel take baruch scribe jeremiah prophet lord hid
then word lord came jeremiah after king had burned roll words baruch wrote at mouth saying
take thee again another roll write former words first jehoiakim king judah hath burned
thou shalt say jehoiakim king judah thus saith lord hast burned roll saying why written therein babylon certainly come destroy land cause cease thence man beast
therefore thus saith lord jehoiakim king judah none sit upon throne david dead body cast out day heat night frost

then came word lord prophet jeremiah saying
thus saith lord god israel ye say king judah sent you enquire behold pharaoh's army come forth help return egypt own land
chaldeans come again fight against city take burn fire
thus saith lord deceive yourselves saying chaldeans surely depart us
though ye had smitten whole army chaldeans fight against you there remained wounded men among yet should rise every man tent burn city fire
came pass army chaldeans broken jerusalem fear pharaoh's
then jeremiah went forth out jerusalem go land benjamin separate himself thence midst people
gate benjamin captain ward there whose name irijah son shelemiah hananiah took jeremiah prophet saying thou fallest away chaldeans
then said jeremiah false fall away chaldeans hearkened so irijah took brought princes
wherefore princes wroth jeremiah smote put prison house jonathan scribe had made
jeremiah entered dungeon cabins had remained there many days
then zedekiah king sent took out asked secretly house said there any word lord jeremiah thou shalt delivered hand babylon
moreover jeremiah said king zedekiah what offended against thee or thy servants people ye put prison
where now your prophets prophesied you saying king babylon come against nor land
therefore hear now pray thee o lord king let supplication accepted before thou cause return house jonathan scribe lest die there
then zedekiah king commanded should commit jeremiah court prison give daily piece bread out bakers' street until city spent thus remained
then shephatiah son mattan gedaliah pashur jucal shelemiah malchiah heard words jeremiah had spoken people saying
thus saith lord remaineth city die by sword famine pestilence goeth forth chaldeans live life prey
thus saith lord city surely given hand king babylon's army take
therefore princes said king we beseech thee let man put death thus weakeneth hands men war remain city people speaking such words seeketh welfare hurt
then zedekiah king said behold your hand can do any thing against you
then took jeremiah cast dungeon malchiah son hammelech court prison let down cords there no water mire so sunk
now ebedmelech ethiopian one eunuchs king's house heard had put jeremiah dungeon king then sitting gate benjamin
ebedmelech went forth out king's house spake king saying
lord king these men done evil jeremiah prophet whom cast dungeon like die hunger place where there no more bread city
then king commanded ebedmelech ethiopian saying take hence thirty men thee jeremiah prophet out dungeon before die
so ebedmelech took men went house king under treasury thence old cast clouts rotten rags let down by cords dungeon jeremiah
ebedmelech ethiopian said jeremiah put now these old cast clouts rotten rags under thine armholes cords did so
so drew jeremiah cords took out dungeon remained court prison
then zedekiah king sent took jeremiah prophet third entry house lord said ask thee thing hide nothing
then jeremiah said zedekiah if declare thee wilt thou surely put death give counsel hearken
so zedekiah king sware secretly jeremiah saying lord liveth made us soul put thee death neither give hand these men seek thy life
then said jeremiah zedekiah thus saith lord god hosts israel if thou wilt assuredly go forth king babylon's princes thy soul live city burned fire shalt thine house
if thou wilt go forth king babylon's princes then city given hand chaldeans burn fire shalt escape out
zedekiah king said jeremiah am afraid jews fallen chaldeans lest deliver hand mock
jeremiah said deliver thee obey beseech voice lord speak so well thy soul live
if thou refuse go forth word lord hath shewed
behold women left king judah's house brought forth babylon's princes those say thy friends set thee on prevailed against feet sunk mire turned away back
so bring out thy wives children chaldeans thou shalt escape hand taken by king babylon cause city burned fire
then said zedekiah jeremiah let no man know these words thou shalt die
if princes hear talked thee come say declare us now what thou hast said king hide we put death also
then thou shalt say presented supplication before king would cause return jonathan's house die there
then came princes jeremiah asked told according these words king had commanded so left off speaking matter perceived
so jeremiah abode court prison until day jerusalem taken there
ninth year zedekiah king judah tenth month came nebuchadrezzar babylon army against jerusalem besieged
eleventh year zedekiah fourth month ninth day city broken
princes king babylon came sat middle gate even nergalsharezer samgarnebo sarsechim rabsaris rabmag residue
came pass zedekiah king judah saw men war then fled went forth out city by night way king's garden gate betwixt two walls plain
chaldeans' army pursued after overtook zedekiah plains jericho had taken brought nebuchadnezzar king babylon riblah land hamath where gave judgment upon
then king babylon slew sons zedekiah riblah before eyes also nobles judah
moreover put out zedekiah's eyes bound chains carry babylon
chaldeans burned king's house houses people fire brake down walls jerusalem
then nebuzaradan captain guard carried away captive babylon remnant people remained city those fell rest
nebuzaradan captain guard left poor people had nothing land judah gave vineyards fields at same time
now nebuchadrezzar king babylon gave charge concerning jeremiah nebuzaradan captain guard saying
take look well do no harm even say thee
so nebuzaradan captain guard sent nebushasban rabsaris nergalsharezer rabmag king babylon's princes
even sent took jeremiah out court prison committed gedaliah son ahikam shaphan should carry home so dwelt among people
now word lord came jeremiah while shut court prison saying
go speak ebedmelech ethiopian saying thus saith lord hosts god israel behold bring words upon city evil good accomplished day before thee
deliver thee day saith lord thou shalt given hand men whom art afraid
surely deliver thee thou shalt fall by sword thy life prey because hast put trust saith lord
word came jeremiah lord after nebuzaradan captain guard had let go ramah taken being bound chains among carried away captive jerusalem judah babylon
captain guard took jeremiah said lord thy god hath pronounced evil upon place
now lord hath brought done according said because ye sinned against obeyed voice therefore thing come upon you
now behold loose thee day chains upon thine hand if seem good come babylon look well ill forbear land before whither seemeth convenient go thither
now while yet gone back said go also gedaliah son ahikam shaphan whom king babylon hath made governor over cities judah dwell among people or wheresoever seemeth convenient thee so captain guard gave victuals reward let
then went jeremiah gedaliah son ahikam mizpah dwelt among people left land
now captains forces fields even men heard king babylon had made gedaliah son ahikam governor land committed women children poor carried away captive
then came gedaliah mizpah even ishmael son nethaniah johanan jonathan sons kareah seraiah tanhumeth ephai netophathite jezaniah maachathite men
gedaliah son ahikam shaphan sware men saying fear serve chaldeans dwell land king babylon well you
behold dwell at mizpah serve chaldeans come us ye gather wine summer fruits oil put your vessels cities taken
likewise jews moab among ammonites edom countries heard king babylon had left remnant judah set over gedaliah son ahikam shaphan
even jews returned out places whither driven came land judah gedaliah mizpah gathered wine summer fruits very much
moreover johanan son kareah captains forces fields came gedaliah mizpah
said dost thou certainly know baalis king ammonites hath sent ishmael son nethaniah slay thee gedaliah ahikam believed
then johanan son kareah spake gedaliah mizpah secretly saying let go pray thee slay ishmael nethaniah no man know wherefore should jews gathered scattered remnant judah perish
gedaliah son ahikam said johanan kareah thou shalt do thing speakest falsely ishmael
now came pass seventh month ishmael son nethaniah elishama seed royal princes king even ten men gedaliah ahikam mizpah there did eat bread together
then arose ishmael son nethaniah ten men smote gedaliah ahikam shaphan sword slew whom king babylon had made governor over land
ishmael also slew jews even gedaliah at mizpah chaldeans found there men war
came pass second day after had slain gedaliah no man knew
there came certain shechem shiloh samaria even fourscore men having beards shaven clothes rent cut themselves offerings incense hand bring house lord
ishmael son nethaniah went forth mizpah meet weeping along came pass met said come gedaliah ahikam
so came midst city ishmael son nethaniah slew cast pit men
ten men found among said ishmael slay us we treasures field wheat barley oil honey so forbare slew brethren
now pit wherein ishmael had cast dead bodies men whom slain because gedaliah asa king made fear baasha israel son nethaniah filled
then ishmael carried away captive residue people mizpah even king's daughters remained whom nebuzaradan captain guard had committed gedaliah son ahikam nethaniah departed go over ammonites
johanan son kareah captains forces heard evil ishmael nethaniah had done
then took men went fight ishmael son nethaniah found by great waters gibeon
now came pass people ishmael saw johanan son kareah captains forces then glad
so people ishmael had carried away captive mizpah cast about returned went johanan son kareah
ishmael son nethaniah escaped johanan eight men went ammonites
then took johanan son kareah captains forces remnant people whom had recovered ishmael nethaniah mizpah after slain gedaliah ahikam even mighty men war women children eunuchs brought again gibeon
departed dwelt habitation chimham by bethlehem go enter egypt
because chaldeans afraid ishmael son nethaniah had slain gedaliah ahikam whom king babylon made governor land
then captains forces johanan son kareah jezaniah hoshaiah people least even greatest came near
said jeremiah prophet let we beseech thee our supplication accepted before pray us lord thy god even remnant left few many thine eyes do behold
lord thy god may shew us way wherein we walk thing do
then jeremiah prophet said heard you behold pray lord your god according words come pass whatsoever thing answer declare keep nothing back
then said jeremiah lord true faithful witness between us if we do even according things thy god send thee
whether good or evil we obey voice lord our god whom send thee may well us
came pass after ten days word lord jeremiah
then called johanan son kareah captains forces people least even greatest
said thus saith lord god israel whom ye sent present your supplication before
if ye still abide land then build you pull down plant pluck repent evil done
afraid king babylon whom ye saith lord am you save deliver hand
shew mercies you may mercy upon cause return your own land
if ye say we dwell land neither obey voice lord your god
saying no we go land egypt where see war nor hear sound trumpet hunger bread there dwell
now therefore hear word lord ye remnant judah thus saith hosts god israel if wholly set your faces enter egypt go sojourn there
then come pass sword ye feared overtake you there land egypt famine whereof afraid follow close after die
so men set faces go egypt sojourn there die by sword famine pestilence none remain or escape evil bring upon
thus saith lord hosts god israel mine anger fury hath been poured forth upon inhabitants jerusalem so you ye enter egypt execration astonishment curse reproach see place no more
lord hath said concerning you o ye remnant judah go egypt know certainly admonished day
ye dissembled your hearts sent lord god saying pray us our according say so declare we do
now day declared you ye obeyed voice lord your god nor any thing hath sent
now therefore know certainly ye die by sword famine pestilence place whither desire go sojourn
came pass jeremiah had made end speaking people words lord god sent even these
then spake azariah son hoshaiah johanan kareah proud men saying jeremiah thou speakest falsely lord our god hath sent thee say go egypt sojourn there
baruch son neriah setteth thee on against us deliver hand chaldeans might put death carry away captives babylon
so johanan son kareah captains forces people obeyed voice lord dwell land judah
johanan son kareah captains forces took remnant judah returned nations whither had been driven dwell land
even men women children king's daughters every person nebuzaradan captain guard had left gedaliah son ahikam shaphan jeremiah prophet baruch neriah
so came land egypt obeyed voice lord thus even tahpanhes
then came word lord jeremiah tahpanhes saying
take great stones thine hand hide clay brickkiln at entry pharaoh's house tahpanhes sight men judah
say thus saith lord hosts god israel behold send take nebuchadrezzar king babylon servant set throne upon these stones hid spread royal pavilion over
cometh smite land egypt deliver such death captivity sword
kindle fire houses gods egypt burn carry away captives array himself land shepherd putteth on garment go forth thence peace
break also images bethshemesh land egypt houses gods egyptians burn fire
word came jeremiah concerning jews dwell land egypt at migdol tahpanhes noph country pathros saying
thus saith lord hosts god israel ye seen evil brought upon jerusalem cities judah behold day desolation no man dwelleth therein
because wickedness committed provoke anger went burn incense serve other gods whom knew neither ye nor your fathers
howbeit sent you servants prophets rising early sending saying oh do abominable thing hate
hearkened nor inclined ear turn wickedness burn no incense other gods
wherefore fury mine anger poured forth kindled cities judah streets jerusalem wasted desolate at day
therefore now thus saith lord god hosts israel wherefore commit ye great evil against your souls cut off you man woman child suckling out judah leave none remain
ye provoke wrath works your hands burning incense other gods land egypt whither gone dwell might cut yourselves off curse reproach among nations earth
ye forgotten wickedness your fathers kings judah wives own committed land streets jerusalem
humbled even day neither feared nor walked law statutes set before you your fathers
therefore thus saith lord hosts god israel behold set face against you evil cut off judah
take remnant judah set faces go land egypt sojourn there consumed fall even by sword famine die least greatest execration astonishment curse reproach
punish dwell land egypt punished jerusalem by sword famine pestilence
so none remnant judah gone land egypt sojourn there escape or remain should return desire dwell such
then men knew wives had burned incense other gods women stood by great multitude even people dwelt land egypt pathros answered jeremiah saying
word thou hast spoken us name lord we hearken thee
we certainly do whatsoever thing goeth forth out our own mouth burn incense queen heaven pour drink offerings her done fathers kings princes cities judah streets jerusalem then had plenty victuals well saw no evil
since we left off burn incense queen heaven pour out drink offerings her wanted things been consumed by sword famine
we burned incense queen heaven poured out drink offerings her did make cakes worship pour without our men
then jeremiah said people men women had given answer saying
incense ye burned cities judah streets jerusalem your fathers kings princes people land did lord remember came mind
so lord could no longer bear because evil your doings abominations ye committed therefore land desolation astonishment curse without inhabitant at day
because ye burned incense sinned against lord obeyed voice nor walked law statutes testimonies therefore evil happened you at day
moreover jeremiah said people women hear word lord judah land egypt
thus saith lord hosts god israel saying ye your wives both spoken mouths fulfilled hand we surely perform our vows vowed burn incense queen heaven pour out drink offerings her accomplish
therefore hear ye word lord judah dwell land egypt behold sworn by great name saith no more named mouth any man saying god liveth
behold watch over evil good men judah land egypt consumed by sword famine until there end
yet small number escape sword return out land egypt judah remnant gone sojourn there know whose words stand mine or their's
sign you saith lord punish place ye may know words surely stand against evil
thus saith lord behold give pharaohhophra king egypt hand enemies seek life gave zedekiah judah nebuchadrezzar babylon enemy sought
word jeremiah prophet spake baruch son neriah had written these words book at mouth fourth year jehoiakim josiah king judah saying
thus saith lord god israel thee o baruch
thou didst say woe now lord hath added grief sorrow fainted sighing find no rest
thus shalt thou say lord saith behold built break down planted pluck even whole land
seekest thou great things thyself seek behold bring evil upon flesh saith lord thy life give thee prey places whither goest
word lord came jeremiah prophet against gentiles
against egypt army pharaohnecho king by river euphrates carchemish nebuchadrezzar babylon smote fourth year jehoiakim son josiah judah
order ye buckler shield draw near battle
harness horses get ye horsemen stand forth your helmets furbish spears put on brigandines
wherefore seen dismayed turned away back mighty ones beaten down fled apace look fear round about saith lord
let swift flee away nor mighty man escape stumble fall toward north by river euphrates
who cometh flood whose waters moved rivers
egypt riseth like flood waters moved rivers saith go cover earth destroy city inhabitants thereof
come ye horses rage chariots let mighty men forth ethiopians libyans handle shield lydians bend bow
day lord god hosts vengeance may avenge adversaries sword devour satiate made drunk blood hath sacrifice north country by river euphrates
go gilead take balm o virgin daughter egypt vain shalt thou use many medicines cured
nations heard thy shame cry hath filled land mighty man stumbled against fallen both together
word lord spake jeremiah prophet how nebuchadrezzar king babylon should come smite land egypt
declare ye egypt publish migdol noph tahpanhes say stand fast prepare thee sword devour round about
why thy valiant men swept away stood because lord did drive
made many fall yea one fell upon another said arise let us go again our own people land nativity oppressing sword
did cry there pharaoh king egypt noise hath passed time appointed
live saith king whose name lord hosts surely tabor among mountains carmel by sea so come
o thou daughter dwelling egypt furnish thyself go captivity noph waste desolate without inhabitant
egypt like very fair heifer destruction cometh out north
also her hired men midst like fatted bullocks turned back fled away together did stand because day calamity come upon time visitation
voice thereof go like serpent march army come against her axes hewers wood
cut down her forest saith lord though cannot searched because more than grasshoppers innumerable
daughter egypt confounded she delivered hand people north
lord hosts god israel saith behold punish multitude no pharaoh egypt gods kings even trust
deliver hand those seek lives nebuchadrezzar king babylon servants afterward inhabited days old saith lord
fear thou o servant jacob dismayed israel behold save thee afar off thy seed land captivity return rest at ease none make afraid
fear thou o jacob servant saith lord am thee make full end nations whither driven correct measure yet leave wholly unpunished
word lord came jeremiah prophet against philistines before pharaoh smote gaza
thus saith lord behold waters rise out north overflowing flood overflow land therein city dwell then men cry inhabitants howl
at noise stamping hoofs strong horses rushing chariots rumbling wheels fathers look back children feebleness hands
because day cometh spoil philistines cut off tyrus zidon every helper remaineth lord remnant country caphtor
baldness come upon gaza ashkelon cut off remnant valley how long wilt thou thyself
o thou sword lord how long ere quiet put thyself thy scabbard rest still
how can quiet seeing lord hath given charge against ashkelon sea shore there appointed
against moab thus saith lord hosts god israel woe nebo spoiled kiriathaim confounded taken misgab dismayed
there no more praise moab heshbon devised evil against come let us cut off being nation also thou shalt down o madmen sword pursue thee
voice crying horonaim spoiling great destruction
moab destroyed her little ones caused cry heard
going luhith continual weeping go down horonaim enemies heard cry destruction
flee save your lives like heath wilderness
because thou hast trusted thy works treasures shalt also taken chemosh go forth captivity priests princes together
spoiler come upon every city no escape valley also perish plain destroyed lord hath spoken
give wings moab may flee get away cities thereof desolate without any dwell therein
cursed doeth work lord deceitfully keepeth back sword blood
moab hath been at ease youth settled on lees emptied vessel neither gone captivity therefore taste remained scent changed
therefore behold days come saith lord send wanderers cause wander empty vessels break bottles
moab ashamed chemosh house israel bethel confidence
how say ye we mighty strong men war
moab spoiled gone out her cities chosen young men down slaughter saith king whose name lord hosts
calamity moab near come affliction hasteth fast
ye about bemoan know name say how strong staff broken beautiful rod
thou daughter dost inhabit dibon come down thy glory sit thirst spoiler moab upon thee destroy strong holds
o inhabitant aroer stand by way espy ask fleeth her escapeth say what done
moab confounded broken down howl cry tell ye arnon spoiled
judgment come upon plain country holon jahazah mephaath
upon dibon nebo bethdiblathaim
upon kiriathaim bethgamul bethmeon
upon kerioth bozrah cities land moab far or near
horn moab cut off arm broken saith lord
make ye drunken magnified himself against lord moab also wallow vomit derision
israel derision thee found among thieves since thou spakest skippedst joy
o ye dwell moab leave cities rock like dove maketh her nest sides hole's mouth
we heard pride moab exceeding proud loftiness arrogancy haughtiness heart
know wrath saith lord so lies effect
therefore howl moab cry out mine heart mourn men kirheres
o vine sibmah weep thee weeping jazer thy plants gone over sea reach even spoiler fallen upon summer fruits vintage
joy gladness taken plentiful field land moab caused wine fail winepresses none tread shouting no
cry heshbon even elealeh jahaz uttered voice zoar horonaim heifer three years old waters also nimrim desolate
moreover cause cease moab saith lord offereth high places burneth incense gods
therefore mine heart sound moab like pipes men kirheres because riches hath gotten perished
every head bald beard clipped upon hands cuttings loins sackcloth
there lamentation generally upon housetops moab streets thereof broken like vessel wherein no pleasure saith lord
howl saying how broken down hath moab turned back shame so derision dismaying about
thus saith lord behold fly eagle spread wings over moab
kerioth taken strong holds surprised mighty men's hearts moab at day heart woman her pangs
moab destroyed being people because hath magnified himself against lord
fear pit snare upon thee o inhabitant moab saith lord
fleeth fear fall pit getteth out taken snare bring upon even moab year visitation saith lord
fled stood under shadow heshbon because force fire come forth out flame midst sihon devour corner moab crown head tumultuous ones
woe thee o moab people chemosh perisheth thy sons taken captives daughters
yet bring again captivity moab latter days saith lord thus far judgment
concerning ammonites thus saith lord hath israel no sons heir why then doth king inherit gad people dwell cities
therefore behold days come saith lord cause alarm war heard rabbah ammonites desolate heap her daughters burned fire then israel heir heirs
howl o heshbon ai spoiled cry ye daughters rabbah gird you sackcloth lament run fro by hedges king go captivity priests princes together
wherefore gloriest thou valleys thy flowing valley o backsliding daughter trusted her treasures saying who come
behold bring fear upon thee saith lord god hosts those about ye driven out every man right forth none gather wandereth
afterward bring again captivity children ammon saith lord
concerning edom thus saith lord hosts wisdom no more teman counsel perished prudent vanished
flee ye turn back dwell deep o inhabitants dedan bring calamity esau upon time visit
if grapegatherers come thee would leave some gleaning grapes thieves by night destroy till enough
made esau bare uncovered secret places able hide himself seed spoiled brethren neighbours
leave thy fatherless children preserve alive let widows trust
thus saith lord behold whose judgment drink cup assuredly drunken art thou altogether go unpunished shalt surely
sworn by myself saith lord bozrah become desolation reproach waste curse cities thereof perpetual wastes
heard rumour lord ambassador sent heathen saying gather ye together come against her rise battle
lo make thee small among heathen despised men
thy terribleness hath deceived thee pride thine heart o thou dwellest clefts rock holdest height hill though shouldest make nest high eagle bring down thence saith lord
also edom desolation every one goeth by astonished hiss at plagues thereof
overthrow sodom gomorrah neighbour cities thereof saith lord no man abide there neither son dwell
behold come like lion swelling jordan against habitation strong suddenly make run away her who chosen man may appoint over time shepherd stand before
therefore hear counsel lord hath taken against edom purposes purposed inhabitants teman surely least flock draw out make habitations desolate
earth moved at noise fall cry thereof heard red sea
behold come fly eagle spread wings over bozrah at day heart mighty men edom woman her pangs
concerning damascus hamath confounded arpad heard evil tidings fainthearted there sorrow on sea cannot quiet
damascus waxed feeble turneth herself flee fear hath seized on her anguish sorrows taken woman travail
how city praise left joy
therefore her young men fall streets war cut off day saith lord hosts
kindle fire wall damascus consume palaces benhadad
concerning kedar kingdoms hazor nebuchadrezzar king babylon smite thus saith lord arise ye go spoil men east
tents flocks take away themselves curtains vessels camels cry fear on every side
flee get you far off dwell deep o ye inhabitants hazor saith lord nebuchadrezzar king babylon hath taken counsel against conceived purpose
arise get you wealthy nation dwelleth without care saith lord neither gates nor bars dwell alone
camels booty multitude cattle spoil scatter winds utmost corners bring calamity sides thereof saith lord
hazor dwelling dragons desolation ever there no man abide nor any son dwell
word lord came jeremiah prophet against elam beginning reign zedekiah king judah saying
thus saith lord hosts behold break bow elam chief might
upon elam bring four winds quarters heaven scatter toward those there no nation whither outcasts come
cause elam dismayed before enemies seek life bring evil upon even fierce anger saith lord send sword after till consumed
set throne elam destroy thence king princes saith lord
come pass latter days bring again captivity elam saith lord
word lord spake against babylon land chaldeans by jeremiah prophet
declare ye among nations publish set standard conceal say babylon taken bel confounded merodach broken pieces her idols images
out north there cometh nation against her make land desolate none dwell therein remove depart both man beast
those days time saith lord children israel come judah together going weeping go seek god
ask way zion faces thitherward saying come let us join ourselves lord perpetual covenant forgotten
people hath been lost sheep shepherds caused go astray turned away on mountains gone mountain hill forgotten restingplace
found devoured adversaries said we offend because sinned against lord habitation justice even hope fathers
remove out midst babylon go forth land chaldeans goats before flocks
lo raise cause come against babylon assembly great nations north country set themselves array her thence she taken arrows mighty expert man none return vain
chaldea spoil her satisfied saith lord
because ye glad rejoiced o destroyers mine heritage grown fat heifer at grass bellow bulls
your mother sore confounded she bare you ashamed behold hindermost nations wilderness dry land desert
because wrath lord inhabited wholly desolate every one goeth by babylon astonished hiss at her plagues
put yourselves array against babylon round about ye bend bow shoot at her spare no arrows she hath sinned lord
shout against her round about she hath given hand foundations fallen walls thrown down vengeance lord take upon done do
cut off sower babylon handleth sickle time harvest fear oppressing sword turn every one people flee own land
israel scattered sheep lions driven away first king assyria hath devoured last nebuchadrezzar babylon broken bones
therefore thus saith lord hosts god israel behold punish king babylon land punished assyria
bring israel again habitation feed on carmel bashan soul satisfied upon mount ephraim gilead
those days time saith lord iniquity israel sought there none sins judah found pardon whom reserve
go against land merathaim even inhabitants pekod waste utterly destroy after saith lord do according commanded thee
sound battle land great destruction
how hammer whole earth cut asunder broken babylon become desolation among nations
laid snare thee thou art also taken o babylon wast aware found caught because hast striven against lord
lord hath opened armoury brought forth weapons indignation work god hosts land chaldeans
come against her utmost border open storehouses cast heaps destroy utterly let nothing left
slay her bullocks let go down slaughter woe day come time visitation
voice flee escape out land babylon declare zion vengeance lord our god temple
call together archers against babylon ye bend bow camp round about let none thereof escape recompense her according work she hath done do been proud lord holy one israel
therefore her young men fall streets war cut off day saith lord
behold am against thee o thou most proud saith lord god hosts thy day come time visit
most proud stumble fall none raise kindle fire cities devour round about
thus saith lord hosts children israel judah oppressed together took captives held fast refused let go
redeemer strong lord hosts name throughly plead cause may give rest land disquiet inhabitants babylon
sword upon chaldeans saith lord inhabitants babylon her princes wise men
sword upon liars dote her mighty men dismayed
sword upon horses chariots mingled people midst her become women treasures robbed
drought upon her waters dried land graven images mad idols
therefore wild beasts desert islands dwell there owls therein no more inhabited ever neither dwelt generation
god overthrew sodom gomorrah neighbour cities thereof saith lord so no man abide there neither any son dwell therein
behold people come north great nation many kings raised coasts earth
hold bow lance cruel shew mercy voice roar like sea ride upon horses every one put array man battle against thee o daughter babylon
king babylon hath heard report hands waxed feeble anguish took hold pangs woman travail
behold come like lion swelling jordan habitation strong make suddenly run away her who chosen man may appoint over time shepherd stand before
therefore hear ye counsel lord hath taken against babylon purposes purposed land chaldeans surely least flock draw out make habitation desolate
at noise taking babylon earth moved cry heard among nations
thus saith lord behold raise against babylon dwell midst rise destroying wind
send babylon fanners fan her empty land day trouble against round about
against bendeth let archer bend bow lifteth himself brigandine spare ye her young men destroy utterly host
thus slain fall land chaldeans thrust through her streets
israel hath been forsaken nor judah god lord hosts though land filled sin against holy one
flee out midst babylon deliver every man soul cut off her iniquity time lord's vengeance render recompence
babylon hath been golden cup lord's hand made earth drunken nations her wine therefore mad
babylon suddenly fallen destroyed howl her take balm pain if so she may healed
we would healed babylon she forsake her let us go every one own country judgment reacheth heaven lifted even skies
lord hath brought forth our righteousness come let us declare zion work god
make bright arrows gather shields lord hath raised spirit kings medes device against babylon destroy because vengeance temple
set standard upon walls babylon make watch strong watchmen prepare ambushes lord hath both devised done spake against inhabitants
o thou dwellest upon many waters abundant treasures thine end come measure thy covetousness
lord hosts hath sworn by himself saying surely fill thee men caterpillers lift shout against
hath made earth by power established world wisdom stretched out heaven understanding
uttereth voice there multitude waters heavens causeth vapours ascend ends earth maketh lightnings rain bringeth forth wind out treasures
every man brutish by knowledge founder confounded graven image molten falsehood there no breath
vanity work errors time visitation perish
portion jacob like former things israel rod inheritance lord hosts name
thou art battle axe weapons war thee break pieces nations destroy kingdoms
thee break pieces horse rider chariot
thee also break pieces man woman old young maid
also break pieces thee shepherd flock husbandman yoke oxen captains rulers
render babylon inhabitants chaldea evil done zion your sight saith lord
behold am against thee o destroying mountain saith lord destroyest earth stretch out mine hand upon roll down rocks make burnt
take thee stone corner nor foundations thou shalt desolate ever saith lord
set ye standard land blow trumpet among nations prepare against her call together kingdoms ararat minni ashchenaz appoint captain cause horses come rough caterpillers
prepare against her nations kings medes captains thereof rulers land dominion
land tremble sorrow every purpose lord performed against babylon make desolation without inhabitant

passages stopped reeds burned fire men war affrighted
thus saith lord hosts god israel daughter babylon like threshingfloor time thresh her yet little while harvest come

bring down like lambs slaughter rams goats
how sheshach taken praise whole earth surprised babylon become astonishment among nations
sea come upon babylon she covered multitude waves thereof
her cities desolation dry land wilderness wherein no man dwelleth neither doth any son pass thereby
punish bel babylon bring forth out mouth hath swallowed nations flow together any more yea wall fall

lest your heart faint ye fear rumour heard land both come one year after another violence ruler against
therefore behold days come do judgment upon graven images babylon her whole land confounded slain fall midst
then heaven earth therein sing babylon spoilers come her north saith lord
babylon hath caused slain israel fall so at earth
ye escaped sword go away stand still remember lord afar off let jerusalem come your mind
we confounded because heard reproach shame hath covered our faces strangers come sanctuaries lord's house
wherefore behold days come saith lord do judgment upon her graven images through land wounded groan
though babylon should mount heaven she fortify height her strength yet spoilers come saith lord
sound cry cometh babylon great destruction land chaldeans
because lord hath spoiled babylon destroyed out her great voice waves do roar like waters noise uttered
because spoiler come upon her even babylon mighty men taken every one bows broken lord god recompences surely requite
make drunk her princes wise men captains rulers mighty sleep perpetual wake saith king whose name lord hosts
thus saith lord hosts broad walls babylon utterly broken her high gates burned fire people labour vain folk weary

fourth month ninth day famine sore city so there no bread people land

how doth city sit solitary full people she become widow great among nations princess provinces tributary
she weepeth sore night her tears on cheeks among lovers hath none comfort friends dealt treacherously become enemies
judah gone captivity because affliction great servitude she dwelleth among heathen findeth no rest her persecutors overtook between straits
ways zion do mourn because none come solemn feasts her gates desolate priests sigh virgins afflicted she bitterness

daughter zion her beauty departed princes become like harts find no pasture gone without strength before pursuer

am man hath seen affliction by rod wrath
hath led brought darkness light
surely against turned turneth hand day
flesh skin hath made old broken bones
hath builded against compassed gall travail
hath set dark places dead old
hath hedged about cannot get out made chain heavy
also cry shout shutteth out prayer
hath inclosed ways hewn stone made paths crooked
bear lying wait lion secret places
hath turned aside ways pulled pieces made desolate
hath bent bow set mark arrow
hath caused arrows quiver enter reins
derision people song day
hath filled bitterness made drunken wormwood
hath also broken teeth gravel stones covered ashes
thou hast removed soul far off peace forgat prosperity
said strength hope perished lord
remembering mine affliction misery wormwood gall
soul hath still remembrance humbled
recall mind therefore hope
lord's mercies we consumed because compassions fail
new every morning great thy faithfulness
lord portion saith soul therefore hope
lord good wait soul seeketh
good man should both hope quietly wait salvation lord
good man bear yoke youth
sitteth alone keepeth silence because hath borne upon
putteth mouth dust if so there may hope
giveth cheek smiteth filled full reproach
lord cast off ever
though cause grief yet compassion according multitude mercies
doth afflict willingly nor grieve children men
crush under feet prisoners earth
turn aside right man before face most high
subvert man cause lord approveth
who saith cometh pass lord commandeth
out mouth most high proceedeth evil good
wherefore doth living man complain punishment sins
let us search try our ways turn again lord
let us lift our heart hands god heavens
we transgressed rebelled thou hast pardoned
thou hast covered anger persecuted us slain pitied

thou hast made us offscouring refuse midst people
our enemies opened mouths against us
fear snare come upon us desolation destruction

mine eye trickleth down ceaseth without any intermission
till lord look down behold heaven
mine eye affecteth heart because daughters city
mine enemies chased sore like bird without cause

we given hand egyptians assyrians satisfied bread

servants ruled over us there none doth deliver out hand

then came captivity at telabib dwelt by river chebar sat where remained there astonished among seven days
came pass at end seven days word lord saying
son man made thee watchman house israel therefore hear word at mouth give warning
say wicked thou shalt surely die givest warning nor speakest warn way save life same man iniquity blood require at thine hand
yet if thou warn wicked turn wickedness nor way die iniquity hast delivered thy soul
again righteous man doth turn righteousness commit iniquity lay stumblingblock before die because thou hast given warning sin hath done remembered blood require at thine hand
nevertheless if thou warn righteous man sin doth surely live because warned also hast delivered thy soul
hand lord there upon said arise go forth plain talk thee
then arose went forth plain behold glory lord stood there saw by river chebar fell on face
then spirit entered set upon feet spake said go shut thyself within thine house
thou o son man behold put bands upon thee bind shalt go out among
make thy tongue cleave roof mouth thou shalt dumb reprover rebellious house
speak thee open thy mouth thou shalt say thus saith lord god heareth let hear forbeareth forbear rebellious house
thou also son man take thee tile lay before pourtray upon city even jerusalem
lay siege against build fort cast mount set camp also battering rams round about
moreover take thou thee iron pan set wall between city thy face against besieged shalt lay siege sign house israel
lie thou also upon thy left side lay iniquity house israel according number days shalt bear
laid upon thee years iniquity according number days three hundred ninety so shalt thou bear house israel
thou hast accomplished lie again on thy right side shalt bear iniquity house judah forty days appointed thee each day year
therefore thou shalt set thy face toward siege jerusalem thine arm uncovered prophesy against
behold lay bands upon thee thou shalt turn one side another till hast ended days thy siege
take thou also thee wheat barley beans lentiles millet fitches put one vessel make bread thereof according number days shalt lie upon thy side three hundred ninety eat
thy meat thou shalt eat by weight twenty shekels day time
thou shalt drink also water by measure sixth part hin time
thou shalt eat barley cakes bake dung cometh out man sight
lord said even thus children israel eat defiled bread among gentiles whither drive
then said ah lord god behold soul hath been polluted youth even till now eaten dieth itself or torn pieces neither came there abominable flesh mouth
then said lo given thee cow's dung man's thou shalt prepare thy bread therewith

may want bread water astonied one another consume away iniquity

then take again cast midst fire burn thereof come forth house israel
thus saith lord god jerusalem set midst nations countries round about her
she hath changed judgments wickedness more than nations statutes countries round about her refused walked
therefore thus saith lord god because ye multiplied more than nations round about you walked statutes neither kept judgments done according
therefore thus saith lord god behold even am against thee execute judgments midst sight nations
do thee done whereunto any more like because thine abominations
therefore fathers eat sons midst thee execute judgments whole remnant scatter winds
wherefore live saith lord god surely because thou hast defiled sanctuary thy detestable things thine abominations therefore also diminish thee neither mine eye spare any pity
third part thee die pestilence famine consumed midst fall by sword round about scatter winds draw out after
thus mine anger accomplished cause fury rest upon comforted know lord spoken zeal
moreover make thee waste reproach among nations round about sight pass by

son man set thy face toward mountains israel prophesy against

spirit lord fell upon said speak thus saith ye o house israel know things come your mind every one
ye multiplied your slain city filled streets thereof
therefore thus saith lord god your slain whom ye laid midst flesh city caldron bring you forth out
ye feared sword bring upon you saith lord god

came pass prophesied pelatiah son benaiah died then fell down upon face cried loud voice said ah lord god wilt thou make full end remnant israel
again word lord came saying
son man thy brethren even men kindred house israel wholly whom inhabitants jerusalem said get you far lord us land given possession
therefore say thus saith lord god although cast far off among heathen scattered countries yet little sanctuary where come
therefore say thus saith lord god even gather you people assemble out countries where ye been scattered give land israel
come thither take away detestable things thereof abominations thence
give one heart put new spirit within you take stony out flesh
may walk statutes keep mine ordinances do people god
whose heart walketh after detestable things abominations recompense way upon own heads saith lord god
then did cherubims lift wings wheels beside glory god israel over above
glory lord went midst city stood upon mountain on east side
afterwards spirit took brought vision by god chaldea captivity so had seen went
then spake captivity things lord had shewed
word lord also came saying
son man thou dwellest midst rebellious house eyes see ears hear
therefore thou son man prepare thee stuff removing remove by day sight shalt thy place another may consider though rebellious house
then shalt thou bring forth thy stuff by day sight removing go at even captivity
dig thou through wall sight carry out thereby
sight shalt thou bear upon thy shoulders carry forth twilight cover face see ground set thee sign house israel
did so commanded brought forth stuff by day captivity even digged through wall mine hand twilight bare upon shoulder sight
morning came word lord saying
son man hath house israel rebellious said thee what doest thou
say thou thus saith lord god burden concerneth prince jerusalem house israel among
say am your sign like done so remove go captivity
prince among bear upon shoulder twilight go forth dig through wall carry out thereby cover face see ground eyes
net also spread upon taken snare bring babylon land chaldeans yet see though die there
scatter toward every wind about help bands draw out sword after
know am lord scatter among nations disperse countries
leave few men sword famine pestilence may declare abominations among heathen whither come know am lord
moreover word lord came saying
son man eat thy bread quaking drink water trembling carefulness
say people land thus saith lord god inhabitants jerusalem israel eat bread carefulness drink water astonishment her may desolate therein because violence dwell
cities inhabited laid waste land desolate ye know am lord
word lord came saying
son man what proverb ye land israel saying days prolonged every vision faileth
tell therefore thus saith lord god make proverb cease no more use israel say days at hand effect every vision
there no more any vain vision nor flattering divination within house israel
am lord speak word come pass no more prolonged your days o rebellious house say perform saith god
again word lord came saying
son man behold house israel say vision seeth many days come prophesieth times far off
therefore say thus saith lord god there none words prolonged any more word spoken done
word lord came saying
son man prophesy against prophets israel say thou out own hearts hear ye word lord
thus saith lord god woe foolish prophets follow own spirit seen nothing
o israel thy prophets like foxes deserts
ye gone gaps neither made hedge house israel stand battle day lord
seen vanity lying divination saying lord saith hath sent made others hope would confirm word
ye seen vain vision spoken lying divination whereas say lord saith albeit
therefore thus saith lord god because ye spoken vanity seen lies behold am against you
mine hand upon prophets see vanity divine lies assembly people neither written writing house israel enter land ye know am lord god
because even seduced people saying peace there no one built wall lo others daubed untempered morter
say daub untempered morter fall there overflowing shower ye o great hailstones stormy wind rend
lo wall fallen said you where daubing wherewith ye daubed
therefore thus saith lord god even rend stormy wind fury there overflowing shower mine anger great hailstones consume
so break down wall ye daubed untempered morter bring ground foundation thereof discovered fall consumed midst know am lord
thus accomplish wrath upon wall daubed untempered morter say you no more neither
wit prophets israel prophesy concerning jerusalem see visions peace her there no saith lord god
likewise thou son man set thy face against daughters people prophesy out own heart
say thus saith lord god woe women sew pillows armholes make kerchiefs upon head every stature hunt souls ye people save alive come you
ye pollute among people handfuls barley pieces bread slay souls should die save alive live by your lying hear lies
wherefore thus saith lord god behold am against your pillows wherewith ye there hunt souls make fly tear arms let go even
your kerchiefs also tear deliver people out hand no more hunted ye know am lord
because lies ye made heart righteous sad whom strengthened hands wicked should return way by promising life
therefore ye see no more vanity nor divine divinations deliver people out your hand know am lord
then came certain elders israel sat before
word lord came saying
son man these men set idols heart put stumblingblock iniquity before face should enquired at by
therefore speak say thus saith lord god every man house israel setteth idols heart putteth stumblingblock iniquity before face cometh prophet answer according multitude
may take house israel own heart because estranged through idols
therefore say house israel thus saith lord god repent turn yourselves your idols away faces abominations
every one house israel or stranger sojourneth separateth himself setteth idols heart putteth stumblingblock iniquity before face cometh prophet enquire concerning lord answer by myself
set face against man make sign proverb cut off midst people ye know am lord
if prophet deceived hath spoken thing lord stretch out hand upon destroy midst people israel
bear punishment iniquity prophet even seeketh
house israel may go no more astray neither polluted any transgressions people god saith lord
word lord came again saying
son man land sinneth against by trespassing grievously then stretch out mine hand upon break staff bread thereof send famine cut off beast
though these three men noah daniel job should deliver own souls by righteousness saith lord god
if cause noisome beasts pass through land spoil so desolate no man may because
though these three men live saith lord god deliver neither sons nor daughters only delivered land desolate
or if bring sword upon land say go through so cut off man beast
though these three men live saith lord god deliver neither sons nor daughters only delivered themselves
or if send pestilence land pour out fury upon blood cut off man beast
though noah daniel job live saith lord god deliver neither son nor daughter own souls by righteousness
thus saith lord god how much more send four sore judgments upon jerusalem sword famine noisome beast pestilence cut off man
yet behold therein left remnant brought forth both sons daughters come you ye see way doings comforted concerning evil upon jerusalem even
comfort you ye see ways doings know done without cause saith lord god
word lord came saying
son man what vine tree more than any or branch among trees forest
wood taken thereof do any work or men take pin hang vessel thereon
behold cast fire fuel devoureth both ends midst burned meet any work
behold whole meet no work how much less yet any fire hath devoured burned
therefore thus saith lord god vine tree among trees forest given fire fuel so give inhabitants jerusalem
set face against go out one fire another devour ye know am lord
make land desolate because committed trespass saith lord god
again word lord came saying
son man cause jerusalem know her abominations
say thus saith lord god jerusalem thy birth nativity land canaan father amorite mother hittite
thy nativity day thou wast born navel cut neither washed water supple thee salted at nor swaddled
none eye pitied thee do any these compassion upon thou wast cast out open field lothing thy person day born
passed by thee saw polluted thine own blood said thou wast thy live yea
caused thee multiply bud field thou hast increased waxen great art come excellent ornaments thy breasts fashioned thine hair grown whereas wast naked bare
now passed by thee looked upon behold thy time love spread skirt over covered nakedness yea sware entered covenant saith lord god thou becamest mine
then washed thee water yea throughly away thy blood anointed oil
clothed thee also broidered work shod badgers' skin girded about fine linen covered silk
decked thee also ornaments put bracelets upon thy hands chain on neck
put jewel on thy forehead earrings thine ears beautiful crown upon head
thus wast thou decked gold silver thy raiment fine linen silk broidered work didst eat flour honey oil exceeding beautiful prosper kingdom
thy renown went forth among heathen beauty perfect through comeliness had put upon thee saith lord god
thou didst trust thine own beauty playedst harlot because thy renown pouredst out fornications on every one passed by
thy garments thou didst take deckedst high places divers colours playedst harlot thereupon like things come neither so
thou hast also taken thy fair jewels gold silver had given thee madest thyself images men didst commit whoredom
tookest thy broidered garments coveredst thou hast set mine oil incense before
meat also gave thee fine flour oil honey wherewith fed thou hast even set before sweet savour thus saith lord god
moreover thou hast taken thy sons daughters whom borne these sacrificed devoured whoredoms small matter
thou hast slain children delivered cause pass through fire
thine abominations thy whoredoms thou hast remembered days youth wast naked bare polluted blood
came pass after thy wickedness woe thee saith lord god
thou hast also built thee eminent place made high every street
thou hast built thy high place at every head way made beauty abhorred opened feet one passed by multiplied whoredoms
thou hast also committed fornication egyptians thy neighbours great flesh increased whoredoms provoke anger
behold therefore stretched out hand over thee diminished thine ordinary food delivered hate daughters philistines ashamed thy lewd way
