thou hast played whore also assyrians because wast unsatiable yea harlot yet couldest satisfied
thou hast moreover multiplied thy fornication land canaan chaldea yet wast satisfied herewith
how weak thine heart saith lord god seeing thou doest these things work imperious whorish woman
thou buildest thine eminent place head every way makest high street hast been harlot scornest hire
wife committeth adultery taketh strangers instead her husband
give gifts whores thou givest thy lovers hirest may come thee on every side whoredom
contrary thee other women thy whoredoms whereas none followeth commit thou givest reward no given therefore art
wherefore o harlot hear word lord
thus saith lord god because thy filthiness poured out nakedness discovered through whoredoms lovers idols abominations by blood children thou didst give
behold therefore gather thy lovers whom thou hast taken pleasure loved hated even round about against thee discover nakedness may see
judge thee women break wedlock shed blood judged give fury jealousy
also give thee hand throw down thine eminent place break thy high places strip clothes take fair jewels leave naked bare
also bring company against thee stone stones thrust through swords
burn thine houses fire execute judgments upon thee sight many women cause cease playing harlot thou also shalt give no hire any more
so make fury toward thee rest jealousy depart quiet no more angry
because thou hast remembered days thy youth fretted these things behold therefore also recompense way upon thine head saith lord god shalt commit lewdness above abominations
behold every one useth proverbs use proverb against thee saying mother so her daughter
thou art thy mother's daughter lotheth her husband children sister sisters lothed husbands your mother hittite father amorite
thine elder sister samaria she her daughters dwell at thy left hand younger dwelleth right sodom
yet hast thou walked after ways nor done abominations if very little thing wast corrupted more than thy
live saith lord god sodom thy sister hath done she nor her daughters thou hast
behold iniquity thy sister sodom pride fulness bread abundance idleness her daughters neither did she strengthen hand poor needy
haughty committed abomination before therefore took away saw good
neither hath samaria committed half thy sins thou hast multiplied thine abominations more than justified sisters done
thou also hast judged thy sisters bear thine own shame sins committed more abominable than righteous yea confounded justified
bring again captivity sodom her daughters samaria then thy captives midst
thou mayest bear thine own shame confounded hast done art comfort
thy sisters sodom her daughters return former estate samaria then thou your
thy sister sodom mentioned by mouth day pride
before thy wickedness discovered at time reproach daughters syria round about her philistines despise thee
thou hast borne thy lewdness thine abominations saith lord
thus saith lord god even deal thee thou hast done despised oath breaking covenant
nevertheless remember covenant thee days thy youth establish everlasting
then thou shalt remember thy ways ashamed receive sisters thine elder younger give thee daughters by covenant
establish covenant thee thou shalt know am lord
thou mayest remember confounded never open thy mouth any more because shame am pacified toward thee hast done saith lord god
word lord came saying
son man put forth riddle speak parable house israel
say thus saith lord god great eagle wings longwinged full feathers had divers colours came lebanon took highest branch cedar
cropped off top young twigs carried land traffick set city merchants
took also seed land planted fruitful field placed by great waters set willow tree
grew became spreading vine low stature whose branches turned toward roots thereof under so brought forth shot sprigs
there also another great eagle wings many feathers behold vine did bend her roots toward shot forth branches might water by furrows plantation
planted good soil by great waters might bring forth branches bear fruit goodly vine
say thou thus saith lord god prosper pull roots thereof cut off fruit wither leaves her spring even without great power or many people pluck by
yea behold being planted prosper utterly wither east wind toucheth furrows where grew
moreover word lord came saying
say now rebellious house know ye what these things mean tell behold king babylon come jerusalem hath taken thereof princes led
hath taken king's seed made covenant oath also mighty land
kingdom might base lift itself by keeping covenant stand
rebelled against sending ambassadors egypt might give horses much people prosper escape doeth such things or break covenant delivered
live saith lord god surely place where king dwelleth made whose oath despised covenant brake even midst babylon die
neither pharaoh mighty army great company make war by casting mounts building forts cut off many persons
seeing despised oath by breaking covenant lo had given hand hath done these things escape
therefore thus saith lord god live surely mine oath hath despised covenant broken even recompense upon own head
spread net upon taken snare bring babylon plead there trespass hath trespassed against
fugitives bands fall by sword remain scattered toward winds ye know lord spoken
thus saith lord god also take highest branch high cedar set crop off top young twigs tender one plant upon mountain eminent
mountain height israel plant bring forth boughs bear fruit goodly cedar under dwell fowl every wing shadow branches thereof
trees field know lord brought down high tree exalted low dried green made dry flourish spoken done
word lord came again saying
what mean ye use proverb concerning land israel saying fathers eaten sour grapes children's teeth set on edge
live saith lord god ye occasion any more use proverb israel
behold souls mine soul father so also son sinneth die
if man just do lawful right
hath eaten upon mountains neither lifted eyes idols house israel defiled neighbour's wife come near menstruous woman
hath oppressed any restored debtor pledge spoiled none by violence given bread hungry covered naked garment
hath given forth upon usury neither taken any increase withdrawn hand iniquity executed true judgment between man
hath walked statutes kept judgments deal truly just surely live saith lord god
if beget son robber shedder blood doeth like any one these things
doeth any those duties even hath eaten upon mountains defiled neighbour's wife
hath oppressed poor needy spoiled by violence restored pledge lifted eyes idols committed abomination
hath given forth upon usury taken increase then live done these abominations surely die blood
now lo if beget son seeth father's sins hath done considereth doeth such like
hath eaten upon mountains neither lifted eyes idols house israel defiled neighbour's wife
neither hath oppressed any withholden pledge spoiled by violence given bread hungry covered naked garment
hath taken off hand poor received usury nor increase executed judgments walked statutes die iniquity father surely live
father because cruelly oppressed spoiled brother by violence did good among people lo even die iniquity
yet say ye why doth son bear iniquity father hath done lawful right kept statutes surely live
soul sinneth die son bear iniquity father neither righteousness righteous upon wickedness wicked
if wicked turn sins hath committed keep statutes do lawful right surely live die
transgressions hath committed mentioned righteousness done live
any pleasure at wicked should die saith lord god return ways live
righteous turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity doeth according abominations wicked man live hath done mentioned trespass trespassed sin sinned die
yet ye say way lord equal hear now o house israel your ways unequal
righteous man turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity dieth hath done die
again wicked man turneth away wickedness hath committed doeth lawful right save soul alive
because considereth turneth away transgressions hath committed surely live die
yet saith house israel way lord equal o ways your unequal
therefore judge you o house israel every one according ways saith lord god repent turn yourselves your transgressions so iniquity ruin
cast away you your transgressions whereby ye transgressed make new heart spirit why die o house israel
no pleasure death dieth saith lord god wherefore turn yourselves live ye
moreover take thou lamentation princes israel
say what thy mother lioness she lay down among lions nourished her whelps young
she brought one her whelps became young lion learned catch prey devoured men
nations also heard taken pit brought chains land egypt
now she saw had waited her hope lost then took another whelps made young lion
went down among lions became young lion learned catch prey devoured men
knew desolate palaces laid waste cities land fulness thereof by noise roaring
then nations set against on every side provinces spread net over taken pit
put ward chains brought king babylon holds voice should no more heard upon mountains israel
thy mother like vine blood planted by waters she fruitful full branches reason many
she had strong rods sceptres bare rule her stature exalted among thick branches appeared height multitude
she plucked fury cast down ground east wind dried her fruit strong rods broken withered fire consumed
now she planted wilderness dry thirsty ground
fire gone out rod her branches hath devoured fruit so she no strong sceptre rule lamentation
came pass seventh year fifth month tenth day certain elders israel enquire lord sat before
then came word lord saying
son man speak elders israel say thus saith lord god ye come enquire live enquired by you
wilt thou judge son man cause know abominations fathers
say thus saith lord god day chose israel lifted mine hand seed house jacob made myself known land egypt saying am your
day lifted mine hand bring forth land egypt had espied flowing milk honey glory lands
then said cast ye away every man abominations eyes defile yourselves idols egypt am lord your god
rebelled against would hearken did every man cast away abominations eyes neither forsake idols egypt then said pour out fury upon accomplish anger midst land
wrought name's sake should polluted before heathen among whom whose sight made myself known bringing forth out land egypt
wherefore caused go forth out land egypt brought wilderness
gave statutes shewed judgments if man do even live
moreover also gave sabbaths sign between might know am lord sanctify
house israel rebelled against wilderness walked statutes despised judgments if man do even live sabbaths greatly polluted then said would pour out fury upon consume
wrought name's sake should polluted before heathen whose sight brought out
yet also lifted hand wilderness would bring land had given flowing milk honey glory lands
because despised judgments walked statutes polluted sabbaths heart went after idols
nevertheless mine eye spared destroying neither did make end wilderness
said children wilderness walk ye statutes your fathers neither observe judgments nor defile yourselves idols
am lord your god walk statutes keep judgments do
hallow sabbaths sign between you ye may know am lord your god
notwithstanding children rebelled against walked statutes neither kept judgments do if man even live polluted sabbaths then said would pour out fury upon accomplish anger wilderness
nevertheless withdrew mine hand wrought name's sake should polluted sight heathen whose brought forth
lifted mine hand also wilderness would scatter among heathen disperse through countries
because had executed judgments despised statutes polluted sabbaths eyes after fathers' idols
wherefore gave also statutes good judgments whereby should live
polluted own gifts caused pass through fire openeth womb might make desolate end know am lord
therefore son man speak house israel say thus saith lord god yet your fathers blasphemed committed trespass against
had brought land lifted mine hand give then saw every high hill thick trees offered there sacrifices presented provocation offering also made sweet savour poured out drink offerings
then said what high place whereunto ye go name thereof called bamah day
wherefore say house israel thus saith lord god ye polluted after manner your fathers commit whoredom abominations
ye offer your gifts make sons pass through fire pollute yourselves idols even day enquired by you o house israel live saith lord god
cometh your mind at ye say we heathen families countries serve wood stone
live saith lord god surely mighty hand stretched out arm fury poured rule over you
bring you out people gather countries wherein ye scattered mighty hand stretched arm fury poured
bring you wilderness people there plead face
like pleaded your fathers wilderness land egypt so plead you saith lord god
cause you pass under rod bring bond covenant
purge out among you rebels transgress against bring forth country where sojourn enter land israel ye know am lord
you o house israel thus saith lord god go ye serve every one idols hereafter also if hearken pollute holy name no more your gifts
mine holy mountain height israel saith lord god there house land serve accept require your offerings firstfruits oblations things
accept you your sweet savour bring out people gather countries wherein ye been scattered sanctified before heathen
ye know am lord bring you land israel country lifted mine hand give your fathers
there ye remember your ways doings wherein been defiled lothe yourselves own sight evils committed
ye know am lord wrought you name's sake according your wicked ways nor corrupt doings o house israel saith god
moreover word lord came saying
son man set thy face toward south drop word prophesy against forest field
say forest south hear word lord thus saith god behold kindle fire thee devour every green tree dry flaming flame quenched faces north burned therein
flesh see lord kindled quenched
then said ah lord god say doth speak parables
word lord came saying
son man set thy face toward jerusalem drop word holy places prophesy against land israel
say land israel thus saith lord behold am against thee draw forth sword out sheath cut off righteous wicked
seeing then cut off thee righteous wicked therefore sword go forth out sheath against flesh south north
flesh may know lord drawn forth sword out sheath return any more
sigh therefore thou son man breaking thy loins bitterness before eyes
say thee wherefore sighest thou shalt answer tidings because cometh every heart melt hands feeble spirit faint knees weak water behold brought pass saith lord god
again word lord came saying
son man prophesy say thus saith lord sword sharpened also furbished
sharpened make sore slaughter furbished may glitter should we then mirth contemneth rod son every tree
hath given furbished may handled sword sharpened give hand slayer
cry howl son man upon people princes israel terrors by reason sword smite therefore thy thigh
because trial what if sword contemn even rod no more saith lord god
thou therefore son man prophesy smite thine hands together let sword doubled third time slain great men entereth privy chambers
set point sword against gates heart may faint ruins multiplied ah made bright wrapped slaughter
go thee one way or other either on right hand left whithersoever thy face set
also smite mine hands together cause fury rest lord said
word lord came again saying
also thou son man appoint thee two ways sword king babylon may come both twain forth out one land choose place at head way city
appoint way sword may come rabbath ammonites judah jerusalem defenced
king babylon stood at parting way head two ways use divination made arrows bright consulted images looked liver
at right hand divination jerusalem appoint captains open mouth slaughter lift voice shouting battering rams against gates cast mount build fort
false divination sight sworn oaths call remembrance iniquity may taken
therefore thus saith lord god because ye made your iniquity remembered transgressions discovered so doings sins do appear say come remembrance taken hand
thou profane wicked prince israel whose day come iniquity end
thus saith lord god remove diadem take off crown same exalt low abase high
overturn no more until come whose right give
thou son man prophesy say thus saith lord god concerning ammonites reproach even sword drawn slaughter furbished consume because glittering
whiles see vanity thee divine lie bring upon necks slain wicked whose day come iniquity end
cause return sheath judge thee place where thou wast created land thy nativity
pour out mine indignation upon thee blow against fire wrath deliver hand brutish men skilful destroy
thou shalt fuel fire thy blood midst land no more remembered lord spoken
moreover word lord came saying
now thou son man wilt judge bloody city yea shalt shew her abominations
then say thou thus saith lord god city sheddeth blood midst her time may come maketh idols against herself defile
thou art become guilty thy blood hast shed defiled thyself thine idols made caused days draw near come even years therefore thee reproach heathen mocking countries
those near far thee mock art infamous much vexed
behold princes israel every one thee power shed blood
thee set light by father mother midst dealt oppression stranger vexed fatherless widow
thou hast despised mine holy things profaned sabbaths
thee men carry tales shed blood eat upon mountains midst commit lewdness
thee discovered fathers' nakedness humbled her set apart pollution
one hath committed abomination neighbour's wife another lewdly defiled daughter law thee humbled sister father's
thee taken gifts shed blood thou hast usury increase greedily gained thy neighbours by extortion forgotten saith lord god
behold therefore smitten mine hand at thy dishonest gain thou hast made blood hath been midst thee
can thine heart endure or hands strong days deal thee lord spoken do
scatter thee among heathen disperse countries consume thy filthiness out
thou shalt take thine inheritance thyself sight heathen know am lord
word lord came saying
son man house israel become dross brass tin iron lead midst furnace even silver
therefore thus saith lord god because ye become dross behold gather you midst jerusalem
gather silver brass iron lead tin midst furnace blow fire upon melt so you mine anger fury leave there
yea gather you blow upon fire wrath ye melted midst thereof
silver melted midst furnace so ye thereof know lord poured out fury upon you
word lord came saying
son man say her thou art land cleansed nor rained upon day indignation
there conspiracy her prophets midst thereof like roaring lion ravening prey devoured souls taken treasure precious things made many widows
her priests violated law profaned mine holy things put no difference between profane neither shewed unclean clean hid eyes sabbaths am among
her princes midst thereof like wolves ravening prey shed blood destroy souls get dishonest gain
her prophets daubed untempered morter seeing vanity divining lies saying thus saith lord god hath spoken
people land used oppression exercised robbery vexed poor needy yea oppressed stranger wrongfully
sought man among should make hedge stand gap before land destroy found none
therefore poured out mine indignation upon consumed fire wrath own way recompensed heads saith lord god
word lord came again saying
son man there two women daughters one mother
committed whoredoms egypt youth there breasts pressed bruised teats virginity
names aholah elder aholibah her sister mine bare sons daughters thus samaria jerusalem
aholah played harlot she mine doted on her lovers assyrians neighbours
clothed blue captains rulers desirable young men horsemen riding upon horses
thus she committed her whoredoms chosen men assyria on whom doted idols defiled herself
neither left she her whoredoms brought egypt youth lay bruised breasts virginity poured whoredom upon
wherefore delivered her hand lovers assyrians upon whom she doted
these discovered her nakedness took sons daughters slew sword she became famous among women had executed judgment upon
her sister aholibah saw she more corrupt inordinate love than whoredoms
she doted upon assyrians her neighbours captains rulers clothed most gorgeously horsemen riding horses desirable young men
then saw she defiled took both one way
she increased her whoredoms saw men pourtrayed upon wall images chaldeans vermilion
girded girdles upon loins exceeding dyed attire heads princes look after manner babylonians chaldea land nativity
soon she saw her eyes doted upon sent messengers chaldea
babylonians came her bed love defiled whoredom she polluted mind alienated
so she discovered her whoredoms nakedness then mind alienated like sister
yet she multiplied her whoredoms calling remembrance days youth wherein had played harlot land egypt
she doted upon paramours whose flesh asses issue like horses
thus thou calledst remembrance lewdness thy youth bruising teats by egyptians paps
therefore o aholibah thus saith lord god behold raise thy lovers against thee whom mind alienated bring on every side
babylonians chaldeans pekod shoa koa assyrians desirable young men captains rulers great lords renowned riding upon horses
come against thee chariots wagons wheels assembly people set buckler shield helmet round about judgment before judge according judgments
set jealousy against thee deal furiously take away thy nose thine ears remnant fall by sword sons daughters residue devoured fire
also strip thee out thy clothes take away fair jewels
thus make thy lewdness cease thee whoredom brought land egypt so thou shalt lift thine eyes nor remember any more
thus saith lord god behold deliver thee hand whom thou hatest thy mind alienated
deal thee hatefully take away thy labour leave naked bare nakedness whoredoms discovered both lewdness
do these things thee because thou hast gone whoring after heathen art polluted idols
thou hast walked way thy sister therefore give her cup thine hand
thus saith lord god thou shalt drink thy sister's cup deep large laughed scorn had derision containeth much
thou shalt filled drunkenness sorrow cup astonishment desolation thy sister samaria
thou shalt even drink suck out break sherds thereof pluck off thine own breasts spoken saith lord god
therefore thus saith lord god because thou hast forgotten cast behind thy back bear also lewdness whoredoms
lord said moreover son man wilt thou judge aholah aholibah yea declare abominations
committed adultery blood hands idols also caused sons whom bare pass through fire devour
moreover done defiled sanctuary same day profaned sabbaths
had slain children idols then came same day sanctuary profane lo thus done midst mine house
furthermore ye sent men come far whom messenger lo came thou didst wash thyself paintedst thy eyes deckedst ornaments
satest upon stately bed table prepared before whereupon thou hast set mine incense oil
voice multitude being at ease her men common sort brought sabeans wilderness put bracelets upon hands beautiful crowns heads
then said her old adulteries now commit whoredoms she
yet went her go woman playeth harlot so aholah aholibah lewd women
righteous men judge after manner adulteresses women shed blood because hands
thus saith lord god bring company upon give removed spoiled
company stone stones dispatch swords slay sons daughters burn houses fire
thus cause lewdness cease out land women may taught do after your
recompense your lewdness upon you ye bear sins idols know am lord god
again ninth year tenth month day word lord came saying
son man write thee name day even same king babylon set himself against jerusalem
utter parable rebellious house say thus saith lord god set on pot also pour water
gather pieces thereof even every good piece thigh shoulder fill choice bones
take choice flock burn also bones under make boil well let seethe therein
wherefore thus saith lord god woe bloody city pot whose scum therein gone out bring piece by let no lot fall upon
her blood midst she set upon top rock poured ground cover dust
might cause fury come take vengeance set her blood upon top rock should covered
therefore thus saith lord god woe bloody city even make pile fire great
heap on wood kindle fire consume flesh spice well let bones burned
then set empty upon coals thereof brass may hot burn filthiness molten scum consumed
she hath wearied herself lies her great scum went forth out fire
thy filthiness lewdness because purged thee thou wast shalt any more till caused fury rest upon
lord spoken come pass do go back neither spare repent according thy ways doings judge thee saith god
also word lord came saying
son man behold take away thee desire thine eyes stroke yet neither shalt thou mourn nor weep thy tears run down
forbear cry make no mourning dead bind tire thine head upon thee put on thy shoes feet cover lips eat bread men
so spake people morning at even wife died did commanded
people said wilt thou tell us what these things doest so
then answered word lord came saying
speak house israel thus saith lord god behold profane sanctuary excellency your strength desire eyes soul pitieth sons daughters whom ye left fall by sword
ye do done cover your lips nor eat bread men
your tires upon heads shoes feet ye mourn nor weep pine away iniquities one toward another
thus ezekiel you sign according hath done ye do cometh know am lord god
also thou son man day take strength joy glory desire eyes whereupon set minds sons daughters
escapeth day come thee cause hear thine ears
day thy mouth opened escaped thou shalt speak no more dumb sign know am lord
word lord came again saying
son man set thy face against ammonites prophesy
say ammonites hear word lord god thus saith because thou saidst aha against sanctuary profaned land israel desolate house judah went captivity
behold therefore deliver thee men east possession set palaces make dwellings eat thy fruit drink milk
make rabbah stable camels ammonites couchingplace flocks ye know am lord
thus saith lord god because thou hast clapped thine hands stamped feet rejoiced heart thy despite against land israel
behold therefore stretch out mine hand upon thee deliver spoil heathen cut off people cause perish countries destroy thou shalt know am lord
thus saith lord god because moab seir do say behold house judah like heathen
therefore behold open side moab cities on frontiers glory country bethjeshimoth baalmeon kiriathaim
men east ammonites give possession may remembered among nations
execute judgments upon moab know am lord
thus saith lord god because edom hath dealt against house judah by taking vengeance greatly offended revenged himself upon
therefore thus saith lord god also stretch out mine hand upon edom cut off man beast make desolate teman dedan fall by sword
lay vengeance upon edom by hand people israel do according mine anger fury know saith lord god
thus saith lord god because philistines dealt by revenge taken vengeance despiteful heart destroy old hatred
therefore thus saith lord god behold stretch out mine hand upon philistines cut off cherethims destroy remnant sea coast
execute great vengeance upon furious rebukes know am lord lay
came pass eleventh year first day month word lord saying
son man because tyrus hath said against jerusalem aha she broken gates people turned replenished now laid waste
therefore thus saith lord god behold am against thee o tyrus cause many nations come sea causeth waves
destroy walls tyrus break down her towers also scrape dust make like top rock
place spreading nets midst sea spoken saith lord god become spoil nations
her daughters field slain by sword know am lord
thus saith lord god behold bring upon tyrus nebuchadrezzar king babylon kings north horses chariots horsemen companies much people
slay sword thy daughters field make fort against thee cast mount lift buckler
set engines war against thy walls axes break down towers
by reason abundance horses dust cover thee thy walls shake at noise horsemen wheels chariots enter gates men city wherein made breach
hoofs horses tread down thy streets slay people by sword strong garrisons go ground
make spoil thy riches prey merchandise break down walls destroy pleasant houses lay stones timber dust midst water
cause noise thy songs cease sound harps no more heard
make thee like top rock thou shalt place spread nets upon built no more lord spoken saith god
thus saith lord god tyrus isles shake at sound thy fall wounded cry slaughter made midst thee
then princes sea come down thrones lay away robes put off broidered garments clothe themselves trembling sit upon ground tremble at every moment astonished thee
take lamentation thee say how art thou destroyed wast inhabited seafaring men renowned city strong sea she her inhabitants cause terror on haunt
now isles tremble day thy fall yea sea troubled at departure
thus saith lord god make thee desolate city like cities inhabited bring deep upon great waters cover
bring thee down descend pit people old time set low parts earth places desolate go thou inhabited glory land living
make thee terror thou shalt no more though sought yet never found again saith lord god
word lord came again saying
now thou son man take lamentation tyrus
say tyrus o thou art situate at entry sea merchant people many isles thus saith lord god hast said am perfect beauty
thy borders midst seas builders perfected beauty
made thy ship boards fir trees senir taken cedars lebanon make masts thee
oaks bashan made thine oars company ashurites thy benches ivory brought out isles chittim
fine linen broidered work egypt thou spreadest forth thy sail blue purple isles elishah covered thee
inhabitants zidon arvad thy mariners wise men o tyrus thee pilots
ancients gebal wise men thereof thee thy calkers ships sea mariners occupy merchandise
persia lud phut thine army thy men war hanged shield helmet thee set forth comeliness
men arvad thine army upon thy walls round about gammadims towers hanged shields made beauty perfect
tarshish thy merchant by reason multitude kind riches silver iron tin lead traded fairs
javan tubal meshech thy merchants traded persons men vessels brass market
house togarmah traded thy fairs horses horsemen mules
men dedan thy merchants many isles merchandise thine hand brought thee present horns ivory ebony
syria thy merchant by reason multitude wares making occupied fairs emeralds purple broidered work fine linen coral agate
judah land israel thy merchants traded market wheat minnith pannag honey oil balm
damascus thy merchant multitude wares making riches wine helbon white wool
dan also javan going fro occupied thy fairs bright iron cassia calamus market
dedan thy merchant precious clothes chariots
arabia princes kedar occupied thee lambs rams goats these thy merchants
merchants sheba raamah thy occupied fairs chief spices precious stones gold
haran canneh eden merchants sheba asshur chilmad thy
these thy merchants sorts things blue clothes broidered work chests rich apparel bound cords made cedar among merchandise
ships tarshish did sing thee thy market thou wast replenished made very glorious midst seas
thy rowers brought thee great waters east wind hath broken midst seas
thy riches fairs merchandise mariners pilots calkers occupiers men war thee company midst fall seas day ruin
suburbs shake at sound cry thy pilots
handle oar mariners pilots sea come down ships stand upon land
cause voice heard against thee cry bitterly cast dust upon heads wallow themselves ashes
make themselves utterly bald thee gird sackcloth weep bitterness heart bitter wailing
wailing take lamentation thee lament over saying what city like tyrus destroyed midst sea
thy wares went forth out seas thou filledst many people didst enrich kings earth multitude riches merchandise
time thou shalt broken by seas depths waters thy merchandise company midst thee fall
inhabitants isles astonished at thee kings sore afraid troubled countenance
merchants among people hiss at thee thou shalt terror never any more
word lord came again saying
son man say prince tyrus thus saith lord god because thine heart lifted thou hast said am sit seat midst seas yet art though set
behold thou art wiser than daniel there no secret can hide thee
thy wisdom thine understanding thou hast gotten thee riches gold silver treasures
by thy great wisdom traffick hast thou increased riches thine heart lifted because
therefore thus saith lord god because thou hast set thine heart
behold therefore bring strangers upon thee terrible nations draw swords against beauty thy wisdom defile brightness
bring thee down pit thou shalt die deaths slain midst seas
wilt thou yet say before slayeth thee am god shalt man no hand
thou shalt die deaths uncircumcised by hand strangers spoken saith lord god
moreover word lord came saying
son man take lamentation upon king tyrus say thus saith lord god thou sealest sum full wisdom perfect beauty
thou hast been eden garden god every precious stone thy covering sardius topaz diamond beryl onyx jasper sapphire emerald carbuncle gold workmanship tabrets pipes prepared thee day wast created
thou art anointed cherub covereth set thee so wast upon holy mountain god hast walked down midst stones fire
thou wast perfect thy ways day created till iniquity found thee
by multitude thy merchandise filled midst thee violence thou hast sinned therefore cast profane out mountain god destroy o covering cherub stones fire
thine heart lifted because thy beauty thou hast corrupted wisdom by reason brightness cast thee ground lay before kings may behold
thou hast defiled thy sanctuaries by multitude thine iniquities iniquity traffick therefore bring forth fire midst thee devour ashes upon earth sight behold
know thee among people astonished at thou shalt terror never any more
again word lord came saying
son man set thy face against zidon prophesy
say thus saith lord god behold am against thee o zidon glorified midst know executed judgments her sanctified
send her pestilence blood streets wounded judged midst by sword upon on every side know am lord
there no more pricking brier house israel nor any grieving thorn round about despised know am lord god
thus saith lord god gathered house israel people among whom scattered sanctified sight heathen then dwell land given servant jacob
dwell safely therein build houses plant vineyards yea confidence executed judgments upon those despise round about know am lord god
tenth year month twelfth day word lord came saying
son man set thy face against pharaoh king egypt prophesy
speak say thus saith lord god behold am against thee pharaoh king egypt great dragon lieth midst rivers hath said river mine own made myself
put hooks thy jaws cause fish rivers stick scales bring thee out midst
leave thee thrown wilderness fish thy rivers thou shalt fall upon open fields brought together nor gathered given meat beasts field fowls heaven
inhabitants egypt know am lord because been staff reed house israel
took hold thee by thy hand thou didst break rend shoulder leaned upon brakest madest loins at stand
therefore thus saith lord god behold bring sword upon thee cut off man beast out
land egypt desolate waste know am lord because hath said river mine made
behold therefore am against thee thy rivers make land egypt utterly waste desolate tower syene even border ethiopia
no foot man pass through nor beast neither inhabited forty years
make land egypt desolate midst countries her cities among laid waste forty years scatter egyptians nations disperse through
yet thus saith lord god at end forty years gather egyptians people whither scattered
bring again captivity egypt cause return land pathros habitation there base kingdom
basest kingdoms neither exalt itself any more above nations diminish no rule over
no more confidence house israel bringeth iniquity remembrance look after know am lord god
came pass seven twentieth year first month day word lord saying
son man nebuchadrezzar king babylon caused army serve great service against tyrus every head made bald shoulder peeled yet had no wages nor served
therefore thus saith lord god behold give land egypt nebuchadrezzar king babylon take her multitude spoil prey wages army
given land egypt labour wherewith served against because wrought saith lord god
day cause horn house israel bud forth give thee opening mouth midst know am lord
word lord came again saying
son man prophesy say thus saith lord god howl ye woe worth day
day near even lord cloudy time heathen
sword come upon egypt great pain ethiopia slain fall take away her multitude foundations broken down
ethiopia libya lydia mingled people chub men land league fall by sword
thus saith lord also uphold egypt fall pride her power come down tower syene by sword god
desolate midst countries her cities wasted
know am lord set fire egypt her helpers destroyed
day messengers go forth ships make careless ethiopians afraid great pain come upon egypt lo cometh
thus saith lord god also make multitude egypt cease by hand nebuchadrezzar king babylon
people terrible nations brought destroy land draw swords against egypt fill slain
make rivers dry sell land hand wicked waste therein by strangers lord spoken
thus saith lord god also destroy idols cause images cease out noph there no more prince land egypt put fear
make pathros desolate set fire zoan execute judgments no
pour fury upon sin strength egypt cut off multitude no
set fire egypt sin great pain no rent asunder noph distresses daily
young men aven pibeseth fall by sword these cities go captivity
at tehaphnehes also day darkened break there yokes egypt pomp her strength cease cloud cover daughters go captivity
thus execute judgments egypt know am lord
came pass eleventh year first month seventh day word lord saying
son man broken arm pharaoh king egypt lo bound healed put roller bind make strong hold sword
therefore thus saith lord god behold am against pharaoh king egypt break arms strong broken cause sword fall out hand
scatter egyptians among nations disperse through countries
strengthen arms king babylon put sword hand break pharaoh's groan before groanings deadly wounded man
strengthen arms king babylon pharaoh fall down know am lord put sword hand stretch out upon land egypt
scatter egyptians among nations disperse countries know am lord
came pass eleventh year third month first day word lord saying
son man speak pharaoh king egypt multitude whom art thou like thy greatness
behold assyrian cedar lebanon fair branches shadowing shroud high stature top among thick boughs
waters made great deep set on high her rivers running round about plants sent out little trees field
therefore height exalted above trees field boughs multiplied branches became long because multitude waters shot forth
fowls heaven made nests boughs under branches did beasts field bring forth young shadow dwelt great nations
thus fair greatness length branches root by great waters
cedars garden god could hide fir trees like boughs chesnut branches nor any tree beauty
made fair by multitude branches so trees eden garden god envied
therefore thus saith lord god because thou hast lifted thyself height hath shot top among thick boughs heart
therefore delivered hand mighty one heathen surely deal driven out wickedness
strangers terrible nations cut off left upon mountains valleys branches fallen boughs broken by rivers land people earth gone down shadow
upon ruin fowls heaven remain beasts field branches
end none trees by waters exalt themselves height neither shoot top among thick boughs stand drink water delivered death nether parts earth midst children men go down pit
thus saith lord god day went down grave caused mourning covered deep restrained floods thereof great waters stayed lebanon mourn trees field fainted
made nations shake at sound fall cast down hell descend pit trees eden choice best lebanon drink water comforted nether parts earth
also went down hell slain sword arm dwelt under shadow midst heathen
whom art thou thus like glory greatness among trees eden yet shalt brought down nether parts earth lie midst uncircumcised slain by sword pharaoh multitude saith lord god
came pass twelfth year month first day word lord saying
son man take lamentation pharaoh king egypt say thou art like young lion nations whale seas camest forth thy rivers troubledst waters feet fouledst
thus saith lord god therefore spread out net over thee company many people bring
then leave thee upon land cast forth open field cause fowls heaven remain fill beasts whole earth
lay thy flesh upon mountains fill valleys height
also water thy blood land wherein thou swimmest even mountains rivers full thee
put thee out cover heaven make stars thereof dark sun cloud moon give her light
bright lights heaven make dark over thee set darkness upon thy land saith lord god
also vex hearts many people bring thy destruction among nations countries thou hast known
yea make many people amazed at thee kings horribly afraid brandish sword before tremble every moment man own life day thy fall
thus saith lord god sword king babylon come upon thee
by swords mighty cause thy multitude fall terrible nations spoil pomp egypt thereof destroyed
destroy also beasts thereof beside great waters neither foot man trouble any more nor hoofs
then make waters deep cause rivers run like oil saith lord god
make land egypt desolate country destitute whereof full smite dwell therein then know am lord
lamentation wherewith lament her daughters nations even egypt multitude saith lord god
came pass also twelfth year fifteenth day month word lord saying
son man wail multitude egypt cast down even her daughters famous nations nether parts earth go pit
whom dost thou pass beauty go down laid uncircumcised
fall midst slain by sword she delivered draw her multitudes
strong among mighty speak out midst hell help gone down lie uncircumcised slain by sword
asshur there her company graves about slain fallen by sword
whose graves set sides pit her company round about grave slain fallen by sword caused terror land living
there elam her multitude round about grave slain fallen by sword gone down uncircumcised nether parts earth caused terror land living yet borne shame go pit
set her bed midst slain multitude graves round about uncircumcised by sword though terror caused land living yet borne shame go down pit put
there meshech tubal her multitude graves round about uncircumcised slain by sword though caused terror land living
lie mighty fallen uncircumcised gone down hell weapons war laid swords under heads iniquities upon bones though terror land living
yea thou shalt broken midst uncircumcised lie slain sword
there edom her kings princes might laid by slain sword lie uncircumcised go down pit
there princes north zidonians gone down slain terror ashamed might lie uncircumcised by sword bear shame go pit
pharaoh see comforted over multitude even army slain by sword saith lord god
caused terror land living laid midst uncircumcised slain sword even pharaoh multitude saith lord god
again word lord came saying
son man speak children thy people say bring sword upon land if take coasts set watchman
if seeth sword come upon land blow trumpet warn people
then whosoever heareth sound trumpet taketh warning if sword come take away blood upon own head
heard sound trumpet took warning blood upon taketh deliver soul
if watchman see sword come blow trumpet people warned take any person among taken away iniquity blood require at watchman's hand
so thou o son man set thee watchman house israel therefore shalt hear word at mouth warn
say wicked o man thou shalt surely die if dost speak warn way iniquity blood require at thine hand
nevertheless if thou warn wicked way turn do die iniquity hast delivered thy soul
therefore o thou son man speak house israel thus ye saying if our transgressions sins upon us we pine away how should then live
say live saith lord god no pleasure death wicked turn way ye your evil ways why die o house israel
therefore thou son man say children thy people righteousness righteous deliver day transgression wickedness wicked fall thereby turneth neither able live sinneth
say righteous surely live if trust own righteousness commit iniquity righteousnesses remembered hath committed die
again say wicked thou shalt surely die if turn sin do lawful right
if wicked restore pledge give again had robbed walk statutes life without committing iniquity surely live die
none sins hath committed mentioned done lawful right surely live
yet children thy people say way lord equal
righteous turneth righteousness committeth iniquity even die thereby
if wicked turn wickedness do lawful right live thereby
yet ye say way lord equal o house israel judge you every one after ways
came pass twelfth year our captivity tenth month fifth day one had escaped out jerusalem saying city smitten
now hand lord upon evening afore escaped came had opened mouth until morning no more dumb
then word lord came saying
son man inhabit those wastes land israel speak saying abraham one inherited we many given us inheritance
wherefore say thus saith lord god ye eat blood lift your eyes toward idols shed possess land
ye stand upon your sword work abomination defile every one neighbour's wife possess land
say thou thus saith lord god live surely wastes fall by sword open field give beasts devoured forts caves die pestilence
lay land most desolate pomp her strength cease mountains israel none pass through
then know am lord laid land most desolate because abominations committed
also thou son man children thy people still talking against thee by walls doors houses speak one another every brother saying come pray you hear what word cometh forth lord
come thee people cometh sit before hear thy words do mouth shew much love heart goeth after covetousness
lo thou art very lovely song one hath pleasant voice can play well on instrument hear thy words do
cometh pass lo come then know prophet hath been among
word lord came saying
son man prophesy against shepherds israel say thus saith lord god woe do feed themselves should flocks
ye eat fat clothe you wool kill fed feed flock
diseased ye strengthened neither healed sick bound broken brought again driven away sought lost force cruelty ruled
scattered because there no shepherd became meat beasts field
sheep wandered through mountains upon every high hill yea flock scattered face earth none did search or seek after
therefore ye shepherds hear word lord
live saith lord god surely because flock became prey meat every beast field there no shepherd neither did shepherds search fed themselves
therefore o ye shepherds hear word lord
thus saith lord god behold am against shepherds require flock at hand cause cease feeding neither feed themselves any more deliver mouth may meat
thus saith lord god behold even both search sheep seek out
shepherd seeketh out flock day among sheep scattered so seek deliver places where been cloudy dark
bring out people gather countries own land feed upon mountains israel by rivers inhabited places country
feed good pasture upon high mountains israel fold there lie fat
feed flock cause lie down saith lord god
seek lost bring again driven away bind broken strengthen sick destroy fat strong feed judgment
you o flock thus saith lord god behold judge between cattle rams goats
seemeth small thing you eaten good pasture ye must tread down your feet residue pastures drunk deep waters foul
flock eat ye trodden your feet drink fouled
therefore thus saith lord god behold even judge between fat cattle lean
because ye thrust side shoulder pushed diseased your horns till scattered abroad
therefore save flock no more prey judge between cattle
set one shepherd over feed even servant david
lord god servant david prince among spoken
make covenant peace cause evil beasts cease out land dwell safely wilderness sleep woods
make places round about hill blessing cause shower come down season there showers
tree field yield her fruit earth increase safe land know am lord broken bands yoke delivered out hand those served themselves
no more prey heathen neither beast land devour dwell safely none make afraid
raise plant renown no more consumed hunger land neither bear shame heathen any
thus know lord god am even house israel people saith
ye flock pasture men am your god saith lord
moreover word lord came saying
son man set thy face against mount seir prophesy
say thus saith lord god behold o mount seir am against thee stretch out mine hand make most desolate
lay thy cities waste thou shalt desolate know am lord
because thou hast had perpetual hatred shed blood children israel by force sword time calamity iniquity end
therefore live saith lord god prepare thee blood pursue sith thou hast hated even
thus make mount seir most desolate cut off passeth out returneth
fill mountains slain men thy hills valleys rivers fall sword
make thee perpetual desolations thy cities return ye know am lord
because thou hast said these two nations countries mine we possess whereas lord there
therefore live saith lord god even do according thine anger envy thou hast used out thy hatred against make myself known among judged thee
thou shalt know am lord heard thy blasphemies hast spoken against mountains israel saying laid desolate given us consume
thus your mouth ye boasted against multiplied words heard
thus saith lord god whole earth rejoiceth make thee desolate
thou didst rejoice at inheritance house israel because desolate so do thee shalt o mount seir idumea even know am lord
also thou son man prophesy mountains israel say ye hear word lord
thus saith lord god because enemy hath said against you aha even ancient high places our's possession
therefore prophesy say thus saith lord god because made you desolate swallowed on every side ye might possession residue heathen taken lips talkers infamy people
therefore ye mountains israel hear word lord god thus saith hills rivers valleys desolate wastes cities forsaken became prey derision residue heathen round about
therefore thus saith lord god surely fire jealousy spoken against residue heathen idumea appointed land possession joy heart despiteful minds cast out prey
prophesy therefore concerning land israel say mountains hills rivers valleys thus saith lord god behold spoken jealousy fury because ye borne shame heathen
therefore thus saith lord god lifted mine hand surely heathen about you bear shame
ye o mountains israel shoot forth your branches yield fruit people at hand come
behold am you turn ye tilled sown
multiply men upon you house israel even cities inhabited wastes builded
multiply upon you man beast increase bring fruit settle after your old estates do better than at beginnings ye know am lord
yea cause men walk upon you even people israel possess thee thou shalt inheritance no more henceforth bereave
thus saith lord god because say you thou land devourest men hast bereaved thy nations
therefore thou shalt devour men no more neither bereave thy nations any saith lord god
neither cause men hear thee shame heathen any more shalt thou bear reproach people thy nations fall saith lord god
moreover word lord came saying
son man house israel dwelt own land defiled by way doings before uncleanness removed woman
wherefore poured fury upon blood had shed land idols wherewith polluted
scattered among heathen dispersed through countries according way doings judged
entered heathen whither went profaned holy name said these people lord gone forth out land
had pity mine holy name house israel profaned among heathen whither went
therefore say house israel thus saith lord god do your sakes o mine holy name's sake ye profaned among heathen whither went
sanctify great name profaned among heathen ye midst know am lord saith god sanctified you before eyes
take you among heathen gather out countries bring your own land
then sprinkle clean water upon you ye your filthiness idols cleanse
new heart also give you spirit put within take away stony out your flesh
put spirit within you cause walk statutes ye keep judgments do
ye dwell land gave your fathers people god
also save you your uncleannesses call corn increase lay no famine upon
multiply fruit tree increase field ye receive no more reproach famine among heathen
then ye remember your own evil ways doings good lothe yourselves sight iniquities abominations
your sakes do saith lord god known you ashamed confounded own ways o house israel
thus saith lord god day cleansed you your iniquities also cause dwell cities wastes builded
desolate land tilled whereas lay sight passed by
say land desolate become like garden eden waste ruined cities fenced inhabited
then heathen left round about you know lord build ruined places plant desolate spoken do
thus saith lord god yet enquired by house israel do increase men like flock
holy flock jerusalem her solemn feasts so waste cities filled flocks men know am lord
hand lord upon carried out spirit set down midst valley full bones
caused pass by round about behold there very many open valley lo dry
said son man can these bones live answered o lord god thou knowest
again said prophesy upon these bones say o ye dry hear word lord
thus saith lord god these bones behold cause breath enter you ye live
lay sinews upon you bring flesh cover skin put breath ye live know am lord
so prophesied commanded there noise behold shaking bones came together bone
beheld lo sinews flesh came upon skin covered above there no breath
then said prophesy wind son man say thus saith lord god come four winds o breath breathe upon these slain may live
so prophesied commanded breath came lived stood upon feet exceeding great army
then said son man these bones whole house israel behold say our dried hope lost we cut off parts
therefore prophesy say thus saith lord god behold o people open your graves cause you come out bring land israel
ye know am lord opened your graves o people brought you out
put spirit you ye live place your own land then know lord spoken performed saith
word lord came again saying
moreover thou son man take thee one stick write upon judah children israel companions then another joseph ephraim house
join one another stick become thine hand
children thy people speak thee saying wilt thou shew us what meanest by these
say thus saith lord god behold take stick joseph hand ephraim tribes israel fellows put even judah make one mine
sticks whereon thou writest thine hand before eyes
say thus saith lord god behold take children israel among heathen whither gone gather on every side bring own land
make one nation land upon mountains israel king no more two nations neither divided kingdoms any at
neither defile themselves any more idols nor detestable things transgressions save out dwellingplaces wherein sinned cleanse so people god
david servant king over one shepherd also walk judgments observe statutes do
dwell land given jacob servant wherein your fathers dwelt therein even children children's ever david prince
moreover make covenant peace everlasting place multiply set sanctuary midst evermore
tabernacle also yea god people
heathen know lord do sanctify israel sanctuary midst evermore
word lord came saying
son man set thy face against gog land magog chief prince meshech tubal prophesy
say thus saith lord god behold am against thee o gog chief prince meshech tubal
turn thee back put hooks thy jaws bring forth thine army horses horsemen clothed sorts armour even great company bucklers shields handling swords
persia ethiopia libya shield helmet
gomer bands house togarmah north quarters many people thee
thou prepared prepare thyself thy company assembled thee guard
after many days thou shalt visited latter years come land brought back sword gathered out people against mountains israel been always waste forth nations dwell safely
thou shalt ascend come like storm cloud cover land thy bands many people thee
thus saith lord god also come pass at same time things thy mind thou shalt think evil thought
thou shalt say go land unwalled villages at rest dwell safely dwelling without walls having neither bars nor gates
take spoil prey turn thine hand upon desolate places now inhabited people gathered out nations gotten cattle goods dwell midst land
sheba dedan merchants tarshish young lions thereof say thee art thou come take spoil hast gathered thy company prey carry away silver gold cattle goods great
therefore son man prophesy say gog thus saith lord god day people israel dwelleth safely shalt thou know
thou shalt come thy place out north parts many people thee riding upon horses great company mighty army
thou shalt come against people israel cloud cover land latter days bring thee heathen may know sanctified o gog before eyes
thus saith lord god art thou whom spoken old time by servants prophets israel prophesied those days many years would bring thee against
come pass at same time gog against land israel saith lord god fury face
jealousy fire wrath spoken surely day there great shaking land israel
so fishes sea fowls heaven beasts field creeping things creep upon earth men face shake at presence mountains thrown down steep places fall every wall ground
call sword against throughout mountains saith lord god every man's brother
plead against pestilence blood rain upon bands many people overflowing great hailstones fire brimstone
thus magnify myself sanctify known eyes many nations know am lord
therefore thou son man prophesy against gog say thus saith lord god behold am thee o chief prince meshech tubal
turn thee back leave sixth part cause come north parts bring upon mountains israel
smite thy bow out left hand cause thine arrows fall right
thou shalt fall upon mountains israel thy bands people thee give ravenous birds every sort beasts field devoured
thou shalt fall upon open field spoken saith lord god
send fire on magog among dwell carelessly isles know am lord
so make holy name known midst people israel let pollute any more heathen know am lord one
behold come done saith lord god day whereof spoken
dwell cities israel go forth set on fire burn weapons both shields bucklers bows arrows handstaves spears seven years
so take no wood out field neither cut down any forests burn weapons fire spoil those spoiled rob robbed saith lord god
come pass day give gog place there graves israel valley passengers on east sea stop noses bury multitude call hamongog
seven months house israel burying may cleanse land
yea people land bury renown day glorified saith lord god
sever out men continual employment passing through land bury passengers those remain upon face earth cleanse after end seven months search
passengers pass through land any seeth man's bone then set sign by till buriers buried valley hamongog
also name city hamonah thus cleanse land
thou son man thus saith lord god speak every feathered fowl beast field assemble yourselves come gather on side sacrifice do you even great upon mountains israel ye may eat flesh drink blood
ye eat flesh mighty drink blood princes earth rams lambs goats bullocks fatlings bashan
ye eat fat till full drink blood drunken sacrifice sacrificed you
thus ye filled at table horses chariots mighty men war saith lord god
set glory among heathen see judgment executed hand laid upon
so house israel know am lord god day forward
heathen know house israel went captivity iniquity because trespassed against therefore hid face gave hand enemies so fell by sword
according uncleanness transgressions done hid face
therefore thus saith lord god now bring again captivity jacob mercy upon whole house israel jealous holy name
after borne shame trespasses whereby trespassed against dwelt safely land none made afraid
brought again people gathered out enemies' lands am sanctified sight many nations
then know am lord god caused led captivity among heathen gathered own land left none any more there
neither hide face any more poured out spirit upon house israel saith lord god
five twentieth year our captivity beginning tenth day month fourteenth after city smitten selfsame hand lord upon brought thither
visions god brought land israel set upon very high mountain by frame city on south
brought thither behold there man whose appearance like brass line flax hand measuring reed stood gate
man said son behold thine eyes hear ears set heart upon shew thee intent might art thou brought hither declare seest house israel
behold wall on outside house round about man's hand measuring reed six cubits long by cubit breadth so measured building one height
then came gate looketh toward east went stairs thereof measured threshold one reed broad other
every little chamber one reed long broad between chambers five cubits threshold gate by porch within
measured also porch gate within one reed
then measured porch gate eight cubits posts thereof two inward
little chambers gate eastward three on side one measure posts had
measured breadth entry gate ten cubits length thirteen
space also before little chambers one cubit on side six cubits
measured then gate roof one little chamber another breadth five twenty cubits door against
made also posts threescore cubits even post court round about gate
face gate entrance porch inner fifty cubits
there narrow windows little chambers posts within gate round about likewise arches inward upon each post palm trees
then brought outward court lo there chambers pavement made round about thirty upon
pavement by side gates over against length lower
then measured breadth forefront lower gate inner court without hundred cubits eastward northward
gate outward court looked toward north measured length thereof breadth
little chambers thereof three on side posts arches after measure first gate length fifty cubits breadth five twenty
windows arches palm trees after measure gate looketh toward east went by seven steps thereof before
gate inner court over against toward north east measured hundred cubits
after brought toward south behold gate measured posts thereof arches according these measures
there windows arches thereof round about like those length fifty cubits breadth five twenty
there seven steps go arches thereof before had palm trees one on side another upon posts
there gate inner court toward south measured hundred cubits
brought inner court by south gate measured according these measures
little chambers thereof posts arches according these measures there windows round about fifty cubits long five twenty broad
arches round about five twenty cubits long broad
arches thereof toward utter court palm trees upon posts going had eight steps
brought inner court toward east measured gate according these measures
little chambers thereof posts arches according these measures there windows therein round about fifty cubits long five twenty broad
arches thereof toward outward court palm trees upon posts on side going had eight steps
brought north gate measured according these measures
little chambers thereof posts arches windows round about length fifty cubits breadth five twenty
posts thereof toward utter court palm trees upon on side going had eight steps
chambers entries thereof by posts gates where washed burnt offering
porch gate two tables on side slay thereon burnt offering sin trespass
at side without one goeth entry north gate two tables on other porch
four tables on side by gate eight whereupon slew sacrifices
four tables hewn stone burnt offering cubit half long broad one high whereupon also laid instruments wherewith slew sacrifice
within hooks hand broad fastened round about upon tables flesh offering
without inner gate chambers singers court at side north prospect toward south one east having
said chamber whose prospect toward south priests keepers charge house
chamber whose prospect toward north priests keepers charge altar these sons zadok among levi come near lord minister
so measured court hundred cubits long broad foursquare altar before house
brought porch house measured each post five cubits on side breadth gate three
length porch twenty cubits breadth eleven brought by steps whereby went there pillars posts one on side another
afterward brought temple measured posts six cubits broad on one side other breadth tabernacle
breadth door ten cubits sides five on one side other measured length thereof forty twenty
then went inward measured post door two cubits six breadth seven
so measured length thereof twenty cubits breadth before temple said most holy place
after measured wall house six cubits breadth every side chamber four round about on
side chambers three one over another thirty order entered wall house round about might hold had
there enlarging winding about still upward side chambers house went round therefore breadth so increased lowest chamber highest by midst
saw also height house round about foundations side chambers full reed six great cubits
thickness wall side chamber without five cubits left place chambers within
between chambers wideness twenty cubits round about house on every side
doors side chambers toward place left one door north another south breadth five cubits round about
now building before separate place at end toward west seventy cubits broad wall five thick round about length thereof ninety
so measured house hundred cubits long separate place building walls thereof
also breadth face house separate place toward east hundred cubits
measured length building over against separate place behind galleries thereof on one side other hundred cubits inner temple porches court
door posts narrow windows galleries round about on three stories over against cieled wood ground covered
above door even inner house without by wall round about within measure
made cherubims palm trees so tree between cherub every had two faces
so face man toward palm tree on one side young lion other made through house round about
ground above door cherubims palm trees made on wall temple
posts temple squared face sanctuary appearance one other
altar wood three cubits high length thereof two corners walls said table before lord
temple sanctuary had two doors
doors had two leaves apiece turning one door other
there made on doors temple cherubims palm trees like upon walls thick planks face porch without
there narrow windows palm trees on one side other sides porch upon chambers house thick planks
then brought forth utter court way toward north chamber over against separate place before building
before length hundred cubits north door breadth fifty
over against twenty cubits inner court pavement utter gallery three stories
before chambers walk ten cubits breadth inward way one cubit doors toward north
now upper chambers shorter galleries higher than these lower middlemost building
three stories had pillars courts therefore building straitened more than lowest middlemost ground
wall without over against chambers toward utter court on forepart length thereof fifty cubits
length chambers utter court fifty cubits lo before temple hundred
under these chambers entry on east side one goeth utter court
chambers thickness wall court toward east over against separate place building
way before like appearance chambers toward north long broad goings out both according fashions doors
according doors chambers toward south door head way even directly before wall east one entereth
then said north chambers south before separate place holy where priests approach lord eat most things there lay meat offering sin trespass
priests enter therein then go out holy place utter court there lay garments wherein minister put on other approach those things people
now had made end measuring inner house brought forth toward gate whose prospect east measured round about
measured east side measuring reed five hundred reeds round about
measured north side five hundred reeds measuring reed round about
measured south side five hundred reeds measuring reed
turned about west side measured five hundred reeds measuring reed
measured by four sides had wall round about five hundred reeds long broad make separation between sanctuary profane place
afterward brought gate even looketh toward east
behold glory god israel came way east voice like noise many waters earth shined
according appearance vision saw even came destroy city visions like by river chebar fell upon face
glory lord came house by way gate whose prospect toward east
so spirit took brought inner court behold glory lord filled house
heard speaking out house man stood by
said son man place throne soles feet where dwell midst children israel ever holy name house no more defile neither nor kings by whoredom carcases high places
setting threshold by thresholds post posts wall between even defiled holy name abominations committed wherefore consumed mine anger
now let put away whoredom carcases kings far dwell midst ever
thou son man shew house israel may ashamed iniquities let measure pattern
if ashamed done shew form house fashion thereof goings out comings forms ordinances laws write sight may keep whole do
law house upon top mountain whole limit thereof round about most holy behold
these measures altar after cubits cubit hand breadth even bottom border thereof by edge round about span higher place
bottom upon ground even lower settle two cubits breadth one cubit lesser greater four
so altar four cubits upward horns
altar twelve cubits long broad square four squares thereof
settle fourteen cubits long broad four squares thereof border about half cubit bottom stairs look toward east
said son man thus saith lord god these ordinances altar day make offer burnt offerings thereon sprinkle blood
thou shalt give priests levites seed zadok approach minister saith lord god young bullock sin offering
thou shalt take blood thereof put on four horns corners settle upon border round about thus cleanse purge
thou shalt take bullock also sin offering burn appointed place house without sanctuary
on second day thou shalt offer kid goats without blemish sin offering cleanse altar did bullock
thou hast made end cleansing shalt offer young bullock without blemish ram out flock
thou shalt offer before lord priests cast salt upon burnt offering
seven days shalt thou prepare every day goat sin offering also young bullock ram out flock without blemish
seven days purge altar purify consecrate themselves
these days expired upon eighth day so forward priests make your burnt offerings altar peace accept you saith lord god
then brought back way gate outward sanctuary looketh toward east shut
then said lord gate shut opened no man enter by because god israel hath entered therefore
prince sit eat bread before lord enter by way porch gate go out same
then brought way north gate before house looked behold glory lord filled fell upon face
lord said son man mark well behold thine eyes hear ears say thee concerning ordinances house laws thereof entering every going forth sanctuary
thou shalt say rebellious even house israel thus saith lord god o ye let suffice you your abominations
ye brought sanctuary strangers uncircumcised heart flesh pollute even house offer bread fat blood broken covenant because your abominations
ye kept charge mine holy things set keepers sanctuary yourselves
thus saith lord god no stranger uncircumcised heart nor flesh enter sanctuary any among children israel
levites gone away far israel went astray after idols even bear iniquity
yet ministers sanctuary having charge at gates house ministering slay burnt offering sacrifice people stand before minister
because ministered before idols caused house israel fall iniquity therefore lifted mine hand against saith lord god bear
come near do office priest nor any holy things most place bear shame abominations committed
make keepers charge house service thereof done therein
priests levites sons zadok kept charge sanctuary children israel went astray come near minister stand before offer fat blood saith lord god
enter sanctuary come near table minister keep charge
come pass enter at gates inner court clothed linen garments no wool upon whiles minister within
linen bonnets upon heads breeches loins gird themselves any thing causeth sweat
go forth utter court even people put off garments wherein ministered lay holy chambers on other sanctify
neither shave heads nor suffer locks grow long only poll
neither any priest drink wine enter inner court
neither take wives widow nor her put away maidens seed house israel or had priest before
teach people difference between holy profane cause discern unclean clean
controversy stand judgment judge according judgments keep laws statutes mine assemblies hallow sabbaths
come at no dead person defile themselves father or mother son daughter brother sister hath had husband may
after cleansed reckon seven days
day goeth sanctuary inner court minister offer sin offering saith lord god
inheritance am ye give no possession israel
eat meat offering sin trespass every dedicated thing israel their's
first firstfruits things every oblation sort your oblations priest's ye also give priest dough may cause blessing rest thine house
priests eat any thing dead itself or torn whether fowl beast

there sanctuary five hundred length breadth square round about fifty cubits suburbs thereof
measure shalt thou length five twenty thousand breadth ten sanctuary most holy place

thus saith lord god let suffice you o princes israel remove violence spoil execute judgment justice take away your exactions people
ye just balances ephah bath
ephah bath one measure may contain tenth part homer thereof after
shekel twenty gerahs shekels five fifteen your maneh

concerning ordinance oil bath ye offer tenth part out cor homer ten baths

so thou shalt do seventh day month every one erreth simple ye reconcile house

thus prepare lamb meat offering oil every morning continual burnt

if give gift inheritance one servants then year liberty after return prince sons'

said son man hast thou seen then brought caused return brink river
now had returned behold at bank river very many trees on one side other
then said these waters issue out toward east country go down desert sea being brought forth healed
come pass every thing liveth moveth whithersoever rivers live there very great multitude fish because these waters thither healed whither river cometh
come pass fishers stand upon engedi even eneglaim place spread forth nets fish according kinds great sea exceeding many
miry places thereof marishes healed given salt
by river upon bank thereof on side grow trees meat whose leaf fade neither fruit consumed bring forth new according months because waters issued out sanctuary medicine
thus saith lord god border whereby ye inherit land according twelve tribes israel joseph two portions
ye inherit one well another concerning lifted mine hand give your fathers land fall you inheritance
border land toward north side great sea way hethlon men go zedad
hamath berothah sibraim between border damascus hazarhatticon by coast hauran
border sea hazarenan damascus north northward hamath side
east side ye measure hauran damascus gilead land israel by jordan border sea
south side southward tamar even waters strife kadesh river great sea
west side also great sea border till man come over against hamath
so ye divide land you according tribes israel
come pass ye divide by lot inheritance you strangers sojourn among beget children born country israel tribes
come pass what tribe stranger sojourneth there ye give inheritance saith lord god
now these names tribes north end coast way hethlon one goeth hamath hazarenan border damascus northward sides east west portion dan
