third year reign jehoiakim king judah came nebuchadnezzar babylon jerusalem besieged
lord gave jehoiakim king judah hand part vessels house god carried land shinar brought treasure
king spake ashpenaz master eunuchs should bring certain children israel king's seed princes
children whom no blemish well favoured skilful wisdom cunning knowledge understanding science such had ability stand king's palace might teach learning tongue chaldeans
king appointed daily provision king's meat wine drank so nourishing three years at end thereof might stand before
now among these children judah daniel hananiah mishael azariah
whom prince eunuchs gave names daniel name belteshazzar hananiah shadrach mishael meshach azariah abednego
daniel purposed heart would defile himself portion king's meat nor wine drank therefore requested prince eunuchs might
now god had brought daniel favour tender love prince eunuchs
prince eunuchs said daniel fear lord king who hath appointed your meat drink why should see faces worse liking than children sort then ye make endanger head
then said daniel melzar whom prince eunuchs had set over hananiah mishael azariah
prove thy servants beseech thee ten days let give us pulse eat water drink
then let our countenances looked upon before thee countenance children eat portion king's meat thou seest deal thy servants
so consented matter proved ten days
at end ten days countenances appeared fairer fatter flesh than children did eat portion king's meat
thus melzar took away portion meat wine should drink gave pulse
these four children god gave knowledge skill learning wisdom daniel had understanding visions dreams
now at end days king had said should bring then prince eunuchs brought before nebuchadnezzar
king communed among found none like daniel hananiah mishael azariah therefore stood before
matters wisdom understanding king enquired found ten times better than magicians astrologers realm
daniel continued even first year king cyrus
second year reign nebuchadnezzar dreamed dreams wherewith spirit troubled sleep brake
then king commanded call magicians astrologers sorcerers chaldeans shew dreams so came stood before
king said dreamed dream spirit troubled know
then spake chaldeans king syriack o live ever tell thy servants dream we shew interpretation
king answered said chaldeans thing gone if ye make known dream interpretation thereof cut pieces your houses made dunghill
if ye shew dream interpretation thereof receive gifts rewards great honour therefore
answered again said let king tell servants dream we shew interpretation
king answered said know certainty ye would gain time because see thing gone
if ye make known dream there one decree you prepared lying corrupt words speak before till time changed therefore tell know can shew interpretation thereof
chaldeans answered before king said there man upon earth can shew king's matter therefore no lord nor ruler asked such things at any magician or astrologer chaldean
rare thing king requireth there none other can shew before except gods whose dwelling flesh
cause king angry very furious commanded destroy wise men babylon
decree went forth wise men should slain sought daniel fellows
then daniel answered counsel wisdom arioch captain king's guard gone forth slay wise men babylon
answered said arioch king's captain why decree so hasty king then made thing known daniel
then daniel went desired king would give time shew interpretation
then daniel went house made thing known hananiah mishael azariah companions
would desire mercies god heaven concerning secret daniel fellows should perish rest wise men babylon
then secret revealed daniel night vision blessed god heaven
daniel answered said blessed name god ever wisdom might
changeth times seasons removeth kings setteth giveth wisdom wise knowledge know understanding
revealeth deep secret things knoweth what darkness light dwelleth
thank thee praise o thou god fathers who hast given wisdom might made known now what we desired us king's matter
therefore daniel went arioch whom king had ordained destroy wise men babylon said thus bring before shew interpretation
then arioch brought daniel before king haste said thus found man captives judah make known interpretation
king answered said daniel whose name belteshazzar art thou able make known dream seen interpretation thereof
daniel answered presence king said secret hath demanded cannot wise men astrologers magicians soothsayers shew
there god heaven revealeth secrets maketh known king nebuchadnezzar what latter days thy dream visions head upon bed these
thee o king thy thoughts came mind upon bed what should come pass hereafter revealeth secrets maketh known
secret revealed any wisdom more than living sakes make known interpretation king thou mightest know thoughts thy heart
thou o king sawest behold great image whose brightness excellent stood before thee form thereof terrible
image's head fine gold breast arms silver belly thighs brass
legs iron feet part clay
thou sawest till stone cut out without hands smote image upon feet iron clay brake pieces
then iron clay brass silver gold broken pieces together became like chaff summer threshingfloors wind carried away no place found stone smote image great mountain filled whole earth
dream we tell interpretation thereof before king
thou o king art kings god heaven hath given thee kingdom power strength glory
wheresoever children men dwell beasts field fowls heaven hath given thine hand made thee ruler over thou art head gold
after thee arise another kingdom inferior third brass bear rule over earth
fourth kingdom strong iron forasmuch breaketh pieces subdueth things these break bruise
whereas thou sawest feet toes part potters' clay iron kingdom divided there strength forasmuch mixed miry
toes feet part iron clay so kingdom partly strong broken
whereas thou sawest iron mixed miry clay mingle themselves seed men cleave one another even
days these kings god heaven set kingdom never destroyed left other people break pieces consume kingdoms stand ever
forasmuch thou sawest stone cut out mountain without hands brake pieces iron brass clay silver gold great god hath made known king what come pass hereafter dream certain interpretation thereof sure
then king nebuchadnezzar fell upon face worshipped daniel commanded should offer oblation sweet odours
king answered daniel said truth your god gods lord kings revealer secrets seeing thou couldest reveal secret
then king made daniel great man gave many gifts ruler over whole province babylon chief governors wise men
then daniel requested king set shadrach meshach abednego over affairs province babylon sat gate
nebuchadnezzar king made image gold whose height threescore cubits breadth thereof six set plain dura province babylon
then nebuchadnezzar king sent gather together princes governors captains judges treasurers counsellors sheriffs rulers provinces come dedication image had set
then princes governors captains judges treasurers counsellors sheriffs rulers provinces gathered together dedication image nebuchadnezzar king had set stood before
then herald cried aloud you commanded o people nations languages
at what time ye hear sound cornet flute harp sackbut psaltery dulcimer kinds musick fall down worship golden image nebuchadnezzar king hath set
whoso falleth down worshippeth same hour cast midst burning fiery furnace
therefore at time people heard sound cornet flute harp sackbut psaltery kinds musick nations languages fell down worshipped golden image nebuchadnezzar king had set
wherefore at time certain chaldeans came near accused jews
spake said king nebuchadnezzar o live ever
thou o king hast made decree every man hear sound cornet flute harp sackbut psaltery dulcimer kinds musick fall down worship golden image
whoso falleth down worshippeth should cast midst burning fiery furnace
there certain jews whom thou hast set over affairs province babylon shadrach meshach abednego these men o king regarded thee serve thy gods nor worship golden image
then nebuchadnezzar rage fury commanded bring shadrach meshach abednego brought these men before king
nebuchadnezzar spake said true o shadrach meshach abednego do ye serve gods nor worship golden image set
now if ye ready at what time hear sound cornet flute harp sackbut psaltery dulcimer kinds musick fall down worship image made well cast same hour midst burning fiery furnace who god deliver you out hands
shadrach meshach abednego answered said king o nebuchadnezzar we careful answer thee matter
if so our god whom we serve able deliver us burning fiery furnace out thine hand o king
if known thee o king we serve thy gods nor worship golden image thou hast set
then nebuchadnezzar full fury form visage changed against shadrach meshach abednego therefore spake commanded should heat furnace one seven times more than wont heated
commanded most mighty men army bind shadrach meshach abednego cast burning fiery furnace
then these men bound coats hosen hats other garments cast midst burning fiery furnace
therefore because king's commandment urgent furnace exceeding hot flame fire slew those men took shadrach meshach abednego
these three men shadrach meshach abednego fell down bound midst burning fiery furnace
then nebuchadnezzar king astonied rose haste spake said counsellors did we cast three men bound midst fire answered true o
answered said lo see four men loose walking midst fire no hurt form fourth like son god
then nebuchadnezzar came near mouth burning fiery furnace spake said shadrach meshach abednego ye servants most high god come forth hither midst fire
princes governors captains king's counsellors being gathered together saw these men upon whose bodies fire had no power nor hair head singed neither coats changed smell passed on
then nebuchadnezzar spake said blessed god shadrach meshach abednego who hath sent angel delivered servants trusted changed king's word yielded bodies might serve nor worship any except own
therefore make decree every people nation language speak any thing amiss against god shadrach meshach abednego cut pieces houses made dunghill because there no other can deliver after sort
then king promoted shadrach meshach abednego province babylon
nebuchadnezzar king people nations languages dwell earth peace multiplied you
thought good shew signs wonders high god hath wrought toward
how great signs mighty wonders kingdom everlasting dominion generation
nebuchadnezzar at rest mine house flourishing palace
saw dream made afraid thoughts upon bed visions head troubled
therefore made decree bring wise men babylon before might make known interpretation dream
then came magicians astrologers chaldeans soothsayers told dream before did make known interpretation thereof
at last daniel came before whose name belteshazzar according god whom spirit holy gods told dream saying
o belteshazzar master magicians because know spirit holy gods thee no secret troubleth tell visions dream seen interpretation thereof
thus visions mine head bed saw behold tree midst earth height thereof great
tree grew strong height thereof reached heaven sight end earth
leaves thereof fair fruit much meat beasts field had shadow under fowls heaven dwelt boughs flesh fed
saw visions head upon bed behold watcher holy one came down heaven
cried aloud said thus hew down tree cut off branches shake leaves scatter fruit let beasts get away under fowls
nevertheless leave stump roots earth even band iron brass tender grass field let wet dew heaven portion beasts
let heart changed man's beast's given seven times pass over
matter by decree watchers demand word holy ones intent living may know most high ruleth kingdom men giveth whomsoever setteth over basest
dream king nebuchadnezzar seen now thou o belteshazzar declare interpretation thereof forasmuch wise men kingdom able make known art spirit holy gods thee
then daniel whose name belteshazzar astonied one hour thoughts troubled king spake said let dream or interpretation thereof trouble thee answered lord hate thine enemies
tree thou sawest grew strong whose height reached heaven sight thereof earth
whose leaves fair fruit thereof much meat under beasts field dwelt upon branches fowls heaven had habitation
thou o king art grown become strong thy greatness reacheth heaven dominion end earth
whereas king saw watcher holy one coming down heaven saying hew tree destroy yet leave stump roots thereof earth even band iron brass tender grass field let wet dew portion beasts till seven times pass over
interpretation o king decree most high come upon lord
drive thee men thy dwelling beasts field make eat grass oxen wet dew heaven seven times pass over till thou know most high ruleth kingdom giveth whomsoever
whereas commanded leave stump tree roots thy kingdom sure thee after thou shalt known heavens do rule
wherefore o king let counsel acceptable thee break off thy sins by righteousness thine iniquities shewing mercy poor if may lengthening tranquillity
came upon king nebuchadnezzar
at end twelve months walked palace kingdom babylon
king spake said great babylon built house kingdom by might power honour majesty
while word king's mouth there fell voice heaven saying o king nebuchadnezzar thee spoken kingdom departed
drive thee men thy dwelling beasts field make eat grass oxen seven times pass over until thou know most high ruleth kingdom giveth whomsoever
same hour thing fulfilled upon nebuchadnezzar driven men did eat grass oxen body wet dew heaven till hairs grown like eagles' feathers nails birds' claws
at end days nebuchadnezzar lifted mine eyes heaven understanding returned blessed most high praised honoured liveth ever whose dominion everlasting kingdom generation
inhabitants earth reputed nothing doeth according army heaven among none can stay hand or say what doest thou
at same time reason returned glory kingdom mine honour brightness counsellors lords sought established excellent majesty added
now nebuchadnezzar praise extol honour king heaven whose works truth ways judgment those walk pride able abase
belshazzar king made great feast thousand lords drank wine before
belshazzar whiles tasted wine commanded bring golden silver vessels father nebuchadnezzar had taken out temple jerusalem king princes wives concubines might drink therein
then brought golden vessels taken out temple house god at jerusalem king princes wives concubines drank
drank wine praised gods gold silver brass iron wood stone
same hour came forth fingers man's hand wrote over against candlestick upon plaister wall king's palace king saw part
then king's countenance changed thoughts troubled so joints loins loosed knees smote one against another
king cried aloud bring astrologers chaldeans soothsayers spake said wise men babylon whosoever read writing shew interpretation thereof clothed scarlet chain gold about neck third ruler kingdom
then came king's wise men could read writing nor make known king interpretation thereof
then king belshazzar greatly troubled countenance changed lords astonied
now queen by reason words king lords came banquet house spake said o live ever let thy thoughts trouble thee nor countenance changed
there man thy kingdom whom spirit holy gods days father light understanding wisdom like found king nebuchadnezzar say made master magicians astrologers chaldeans soothsayers
forasmuch excellent spirit knowledge understanding interpreting dreams shewing hard sentences dissolving doubts found same daniel whom king named belteshazzar now let called shew interpretation
then daniel brought before king spake said art thou children captivity judah whom father out jewry
even heard thee spirit gods light understanding excellent wisdom found
now wise men astrologers been brought before should read writing make known interpretation thereof could shew thing
heard thee thou canst make interpretations dissolve doubts now if read writing known interpretation thereof shalt clothed scarlet chain gold about thy neck third ruler kingdom
then daniel answered said before king let thy gifts thyself give rewards another yet read writing make known interpretation
o thou king most high god gave nebuchadnezzar thy father kingdom majesty glory honour
majesty gave people nations languages trembled feared before whom would slew kept alive set put down
heart lifted mind hardened pride deposed kingly throne took glory
driven sons men heart made like beasts dwelling wild asses fed grass oxen body wet dew heaven till knew most high god ruled kingdom appointeth over whomsoever
thou son o belshazzar hast humbled thine heart though knewest
hast lifted thyself against lord heaven brought vessels house before thee thou thy lords wives concubines drunk wine praised gods silver gold brass iron wood stone see nor hear know god whose hand breath ways glorified
then part hand sent writing written
writing written mene tekel upharsin
interpretation thing mene god hath numbered thy kingdom finished
tekel thou art weighed balances found wanting
peres thy kingdom divided given medes persians
then commanded belshazzar clothed daniel scarlet put chain gold about neck made proclamation concerning should third ruler kingdom
night belshazzar king chaldeans slain
darius median took kingdom being about threescore two years old
pleased darius set over kingdom hundred twenty princes should whole
over these three presidents whom daniel first princes might give accounts king should no damage
then daniel preferred above presidents princes because excellent spirit king thought set over whole realm
then presidents princes sought find occasion against daniel concerning kingdom could none nor fault forasmuch faithful neither there any error or found
then said these men we find any occasion against daniel except concerning law god
then these presidents princes assembled together king said thus darius live ever
presidents kingdom governors princes counsellors captains consulted together establish royal statute make firm decree whosoever ask petition any god or man thirty days save thee o king cast den lions
now o king establish decree sign writing changed according law medes persians altereth
wherefore king darius signed writing decree
now daniel knew writing signed went house windows being open chamber toward jerusalem kneeled upon knees three times day prayed gave thanks before god did aforetime
then these men assembled found daniel praying making supplication before god
then came near spake before king concerning king's decree hast thou signed every man ask petition any god or within thirty days save thee o cast den lions answered said thing true according law medes persians altereth
then answered said before king daniel children captivity judah regardeth thee o nor decree thou hast signed maketh petition three times day
then king heard these words sore displeased himself set heart on daniel deliver laboured till going down sun
then these men assembled king said know o law medes persians no decree nor statute establisheth may changed
then king commanded brought daniel cast den lions now spake said thy god whom thou servest continually deliver thee
stone brought laid upon mouth den king sealed own signet lords purpose might changed concerning daniel
then king went palace passed night fasting neither instruments musick brought before sleep
then king arose very early morning went haste den lions
came den cried lamentable voice daniel king spake said o servant living god thy whom thou servest continually able deliver thee lions
then said daniel king o live ever
god hath sent angel shut lions' mouths hurt forasmuch before innocency found also thee o king done no
then king exceeding glad commanded should take daniel out den so taken no manner hurt found upon because believed god

first year belshazzar king babylon daniel had dream visions head upon bed then wrote told sum matters
daniel spake said saw vision by night behold four winds heaven strove upon great sea
four great beasts came sea diverse one another
first like lion had eagle's wings beheld till thereof plucked lifted earth made stand upon feet man man's heart given
behold another beast second like bear raised itself on one side had three ribs mouth between teeth said thus arise devour much flesh
after beheld lo another like leopard had upon back four wings fowl beast also heads dominion given
after saw night visions behold fourth beast dreadful terrible strong exceedingly had great iron teeth devoured brake pieces stamped residue feet diverse beasts before ten horns
considered horns behold there came among another little horn before whom three first plucked by roots eyes like man mouth speaking great things
beheld till thrones cast down ancient days did sit whose garment white snow hair head like pure wool throne fiery flame wheels burning fire
fiery stream issued came forth before thousand thousands ministered ten times stood judgment set books opened
beheld then because voice great words horn spake even till beast slain body destroyed given burning flame
concerning rest beasts had dominion taken away yet lives prolonged season time
saw night visions behold one like son man came clouds heaven ancient days brought near before
there given dominion glory kingdom people nations languages should serve everlasting pass away destroyed

came near one stood by asked truth so told made know interpretation things

third year reign king belshazzar vision appeared even daniel after at first
saw vision came pass at shushan palace province elam by river ulai

now o lord our god hast brought thy people forth out land egypt mighty hand gotten thee renown at day we sinned done wickedly

mother hath played harlot she conceived done shamefully said go after lovers give bread water wool flax mine oil drink

she follow after her lovers overtake seek find then say go return first husband better than now
she did know gave her corn wine oil multiplied silver gold prepared baal

you only known families earth therefore punish your iniquities

lord sent out great wind sea there mighty tempest so ship like broken
then mariners afraid cried every man god cast forth wares ship sea lighten jonah gone down sides lay fast asleep
so shipmaster came said what meanest thou o sleeper arise call upon thy god if think us we perish
said every one fellow come let us cast lots we may know whose cause evil upon so lot fell jonah
then said tell us we pray thee whose cause evil upon what thine occupation whence comest thou thy country people art
said am hebrew fear lord god heaven hath made sea dry land
then men exceedingly afraid said why hast thou done knew fled presence lord because had told
then said what we do thee sea may calm us wrought tempestuous
said take cast forth sea so calm you know sake great tempest upon
nevertheless men rowed hard bring land could sea wrought tempestuous against
wherefore cried lord said we beseech thee o let us perish man's life lay upon innocent blood thou hast done pleased
so took jonah cast forth sea ceased her raging
then men feared lord exceedingly offered sacrifice made vows

said cried by reason mine affliction lord heard out belly hell thou heardest voice

makest men fishes sea creeping things no ruler over

these take parable against taunting proverb say woe increaseth how long ladeth himself thick clay

prayer habakkuk prophet upon shigionoth

before went pestilence burning coals forth at feet
stood measured earth beheld drove asunder nations everlasting mountains scattered perpetual hills did bow ways
saw tents cushan affliction curtains land midian did tremble
lord displeased against rivers thine anger thy wrath sea thou didst ride upon horses chariots salvation

mountains saw thee trembled overflowing water passed by deep uttered voice lifted hands on high
sun moon stood still habitation at light thine arrows went shining thy glittering spear
thou didst march through land indignation thresh heathen anger
thou wentest forth salvation thy people even thine anointed woundedst head out house wicked by discovering foundation neck selah

thou didst walk through sea thine horses heap great waters
heard belly trembled lips quivered at voice rottenness entered bones myself might rest day trouble cometh people invade troops
although fig tree blossom neither fruit vines labour olive fail fields yield no meat flock cut off fold there herd stalls
yet rejoice lord joy god salvation
lord god strength make feet like hinds' walk upon mine high places chief singer on stringed instruments
word lord came zephaniah son cushi gedaliah amariah hizkiah days josiah amon king judah
utterly consume things off land saith lord
consume man beast fowls heaven fishes sea stumblingblocks wicked cut off land saith lord
also stretch out mine hand upon judah inhabitants jerusalem cut off remnant baal place name chemarims priests
worship host heaven upon housetops swear by lord malcham
turned back lord those sought nor enquired
hold thy peace at presence lord god day hand hath prepared sacrifice bid guests
come pass day lord's sacrifice punish princes king's children such clothed strange apparel
same day also punish those leap on threshold fill masters' houses violence deceit
come pass day saith lord there noise cry fish gate howling second great crashing hills
howl ye inhabitants maktesh merchant people cut down bear silver off
come pass at time search jerusalem candles punish men settled on lees say heart lord do good neither evil
therefore goods become booty houses desolation also build inhabit plant vineyards drink wine thereof
great day lord near hasteth greatly even voice mighty man cry there bitterly
day wrath trouble distress wasteness desolation darkness gloominess clouds thick
day trumpet alarm against fenced cities high towers
bring distress upon men walk like blind because sinned against lord blood poured out dust flesh dung
neither silver nor gold able deliver day lord's wrath whole land devoured by fire jealousy make even speedy riddance dwell
gather yourselves together yea o nation desired
before decree bring forth day pass chaff fierce anger lord come upon you lord's
seek ye lord meek earth wrought judgment righteousness meekness may hid day lord's anger
gaza forsaken ashkelon desolation drive out ashdod at noon day ekron rooted
woe inhabitants sea coast nation cherethites word lord against you o canaan land philistines even destroy thee there no inhabitant
sea coast dwellings cottages shepherds folds flocks
coast remnant house judah feed thereupon houses ashkelon lie down evening lord god visit turn away captivity
heard reproach moab revilings children ammon whereby reproached people magnified themselves against border
therefore live saith lord hosts god israel surely moab sodom children ammon gomorrah even breeding nettles saltpits perpetual desolation residue people spoil remnant possess
pride because reproached magnified themselves against people lord hosts
lord terrible famish gods earth men worship every one place even isles heathen
ye ethiopians also slain by sword
stretch out hand against north destroy assyria make nineveh desolation dry like wilderness
flocks lie down midst her beasts nations both cormorant bittern lodge upper lintels voice sing windows desolation thresholds uncover cedar work
rejoicing city dwelt carelessly said her heart am there none beside how she become desolation place beasts lie down every one passeth by hiss wag hand
woe her filthy polluted oppressing city
she obeyed voice received correction trusted lord drew near her god
her princes within roaring lions judges evening wolves gnaw bones till morrow
her prophets light treacherous persons priests polluted sanctuary done violence law
just lord midst thereof do iniquity every morning doth bring judgment light faileth unjust knoweth no shame
cut off nations towers desolate made streets waste none passeth by cities destroyed so there no man inhabitant
said surely thou wilt fear receive instruction so dwelling should cut off howsoever punished rose early corrupted doings
therefore wait ye upon saith lord until day rise prey determination gather nations may assemble kingdoms pour mine indignation even fierce anger earth devoured fire jealousy
then turn people pure language may call upon name lord serve one consent
beyond rivers ethiopia suppliants even daughter dispersed bring mine offering
day shalt thou ashamed thy doings wherein hast transgressed against then take away out midst thee rejoice pride no more haughty because holy mountain
also leave midst thee afflicted poor people trust name lord
remnant israel do iniquity nor speak lies neither deceitful tongue found mouth feed lie down none make afraid
sing o daughter zion shout israel glad rejoice heart jerusalem
lord hath taken away thy judgments cast out thine enemy king israel even midst thee thou shalt see evil any more
day said jerusalem fear thou zion let thine hands slack
lord thy god midst thee mighty save rejoice over joy rest love singing
gather sorrowful solemn assembly who thee whom reproach burden
behold at time undo afflict thee save her halteth gather driven out get praise fame every land where been put shame
at time bring you again even gather make name praise among people earth turn back your captivity before eyes saith lord
second year darius king sixth month first day came word lord by haggai prophet zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah joshua josedech high priest saying
thus speaketh lord hosts saying people say time come lord's house should built
then came word lord by haggai prophet saying
time you o ye dwell your cieled houses house lie waste
now therefore thus saith lord hosts consider your ways
ye sown much bring little eat enough drink filled clothe you there none warm earneth wages put bag holes
thus saith lord hosts consider your ways
go mountain bring wood build house take pleasure glorified saith lord
ye looked much lo came little brought home did blow upon why saith lord hosts because mine house waste run every man own
therefore heaven over you stayed dew earth her fruit
called drought upon land mountains corn new wine oil ground bringeth forth men cattle labour hands
then zerubbabel son shealtiel joshua josedech high priest remnant people obeyed voice lord god words haggai prophet had sent did fear before
then spake haggai lord's messenger message people saying am you saith lord
lord stirred spirit zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah joshua josedech high priest remnant people came did work house hosts god
four twentieth day sixth month second year darius king
seventh month one twentieth day came word lord by prophet haggai saying
speak now zerubbabel son shealtiel governor judah joshua josedech high priest residue people saying
who left among you saw house her first glory how do ye see now your eyes comparison nothing
yet now strong o zerubbabel saith lord joshua son josedech high priest ye people land work am you hosts
according word covenanted you ye came out egypt so spirit remaineth among fear
thus saith lord hosts yet once little while shake heavens earth sea dry land
shake nations desire come fill house glory saith lord hosts
silver mine gold saith lord hosts
glory latter house greater than former saith lord hosts place give peace
four twentieth day ninth month second year darius came word lord by haggai prophet saying
thus saith lord hosts ask now priests concerning law saying
if one bear holy flesh skirt garment do touch bread or pottage wine oil any meat priests answered said no
then said haggai if one unclean by dead body touch any these priests answered
then answered haggai said so people nation before saith lord every work hands offer there unclean
now pray you consider day upward before stone laid upon temple lord
since those days one came heap twenty measures there ten pressfat draw out fifty vessels press
smote you blasting mildew hail labours your hands yet ye turned saith lord
consider now day upward four twentieth ninth month even foundation lord's temple laid
seed yet barn yea vine fig tree pomegranate olive hath brought forth day bless you
again word lord came haggai four twentieth day month saying
speak zerubbabel governor judah saying shake heavens earth
overthrow throne kingdoms destroy strength heathen chariots those ride horses riders come down every one by sword brother
day saith lord hosts take thee o zerubbabel servant son shealtiel make signet chosen
eighth month second year darius came word lord zechariah son berechiah iddo prophet saying
lord hath been sore displeased your fathers
therefore say thou thus saith lord hosts turn ye you
ye your fathers whom former prophets cried saying thus saith lord hosts turn now evil ways doings did hear nor hearken
your fathers where prophets do live ever
words statutes commanded servants prophets did take hold your fathers returned said like lord hosts thought do us according our ways doings so hath dealt
upon four twentieth day eleventh month sebat second year darius came word lord zechariah son berechiah iddo prophet saying
saw by night behold man riding upon red horse stood among myrtle trees bottom behind there horses speckled white
then said o lord what these angel talked shew thee
man stood among myrtle trees answered said these whom lord hath sent walk fro through earth
answered angel lord stood among myrtle trees said we walked fro through earth behold sitteth still at rest
then angel lord answered said o hosts how long wilt thou mercy on jerusalem cities judah against hast had indignation these threescore ten years
lord answered angel talked good words comfortable
so angel communed said cry thou saying thus saith lord hosts am jealous jerusalem zion great jealousy
am very sore displeased heathen at ease little helped forward affliction
therefore thus saith lord am returned jerusalem mercies house built hosts line stretched forth upon
cry yet saying thus saith lord hosts cities through prosperity spread abroad comfort zion choose jerusalem
then lifted mine eyes saw behold four horns
said angel talked what these answered horns scattered judah israel jerusalem
lord shewed four carpenters
then said what come these do spake saying horns scattered judah so no man did lift head fray cast out gentiles lifted horn over land scatter
lifted mine eyes again looked behold man measuring line hand
then said whither goest thou measure jerusalem see what breadth thereof length
behold angel talked went forth another out meet
said run speak young man saying jerusalem inhabited towns without walls multitude men cattle therein
saith lord her wall fire round about glory midst
ho come forth flee land north saith lord spread you abroad four winds heaven
deliver thyself o zion dwellest daughter babylon
thus saith lord hosts after glory hath sent nations spoiled you toucheth apple eye
behold shake mine hand upon spoil servants ye know lord hosts hath sent
sing rejoice o daughter zion lo come dwell midst thee saith lord
many nations joined lord day people dwell midst thee thou shalt know hosts hath sent
lord inherit judah portion holy land choose jerusalem again
silent o flesh before lord raised out holy habitation
shewed joshua high priest standing before angel lord satan at right hand resist
lord said satan rebuke thee o even hath chosen jerusalem brand plucked out fire
now joshua clothed filthy garments stood before angel
answered spake those stood before saying take away filthy garments said behold caused thine iniquity pass thee clothe change raiment
said let set fair mitre upon head so clothed garments angel lord stood by
angel lord protested joshua saying
thus saith lord hosts if thou wilt walk ways keep charge then shalt also judge house courts give thee places among these stand by
hear now o joshua high priest thou thy fellows sit before thee men wondered at behold bring forth servant branch
behold stone laid before joshua upon one seven eyes engrave graving thereof saith lord hosts remove iniquity land day
day saith lord hosts ye call every man neighbour under vine fig tree
angel talked came again waked man wakened out sleep
said what seest thou looked behold candlestick gold bowl upon top seven lamps thereon pipes thereof
two olive trees by one upon right side bowl other left thereof
so answered spake angel talked saying what these lord
then angel talked answered said knowest thou what these no lord
then answered spake saying word lord zerubbabel by might nor power spirit saith hosts
who art thou o great mountain before zerubbabel shalt become plain bring forth headstone thereof shoutings crying grace
moreover word lord came saying
hands zerubbabel laid foundation house also finish thou shalt know lord hosts hath sent you
who hath despised day small things rejoice see plummet hand zerubbabel those seven eyes lord run fro through whole earth
then answered said what these two olive trees upon right side candlestick left thereof
answered again said what these two olive branches through golden pipes empty oil out themselves
answered said knowest thou what these no lord
then said these two anointed ones stand by lord whole earth
then turned lifted mine eyes looked behold flying roll
said what seest thou answered see flying roll length thereof twenty cubits breadth ten
then said curse goeth forth over face whole earth every one stealeth cut off on side according sweareth
bring forth saith lord hosts enter house thief sweareth falsely by name remain midst consume timber thereof stones
then angel talked went forth said lift now thine eyes see what goeth
said what ephah goeth forth moreover resemblance through earth
behold there lifted talent lead woman sitteth midst ephah
said wickedness cast midst ephah weight lead upon mouth thereof
then lifted mine eyes looked behold there came out two women wind wings had like stork ephah between earth heaven
then said angel talked whither do these bear ephah
said build house land shinar established set there upon her own base
turned lifted mine eyes looked behold there came four chariots out between two mountains brass
first chariot red horses second black
third chariot white horses fourth grisled bay
then answered said angel talked what these lord
angel answered said these four spirits heavens go forth standing before lord earth
black horses therein go forth north country white after grisled toward south
bay went forth sought go might walk fro through earth said get you hence so walked
then cried upon spake saying behold these go toward north country quieted spirit
word lord came saying
take captivity even heldai tobijah jedaiah come babylon thou same day go house josiah son zephaniah
then take silver gold make crowns set upon head joshua son josedech high priest
speak saying thus speaketh lord hosts behold man whose name branch grow out place build temple
even build temple lord bear glory sit rule upon throne priest counsel peace between both
crowns helem tobijah jedaiah hen son zephaniah memorial temple lord
far off come build temple lord ye know hosts hath sent you pass if diligently obey voice your god
came pass fourth year king darius word lord zechariah day ninth month even chisleu
had sent house god sherezer regemmelech men pray before lord
speak priests house lord hosts prophets saying should weep fifth month separating myself done these so many years
then came word lord hosts saying
speak people land priests saying ye fasted mourned fifth seventh month even those seventy years did at fast
ye did eat drink yourselves
should ye hear words lord hath cried by former prophets jerusalem inhabited prosperity cities thereof round about her men south plain
word lord came zechariah saying
thus speaketh lord hosts saying execute true judgment shew mercy compassions every man brother
oppress widow nor fatherless stranger poor let none you imagine evil against brother your heart
refused hearken pulled away shoulder stopped ears should hear
yea made hearts adamant stone lest should hear law words lord hosts hath sent spirit by former prophets therefore came great wrath
therefore come pass cried would hear so saith lord hosts
scattered whirlwind among nations whom knew thus land desolate after no man passed through nor returned laid pleasant
again word lord hosts came saying
thus saith lord hosts jealous zion great jealousy her fury
thus saith lord am returned zion dwell midst jerusalem called city truth mountain hosts holy
thus saith lord hosts there yet old men women dwell streets jerusalem every man staff hand very age
streets city full boys girls playing thereof
thus saith lord hosts if marvellous eyes remnant people these days should also mine
thus saith lord hosts behold save people east country west
bring dwell midst jerusalem people god truth righteousness
thus saith lord hosts let your hands strong ye hear these days words by mouth prophets day foundation house laid temple might built
before these days there no hire man nor any beast neither peace went out or came because affliction set men every one against neighbour
now residue people former days saith lord hosts
seed prosperous vine give her fruit ground increase heavens dew cause remnant people possess these things
come pass ye curse among heathen o house judah israel so save you blessing fear let your hands strong
thus saith lord hosts thought punish you your fathers provoked wrath repented
so again thought these days do well jerusalem house judah fear ye
these things ye do speak every man truth neighbour execute judgment peace your gates
let none you imagine evil your hearts against neighbour love no false oath these things hate saith lord
word lord hosts came saying
thus saith lord hosts fast fourth month fifth seventh tenth house judah joy gladness cheerful feasts therefore love truth peace
thus saith lord hosts yet come pass there people inhabitants many cities
inhabitants one city go another saying let us speedily pray before lord seek hosts also
yea many people strong nations come seek lord hosts jerusalem pray before
thus saith lord hosts those days come pass ten men take hold out languages nations even skirt jew saying we go you heard god
burden word lord land hadrach damascus rest thereof eyes man tribes israel toward
hamath also border thereby tyrus zidon though very wise
tyrus did build herself strong hold heaped silver dust fine gold mire streets
behold lord cast her out smite power sea she devoured fire
ashkelon see fear gaza also very sorrowful ekron her expectation ashamed king perish inhabited
bastard dwell ashdod cut off pride philistines
take away blood out mouth abominations between teeth remaineth even our god governor judah ekron jebusite
encamp about mine house because army passeth by returneth no oppressor pass through any more now seen eyes
rejoice greatly o daughter zion shout jerusalem behold thy king cometh thee just having salvation lowly riding upon ass colt foal
cut off chariot ephraim horse jerusalem battle bow speak peace heathen dominion sea even river ends earth
thee also by blood thy covenant sent forth prisoners out pit wherein no water
turn you strong hold ye prisoners hope even day do declare render double thee
bent judah filled bow ephraim raised thy sons o zion against greece made thee sword mighty man
lord seen over arrow go forth lightning god blow trumpet whirlwinds south
lord hosts defend devour subdue sling stones drink make noise through wine filled like bowls corners altar
lord god save day flock people stones crown lifted ensign upon land
how great goodness beauty corn make young men cheerful new wine maids
ask ye lord rain time latter so make bright clouds give showers every one grass field
idols spoken vanity diviners seen lie told false dreams comfort vain therefore went way flock troubled because there no shepherd
mine anger kindled against shepherds punished goats lord hosts hath visited flock house judah made goodly horse battle
out came forth corner nail battle bow every oppressor together
mighty men tread down enemies mire streets battle fight because lord riders on horses confounded
strengthen house judah save joseph bring again place mercy upon though had cast off am lord god hear
ephraim like mighty man heart rejoice through wine yea children see glad lord
hiss gather redeemed increase increased
sow among people remember far countries live children turn again
bring again also out land egypt gather assyria gilead lebanon place found
pass through sea affliction smite waves deeps river dry pride assyria brought down sceptre egypt depart away
strengthen lord walk down name saith
open thy doors o lebanon fire may devour cedars
howl fir tree cedar fallen because mighty spoiled o ye oaks bashan forest vintage come down
there voice howling shepherds glory spoiled roaring young lions pride jordan
thus saith lord god feed flock slaughter
whose possessors slay hold themselves guilty sell say blessed lord am rich own shepherds pity
no more pity inhabitants land saith lord lo deliver men every one neighbour's hand king smite out
feed flock slaughter even you o poor took two staves one called beauty other bands fed
three shepherds also cut off one month soul lothed abhorred
then said feed you dieth let die cut off rest eat every one flesh another
took staff even beauty cut asunder might break covenant had made people
broken day so poor flock waited upon knew word lord
said if ye think good give price forbear so weighed thirty pieces silver
lord said cast potter goodly price prised at took thirty pieces silver house
then cut asunder mine other staff even bands might break brotherhood between judah israel
lord said take thee yet instruments foolish shepherd
lo raise shepherd land visit those cut off neither seek young one nor heal broken feed standeth still eat flesh fat tear claws pieces
woe idol shepherd leaveth flock sword upon arm right eye clean dried utterly darkened
burden word lord israel saith stretcheth forth heavens layeth foundation earth formeth spirit man within
behold make jerusalem cup trembling people round about siege both against judah
day make jerusalem burdensome stone people burden themselves cut pieces though earth gathered together against
day saith lord smite every horse astonishment rider madness open mine eyes upon house judah people blindness
governors judah say heart inhabitants jerusalem strength lord hosts god
day make governors judah like hearth fire among wood torch sheaf devour people round about on right hand left jerusalem inhabited again her own place even
lord also save tents judah first glory house david inhabitants jerusalem do magnify themselves against
day lord defend inhabitants jerusalem feeble among at david house god angel before
come pass day seek destroy nations against jerusalem
pour upon house david inhabitants jerusalem spirit grace supplications look whom pierced mourn one mourneth only son bitterness firstborn
day there great mourning jerusalem hadadrimmon valley megiddon
land mourn every family apart house david wives nathan
family house levi apart wives shimei
families remain every family apart wives
day there fountain opened house david inhabitants jerusalem sin uncleanness
come pass day saith lord hosts cut off names idols out land no more remembered also cause prophets unclean spirit
come pass any yet prophesy then father mother begat say thou shalt live speakest lies name lord thrust through prophesieth
come pass day prophets ashamed every one vision hath prophesied neither wear rough garment deceive
say am no prophet husbandman man taught keep cattle youth
one say what these wounds thine hands then answer those wounded house friends
awake o sword against shepherd man fellow saith lord hosts smite sheep scattered turn mine hand upon little ones
come pass land saith lord two parts therein cut off die third left
bring third part through fire refine silver refined try gold tried call on name hear say people lord god
behold day lord cometh thy spoil divided midst thee
gather nations against jerusalem battle city taken houses rifled women ravished half go forth captivity residue people cut off
then lord go forth fight against those nations fought day battle
feet stand day upon mount olives before jerusalem on east cleave midst thereof toward west there very great valley half mountain remove north south
ye flee valley mountains reach azal yea like fled before earthquake days uzziah king judah lord god come saints thee
come pass day light clear nor dark
one day known lord nor night come pass at evening time light
day living waters go out jerusalem half toward former sea hinder summer winter
lord king over earth day there one name
land turned plain geba rimmon south jerusalem lifted inhabited her place benjamin's gate first corner tower hananeel king's winepresses
men dwell there no more utter destruction jerusalem safely inhabited
plague wherewith lord smite people fought against jerusalem flesh consume away while stand upon feet eyes holes tongue mouth
come pass day great tumult lord among lay hold every one on hand neighbour rise against
judah also fight at jerusalem wealth heathen round about gathered together gold silver apparel great abundance
so plague horse mule camel ass beasts these tents
come pass every one left nations came against jerusalem even go year worship king lord hosts keep feast tabernacles
whoso come families earth jerusalem worship king lord hosts even upon no rain
if family egypt go come no rain there plague wherewith lord smite heathen keep feast tabernacles
punishment egypt nations come keep feast tabernacles
day there upon bells horses holiness lord pots lord's house like bowls before altar
yea every pot jerusalem judah holiness lord hosts sacrifice come take seethe therein day there no more canaanite house
burden word lord israel by malachi
loved you saith lord yet ye say wherein hast thou us esau jacob's brother jacob
hated esau laid mountains heritage waste dragons wilderness
whereas edom saith we impoverished return build desolate places thus lord hosts throw down call border wickedness people against whom hath indignation ever
your eyes see ye say lord magnified border israel
son honoureth father servant master if then where mine honour fear saith lord hosts you o priests despise name ye say wherein we despised thy
ye offer polluted bread upon mine altar say wherein we thee table lord contemptible
if ye offer blind sacrifice evil lame sick now thy governor pleased thee or accept person saith lord hosts
now pray you beseech god gracious us hath been by your means regard persons saith lord hosts
who there even among you would shut doors nought neither do ye kindle fire on mine altar no pleasure saith lord hosts accept offering at your hand
rising sun even going down same name great among gentiles every place incense offered pure offering heathen saith lord hosts
ye profaned say table lord polluted fruit thereof even meat contemptible
ye said also behold what weariness snuffed at saith lord hosts brought torn lame sick thus offering should accept your hand
cursed deceiver hath flock male voweth sacrificeth lord corrupt thing am great king saith hosts name dreadful among heathen
now o ye priests commandment you
if ye hear lay heart give glory name saith lord hosts even send curse upon you your blessings yea cursed already because do
behold corrupt your seed spread dung upon faces even solemn feasts one take you away
ye know sent commandment you covenant might levi saith lord hosts
covenant life peace gave fear wherewith feared afraid before name
law truth mouth iniquity found lips walked peace equity did turn many away
priest's lips should keep knowledge seek law at mouth messenger lord hosts
ye departed out way caused many stumble at law corrupted covenant levi saith lord hosts
therefore also made you contemptible base before people according ye kept ways been partial law
we one father hath god created us why do deal treacherously every man against brother by profaning covenant our fathers
judah hath dealt treacherously abomination committed israel jerusalem profaned holiness lord loved married daughter strange god
lord cut off man doeth master scholar out tabernacles jacob offereth offering hosts
ye done again covering altar lord tears weeping crying out insomuch regardeth offering any more or receiveth good at your hand
yet ye say wherefore because lord hath been witness between thee wife thy youth against whom thou hast dealt treacherously she companion covenant
did make one yet had residue spirit wherefore might seek godly seed therefore take heed your let none deal treacherously against wife youth
lord god israel saith hateth putting away one covereth violence garment hosts therefore take heed your spirit ye deal treacherously
ye wearied lord your words yet say wherein we every one doeth evil good sight delighteth or where god judgment
behold send messenger prepare way before lord whom ye seek suddenly come temple even covenant delight saith hosts
who may abide day coming stand appeareth like refiner's fire fullers' sope
sit refiner purifier silver purify sons levi purge gold may offer lord offering righteousness
then offering judah jerusalem pleasant lord days old former years
come near you judgment swift witness against sorcerers adulterers false swearers those oppress hireling wages widow fatherless turn aside stranger right fear saith lord hosts
am lord change therefore ye sons jacob consumed
even days your fathers ye gone away mine ordinances kept return you saith lord hosts said wherein we
man rob god yet ye robbed say wherein we thee tithes offerings
ye cursed curse robbed even whole nation
bring ye tithes storehouse there may meat mine house prove now herewith saith lord hosts if open you windows heaven pour out blessing room enough receive
rebuke devourer your sakes destroy fruits ground neither vine cast her fruit before time field saith lord hosts
nations call you blessed ye delightsome land saith lord hosts
your words been stout against saith lord yet ye say what we spoken so much thee
ye said vain serve god what profit we kept ordinance walked mournfully before lord hosts
now we call proud happy yea work wickedness set tempt god even delivered
then feared lord spake often one another hearkened heard book remembrance written before thought upon name
mine saith lord hosts day make jewels spare man spareth own son serveth
then ye return discern between righteous wicked serveth god
behold day cometh burn oven proud yea do wickedly stubble saith lord hosts leave neither root nor branch
you fear name sun righteousness arise healing wings ye go forth grow calves stall
ye tread down wicked ashes under soles your feet day do saith lord hosts
remember ye law moses servant commanded horeb israel statutes judgments
behold send you elijah prophet before coming great dreadful day lord
turn heart fathers children lest come smite earth curse
book generation jesus christ son david abraham
abraham begat isaac jacob judas brethren
judas begat phares zara thamar esrom aram
aram begat aminadab naasson salmon
salmon begat booz rachab obed ruth jesse
jesse begat david king solomon her had been wife urias
solomon begat roboam abia asa
asa begat josaphat joram ozias
ozias begat joatham achaz ezekias
ezekias begat manasses amon josias
josias begat jechonias brethren about time carried away babylon
after brought babylon jechonias begat salathiel zorobabel
zorobabel begat abiud eliakim azor
azor begat sadoc achim eliud
eliud begat eleazar matthan jacob
jacob begat joseph husband mary whom born jesus who called christ
so generations abraham david fourteen until carrying away babylon christ
now birth jesus christ on wise mother mary espoused joseph before came together she found child holy ghost
then joseph her husband being just man willing make publick example minded put away privily
while thought on these things behold angel lord appeared dream saying joseph thou son david fear take thee mary thy wife conceived her holy ghost
she bring forth son thou shalt call name jesus save people sins
now done might fulfilled spoken lord by prophet saying
behold virgin child bring forth son call name emmanuel being interpreted god us
then joseph being raised sleep did angel lord had bidden took wife
knew her till she had brought forth firstborn son called name jesus
now jesus born bethlehem judaea days herod king behold there came wise men east jerusalem
saying where born king jews we seen star east come worship
herod king had heard these things troubled jerusalem
had gathered chief priests scribes people together demanded where christ should born
said bethlehem judaea thus written by prophet
thou bethlehem land juda art least among princes out thee come governor rule people israel
then herod had privily called wise men enquired diligently what time star appeared
sent bethlehem said go search diligently young child ye found bring word again may come worship also
had heard king departed lo star saw east went before till came stood over where young child
saw star rejoiced exceeding great joy
come house saw young child mary mother fell down worshipped had opened treasures presented gifts gold frankincense myrrh
being warned god dream should return herod departed own country another way
departed behold angel lord appeareth joseph dream saying arise take young child mother flee egypt thou there until bring thee word herod seek destroy
arose took young child mother by night departed egypt
there until death herod might fulfilled spoken lord by prophet saying out egypt called son
then herod saw mocked wise men exceeding wroth sent forth slew children bethlehem coasts thereof two years old under according time had diligently enquired
then fulfilled spoken by jeremy prophet saying
rama there voice heard lamentation weeping great mourning rachel her children would comforted because
herod dead behold angel lord appeareth dream joseph egypt
saying arise take young child mother go land israel dead sought child's life
arose took young child mother came land israel
heard archelaus did reign judaea room father herod afraid go thither notwithstanding being warned god dream turned aside parts galilee
came dwelt city called nazareth might fulfilled spoken by prophets nazarene
those days came john baptist preaching wilderness judaea
saying repent ye kingdom heaven at hand
spoken by prophet esaias saying voice one crying wilderness prepare ye way lord make paths straight
same john had raiment camel's hair leathern girdle about loins meat locusts wild honey
then went out jerusalem judaea region round about jordan
baptized jordan confessing sins
saw many pharisees sadducees come baptism said o generation vipers who hath warned you flee wrath
bring forth therefore fruits meet repentance
think say within yourselves we abraham our father you god able these stones raise children
now also axe laid root trees therefore every tree bringeth forth good fruit hewn down cast fire
indeed baptize you water repentance cometh after mightier than whose shoes am worthy bear holy ghost fire
whose fan hand throughly purge floor gather wheat garner burn chaff unquenchable fire
then cometh jesus galilee jordan john baptized
john forbad saying need baptized thee comest thou
jesus answering said suffer so now thus becometh us fulfil righteousness then suffered
jesus baptized went straightway out water lo heavens opened saw spirit god descending like dove lighting upon
lo voice heaven saying beloved son whom am well pleased
then jesus led spirit wilderness tempted devil
had fasted forty days nights afterward hungred
tempter came said if thou son god command these stones made bread
answered said written man live by bread alone every word proceedeth out mouth god
then devil taketh holy city setteth on pinnacle temple
saith if thou son god cast thyself down written give angels charge concerning thee hands bear lest at any time dash thy foot against stone
jesus said written again thou shalt tempt lord thy god
again devil taketh exceeding high mountain sheweth kingdoms world glory
saith these things give thee if thou wilt fall down worship
then saith jesus get thee hence satan written thou shalt worship lord thy god only serve
then devil leaveth behold angels came ministered
now jesus had heard john cast prison departed galilee
leaving nazareth came dwelt capernaum upon sea coast borders zabulon nephthalim
might fulfilled spoken by esaias prophet saying
land zabulon nephthalim by way sea beyond jordan galilee gentiles
people sat darkness saw great light region shadow death sprung
time jesus began preach say repent kingdom heaven at hand
jesus walking by sea galilee saw two brethren simon called peter andrew brother casting net fishers
saith follow make you fishers men
straightway left nets followed
going on thence saw other two brethren james son zebedee john brother ship father mending nets called
immediately left ship father followed
jesus went about galilee teaching synagogues preaching gospel kingdom healing manner sickness disease among people
fame went throughout syria brought sick people taken divers diseases torments those possessed devils lunatick had palsy healed
there followed great multitudes people galilee decapolis jerusalem judaea beyond jordan
seeing multitudes went mountain set disciples came
opened mouth taught saying
blessed poor spirit their's kingdom heaven
blessed mourn comforted
blessed meek inherit earth
blessed do hunger thirst after righteousness filled
blessed merciful obtain mercy
blessed pure heart see god
blessed peacemakers called children god
blessed persecuted righteousness' sake their's kingdom heaven
blessed ye men revile you persecute say manner evil against falsely sake
rejoice exceeding glad great your reward heaven so persecuted prophets before you
ye salt earth if lost savour wherewith salted thenceforth good nothing cast out trodden under foot men
ye light world city set on hill cannot hid
neither do men light candle put under bushel on candlestick giveth house
let your light so shine before men may see good works glorify father heaven
think am come destroy law or prophets fulfil
verily say you till heaven earth pass one jot or tittle no wise law fulfilled
whosoever therefore break one these least commandments teach men so called kingdom heaven do same great
say you except your righteousness exceed scribes pharisees ye no case enter kingdom heaven
ye heard said by old time thou shalt kill whosoever danger judgment
say you whosoever angry brother without cause danger judgment raca council thou fool hell fire
therefore if thou bring thy gift altar there rememberest brother hath ought against thee
leave there thy gift before altar go way first reconciled brother then come offer
agree thine adversary quickly whiles thou art way lest at any time deliver thee judge officer cast prison
verily say thee thou shalt by no means come out thence till hast paid uttermost farthing
ye heard said by old time thou shalt commit adultery
say you whosoever looketh on woman lust after her hath committed adultery already heart
if thy right eye offend thee pluck out cast profitable one members should perish whole body hell
if thy right hand offend thee cut off cast profitable one members should perish whole body hell
hath been said whosoever put away wife let give her writing divorcement
say you whosoever put away wife saving cause fornication causeth her commit adultery marry divorced committeth
again ye heard hath been said by old time thou shalt forswear thyself perform lord thine oaths
say you swear at neither by heaven god's throne
nor by earth footstool neither jerusalem city great king
neither shalt thou swear by thy head because canst make one hair white or black
let your communication yea nay whatsoever more than these cometh evil
ye heard hath been said eye tooth
say you ye resist evil whosoever smite thee on thy right cheek turn other also
if any man sue thee at law take away thy coat let cloke also
whosoever compel thee go mile twain
give asketh thee would borrow turn thou away
ye heard hath been said thou shalt love thy neighbour hate thine enemy
say you love your enemies bless curse do good hate pray despitefully use persecute
ye may children your father heaven maketh sun rise on evil good sendeth rain just unjust
if ye love you what reward do even publicans same
if ye salute your brethren only what do more than others even publicans so
ye therefore perfect even your father heaven
take heed ye do your alms before men seen otherwise no reward father heaven
therefore thou doest thine alms do sound trumpet before thee hypocrites synagogues streets may glory men verily say you reward
thou doest alms let thy left hand know what right doeth
thine alms may secret thy father seeth himself reward thee openly
thou prayest shalt hypocrites love pray standing synagogues corners streets may seen men verily say you reward
thou prayest enter thy closet hast shut door pray father secret seeth reward thee openly
ye pray use vain repetitions heathen do think heard much speaking
ye therefore like your father knoweth what things need before ask
after manner therefore pray ye our father art heaven hallowed thy name
thy kingdom come done earth heaven
give us day our daily bread
forgive us our debts we debtors
lead us temptation deliver evil thine kingdom power glory ever amen
if ye forgive men trespasses your heavenly father also you
if ye forgive men trespasses neither your father
moreover ye fast hypocrites sad countenance disfigure faces may appear men verily say you reward
thou fastest anoint thine head wash thy face
thou appear men fast thy father secret seeth reward thee openly
lay yourselves treasures upon earth where moth rust doth corrupt thieves break through steal
lay yourselves treasures heaven where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt thieves do break through steal
where your treasure there heart also
light body eye if therefore thine single thy whole full
if thine eye evil thy whole body full darkness therefore light thee how great
no man can serve two masters either hate one love other or else hold despise ye cannot god mammon
therefore say you take no thought your life what ye eat or drink nor yet body put on more than meat raiment
behold fowls air sow neither do reap nor gather barns yet your heavenly father feedeth ye much better than
you by taking thought can add one cubit stature
why take ye thought raiment consider lilies field how grow toil neither do spin
yet say you even solomon glory arrayed like one these
wherefore if god so clothe grass field day morrow cast oven much more you o ye little faith
therefore take no thought saying what we eat or drink wherewithal clothed
after these things do gentiles seek your heavenly father knoweth ye need
seek ye first kingdom god righteousness these things added you
take therefore no thought morrow things itself sufficient day evil thereof
judge ye judged
what judgment ye judge judged measure mete measured you again
why beholdest thou mote thy brother's eye considerest beam thine own
or how wilt thou say thy brother let pull out mote thine eye behold beam own
thou hypocrite first cast out beam thine own eye then shalt see clearly mote thy brother's
give holy dogs neither cast ye your pearls before swine lest trample under feet turn again rend you
ask given you seek ye find knock opened
every one asketh receiveth seeketh findeth knocketh opened
or what man there you whom if son ask bread give stone
or if ask fish give serpent
if ye then being evil know how give good gifts your children much more father heaven things ask
therefore things whatsoever ye would men should do you even so law prophets
enter ye at strait gate wide broad way leadeth destruction many there go thereat
because strait gate narrow way leadeth life few there find
beware false prophets come you sheep's clothing inwardly ravening wolves
ye know by fruits do men gather grapes thorns or figs thistles
even so every good tree bringeth forth fruit corrupt evil
good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit neither can corrupt
every tree bringeth forth good fruit hewn down cast fire
wherefore by fruits ye know
every one saith lord enter kingdom heaven doeth father
many say day lord we prophesied thy name cast out devils done wonderful works
then profess never knew you depart ye work iniquity
therefore whosoever heareth these sayings mine doeth liken wise man built house upon rock
rain descended floods came winds blew beat upon house fell founded rock
every one heareth these sayings mine doeth likened foolish man built house upon sand
rain descended floods came winds blew beat upon house fell great fall
came pass jesus had ended these sayings people astonished at doctrine
taught one having authority scribes
come down mountain great multitudes followed
behold there came leper worshipped saying lord if thou wilt canst make clean
jesus put forth hand touched saying thou clean immediately leprosy cleansed
jesus saith see thou tell no man go thy way shew thyself priest offer gift moses commanded testimony
jesus entered capernaum there came centurion beseeching
saying lord servant lieth at home sick palsy grievously tormented
jesus saith come heal
centurion answered said lord am worthy thou shouldest come under roof speak word only servant healed
am man under authority having soldiers say go goeth another come cometh servant do doeth
jesus heard marvelled said followed verily say you found so great faith no israel
say you many come east west sit down abraham isaac jacob kingdom heaven
children kingdom cast out outer darkness there weeping gnashing teeth
jesus said centurion go thy way thou hast believed so done thee servant healed selfsame hour
jesus come peter's house saw wife's mother laid sick fever
touched her hand fever left she arose ministered
even come brought many possessed devils cast out spirits word healed sick
might fulfilled spoken by esaias prophet saying himself took our infirmities bare sicknesses
now jesus saw great multitudes about gave commandment depart other side
certain scribe came said master follow thee whithersoever thou goest
jesus saith foxes holes birds air nests son man hath where lay head
another disciples said lord suffer first go bury father
jesus said follow let dead bury
entered ship disciples followed
behold there arose great tempest sea insomuch ship covered waves asleep
disciples came awoke saying lord save us we perish
saith why ye fearful o little faith then arose rebuked winds sea there great calm
men marvelled saying what manner man even winds sea obey
come other side country gergesenes there met two possessed devils coming out tombs exceeding fierce so no man might pass by way
behold cried out saying what we do thee jesus thou son god art come hither torment us before time
there good way off herd many swine feeding
so devils besought saying if thou cast us out suffer go away herd swine
said go come out went herd swine behold whole ran violently down steep place sea perished waters
kept fled went ways city told every thing what befallen possessed devils
behold whole city came out meet jesus saw besought would depart coasts
entered ship passed over came own city
behold brought man sick palsy lying on bed jesus seeing faith said son good cheer thy sins forgiven thee
behold certain scribes said within themselves man blasphemeth
jesus knowing thoughts said wherefore think ye evil your hearts
whether easier say thy sins forgiven thee or arise walk
ye may know son man hath power on earth forgive sins then saith sick palsy arise take thy bed go thine house
arose departed house
multitudes saw marvelled glorified god had given such power men
jesus passed forth thence saw man named matthew sitting at receipt custom saith follow arose followed
came pass jesus sat at meat house behold many publicans sinners down disciples
pharisees saw said disciples why eateth your master publicans sinners
jesus heard said whole need physician sick
go ye learn what meaneth mercy sacrifice am come call righteous sinners repentance
then came disciples john saying why do we pharisees fast oft thy
jesus said can children bridechamber mourn long bridegroom days come taken then fast
no man putteth piece new cloth old garment put fill taketh rent made worse
neither do men put new wine old bottles else break runneth out perish both preserved
while spake these things behold there came certain ruler worshipped saying daughter even now dead come lay thy hand upon her she live
jesus arose followed so did disciples
behold woman diseased issue blood twelve years came behind touched hem garment
she said within herself if may touch garment whole
jesus turned about saw her said daughter good comfort thy faith hath made thee whole woman hour
jesus came ruler's house saw minstrels people making noise
said give place maid dead sleepeth laughed scorn
people put forth went took her by hand maid arose
fame hereof went abroad land
jesus departed thence two blind men followed crying saying thou son david mercy on us
come house blind men came jesus saith believe ye am able do said yea lord
then touched eyes saying according your faith you
eyes opened jesus straitly charged saying see no man know
departed spread abroad fame country
went out behold brought dumb man possessed devil
devil cast out dumb spake multitudes marvelled saying never so seen israel
pharisees said casteth out devils through prince
jesus went about cities villages teaching synagogues preaching gospel kingdom healing every sickness disease among people
saw multitudes moved compassion on because fainted scattered abroad sheep having no shepherd
then saith disciples harvest truly plenteous labourers few
pray ye therefore lord harvest send forth labourers
had called twelve disciples gave power against unclean spirits cast out heal manner sickness disease
now names twelve apostles these first simon who called peter andrew brother james son zebedee john
philip bartholomew thomas matthew publican james son alphaeus lebbaeus whose surname thaddaeus
simon canaanite judas iscariot who also betrayed
these twelve jesus sent forth commanded saying go way gentiles any city samaritans enter ye
go rather lost sheep house israel
ye go preach saying kingdom heaven at hand
heal sick cleanse lepers raise dead cast out devils freely ye received give
provide neither gold nor silver brass your purses
nor scrip your journey neither two coats shoes yet staves workman worthy meat
whatsoever city or town ye enter enquire who worthy there abide till go thence
ye come house salute
if house worthy let your peace come upon return you
whosoever receive you nor hear your words ye depart out house or city shake off dust feet
verily say you more tolerable land sodom gomorrha day judgment than city
behold send you forth sheep midst wolves ye therefore wise serpents harmless doves
beware men deliver you councils scourge synagogues
ye brought before governors kings sake testimony against gentiles
deliver you take no thought how or what ye speak given same hour
ye speak spirit your father speaketh you
brother deliver death father child children rise against parents cause put
ye hated men name's sake endureth end saved
persecute you city flee ye another verily say gone over cities israel till son man come
disciple above master nor servant lord
enough disciple master servant lord if called house beelzebub how much more call household
fear therefore there nothing covered revealed hid known
what tell you darkness speak ye light hear ear preach upon housetops
fear kill body able soul rather destroy both hell
two sparrows sold farthing one fall on ground without your father
very hairs your head numbered
fear ye therefore more value than many sparrows
whosoever therefore confess before men also father heaven
whosoever deny before men also father heaven
think am come send peace on earth came sword
am come set man at variance against father daughter her mother law
man's foes own household
loveth father or mother more than worthy son daughter
taketh cross followeth after worthy
findeth life lose loseth sake find
receiveth you sent
receiveth prophet name receive prophet's reward righteous man man's
whosoever give drink one these little ones cup cold water only name disciple verily say you no wise lose reward
came pass jesus had made end commanding twelve disciples departed thence teach preach cities
now john had heard prison works christ sent two disciples
said art thou should come or do we look another
jesus answered said go shew john again those things ye do hear see
blind receive sight lame walk lepers cleansed deaf hear dead raised poor gospel preached
blessed whosoever offended
departed jesus began say multitudes concerning john what went ye out wilderness see reed shaken wind
what went ye out see man clothed soft raiment behold wear clothing kings' houses
what went ye out see prophet yea say you more than
whom written behold send messenger before thy face prepare way thee
verily say you among born women there hath risen greater than john baptist notwithstanding least kingdom heaven
days john baptist until now kingdom heaven suffereth violence violent take by force
prophets law prophesied until john
if ye receive elias come
hath ears hear let
whereunto liken generation like children sitting markets calling fellows
saying we piped you ye danced mourned lamented
john came neither eating nor drinking say hath devil
son man came eating drinking say behold gluttonous winebibber friend publicans sinners wisdom justified her children
then began upbraid cities wherein most mighty works done because repented
woe thee chorazin bethsaida if mighty works done you had been tyre sidon would repented long ago sackcloth ashes
say you more tolerable tyre sidon at day judgment than
thou capernaum art exalted heaven shalt brought down hell if mighty works been done thee had sodom would remained until day
say you more tolerable land sodom day judgment than thee
at time jesus answered said thank thee o father lord heaven earth because thou hast hid these things wise prudent revealed babes
even so father seemed good thy sight
things delivered father no man knoweth son neither any save whomsoever reveal
come ye labour heavy laden give you rest
take yoke upon you learn am meek lowly heart ye find rest your souls
yoke easy burden light
at time jesus went on sabbath day through corn disciples hungred began pluck ears eat
pharisees saw said behold thy disciples do lawful upon sabbath day
said ye read what david did hungred
how entered house god did eat shewbread lawful neither only priests
or ye read law how on sabbath days priests temple profane blameless
say you place one greater than temple
if ye had known what meaneth mercy sacrifice would condemned guiltless
son man lord even sabbath day
departed thence went synagogue
behold there man had hand withered asked saying lawful heal on sabbath days might accuse
said what man there among you one sheep if fall pit on sabbath day lay hold lift out
how much then man better than sheep wherefore lawful do well on sabbath days
then saith man stretch forth thine hand stretched restored whole like other
then pharisees went out held council against how might destroy
jesus knew withdrew himself thence great multitudes followed healed
charged should make known
might fulfilled spoken by esaias prophet saying
behold servant whom chosen beloved soul well pleased put spirit upon shew judgment gentiles
strive nor cry neither any man hear voice streets
bruised reed break smoking flax quench till send forth judgment victory
name gentiles trust
then brought one possessed devil blind dumb healed insomuch both spake saw
people amazed said son david
pharisees heard said fellow doth cast out devils by beelzebub prince
jesus knew thoughts said every kingdom divided against itself brought desolation city or house stand
if satan cast out divided against himself how then kingdom stand
