if by beelzebub cast out devils whom do your children therefore judges
if cast out devils by spirit god then kingdom come you
or else how can one enter strong man's house spoil goods except first bind man then
against gathereth scattereth abroad
wherefore say you manner sin blasphemy forgiven men against holy ghost
whosoever speaketh word against son man forgiven holy ghost neither world come
either make tree good fruit or else corrupt known by
o generation vipers how can ye being evil speak good things out abundance heart mouth speaketh
good man out treasure heart bringeth forth things evil
say you every idle word men speak give account thereof day judgment
by thy words thou shalt justified condemned
then certain scribes pharisees answered saying master we would see sign thee
answered said evil adulterous generation seeketh after sign there no given prophet jonas
jonas three days nights whale's belly so son man heart earth
men nineveh rise judgment generation condemn because repented at preaching jonas behold greater than here
queen south rise judgment generation condemn she came uttermost parts earth hear wisdom solomon behold greater than here
unclean spirit gone out man walketh through dry places seeking rest findeth none
then saith return house whence came out come findeth empty swept garnished
then goeth taketh himself seven other spirits more wicked than enter dwell there last state man worse first even so also generation
while yet talked people behold mother brethren stood without desiring speak
then one said behold thy mother brethren stand without desiring speak thee
answered said told who mother brethren
stretched forth hand toward disciples said behold mother brethren
whosoever do father heaven same brother sister mother
same day went jesus out house sat by sea side
great multitudes gathered together so went ship sat whole multitude stood on shore
spake many things parables saying behold sower went forth sow
sowed some seeds fell by way side fowls came devoured
some fell upon stony places where had much earth forthwith sprung because no deepness
sun scorched because had no root withered away
some fell among thorns sprung choked
other fell good ground brought forth fruit some hundredfold sixtyfold thirtyfold
who hath ears hear let
disciples came said why speakest thou parables
answered said because given you know mysteries kingdom heaven
whosoever hath given more abundance taken away even
therefore speak parables because seeing see hearing hear neither do understand
fulfilled prophecy esaias saith by hearing ye hear understand seeing see perceive
people's heart waxed gross ears dull hearing eyes closed lest at any time should see hear understand converted heal
blessed your eyes see ears hear
verily say you many prophets righteous men desired see those things ye seen hear heard
hear ye therefore parable sower
any one heareth word kingdom understandeth then cometh wicked catcheth away sown heart received seed by way side
received seed stony places same heareth word anon joy receiveth
yet hath root himself dureth while tribulation or persecution ariseth because word by offended
also received seed among thorns heareth word care world deceitfulness riches choke becometh unfruitful
received seed good ground heareth word understandeth also beareth fruit bringeth forth some hundredfold sixty thirty
another parable put forth saying kingdom heaven likened man sowed good seed field
while men slept enemy came sowed tares among wheat went way
blade sprung brought forth fruit then appeared tares also
so servants householder came said sir didst thou sow good seed thy field whence then hath tares
said enemy hath done servants wilt thou then we go gather
said nay lest while ye gather tares root also wheat
let both grow together until harvest time say reapers gather ye first tares bind bundles burn wheat barn
another parable put forth saying kingdom heaven like grain mustard seed man took sowed field
indeed least seeds grown greatest among herbs becometh tree so birds air come lodge branches thereof
another parable spake kingdom heaven like leaven woman took hid three measures meal till whole leavened
these things spake jesus multitude parables without parable
might fulfilled spoken by prophet saying open mouth parables utter things been kept secret foundation world
then jesus sent multitude away went house disciples came saying declare us parable tares field
answered said soweth good seed son man
field world good seed children kingdom tares wicked one
enemy sowed devil harvest end world reapers angels
therefore tares gathered burned fire so end world
son man send forth angels gather out kingdom things offend do iniquity
cast furnace fire there wailing gnashing teeth
then righteous shine forth sun kingdom father who hath ears hear let
again kingdom heaven like treasure hid field man hath found hideth joy thereof goeth selleth buyeth
again kingdom heaven like merchant man seeking goodly pearls
who had found one pearl great price went sold bought
again kingdom heaven like net cast sea gathered every kind
full drew shore sat down gathered good vessels cast bad away
so at end world angels come forth sever wicked among just
cast furnace fire there wailing gnashing teeth
jesus saith ye understood these things say yea lord
then said therefore every scribe instructed kingdom heaven like man householder bringeth forth out treasure things new old
came pass jesus had finished these parables departed thence
come own country taught synagogue insomuch astonished said whence hath man wisdom these mighty works
carpenter's son mother called mary brethren james joses simon judas
sisters us whence then hath man these things
offended jesus said prophet without honour save own country house
did many mighty works there because unbelief
at time herod tetrarch heard fame jesus
said servants john baptist risen dead therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves
herod had laid hold on john bound put prison herodias' sake brother philip's wife
john said lawful thee her
would put death feared multitude because counted prophet
herod's birthday kept daughter herodias danced before pleased herod
whereupon promised oath give her whatsoever she would ask
she being before instructed her mother said give here john baptist's head charger
king sorry nevertheless oath's sake sat at meat commanded given her
sent beheaded john prison
head brought charger given damsel she her mother
disciples came took body buried went told jesus
jesus heard departed thence by ship desert place apart people had thereof followed on foot out cities
jesus went forth saw great multitude moved compassion toward healed sick
evening disciples came saying desert place time now past send multitude away may go villages buy themselves victuals
jesus said need depart give ye eat
say we here five loaves two fishes
said bring hither
commanded multitude sit down on grass took five loaves two fishes looking heaven blessed brake gave disciples
did eat filled took fragments remained twelve baskets full
had eaten about five thousand men beside women children
straightway jesus constrained disciples get ship go before other side while sent multitudes away
had sent multitudes away went mountain apart pray evening come there alone
ship now midst sea tossed waves wind contrary
fourth watch night jesus went walking on sea
disciples saw walking on sea troubled saying spirit cried out fear
straightway jesus spake saying good cheer afraid
peter answered said lord if thou bid come thee on water
said come peter down out ship walked on water go jesus
saw wind boisterous afraid beginning sink cried saying lord save
immediately jesus stretched forth hand caught said o thou little faith wherefore didst doubt
come ship wind ceased
then ship came worshipped saying truth thou art son god
gone over came land gennesaret
men place had knowledge sent out country round about brought diseased
besought might only touch hem garment many touched made perfectly whole
then came jesus scribes pharisees jerusalem saying
why do thy disciples transgress tradition elders wash hands eat bread
answered said why do ye also transgress commandment god by your tradition
god commanded saying honour thy father mother curseth or let die death
ye say whosoever father or mother gift by whatsoever thou mightest profited
honour father or mother free thus ye made commandment god none effect by your tradition
ye hypocrites well did esaias prophesy you saying
people draweth nigh mouth honoureth lips heart far
vain do worship teaching doctrines commandments men
called multitude said hear understand
goeth mouth defileth man cometh out
then came disciples said knowest thou pharisees offended after heard saying
answered said every plant heavenly father hath planted rooted
let alone blind leaders if lead both fall ditch
then answered peter said declare us parable
jesus said ye also yet without understanding
do ye yet understand whatsoever entereth at mouth goeth belly cast out draught
those things proceed out mouth come forth heart defile man
out heart proceed evil thoughts murders adulteries fornications thefts false witness blasphemies
these things defile man eat unwashen hands defileth
then jesus went thence departed coasts tyre sidon
behold woman canaan came out same coasts cried saying mercy on o lord thou son david daughter grievously vexed devil
answered her word disciples came besought saying send away she crieth after us
answered said am sent lost sheep house israel
then came she worshipped saying lord help
answered said meet take children's bread cast dogs
she said truth lord yet dogs eat crumbs fall masters' table
then jesus answered said her o woman great thy faith thee even thou wilt daughter made whole very hour
jesus departed thence came nigh sea galilee went mountain sat down there
great multitudes came having those lame blind dumb maimed many others cast down at jesus' feet healed
insomuch multitude wondered saw dumb speak maimed whole lame walk blind see glorified god israel
then jesus called disciples said compassion on multitude because continue now three days nothing eat send away fasting lest faint way
disciples say whence should we so much bread wilderness fill great multitude
jesus saith how many loaves ye said seven few little fishes
commanded multitude sit down on ground
took seven loaves fishes gave thanks brake disciples multitude
did eat filled took broken meat left seven baskets full
did eat four thousand men beside women children
sent away multitude took ship came coasts magdala
pharisees also sadducees came tempting desired would shew sign heaven
answered said evening ye say fair weather sky red
morning foul weather day sky red lowring o ye hypocrites can discern face signs times
wicked adulterous generation seeketh after sign there no given prophet jonas left departed
disciples come other side had forgotten take bread
then jesus said take heed beware leaven pharisees sadducees
reasoned among themselves saying because we taken no bread
jesus perceived said o ye little faith why reason among yourselves because brought no bread
do ye yet understand neither remember five loaves thousand how many baskets took
neither seven loaves four thousand how many baskets ye took
how ye do understand spake you concerning bread should beware leaven pharisees sadducees
then understood how bade beware leaven bread doctrine pharisees sadducees
jesus came coasts caesarea philippi asked disciples saying whom do men say son man am
said some say thou art john baptist elias others jeremias or one prophets
saith whom say ye am
simon peter answered said thou art christ son living god
jesus answered said blessed art thou simon barjona flesh blood hath revealed thee father heaven
say also thee thou art peter upon rock build church gates hell prevail against
give thee keys kingdom heaven whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth bound loose loosed
then charged disciples should tell no man jesus christ
time forth began jesus shew disciples how must go jerusalem suffer many things elders chief priests scribes killed raised again third day
then peter took began rebuke saying far thee lord
turned said peter get thee behind satan thou art offence savourest things god those men
then said jesus disciples if any man come after let deny himself take cross follow
whosoever save life lose sake find
what man profited if gain whole world lose own soul or give exchange
son man come glory father angels then reward every according works
verily say you there some standing here taste death till see son man coming kingdom
after six days jesus taketh peter james john brother bringeth high mountain apart
transfigured before face did shine sun raiment white light
behold there appeared moses elias talking
then answered peter said jesus lord good us here if thou wilt let make three tabernacles one thee moses elias
while yet spake behold bright cloud overshadowed voice out said beloved son whom am well pleased hear ye
disciples heard fell on face sore afraid
jesus came touched said arise afraid
had lifted eyes saw no man save jesus only
came down mountain jesus charged saying tell vision no man until son risen again dead
disciples asked saying why then say scribes elias must first come
jesus answered said elias truly first come restore things
say you elias come already knew done whatsoever listed likewise also son man suffer
then disciples understood spake john baptist
come multitude there came certain man kneeling down saying
lord mercy on son lunatick sore vexed ofttimes falleth fire oft water
brought thy disciples could cure
then jesus answered said o faithless perverse generation how long you suffer bring hither
jesus rebuked devil departed out child cured very hour
then came disciples jesus apart said why could we cast out
jesus said because your unbelief verily say you if ye faith grain mustard seed mountain remove hence yonder place nothing impossible
howbeit kind goeth out by prayer fasting
while abode galilee jesus said son man betrayed hands men
kill third day raised again exceeding sorry
come capernaum received tribute money came peter said doth your master pay
saith yes come house jesus prevented saying what thinkest thou simon whom do kings earth take custom or tribute own children strangers
peter saith strangers jesus then children free
notwithstanding lest we should offend go thou sea cast hook take fish first cometh hast opened mouth shalt find piece money give thee
at same time came disciples jesus saying who greatest kingdom heaven
jesus called little child set midst
said verily say you except ye converted become little children enter kingdom heaven
whosoever therefore humble himself little child same greatest kingdom heaven
whoso receive one such little child name receiveth
whoso offend one these little ones believe better millstone hanged about neck drowned depth sea
woe world because offences must needs come man by whom offence cometh
wherefore if thy hand or foot offend thee cut off cast better enter life halt maimed rather than having two hands feet everlasting fire
if thine eye offend thee pluck out cast better enter life one rather than having two eyes hell fire
take heed ye despise one these little ones say you heaven angels do always behold face father
son man come save lost
how think ye if man hundred sheep one gone astray doth leave ninety nine goeth mountains seeketh
if so find verily say you rejoiceth more sheep than ninety nine went astray
even so your father heaven one these little ones should perish
moreover if thy brother trespass against thee go tell fault between alone hear thou hast gained
if hear thee then take one or two more mouth three witnesses every word may established
if neglect hear tell church let thee heathen man publican
verily say you whatsoever ye bind on earth bound heaven loose loosed
again say you if two agree on earth touching any thing ask done father heaven
where two or three gathered together name there am midst
then came peter said lord how oft brother sin against forgive till seven times
jesus saith say thee until seven times seventy
therefore kingdom heaven likened certain king would take account servants
had begun reckon one brought owed ten thousand talents
forasmuch had pay lord commanded sold wife children payment made
servant therefore fell down worshipped saying lord patience pay thee
then lord servant moved compassion loosed forgave debt
same servant went out found one fellowservants owed hundred pence laid hands on took by throat saying pay thou owest
fellowservant fell down at feet besought saying patience pay thee
would went cast prison till should pay debt
so fellowservants saw what done very sorry came told lord
then lord after had called said o thou wicked servant forgave thee debt because desiredst
shouldest thou also had compassion on thy fellowservant even pity thee
lord wroth delivered tormentors till should pay due
so likewise heavenly father do also you if ye your hearts forgive every one brother trespasses
came pass jesus had finished these sayings departed galilee coasts judaea beyond jordan
great multitudes followed healed there
pharisees also came tempting saying lawful man put away wife every cause
answered said ye read made at beginning male female
said cause man leave father mother cleave wife twain one flesh
wherefore no more twain one flesh what therefore god hath joined together let man put asunder
say why did moses then command give writing divorcement put her away
saith moses because hardness your hearts suffered you put away wives beginning so
say you whosoever put away wife except fornication marry another committeth adultery whoso marrieth her doth commit
disciples say if case man so wife good marry
said men cannot receive saying save whom given
there some eunuchs so born mother's womb made men themselves kingdom heaven's sake able receive let
then there brought little children should put hands on pray disciples rebuked
jesus said suffer little children forbid come such kingdom heaven
laid hands on departed thence
behold one came said good master what thing do may eternal life
said why callest thou good there none one god if wilt enter life keep commandments
saith jesus said thou shalt do no murder commit adultery steal bear false witness
honour thy father mother thou shalt love neighbour thyself
young man saith these things kept youth what lack yet
jesus said if thou wilt perfect go sell hast give poor shalt treasure heaven come follow
young man heard saying went away sorrowful had great possessions
then said jesus disciples verily say you rich man hardly enter kingdom heaven
again say you easier camel go through eye needle than rich man enter kingdom god
disciples heard exceedingly amazed saying who then can saved
jesus beheld said men impossible god things possible
then answered peter said behold we forsaken followed thee what therefore
jesus said verily say you ye followed regeneration son man sit throne glory also upon twelve thrones judging tribes israel
every one hath forsaken houses or brethren sisters father mother wife children lands name's sake receive hundredfold inherit everlasting life
many first last
kingdom heaven like man householder went out early morning hire labourers vineyard
had agreed labourers penny day sent vineyard
went out about third hour saw others standing idle marketplace
said go ye also vineyard whatsoever right give you went way
again went out about sixth ninth hour did likewise
about eleventh hour went out found others standing idle saith why stand ye here day
say because no man hath hired us saith go ye also vineyard whatsoever right receive
so even come lord vineyard saith steward call labourers give hire beginning last first
came hired about eleventh hour received every man penny
first came supposed should received more likewise every man penny
had received murmured against goodman house
saying these last wrought one hour thou hast made equal us borne burden heat day
answered one said friend do thee no wrong didst thou agree penny
take thine go thy way give last even thee
lawful do what mine own thine eye evil because am good
so last first many called few chosen
jesus going jerusalem took twelve disciples apart way said
behold we go jerusalem son man betrayed chief priests scribes condemn death
deliver gentiles mock scourge crucify third day rise again
then came mother zebedee's children her sons worshipping desiring certain thing
said her what wilt thou she saith grant these two sons may sit one on thy right hand other left kingdom
jesus answered said ye know what ask able drink cup baptized baptism am say we
saith ye drink indeed cup baptized baptism am sit on right hand left mine give given whom prepared father
ten heard moved indignation against two brethren
jesus called said ye know princes gentiles exercise dominion over great authority upon
so among you whosoever great let your minister
whosoever chief among you let your servant
even son man came ministered minister give life ransom many
departed jericho great multitude followed
behold two blind men sitting by way side heard jesus passed cried out saying mercy on us o lord thou son david
multitude rebuked because should hold peace cried more saying mercy on us o lord thou son david
jesus stood still called said what ye do you
say lord our eyes may opened
so jesus had compassion on touched eyes immediately received sight followed
drew nigh jerusalem come bethphage mount olives then sent jesus two disciples
saying go village over against you straightway ye find ass tied colt her loose bring
if any man say ought you ye lord hath need straightway send
done might fulfilled spoken by prophet saying
tell ye daughter sion behold thy king cometh thee meek sitting upon ass colt foal
disciples went did jesus commanded
brought ass colt put on clothes set thereon
very great multitude spread garments way others cut down branches trees strawed
multitudes went before followed cried saying hosanna son david blessed cometh name lord highest
come jerusalem city moved saying who
multitude said jesus prophet nazareth galilee
jesus went temple god cast out sold bought overthrew tables moneychangers seats doves
said written house called prayer ye made den thieves
blind lame came temple healed
chief priests scribes saw wonderful things did children crying temple saying hosanna son david sore displeased
said hearest thou what these say jesus saith yea ye never read out mouth babes sucklings hast perfected praise
left went out city bethany lodged there
now morning returned city hungered
saw fig tree way came found nothing thereon leaves only said let no fruit grow on thee henceforward ever presently withered away
disciples saw marvelled saying how soon fig tree withered away
jesus answered said verily say you if ye faith doubt only do done fig tree also mountain thou removed cast sea
things whatsoever ye ask prayer believing receive
come temple chief priests elders people came teaching said by what authority doest thou these things who gave thee
jesus answered said also ask you one thing if ye tell like wise by what authority do these things
baptism john whence heaven or men reasoned themselves saying if we say us why did ye then believe
if we say men fear people hold john prophet
answered jesus said we cannot tell neither you by what authority do these things
what think ye certain man had two sons came first said son go work day vineyard
answered said afterward repented went
came second said likewise answered go sir went
whether twain did father say first jesus saith verily you publicans harlots go kingdom god before
john came you way righteousness ye believed publicans harlots had seen repented afterward might believe
hear another parable there certain householder planted vineyard hedged round about digged winepress built tower let out husbandmen went far country
time fruit drew near sent servants husbandmen might receive fruits
husbandmen took servants beat one killed another stoned
again sent other servants more than first did likewise
last sent son saying reverence
husbandmen saw son said among themselves heir come let us kill seize on inheritance
caught cast out vineyard slew
lord therefore vineyard cometh what do those husbandmen
say miserably destroy those wicked men let out vineyard other husbandmen render fruits seasons
jesus saith did ye never read scriptures stone builders rejected same become head corner lord's doing marvellous our eyes
therefore say you kingdom god taken given nation bringing forth fruits thereof
whosoever fall on stone broken whomsoever grind powder
chief priests pharisees had heard parables perceived spake
sought lay hands on feared multitude because took prophet
jesus answered spake again by parables said
kingdom heaven like certain king made marriage son
sent forth servants call bidden wedding would come
again sent forth other servants saying tell bidden behold prepared dinner oxen fatlings killed things ready come marriage
made light went ways one farm another merchandise
remnant took servants entreated spitefully slew
king heard thereof wroth sent forth armies destroyed those murderers burned city
then saith servants wedding ready bidden worthy
go ye therefore highways many find bid marriage
so those servants went out highways gathered together many found both bad good wedding furnished guests
king came see guests saw there man had on wedding garment
saith friend how camest thou hither having wedding garment speechless
then said king servants bind hand foot take away cast outer darkness there weeping gnashing teeth
many called few chosen
then went pharisees took counsel how might entangle talk
sent out disciples herodians saying master we know thou art true teachest way god truth neither carest any man regardest person men
tell us therefore what thinkest thou lawful give tribute caesar or
jesus perceived wickedness said why tempt ye hypocrites
shew tribute money brought penny
saith whose image superscription
say caesar's then saith render therefore caesar things god god's
had heard these words marvelled left went way
same day came sadducees say there no resurrection asked
saying master moses said if man die having no children brother marry wife raise seed
now there us seven brethren first had married wife deceased having no issue left brother
likewise second also third seventh
last woman died also
therefore resurrection whose wife she seven had her
jesus answered said ye do err knowing scriptures nor power god
resurrection neither marry nor given marriage angels god heaven
touching resurrection dead ye read spoken you by god saying
am god abraham isaac jacob dead living
multitude heard astonished at doctrine
pharisees had heard put sadducees silence gathered together
then one lawyer asked question tempting saying
master great commandment law
jesus said thou shalt love lord thy god heart soul mind
first great commandment
second like thou shalt love thy neighbour thyself
on these two commandments hang law prophets
while pharisees gathered together jesus asked
saying what think ye christ whose son say david
saith how then doth david spirit call lord saying
lord said sit thou on right hand till make thine enemies thy footstool
if david then call lord how son
no man able answer word neither durst any day forth ask more questions
then spake jesus multitude disciples
saying scribes pharisees sit moses' seat
therefore whatsoever bid you observe do ye after works say
bind heavy burdens grievous borne lay on men's shoulders themselves move one fingers
works do seen men make broad phylacteries enlarge borders garments
love uppermost rooms at feasts chief seats synagogues
greetings markets called men rabbi
ye called rabbi one your master even christ brethren
call no man your father upon earth one heaven
neither ye called masters one your master even christ
greatest among you your servant
whosoever exalt himself abased humble exalted
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites ye shut kingdom heaven against men neither go yourselves suffer entering
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites ye devour widows' houses pretence make long prayer therefore receive greater damnation
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites ye compass sea land make one proselyte made twofold more child hell than yourselves
woe you ye blind guides say whosoever swear by temple nothing gold debtor
ye fools blind whether greater gold or temple sanctifieth
whosoever swear by altar nothing sweareth gift upon guilty
ye fools blind whether greater gift or altar sanctifieth
whoso therefore swear by altar sweareth things thereon
whoso swear by temple sweareth dwelleth therein
swear by heaven sweareth throne god sitteth thereon
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites ye pay tithe mint anise cummin omitted weightier matters law judgment mercy faith these ought done leave other undone
ye blind guides strain at gnat swallow camel
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites ye make clean outside cup platter within full extortion excess
thou blind pharisee cleanse first within cup platter outside may clean also
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites ye like whited sepulchres indeed appear beautiful outward within full dead men's bones uncleanness
even so ye also outwardly appear righteous men within full hypocrisy iniquity
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites because ye build tombs prophets garnish sepulchres righteous
say if we had been days our fathers would partakers blood prophets
wherefore ye witnesses yourselves children killed prophets
fill ye then measure your fathers
ye serpents generation vipers how can escape damnation hell
wherefore behold send you prophets wise men scribes some ye kill crucify scourge your synagogues persecute city
upon you may come righteous blood shed earth abel zacharias son barachias whom ye slew between temple altar
verily say you these things come upon generation
o jerusalem thou killest prophets stonest sent thee how often would gathered thy children together even hen gathereth her chickens under wings ye
behold your house left you desolate
say you ye see henceforth till blessed cometh name lord
jesus went out departed temple disciples came shew buildings
jesus said see ye these things verily say you there left here one stone upon another thrown down
sat upon mount olives disciples came privately saying tell us these things what sign thy coming end world
jesus answered said take heed no man deceive you
many come name saying am christ deceive
ye hear wars rumours see troubled these things must come pass end yet
nation rise against kingdom there famines pestilences earthquakes divers places
these beginning sorrows
then deliver you afflicted kill ye hated nations name's sake
then many offended betray one another hate
many false prophets rise deceive
because iniquity abound love many wax cold
endure end same saved
gospel kingdom preached world witness nations then end come
ye therefore see abomination desolation spoken by daniel prophet stand holy place whoso readeth let understand
then let judaea flee mountains
let on housetop come down take any thing out house
neither let field return back take clothes
woe child give suck those days
pray ye your flight winter neither on sabbath day
then great tribulation such since beginning world time no nor ever
except those days should shortened there no flesh saved elect's sake
then if any man say you lo here christ or there believe
there arise false christs prophets shew great signs wonders insomuch if possible deceive very elect
behold told you before
wherefore if say you behold desert go forth secret chambers believe
lightning cometh out east shineth even west so also coming son man
wheresoever carcase there eagles gathered together
immediately after tribulation those days sun darkened moon give her light stars fall heaven powers heavens shaken
then appear sign son man heaven tribes earth mourn see coming clouds power great glory
send angels great sound trumpet gather together elect four winds one end heaven other
now learn parable fig tree branch yet tender putteth forth leaves ye know summer nigh
so likewise ye see these things know near even at doors
verily say you generation pass till these things fulfilled
heaven earth pass away words
day hour knoweth no man angels heaven father only
days noe so also coming son man
days before flood eating drinking marrying giving marriage until day noe entered ark
knew until flood came took away so also coming son man
then two field one taken other left
two women grinding at mill one taken other left
watch therefore ye know what hour your lord doth come
know if goodman house had known what watch thief would come watched suffered broken
therefore ye also ready such hour think son man cometh
who then faithful wise servant whom lord hath made ruler over household give meat due season
blessed servant whom lord cometh find so doing
verily say you make ruler over goods
if evil servant say heart lord delayeth coming
begin smite fellowservants eat drink drunken
lord servant come day looketh hour aware
cut asunder appoint portion hypocrites there weeping gnashing teeth
then kingdom heaven likened ten virgins took lamps went forth meet bridegroom
five wise foolish
foolish took lamps no oil
wise took oil vessels lamps
while bridegroom tarried slumbered slept
at midnight there cry made behold bridegroom cometh go ye out meet
then those virgins arose trimmed lamps
foolish said wise give us your oil our lamps gone out
wise answered saying so lest there enough us you go ye rather sell buy yourselves
while went buy bridegroom came ready marriage door shut
afterward came also other virgins saying lord open us
answered said verily say you know
watch therefore ye know neither day nor hour wherein son man cometh
kingdom heaven man travelling far country who called own servants delivered goods
one gave five talents another two every man according several ability straightway took journey
then had received five talents went traded same made other
likewise had received two also gained other
had received one went digged earth hid lord's money
after long time lord those servants cometh reckoneth
so had received five talents came brought other saying lord thou deliveredst behold gained beside more
lord said well done thou good faithful servant hast been over few things make thee ruler many enter joy thy
also had received two talents came said lord thou deliveredst behold gained other beside
lord said well done good faithful servant thou hast been over few things make thee ruler many enter joy thy
then had received one talent came said lord knew thee thou art hard man reaping where hast sown gathering strawed
afraid went hid thy talent earth lo there thou hast thine
lord answered said thou wicked slothful servant knewest reap where sowed gather strawed
thou oughtest therefore put money exchangers then at coming should received mine own usury
take therefore talent give hath ten talents
every one hath given abundance taken away even
cast ye unprofitable servant outer darkness there weeping gnashing teeth
son man come glory holy angels then sit upon throne
before gathered nations separate one another shepherd divideth sheep goats
set sheep on right hand goats left
then king say on right hand come ye blessed father inherit kingdom prepared you foundation world
hungred ye gave meat thirsty drink stranger took
naked ye clothed sick visited prison came
then righteous answer saying lord saw we thee hungred fed or thirsty gave drink
saw we thee stranger took or naked clothed
or saw we thee sick prison came
king answer say verily you inasmuch ye done one least these brethren
then say also on left hand depart ye cursed everlasting fire prepared devil angels
hungred ye gave no meat thirsty drink
stranger ye took naked clothed sick prison visited
then also answer saying lord saw we thee hungred or athirst stranger naked sick prison did minister
then answer saying verily say you inasmuch ye did one least these
these go away everlasting punishment righteous life eternal
came pass jesus had finished these sayings said disciples
ye know after two days feast passover son man betrayed crucified
then assembled together chief priests scribes elders people palace high priest who called caiaphas
consulted might take jesus by subtilty kill
said on feast day lest there uproar among people
now jesus bethany house simon leper
there came woman having alabaster box very precious ointment poured on head sat at meat
disciples saw had indignation saying what purpose waste
ointment might been sold much given poor
jesus understood said why trouble ye woman she hath wrought good work upon
ye poor always you
she hath poured ointment on body did burial
verily say you wheresoever gospel preached whole world there also woman hath done told memorial her
then one twelve called judas iscariot went chief priests
said what ye give deliver you covenanted thirty pieces silver
time sought opportunity betray
now first day feast unleavened bread disciples came jesus saying where wilt thou we prepare thee eat passover
said go city such man say master saith time at hand keep passover thy house disciples
disciples did jesus had appointed made ready passover
now even come sat down twelve
did eat said verily say you one betray
exceeding sorrowful began every one say lord
answered said dippeth hand dish same betray
son man goeth written woe by whom betrayed had been good if born
then judas betrayed answered said master thou hast
eating jesus took bread blessed brake gave disciples said take eat body
took cup gave thanks saying drink ye
blood new testament shed many remission sins
say you drink henceforth fruit vine until day new father's kingdom
had sung hymn went out mount olives
then saith jesus ye offended because night written smite shepherd sheep flock scattered abroad
after am risen again go before you galilee
peter answered said though men offended because thee yet never
jesus said verily say thee night before cock crow thou shalt deny thrice
peter said though should die thee yet deny likewise also disciples
then cometh jesus place called gethsemane saith disciples sit ye here while go pray yonder
took peter two sons zebedee began sorrowful very heavy
then saith soul exceeding sorrowful even death tarry ye here watch
went little further fell on face prayed saying o father if possible let cup pass nevertheless thou wilt
cometh disciples findeth asleep saith peter what could ye watch one hour
watch pray ye enter temptation spirit indeed willing flesh weak
went away again second time prayed saying o father if cup may pass except drink thy done
came found asleep again eyes heavy
left went away again prayed third time saying same words
then cometh disciples saith sleep on now take your rest behold hour at hand son man betrayed hands sinners
rise let us going behold at hand doth betray
while yet spake lo judas one twelve came great multitude swords staves chief priests elders people
now betrayed gave sign saying whomsoever kiss same hold fast
forthwith came jesus said hail master kissed
jesus said friend wherefore art thou come then came laid hands on took
behold one jesus stretched out hand drew sword struck servant high priest's smote off ear
then said jesus put again thy sword place take perish
thinkest thou cannot now pray father presently give more than twelve legions angels
how then scriptures fulfilled thus must
same hour said jesus multitudes ye come out against thief swords staves take sat daily you teaching temple laid no hold on
done scriptures prophets might fulfilled then disciples forsook fled
had laid hold on jesus led away caiaphas high priest where scribes elders assembled
peter followed afar off high priest's palace went sat servants see end
now chief priests elders council sought false witness against jesus put death
found none yea though many false witnesses came yet at last two
said fellow am able destroy temple god build three days
high priest arose said answerest thou nothing what these witness against thee
jesus held peace high priest answered said adjure thee by living god thou tell us whether christ son
jesus saith thou hast said nevertheless say you hereafter ye see son man sitting on right hand power coming clouds heaven
then high priest rent clothes saying hath spoken blasphemy what further need we witnesses behold now ye heard
what think ye answered said guilty death
then did spit face buffeted others smote palms hands
saying prophesy us thou christ who smote thee
now peter sat without palace damsel came saying thou also wast jesus galilee
denied before saying know what thou sayest
gone out porch another maid saw said there fellow also jesus nazareth
again denied oath do know man
after while came stood by said peter surely thou also art one thy speech bewrayeth thee
then began curse swear saying know man immediately cock crew
peter remembered word jesus said before cock crow thou shalt deny thrice went out wept bitterly
morning come chief priests elders people took counsel against jesus put death
had bound led away delivered pontius pilate governor
then judas had betrayed saw condemned repented himself brought again thirty pieces silver chief priests elders
saying sinned betrayed innocent blood said what us see thou
cast down pieces silver temple departed went hanged himself
chief priests took silver pieces said lawful put treasury because price blood
took counsel bought potter's field bury strangers
wherefore field called blood day
then fulfilled spoken by jeremy prophet saying took thirty pieces silver price valued whom children israel did value
gave potter's field lord appointed
jesus stood before governor asked saying art thou king jews said sayest
accused chief priests elders answered nothing
then said pilate hearest thou how many things witness against thee
answered never word insomuch governor marvelled greatly
now at feast governor wont release people prisoner whom would
had then notable prisoner called barabbas
therefore gathered together pilate said whom ye release you barabbas or jesus called christ
knew envy had delivered
set down on judgment seat wife sent saying thou nothing do just man suffered many things day dream because
chief priests elders persuaded multitude should ask barabbas destroy jesus
governor answered said whether twain ye release you barabbas
pilate saith what do then jesus called christ say let crucified
governor said why what evil hath done cried out more saying let crucified
pilate saw could prevail nothing rather tumult made took water washed hands before multitude saying am innocent blood just person see ye
then answered people said blood on us our children
then released barabbas had scourged jesus delivered crucified
then soldiers governor took jesus common hall gathered whole band
stripped put on scarlet robe
had platted crown thorns put upon head reed right hand bowed knee before mocked saying hail king jews
spit upon took reed smote on head
after had mocked took robe off put own raiment on led away crucify
came out found man cyrene simon by name compelled bear cross
come place called golgotha say skull
gave vinegar drink mingled gall had tasted thereof would
crucified parted garments casting lots might fulfilled spoken by prophet among upon vesture did cast
sitting down watched there
set over head accusation written jesus king jews
then there two thieves crucified one on right hand another left
passed by reviled wagging heads
saying thou destroyest temple buildest three days save thyself if son god come down cross
likewise also chief priests mocking scribes elders said
saved others himself cannot save if king israel let now come down cross we believe
trusted god let deliver now if said am son
thieves also crucified cast same teeth
now sixth hour there darkness over land ninth
about ninth hour jesus cried loud voice saying eli lama sabachthani say god why hast thou forsaken
some stood there heard said man calleth elias
straightway one ran took spunge filled vinegar put on reed gave drink
rest said let us see whether elias come save
jesus had cried again loud voice yielded ghost
behold veil temple rent twain top bottom earth did quake rocks
graves opened many bodies saints slept arose
came out graves after resurrection went holy city appeared many
now centurion watching jesus saw earthquake those things done feared greatly saying truly son god
many women there beholding afar off followed jesus galilee ministering
among mary magdalene mother james joses zebedee's children
even come there came rich man arimathaea named joseph who also himself jesus' disciple
went pilate begged body jesus then commanded delivered
joseph had taken body wrapped clean linen cloth
laid own new tomb had hewn out rock rolled great stone door sepulchre departed
there mary magdalene other sitting over against sepulchre
now next day followed preparation chief priests pharisees came together pilate
saying sir we remember deceiver said while yet alive after three days rise again
command therefore sepulchre made sure until third day lest disciples come by night steal away say people risen dead so last error worse than first
pilate said ye watch go your way make sure can
so went made sepulchre sure sealing stone setting watch
end sabbath began dawn toward first day week came mary magdalene other see sepulchre
behold there great earthquake angel lord descended heaven came rolled back stone door sat upon
countenance like lightning raiment white snow
fear keepers did shake became dead men
angel answered said women fear ye know seek jesus crucified
here risen said come see place where lord lay
go quickly tell disciples risen dead behold goeth before you galilee there ye see lo told
departed quickly sepulchre fear great joy did run bring disciples word
went tell disciples behold jesus met saying hail came held by feet worshipped
then said jesus afraid go tell brethren galilee there see
now going behold some watch came city shewed chief priests things done
assembled elders had taken counsel gave large money soldiers
saying say ye disciples came by night stole away while we slept
if come governor's ears we persuade secure you
so took money did taught saying commonly reported among jews until day
then eleven disciples went away galilee mountain where jesus had appointed
saw worshipped some doubted
jesus came spake saying power given heaven earth
go ye therefore teach nations baptizing name father son holy ghost
teaching observe things whatsoever commanded you lo am alway even end world amen
beginning gospel jesus christ son god
written prophets behold send messenger before thy face prepare way thee
voice one crying wilderness prepare ye way lord make paths straight
john did baptize wilderness preach baptism repentance remission sins
there went out land judaea jerusalem baptized river jordan confessing sins
john clothed camel's hair girdle skin about loins did eat locusts wild honey
preached saying there cometh one mightier than after latchet whose shoes am worthy stoop down unloose
indeed baptized you water baptize holy ghost
came pass those days jesus nazareth galilee baptized john jordan
straightway coming out water saw heavens opened spirit like dove descending upon
there came voice heaven saying thou art beloved son whom am well pleased
immediately spirit driveth wilderness
there wilderness forty days tempted satan wild beasts angels ministered
now after john put prison jesus came galilee preaching gospel kingdom god
saying time fulfilled kingdom god at hand repent ye believe gospel
now walked by sea galilee saw simon andrew brother casting net fishers
jesus said come ye after make you become fishers men
straightway forsook nets followed
had gone little further thence saw james son zebedee john brother who also ship mending nets
straightway called left father zebedee ship hired servants went after
went capernaum straightway on sabbath day entered synagogue taught
astonished at doctrine taught one had authority scribes
there synagogue man unclean spirit cried out
saying let us alone what we do thee thou jesus nazareth art come destroy know who holy one god
jesus rebuked saying hold thy peace come out
unclean spirit had torn cried loud voice came out
amazed insomuch questioned among themselves saying what thing new doctrine authority commandeth even unclean spirits do obey
immediately fame spread abroad throughout region round about galilee
forthwith come out synagogue entered house simon andrew james john
simon's wife's mother lay sick fever anon tell her
came took her by hand lifted immediately fever left she ministered
at even sun did set brought diseased possessed devils
city gathered together at door
healed many sick divers diseases cast out devils suffered speak because knew
morning rising great while before day went out departed solitary place there prayed
simon followed after
had found said men seek thee
said let us go next towns may preach there also therefore came forth
preached synagogues throughout galilee cast out devils
there came leper beseeching kneeling down saying if thou wilt canst make clean
jesus moved compassion put forth hand touched saith thou clean
soon had spoken immediately leprosy departed cleansed
straitly charged forthwith sent away
saith see thou say nothing any man go thy way shew thyself priest offer cleansing those things moses commanded testimony
went out began publish much blaze abroad matter insomuch jesus could no more openly enter city without desert places came every quarter
again entered capernaum after some days noised house
straightway many gathered together insomuch there no room receive so much about door preached word
come bringing one sick palsy borne four
could come nigh press uncovered roof where had broken let down bed wherein sick palsy lay
jesus saw faith said sick palsy son thy sins forgiven thee
there certain scribes sitting reasoning hearts
why doth man thus speak blasphemies who can forgive sins god only
immediately jesus perceived spirit so reasoned within themselves said why reason ye these things your hearts
whether easier say sick palsy thy sins forgiven thee or arise take bed walk
ye may know son man hath power on earth forgive sins saith sick palsy
say thee arise take thy bed go way thine house
immediately arose took bed went forth before insomuch amazed glorified god saying we never saw on fashion
went forth again by sea side multitude resorted taught
passed by saw levi son alphaeus sitting at receipt custom said follow arose followed
came pass jesus sat at meat house many publicans sinners also together disciples there followed
scribes pharisees saw eat publicans sinners said disciples how eateth drinketh
jesus heard saith whole no need physician sick came call righteous sinners repentance
disciples john pharisees used fast come say why do thy
jesus said can children bridechamber fast while bridegroom long cannot
days come bridegroom taken away then fast those
no man also seweth piece new cloth on old garment else filled taketh away rent made worse
no man putteth new wine old bottles else doth burst spilled marred must put
came pass went through corn fields on sabbath day disciples began pluck ears
pharisees said behold why do on sabbath day lawful
said ye never read what david did had need hungred
how went house god days abiathar high priest did eat shewbread lawful priests gave also
said sabbath made man
therefore son man lord also sabbath
entered again synagogue there man had withered hand
watched whether would heal on sabbath day might accuse
saith man had withered hand stand forth
saith lawful do good on sabbath days or evil save life kill held peace
had looked round about on anger being grieved hardness hearts saith man stretch forth thine hand stretched out restored whole other
pharisees went forth straightway took counsel herodians against how might destroy
jesus withdrew himself disciples sea great multitude galilee followed judaea
jerusalem idumaea beyond jordan about tyre sidon great multitude had heard what things did came
spake disciples small ship should wait on because multitude lest throng
had healed many insomuch pressed upon touch plagues
unclean spirits saw fell down before cried saying thou art son god
straitly charged should make known
goeth mountain calleth whom would came
ordained twelve should might send forth preach
power heal sicknesses cast out devils
simon surnamed peter
james son zebedee john brother surnamed boanerges sons thunder
andrew philip bartholomew matthew thomas james son alphaeus thaddaeus simon canaanite
judas iscariot also betrayed went house
multitude cometh together again so could much eat bread
friends heard went out lay hold on said beside himself
scribes came down jerusalem said hath beelzebub by prince devils casteth out
called said parables how can satan cast out
if kingdom divided against itself cannot stand
if house divided against itself cannot stand
if satan rise against himself divided cannot stand hath end
no man can enter strong man's house spoil goods except first bind then
verily say you sins forgiven sons men blasphemies wherewith soever blaspheme
blaspheme against holy ghost hath never forgiveness danger eternal damnation
because said hath unclean spirit
there came then brethren mother standing without sent calling
multitude sat about said behold thy mother brethren without seek thee
answered saying who mother or brethren
looked round about on sat said behold mother brethren
whosoever do god same brother sister mother
began again teach by sea side there gathered great multitude so entered ship sat whole on land
taught many things by parables said doctrine
hearken behold there went out sower sow
came pass sowed some fell by way side fowls air devoured
some fell on stony ground where had much earth immediately sprang because no depth
sun scorched because had no root withered away
some fell among thorns grew choked yielded no fruit
other fell on good ground did yield fruit sprang increased brought forth some thirty sixty hundred
said hath ears hear let
alone about twelve asked parable
said you given know mystery kingdom god without these things done parables
seeing may see perceive hearing hear understand lest at any time should converted sins forgiven
said know ye parable how then parables
sower soweth word
these by way side where word sown heard satan cometh immediately taketh away hearts
these likewise sown on stony ground who heard word immediately receive gladness
no root themselves so endure time afterward affliction or persecution ariseth word's sake immediately offended
these sown among thorns such hear word
cares world deceitfulness riches lusts other things entering choke word becometh unfruitful
these sown on good ground such hear word receive bring forth fruit some thirtyfold sixty hundred
said candle brought put under bushel or bed set on candlestick
there nothing hid manifested neither any thing kept secret should come abroad
if any man ears hear let
said take heed what ye hear measure mete measured you more given
hath given taken even
said so kingdom god if man should cast seed ground
should sleep rise night day seed spring grow knoweth how
earth bringeth forth fruit herself first blade then ear after full corn
fruit brought forth immediately putteth sickle because harvest come
said whereunto we liken kingdom god or what comparison compare
like grain mustard seed sown earth less than seeds
sown groweth becometh greater than herbs shooteth out great branches so fowls air may lodge under shadow
many such parables spake word able hear
without parable spake alone expounded things disciples
same day even come saith let us pass over other side
had sent away multitude took even ship there also other little ships
there arose great storm wind waves beat ship so now full
hinder part ship asleep on pillow awake say master carest thou we perish
arose rebuked wind said sea peace still ceased there great calm
said why ye so fearful how no faith
feared exceedingly said one another what manner man even wind sea obey
came over other side sea country gadarenes
come out ship immediately there met tombs man unclean spirit
who had dwelling among tombs no man could bind chains
because had been often bound fetters chains plucked asunder by broken pieces neither could any man tame
always night day mountains tombs crying cutting himself stones
saw jesus afar off ran worshipped
cried loud voice said what do thee jesus thou son most high god adjure by torment
said come out man thou unclean spirit
asked what thy name answered saying legion we many
besought much would send away out country
now there nigh mountains great herd swine feeding
devils besought saying send us swine we may enter
forthwith jesus gave leave unclean spirits went out entered swine herd ran violently down steep place sea about two thousand choked
fed swine fled told city country went out see what done
come jesus see possessed devil had legion sitting clothed right mind afraid
saw told how befell possessed devil also concerning swine
began pray depart out coasts
come ship had been possessed devil prayed might
howbeit jesus suffered saith go home thy friends tell how great things lord hath done thee had compassion on
departed began publish decapolis how great things jesus had done men did marvel
jesus passed over again by ship other side much people gathered nigh sea
behold there cometh one rulers synagogue jairus by name saw fell at feet
besought greatly saying little daughter lieth at point death pray thee come lay thy hands on her she may healed live
jesus went much people followed thronged
certain woman had issue blood twelve years
had suffered many things physicians spent she nothing bettered rather grew worse
she had heard jesus came press behind touched garment
she said if may touch clothes whole
straightway fountain her blood dried she felt body healed plague
jesus immediately knowing himself virtue had gone out turned about press said who touched clothes
disciples said thou seest multitude thronging thee sayest who touched
looked round about see her had done thing
woman fearing trembling knowing what done her came fell down before told truth
said her daughter thy faith hath made thee whole go peace plague
while yet spake there came ruler synagogue's house certain said thy daughter dead why troublest thou master any further
soon jesus heard word spoken saith ruler synagogue afraid only believe
suffered no man follow save peter james john brother
cometh house ruler synagogue seeth tumult wept wailed greatly
come saith why make ye ado weep damsel dead sleepeth
laughed scorn had put out taketh father mother damsel entereth where lying
took damsel by hand said her talitha cumi being interpreted say thee arise
straightway damsel arose walked she age twelve years astonished great astonishment
charged straitly no man should know commanded something given her eat
went out thence came own country disciples follow
sabbath day come began teach synagogue many hearing astonished saying whence hath man these things what wisdom given even such mighty works wrought by hands
carpenter son mary brother james joses juda simon sisters here us offended at
jesus said prophet without honour own country among kin house
could there do no mighty work save laid hands upon few sick folk healed
marvelled because unbelief went round about villages teaching
called twelve began send forth by two gave power over unclean spirits
commanded should take nothing journey save staff only no scrip bread money purse
shod sandals put on two coats
said what place soever ye enter house there abide till depart
whosoever receive you nor hear ye depart thence shake off dust under your feet testimony against verily say more tolerable sodom gomorrha day judgment than city
went out preached men should repent
cast out many devils anointed oil sick healed
king herod heard name spread abroad said john baptist risen dead therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves
others said elias prophet or one prophets
herod heard thereof said john whom beheaded risen dead
herod himself had sent forth laid hold upon john bound prison herodias' sake brother philip's wife married her
john had said herod lawful thee thy brother's wife
therefore herodias had quarrel against would killed she could
herod feared john knowing just man holy observed heard did many things gladly
convenient day come herod on birthday made supper lords high captains chief estates galilee
daughter said herodias came danced pleased herod sat king damsel ask whatsoever thou wilt give thee
sware her whatsoever thou shalt ask give thee half kingdom
she went forth said her mother what ask head john baptist
she came straightway haste king asked saying thou give by charger head john baptist
king exceeding sorry yet oath's sake sakes sat would reject her
immediately king sent executioner commanded head brought went beheaded prison
brought head charger gave damsel her mother
disciples heard came took corpse laid tomb
apostles gathered themselves together jesus told things both what had done taught
said come ye yourselves apart desert place rest while there many coming going had no leisure so much eat
departed desert place by ship privately
people saw departing many knew ran afoot thither out cities outwent came together
jesus came out saw much people moved compassion toward because sheep having shepherd began teach many things
day now far spent disciples came said desert place time passed
send away may go country round about villages buy themselves bread nothing eat
answered said give ye eat say we go buy two hundred pennyworth bread
saith how many loaves ye go see knew say five two fishes
commanded make sit down by companies upon green grass
sat down ranks by hundreds fifties
had taken five loaves two fishes looked heaven blessed brake gave disciples set before divided among
did eat filled
took twelve baskets full fragments fishes
did eat loaves about five thousand men
straightway constrained disciples get ship go other side before bethsaida while sent away people
had sent away departed mountain pray
even come ship midst sea alone on land
saw toiling rowing wind contrary about fourth watch night cometh walking upon sea would passed by
saw walking upon sea supposed had been spirit cried out
saw troubled immediately talked saith good cheer afraid
went ship wind ceased sore amazed themselves beyond measure wondered
considered miracle loaves heart hardened
had passed over came land gennesaret drew shore
come out ship straightway knew
ran through whole region round about began carry beds those sick where heard
whithersoever entered villages or cities country laid sick streets besought might touch if border garment many touched made whole
then came together pharisees certain scribes jerusalem
saw some disciples eat bread defiled say unwashen hands found fault
pharisees jews except wash hands oft eat holding tradition elders
come market except wash eat many other things there received hold washing cups pots brasen vessels tables
then pharisees scribes asked why walk thy disciples according tradition elders eat bread unwashen hands
answered said well hath esaias prophesied you hypocrites written people honoureth lips heart far
howbeit vain do worship teaching doctrines commandments men
laying aside commandment god ye hold tradition men washing pots cups many other such like things do
said full well ye reject commandment god may keep your own tradition
moses said honour thy father mother whoso curseth or let die death
ye say if man father or mother corban gift by whatsoever thou mightest profited free
ye suffer no more do ought father or mother
making word god none effect through your tradition ye delivered many such like things do
had called people said hearken every one you understand
there nothing without man entering can defile things come out those
if any man ears hear let
entered house people disciples asked concerning parable
saith ye so without understanding also do perceive whatsoever thing entereth man cannot defile
because entereth heart belly goeth out draught purging meats
said cometh out man defileth
within out heart men proceed evil thoughts adulteries fornications murders
thefts covetousness wickedness deceit lasciviousness evil eye blasphemy pride foolishness
these evil things come within defile man
thence arose went borders tyre sidon entered house would no man know could hid
certain woman whose young daughter had unclean spirit heard came fell at feet
woman greek syrophenician by nation she besought would cast forth devil out her daughter
jesus said her let children first filled meet take children's bread cast dogs
she answered said yes lord yet dogs under table eat children's crumbs
said her saying go thy way devil gone out daughter
she come her house found devil gone out daughter laid upon bed
again departing coasts tyre sidon came sea galilee through midst decapolis
bring one deaf had impediment speech beseech put hand upon
took aside multitude put fingers ears spit touched tongue
looking heaven sighed saith ephphatha opened
straightway ears opened string tongue loosed spake plain
charged should tell no man more so much great deal published
beyond measure astonished saying hath done things well maketh both deaf hear dumb speak
those days multitude being very great having nothing eat jesus called disciples saith
compassion on multitude because now been three days nothing eat
if send away fasting own houses faint by way divers came far
disciples answered whence can man satisfy these men bread here wilderness
asked how many loaves ye said seven
commanded people sit down on ground took seven loaves gave thanks brake disciples set before did
had few small fishes blessed commanded set also before
so did eat filled took broken meat left seven baskets
had eaten about four thousand sent away
straightway entered ship disciples came parts dalmanutha
pharisees came forth began question seeking sign heaven tempting
sighed deeply spirit saith why doth generation seek after sign verily say you there no given
left entering ship again departed other side
now disciples had forgotten take bread neither ship more than one loaf
charged saying take heed beware leaven pharisees herod
reasoned among themselves saying because we no bread
jesus knew saith why reason ye because no bread perceive yet neither understand your heart hardened
having eyes see ye ears hear do remember
brake five loaves among thousand how many baskets full fragments took ye say twelve
seven among four thousand how many baskets full fragments took ye said
said how ye do understand
cometh bethsaida bring blind man besought touch
took blind man by hand led out town had spit on eyes put hands upon asked if saw ought
looked said see men trees walking
after put hands again upon eyes made look restored saw every man clearly
sent away house saying neither go town nor tell any
jesus went out disciples towns caesarea philippi by way asked saying whom do men say am
answered john baptist some say elias others one prophets
saith whom say ye am peter answereth thou art christ
charged should tell no man
began teach son man must suffer many things rejected elders chief priests scribes killed after three days rise again
spake saying openly peter took began rebuke
had turned about looked on disciples rebuked peter saying get thee behind satan thou savourest things god men
had called people disciples also said whosoever come after let deny himself take cross follow
whosoever save life lose sake gospel's same
what profit man if gain whole world lose own soul
or what man give exchange soul
whosoever therefore ashamed words adulterous sinful generation also son man cometh glory father holy angels
said verily say you there some stand here taste death till seen kingdom god come power
after six days jesus taketh peter james john leadeth high mountain apart by themselves transfigured before
raiment became shining exceeding white snow so no fuller on earth can
there appeared elias moses talking jesus
peter answered said jesus master good us here let make three tabernacles one thee moses elias
wist what say sore afraid
there cloud overshadowed voice came out saying beloved son hear
suddenly had looked round about saw no man any more save jesus only themselves
came down mountain charged should tell no man what things had seen till son risen dead
kept saying themselves questioning one another what rising dead should mean
asked saying why say scribes elias must first come
answered told elias verily cometh first restoreth things how written son man must suffer many set at nought
say you elias indeed come done whatsoever listed written
came disciples saw great multitude about scribes questioning
straightway people beheld greatly amazed running saluted
asked scribes what question ye
one multitude answered said master brought thee son hath dumb spirit
wheresoever taketh teareth foameth gnasheth teeth pineth away spake thy disciples should cast out could
answereth saith o faithless generation how long you suffer bring
brought saw straightway spirit tare fell on ground wallowed foaming
asked father how long ago since came said child
ofttimes hath cast fire waters destroy if thou canst do any thing compassion on us help
jesus said if thou canst believe things possible believeth
straightway father child cried out said tears lord believe help thou mine unbelief
jesus saw people came running together rebuked foul spirit saying thou dumb deaf charge thee come out enter no more
spirit cried rent sore came out one dead insomuch many said
jesus took by hand lifted arose
come house disciples asked privately why could we cast out
said kind can come forth by nothing prayer fasting
departed thence passed through galilee would any man should know
taught disciples said son man delivered hands men kill after killed rise third day
understood saying afraid ask
came capernaum being house asked what ye disputed among yourselves by way
held peace by way had disputed among themselves who should greatest
sat down called twelve saith if any man desire first same last servant
took child set midst had taken arms said
whosoever receive one such children name receiveth sent
john answered saying master we saw one casting out devils thy name followeth us forbad because
jesus said forbid there no man do miracle name can lightly speak evil
against us on our part
whosoever give you cup water drink name because ye belong christ verily say lose reward
whosoever offend one these little ones believe better millstone hanged about neck cast sea
if thy hand offend thee cut off better enter life maimed than having two hands go hell fire never quenched
where worm dieth fire quenched
if thy foot offend thee cut off better enter halt life than having two feet cast hell fire never quenched
where worm dieth fire quenched
if thine eye offend thee pluck out better enter kingdom god one than having two eyes cast hell fire
where worm dieth fire quenched
every one salted fire sacrifice salt
salt good if lost saltness wherewith ye season yourselves peace one another
arose thence cometh coasts judaea by farther side jordan people resort again wont taught
pharisees came asked lawful man put away wife tempting
answered said what did moses command you
said moses suffered write bill divorcement put her away
jesus answered said hardness your heart wrote you precept
beginning creation god made male female
cause man leave father mother cleave wife
twain one flesh so then no more
what therefore god hath joined together let man put asunder
house disciples asked again same matter
saith whosoever put away wife marry another committeth adultery against her
if woman put away her husband married another she committeth adultery
brought young children should touch disciples rebuked those
jesus saw much displeased said suffer little children come forbid such kingdom god
verily say you whosoever receive kingdom god little child enter therein
took arms put hands upon blessed
gone forth way there came one running kneeled asked good master what do may inherit eternal life
jesus said why callest thou good there none one god
thou knowest commandments do commit adultery kill steal bear false witness defraud honour thy father mother
answered said master these observed youth
then jesus beholding loved said one thing thou lackest go thy way sell whatsoever hast give poor shalt treasure heaven come take cross follow
sad at saying went away grieved had great possessions
jesus looked round about saith disciples how hardly riches enter kingdom god
disciples astonished at words jesus answereth again saith children how hard trust riches enter kingdom god
easier camel go through eye needle than rich man enter kingdom god
astonished out measure saying among themselves who then can saved
jesus looking upon saith men impossible god things possible
then peter began say lo we left followed thee
jesus answered said verily say you there no man hath left house or brethren sisters father mother wife children lands sake gospel's
receive hundredfold now time houses brethren sisters mothers children lands persecutions world come eternal life
many first last
way going jerusalem jesus went before amazed followed afraid took again twelve began tell what things should happen
saying behold we go jerusalem son man delivered chief priests scribes condemn death deliver gentiles
mock scourge spit upon kill third day rise again
james john sons zebedee come saying master we would thou shouldest do us whatsoever desire
said what would ye should do you
said grant us we may sit one on thy right hand other left glory
jesus said ye know what ask can drink cup baptized baptism am
said we can jesus ye indeed drink cup baptism am baptized withal
sit on right hand left mine give given whom prepared
ten heard began much displeased james john
jesus called saith ye know accounted rule over gentiles exercise lordship great ones authority upon
so among you whosoever great your minister
whosoever you chiefest servant
even son man came ministered minister give life ransom many
came jericho went out disciples great number people blind bartimaeus son timaeus sat by highway side begging
heard jesus nazareth began cry out say thou son david mercy on
many charged should hold peace cried more great deal thou son david mercy on
jesus stood still commanded called call blind man saying good comfort rise calleth thee
casting away garment rose came jesus
jesus answered said what wilt thou should do thee blind man lord might receive sight
jesus said go thy way faith hath made thee whole immediately received sight followed
came nigh jerusalem bethphage bethany at mount olives sendeth forth two disciples
saith go your way village over against you soon ye entered find colt tied whereon never man sat loose bring
if any man say you why do ye lord hath need straightway send hither
went way found colt tied by door without place where two ways met loose
certain stood there said what do ye loosing colt
said even jesus had commanded let go
brought colt jesus cast garments on sat upon
many spread garments way others cut down branches off trees strawed
went before followed cried saying hosanna blessed cometh name lord
blessed kingdom our father david cometh name lord hosanna highest
jesus entered jerusalem temple had looked round about upon things now eventide come went out bethany twelve
on morrow come bethany hungry
seeing fig tree afar off having leaves came if haply might find any thing thereon found nothing time figs yet
jesus answered said no man eat fruit thee hereafter ever disciples heard
come jerusalem jesus went temple began cast out sold bought overthrew tables moneychangers seats doves
would suffer any man should carry vessel through temple
taught saying written house called nations prayer ye made den thieves
scribes chief priests heard sought how might destroy feared because people astonished at doctrine
even come went out city
morning passed by saw fig tree dried roots
peter calling remembrance saith master behold fig tree thou cursedst withered away
jesus answering saith faith god
verily say you whosoever mountain thou removed cast sea doubt heart believe those things saith come pass whatsoever
therefore say you what things soever ye desire pray believe receive
ye stand praying forgive if ought against any your father also heaven may you trespasses
if ye do forgive neither your father heaven trespasses
come again jerusalem walking temple there chief priests scribes elders
say by what authority doest thou these things who gave thee do
jesus answered said also ask you one question answer tell by what authority do these things
baptism john heaven or men answer
reasoned themselves saying if we say heaven why then did ye believe
if we say men feared people counted john prophet indeed
answered said jesus we cannot tell answering saith neither do you by what authority these things
began speak by parables certain man planted vineyard set hedge about digged place winefat built tower let out husbandmen went far country
at season sent husbandmen servant might receive fruit vineyard
caught beat sent away empty
again sent another servant at cast stones wounded head away shamefully handled
again sent another killed many others beating some killing
having yet therefore one son wellbeloved sent also last saying reverence
those husbandmen said among themselves heir come let us kill inheritance our's
took killed cast out vineyard
what therefore lord vineyard do come destroy husbandmen give others
ye read scripture stone builders rejected become head corner
lord's doing marvellous our eyes
sought lay hold on feared people knew had spoken parable against left went way
send certain pharisees herodians catch words
come say master we know thou art true carest no man regardest person men teachest way god truth lawful give tribute caesar or
we give or knowing hypocrisy said why tempt ye bring penny may see
brought saith whose image superscription said caesar's
jesus answering said render caesar things caesar's god god's marvelled at
then come sadducees say there no resurrection asked saying
master moses wrote us if man's brother die leave wife behind no children should take raise seed
now there seven brethren first took wife dying left no seed
second took her died neither left any seed third likewise
seven had her left no seed last woman died also
resurrection therefore rise whose wife she seven had her
jesus answering said do ye therefore err because know scriptures neither power god
rise dead neither marry nor given marriage angels heaven
touching dead rise ye read book moses how bush god spake saying am abraham isaac jacob
god dead living ye therefore do greatly err
one scribes came having heard reasoning together perceiving had answered well asked first commandment
jesus answered first commandments hear o israel lord our god one
thou shalt love lord thy god heart soul mind strength first commandment
second like namely thou shalt love thy neighbour thyself there none other commandment greater than these
scribe said well master thou hast truth there one god none other
love heart understanding soul strength neighbour himself more than whole burnt offerings sacrifices
jesus saw answered discreetly said thou art far kingdom god no man after durst ask any question
jesus answered said while taught temple how say scribes christ son david
david himself said by holy ghost lord sit thou on right hand till make thine enemies thy footstool
david therefore himself calleth lord whence then son common people heard gladly
said doctrine beware scribes love go long clothing salutations marketplaces
chief seats synagogues uppermost rooms at feasts
devour widows' houses pretence make long prayers these receive greater damnation
