jesus sat over against treasury beheld how people cast money many rich much
there came certain poor widow she threw two mites make farthing
called disciples saith verily say you poor widow hath cast more than treasury
did cast abundance she her want had even living
went out temple one disciples saith master see what manner stones buildings here
jesus answering said seest thou these great buildings there left one stone upon another thrown down
sat upon mount olives over against temple peter james john andrew asked privately
tell us these things what sign fulfilled
jesus answering began say take heed lest any man deceive you
many come name saying am christ deceive
ye hear wars rumours troubled such things must needs end yet
nation rise against kingdom there earthquakes divers places famines troubles these beginnings sorrows
take heed yourselves deliver you councils synagogues ye beaten brought before rulers kings sake testimony against
gospel must first published among nations
lead you deliver take no thought beforehand what ye speak neither do premeditate whatsoever given hour holy ghost
now brother betray death father son children rise against parents cause put
ye hated men name's sake endure end same saved
ye see abomination desolation spoken by daniel prophet standing where ought let readeth understand then judaea flee mountains
let on housetop go down house neither enter therein take any thing out
let field turn back again take garment
woe child give suck those days
pray ye your flight winter
those days affliction such beginning creation god created time neither
except lord had shortened those days no flesh should saved elect's sake whom hath chosen
then if any man say you lo here christ or there believe
false christs prophets rise shew signs wonders seduce if possible even elect
take ye heed behold foretold you things
those days after tribulation sun darkened moon give her light
stars heaven fall powers shaken
then see son man coming clouds great power glory
then send angels gather together elect four winds uttermost part earth heaven
now learn parable fig tree her branch yet tender putteth forth leaves ye know summer near
so ye like manner see these things come pass know nigh even at doors
verily say you generation pass till these things done
heaven earth pass away words
day hour knoweth no man angels heaven neither son father
take ye heed watch pray know time
son man taking far journey who left house gave authority servants every work commanded porter watch
watch ye therefore know master house cometh at even or midnight cockcrowing morning
lest coming suddenly find you sleeping
what say you watch
after two days feast passover unleavened bread chief priests scribes sought how might take by craft put death
said on feast day lest there uproar people
being bethany house simon leper sat at meat there came woman having alabaster box ointment spikenard very precious she brake poured on head
there some had indignation within themselves said why waste ointment made
might been sold more than three hundred pence given poor murmured against her
jesus said let her alone why trouble ye she hath wrought good work on
ye poor you always whensoever may do good
she hath done what could come aforehand anoint body burying
verily say you wheresoever gospel preached throughout whole world also she hath done spoken memorial her
judas iscariot one twelve went chief priests betray
heard glad promised give money sought how might conveniently betray
first day unleavened bread killed passover disciples said where wilt thou we go prepare mayest eat
sendeth forth two disciples saith go ye city there meet you man bearing pitcher water follow
wheresoever go say ye goodman house master saith where guestchamber eat passover disciples
shew you large upper room furnished prepared there make ready us
disciples went forth came city found had said made ready passover
evening cometh twelve
sat did eat jesus said verily say you one eateth betray
began sorrowful say one by another said
answered said one twelve dippeth dish
son man indeed goeth written woe by whom betrayed good if had never been born
did eat jesus took bread blessed brake gave said take body
took cup had given thanks gave drank
said blood new testament shed many
verily say you drink no more fruit vine until day new kingdom god
had sung hymn went out mount olives
jesus saith ye offended because night written smite shepherd sheep scattered
after am risen go before you galilee
peter said although offended yet
jesus saith verily say thee day even night before cock crow twice thou shalt deny thrice
spake more vehemently if should die thee deny any wise likewise also said
came place named gethsemane saith disciples sit ye here while pray
taketh peter james john began sore amazed very heavy
saith soul exceeding sorrowful death tarry ye here watch
went forward little fell on ground prayed if possible hour might pass
said abba father things possible thee take away cup nevertheless what thou wilt
cometh findeth sleeping saith peter simon sleepest thou couldest watch one hour
watch ye pray lest enter temptation spirit truly ready flesh weak
again went away prayed spake same words
returned found asleep again eyes heavy neither wist what answer
cometh third time saith sleep on now take your rest enough hour come behold son man betrayed hands sinners
rise let us go lo betrayeth at hand
immediately while yet spake cometh judas one twelve great multitude swords staves chief priests scribes elders
betrayed had given token saying whomsoever kiss same take lead away safely
soon come goeth straightway saith master kissed
laid hands on took
one stood by drew sword smote servant high priest cut off ear
jesus answered said ye come out against thief swords staves take
daily you temple teaching ye took scriptures must fulfilled
forsook fled
there followed certain young man having linen cloth cast about naked body men laid hold on
left linen cloth fled naked
led jesus away high priest assembled chief priests elders scribes
peter followed afar off even palace high priest sat servants warmed himself at fire
chief priests council sought witness against jesus put death found none
many bare false witness against agreed together
there arose certain bare false witness against saying
we heard say destroy temple made hands within three days build another without
neither so did witness agree together
high priest stood midst asked jesus saying answerest thou nothing what these witness against thee
held peace answered nothing again high priest asked said art thou christ son blessed
jesus said am ye see son man sitting on right hand power coming clouds heaven
then high priest rent clothes saith what need we any further witnesses
ye heard blasphemy what think condemned guilty death
some began spit on cover face buffet say prophesy servants did strike palms hands
peter beneath palace there cometh one maids high priest
she saw peter warming himself looked upon said thou also wast jesus nazareth
denied saying know neither understand what thou sayest went out porch cock crew
maid saw again began say stood by one
denied again little after stood by said peter surely thou art one galilaean thy speech agreeth thereto
began curse swear saying know man whom ye speak
second time cock crew peter called mind word jesus said before crow twice thou shalt deny thrice thought thereon wept
straightway morning chief priests held consultation elders scribes whole council bound jesus carried away delivered pilate
pilate asked art thou king jews answering said sayest
chief priests accused many things answered nothing
pilate asked again saying answerest thou nothing behold how many things witness against thee
jesus yet answered nothing so pilate marvelled
now at feast released one prisoner whomsoever desired
there one named barabbas lay bound had made insurrection who committed murder
multitude crying aloud began desire do had ever done
pilate answered saying ye release you king jews
knew chief priests had delivered envy
chief priests moved people should rather release barabbas
pilate answered said again what ye then do whom call king jews
cried out again crucify
then pilate said why what evil hath done cried out more exceedingly crucify
so pilate willing content people released barabbas delivered jesus had scourged crucified
soldiers led away hall called praetorium call together whole band
clothed purple platted crown thorns put about head
began salute hail king jews
smote on head reed did spit upon bowing knees worshipped
had mocked took off purple put own clothes on led out crucify
compel one simon cyrenian who passed by coming out country father alexander rufus bear cross
bring place golgotha being interpreted skull
gave drink wine mingled myrrh received
had crucified parted garments casting lots upon what every man should take
third hour crucified
superscription accusation written over king jews
crucify two thieves one on right hand other left
scripture fulfilled saith numbered transgressors
passed by railed on wagging heads saying ah thou destroyest temple buildest three days
save thyself come down cross
likewise also chief priests mocking said among themselves scribes saved others himself cannot save
let christ king israel descend now cross we may see believe crucified reviled
sixth hour come there darkness over whole land until ninth
at ninth hour jesus cried loud voice saying eloi lama sabachthani being interpreted god why hast thou forsaken
some stood by heard said behold calleth elias
one ran filled spunge full vinegar put on reed gave drink saying let alone us see whether elias come take down
jesus cried loud voice gave ghost
veil temple rent twain top bottom

now even come because preparation day before sabbath

knew centurion gave body joseph
bought fine linen took down wrapped laid sepulchre hewn out rock rolled stone door

very early morning first day week came sepulchre at rising sun
said among themselves who roll us away stone door sepulchre
looked saw stone rolled away very great

go your way tell disciples peter goeth before you galilee there ye see said
went out quickly fled sepulchre trembled amazed neither said any thing man afraid
now jesus risen early first day week appeared mary magdalene out whom had cast seven devils
she went told had been mourned wept
had heard alive been seen her believed
after appeared another form two walked went country
went told residue neither believed
afterward appeared eleven sat at meat upbraided unbelief hardness heart because believed had seen after risen

believeth baptized saved damned
these signs follow believe name cast out devils speak new tongues
take serpents if drink any deadly thing hurt lay hands on sick recover
so then after lord had spoken received heaven sat on right hand god
went forth preached every where lord working confirming word signs following amen
forasmuch many taken hand set forth order declaration those things most surely believed among us
even delivered us beginning eyewitnesses ministers word
seemed good also having had perfect understanding things very first write thee order most excellent theophilus
thou mightest know certainty those things wherein hast been instructed
there days herod king judaea certain priest named zacharias course abia wife daughters aaron her name elisabeth
both righteous before god walking commandments ordinances lord blameless
had no child because elisabeth barren both now well stricken years
came pass while executed priest's office before god order course

whole multitude people praying without at time incense

after those days wife elisabeth conceived hid herself five months saying
thus hath lord dealt days wherein looked on take away reproach among men
sixth month angel gabriel sent god city galilee named nazareth
virgin espoused man whose name joseph house david virgin's mary
angel came her said hail thou art highly favoured lord thee blessed among women
she saw troubled at saying cast her mind what manner salutation should
angel said her fear mary thou hast found favour god
behold thou shalt conceive thy womb bring forth son call name jesus
great called son highest lord god give throne father david
reign over house jacob ever kingdom there no end
then said mary angel how seeing know man

god nothing impossible

entered house zacharias saluted elisabeth
came pass elisabeth heard salutation mary babe leaped her womb filled holy ghost

whence mother lord should come
lo soon voice thy salutation sounded mine ears babe leaped womb joy

spirit hath rejoiced god saviour
hath regarded low estate handmaiden behold henceforth generations call blessed

mercy on fear generation

stood over her rebuked fever left immediately she arose ministered
now sun setting had any sick divers diseases brought laid hands on every one healed

said must preach kingdom god other cities also therefore am sent
preached synagogues galilee

saw two ships standing by lake fishermen gone out washing nets

now had left speaking said simon launch out deep let down your nets draught

had done inclosed great multitude fishes net brake

whether easier say thy sins forgiven thee or rise walk

give every man asketh thee taketh away thy goods ask again
ye would men should do you also likewise
if ye love you what thank sinners also those
if ye do good you what thank sinners also even same
if ye lend whom hope receive what thank sinners also much again
love ye your enemies do good lend hoping nothing again reward great children highest kind unthankful evil
ye therefore merciful your father also
judge ye judged condemn condemned forgive forgiven

disciple above master every one perfect

there certain creditor had two debtors one owed five hundred pence other fifty
had nothing pay frankly forgave both tell therefore love most
simon answered said suppose whom forgave most thou hast rightly judged
turned woman said simon seest thou entered thine house gavest no water feet she hath washed tears wiped hairs her head
thou gavest no kiss woman since time came hath ceased feet
head oil thou didst anoint woman hath anointed feet ointment
wherefore say thee her sins many forgiven she loved much whom little same loveth
said her thy sins forgiven

came pass afterward went throughout every city village preaching shewing glad tidings kingdom god twelve

much people gathered together come out every city spake by parable

other fell on good ground sprang bare fruit hundredfold had said these things cried hath ears hear let

said you given know mysteries kingdom god others parables seeing might see hearing understand
now parable seed word god
those by way side hear then cometh devil taketh away word out hearts lest should believe saved
on rock hear receive word joy these no root while believe time temptation fall away
fell among thorns heard go forth choked cares riches pleasures life bring no fruit perfection
on good ground honest heart having heard word keep bring forth fruit patience
no man hath lighted candle covereth vessel or putteth under bed setteth on candlestick enter may see light
nothing secret made manifest neither any thing hid known come abroad
take heed therefore how ye hear whosoever hath given taken even seemeth
then came mother brethren could come at press
told by certain said thy mother brethren stand without desiring see thee
answered said mother brethren these hear word god do
now came pass on certain day went ship disciples said let us go over other side lake launched forth
sailed fell asleep there came down storm wind on lake filled water jeopardy

said where your faith being afraid wondered saying one another what manner man commandeth even winds water obey
arrived at country gadarenes over against galilee
went forth land there met out city certain man had devils long time ware no clothes neither abode any house tombs

had commanded unclean spirit come out man oftentimes caught kept bound chains fetters brake bands driven devil wilderness

then went out see what done came jesus found man whom devils departed sitting at feet clothed right mind afraid
also saw told by what means possessed devils healed
then whole multitude country gadarenes round about besought depart taken great fear went ship returned back again
now man out whom devils departed besought might jesus sent away saying
return thine own house shew how great things god hath done thee went way published throughout whole city jesus had
came pass jesus returned people gladly received waiting
behold there came man named jairus ruler synagogue fell down at jesus' feet besought would come house
had one only daughter about twelve years age she lay dying went people thronged
woman having issue blood twelve years had spent her living upon physicians neither could healed any
came behind touched border garment immediately her issue blood stanched
jesus said who touched denied peter master multitude throng thee press sayest thou
jesus said somebody hath touched perceive virtue gone out
woman saw she hid came trembling falling down before declared people what cause had touched how healed immediately
said her daughter good comfort thy faith hath made thee whole go peace
while yet spake there cometh one ruler synagogue's house saying thy daughter dead trouble master
jesus heard answered saying fear believe only she made whole
came house suffered no man go save peter james john father mother maiden
wept bewailed her said weep she dead sleepeth
laughed scorn knowing she dead
put out took her by hand called saying maid arise
her spirit came again she arose straightway commanded give meat
her parents astonished charged should tell no man what done
then called twelve disciples together gave power authority over devils cure diseases
sent preach kingdom god heal sick
said take nothing your journey neither staves nor scrip bread money two coats apiece
whatsoever house ye enter there abide thence depart
whosoever receive you ye go out city shake off very dust your feet testimony against
departed went through towns preaching gospel healing every where
now herod tetrarch heard done by perplexed because said some john risen dead
some elias had appeared others one old prophets risen again
herod said john beheaded who whom hear such things desired see
apostles returned told had done took went aside privately desert place belonging city called bethsaida
people knew followed received spake kingdom god healed had need healing
day began wear away then came twelve said send multitude may go towns country round about lodge get victuals we here desert place
said give ye eat we no more five loaves two fishes except should go buy meat people
about five thousand men said disciples make sit down by fifties company
did so made sit down
then took five loaves two fishes looking heaven blessed brake gave disciples set before multitude
did eat filled there taken fragments remained twelve baskets
came pass alone praying disciples asked saying whom say people am
answering said john baptist some say elias others one old prophets risen again
said whom say ye am peter answering christ god
straitly charged commanded tell no man thing
saying son man must suffer many things rejected elders chief priests scribes slain raised third day
said if any man come after let deny himself take cross daily follow
whosoever save life lose sake same
what man advantaged if gain whole world lose himself or cast away
whosoever ashamed words son man come own glory father's holy angels
tell you truth there some standing here taste death till see kingdom god
came pass about eight days after these sayings took peter john james went mountain pray
prayed fashion countenance altered raiment white glistering
behold there talked two men moses elias
who appeared glory spake decease should accomplish at jerusalem
peter heavy sleep awake saw glory two men stood
came pass departed peter said jesus master good us here let make three tabernacles one thee moses elias knowing what
while thus spake there came cloud overshadowed feared entered
there came voice out cloud saying beloved son hear
voice past jesus found alone kept close told no man those days any things had seen
came pass on next day come down hill much people met
behold man company cried out saying master beseech thee look upon son mine only child
lo spirit taketh suddenly crieth out teareth foameth again bruising hardly departeth
besought thy disciples cast out could
jesus answering said o faithless perverse generation how long you suffer bring thy son hither
yet coming devil threw down tare jesus rebuked unclean spirit healed child delivered again father
amazed at mighty power god while wondered every one things jesus did said disciples
let these sayings sink down your ears son man delivered hands men
understood saying hid perceived feared ask
then there arose reasoning among should greatest
jesus perceiving thought heart took child set by
said whosoever receive child name receiveth sent least among you same great
john answered said master we saw one casting out devils thy name forbad because followeth us
jesus said forbid against us
came pass time come should received stedfastly set face go jerusalem
sent messengers before face went entered village samaritans make ready
did receive because face though would go jerusalem
disciples james john saw said lord wilt thou we command fire come down heaven consume even elias did
turned rebuked said ye know what manner spirit
son man come destroy men's lives save went another village
came pass went way certain man said lord follow thee whithersoever thou goest
jesus said foxes holes birds air nests son man hath where lay head
said another follow lord suffer first go bury father
jesus said let dead bury go thou preach kingdom god
another also said lord follow thee let first go bid farewell at home house
jesus said no man having put hand plough looking back fit kingdom god
after these things lord appointed other seventy also sent two before face every city place whither himself would come
therefore said harvest truly great labourers few pray ye lord would send forth
go your ways behold send you forth lambs among wolves
carry neither purse nor scrip shoes salute no man by way
whatsoever house ye enter first say peace
if son peace there your rest upon turn you again
same house remain eating drinking such things give labourer worthy hire go
whatsoever city ye enter receive you eat such things set before
heal sick therein say kingdom god come nigh you
whatsoever city ye enter receive you go your ways out streets same say
even very dust your city cleaveth on us we do wipe off against you notwithstanding ye sure kingdom god come nigh
say you more tolerable day sodom than city
woe thee chorazin bethsaida if mighty works had been done tyre sidon you great while ago repented sitting sackcloth ashes
more tolerable tyre sidon at judgment than you
thou capernaum art exalted heaven shalt thrust down hell
heareth you despiseth sent
seventy returned again joy saying lord even devils subject us through thy name
said beheld satan lightning fall heaven
behold give you power tread on serpents scorpions over enemy nothing by any means hurt
notwithstanding rejoice spirits subject you rather because your names written heaven
hour jesus rejoiced spirit said thank thee o father lord heaven earth thou hast hid these things wise prudent revealed babes even so seemed good thy sight
things delivered father no man knoweth who son whom reveal
turned disciples said privately blessed eyes see things ye
tell you many prophets kings desired see those things ye seen hear heard
behold certain lawyer stood tempted saying master what do inherit eternal life
said what written law how readest thou
answering said thou shalt love lord thy god heart soul strength mind neighbour thyself
said thou hast answered right do shalt live
willing justify himself said jesus who neighbour
jesus answering said certain man went down jerusalem jericho fell among thieves stripped raiment wounded departed leaving half dead
by chance there came down certain priest way saw passed on other side
likewise levite at place came looked on passed by other side
certain samaritan journeyed came where saw had compassion on
went bound wounds pouring oil wine set on own beast brought inn took care
on morrow departed took out two pence gave host said take care whatsoever thou spendest more come again repay thee
now these three thinkest thou neighbour fell among thieves
said shewed mercy on then jesus go do thou likewise
now came pass went entered certain village woman named martha received her house
she had sister called mary also sat at jesus' feet heard word
martha cumbered about much serving came said lord dost thou care sister hath left serve alone bid her therefore she help
jesus answered said her martha thou art careful troubled about many things
one thing needful mary hath chosen good part taken away her
came pass praying certain place ceased one disciples said lord teach us pray john also taught
said ye pray say our father art heaven hallowed thy name kingdom come done so earth
give us day by our daily bread
forgive us our sins we also every one indebted lead temptation deliver evil
said you friend go at midnight say lend three loaves
friend mine journey come nothing set before
within answer say trouble door now shut children bed cannot rise give thee
say you though rise give because friend yet importunity many needeth
say you ask given seek ye find knock opened
every one asketh receiveth seeketh findeth knocketh opened
if son ask bread any you father give stone or fish serpent
or if ask egg offer scorpion
if ye then being evil know how give good gifts your children much more heavenly father holy spirit ask
casting out devil dumb came pass gone spake people wondered
some said casteth out devils through beelzebub chief
others tempting sought sign heaven
knowing thoughts said every kingdom divided against itself brought desolation house falleth
if satan also divided against himself how kingdom stand because ye say cast out devils through beelzebub
if by beelzebub cast out devils whom do your sons therefore judges
if finger god cast out devils no doubt kingdom come upon you
strong man armed keepeth palace goods peace
stronger than come upon overcome taketh armour wherein trusted divideth spoils
against gathereth scattereth
unclean spirit gone out man walketh through dry places seeking rest finding none saith return house whence came
cometh findeth swept garnished
then goeth taketh seven other spirits more wicked than himself enter dwell there last state man worse first
came pass spake these things certain woman company lifted her voice said blessed womb bare thee paps thou hast sucked
said yea rather blessed hear word god keep
people gathered thick together began say evil generation seek sign there no given jonas prophet
jonas sign ninevites so also son man generation
queen south rise judgment men generation condemn she came utmost parts earth hear wisdom solomon behold greater than here
men nineve rise judgment generation condemn repented at preaching jonas behold greater than here
no man hath lighted candle putteth secret place neither under bushel on candlestick come may see light
light body eye therefore thine single thy whole also full evil darkness
take heed therefore light thee darkness
if thy whole body therefore full light having no part dark bright shining candle doth give thee
spake certain pharisee besought dine went sat down meat
pharisee saw marvelled had first washed before dinner
lord said now do ye pharisees make clean outside cup platter your inward part full ravening wickedness
ye fools did made without make within also
rather give alms such things ye behold clean you
woe you pharisees ye tithe mint rue manner herbs pass over judgment love god these ought done leave other undone
woe you pharisees ye love uppermost seats synagogues greetings markets
woe you scribes pharisees hypocrites ye graves appear men walk over aware
then answered one lawyers said master thus saying thou reproachest us also
said woe you also ye lawyers lade men burdens grievous borne yourselves touch one your fingers
woe you ye build sepulchres prophets your fathers killed
truly ye bear witness allow deeds your fathers indeed killed build sepulchres
therefore also said wisdom god send prophets apostles some slay persecute
blood prophets shed foundation world may required generation
blood abel zacharias perished between altar temple verily say you required generation
woe you lawyers ye taken away key knowledge entered yourselves entering hindered
said these things scribes pharisees began urge vehemently provoke speak many
laying wait seeking catch something out mouth might accuse
mean time there gathered together innumerable multitude people insomuch trode one upon another began say disciples first beware ye leaven pharisees hypocrisy
there nothing covered revealed neither hid known
therefore whatsoever ye spoken darkness heard light ear closets proclaimed upon housetops
say you friends afraid kill body after no more can do
forewarn you whom ye fear after hath killed power cast hell yea say
five sparrows sold two farthings one forgotten before god
even very hairs your head numbered fear therefore ye more value than many sparrows
also say you whosoever confess before men son man angels god
denieth before men denied angels god
whosoever speak word against son man forgiven blasphemeth holy ghost
bring you synagogues magistrates powers take ye no thought how or what thing answer say
holy ghost teach you same hour what ye ought say
one company said master speak brother divide inheritance
said man who made judge or divider over you
said take heed beware covetousness man's life consisteth abundance things possesseth
spake parable saying ground certain rich man brought forth plentifully
thought within himself saying what do because no room where bestow fruits
said do pull down barns build greater there bestow fruits goods
say soul thou hast much goods laid many years take thine ease eat drink merry
god said thou fool night thy soul required thee then whose those things hast provided
so layeth treasure himself rich toward god
said disciples therefore say you take no thought your life what ye eat neither body put on
life more than meat body raiment
consider ravens neither sow nor reap storehouse barn god feedeth how much more ye better than fowls
you taking thought can add stature one cubit
if ye then able do thing least why take thought rest
consider lilies how grow toil spin yet say you solomon glory arrayed like one these
if then god so clothe grass day field morrow cast oven how much more you o ye little faith
seek ye what eat or drink neither doubtful mind
these things do nations world seek after your father knoweth ye need
rather seek ye kingdom god these things added you
fear little flock your father's good pleasure give you kingdom
sell ye give alms provide yourselves bags wax old treasure heavens faileth where no thief approacheth neither moth corrupteth
where your treasure there heart also
let your loins girded about lights burning
ye yourselves like men wait lord return wedding cometh knocketh may open immediately
blessed those servants whom lord cometh find watching verily say you gird himself make sit down meat come forth serve
if come second watch or third find so blessed those servants
know if goodman house had known what hour thief would come watched suffered broken through
ye therefore ready also son man cometh at hour think
then peter said lord speakest thou parable us or even
lord said who then faithful wise steward whom make ruler over household give portion meat due season
blessed servant whom lord cometh find so doing
truth say you make ruler over hath
if servant say heart lord delayeth coming begin beat menservants maidens eat drink drunken
lord servant come day looketh at hour aware cut sunder appoint portion unbelievers
servant knew lord's prepared himself neither did according beaten many stripes
knew did commit things worthy stripes beaten few whomsoever much given required whom men committed ask more
am come send fire on earth what if already kindled
baptism baptized how am straitened till accomplished
suppose ye am come give peace on earth tell you nay rather division
henceforth there five one house divided three against two
father divided against son mother daughter law her
said also people ye see cloud rise out west straightway say there cometh shower so
ye see south wind blow say there heat cometh pass
ye hypocrites can discern face sky earth how do time
yea why even yourselves judge ye what right
thou goest thine adversary magistrate art way give diligence mayest delivered lest hale thee judge deliver officer cast prison
tell thee thou shalt depart thence till hast paid very last mite
there present at season some told galilaeans whose blood pilate had mingled sacrifices
jesus answering said suppose ye these galilaeans sinners above because suffered such things
tell you nay except ye repent likewise perish
or those eighteen upon whom tower siloam fell slew think ye sinners above men dwelt jerusalem
tell you nay except ye repent likewise perish
spake also parable certain man had fig tree planted vineyard came sought fruit thereon found none
then said dresser vineyard behold these three years come seeking fruit on fig tree find none cut down why cumbereth ground
answering said lord let alone year also till dig about dung
if bear fruit well then after thou shalt cut down
teaching one synagogues on sabbath
behold there woman had spirit infirmity eighteen years bowed together could no wise lift herself
jesus saw her called said woman thou art loosed thine infirmity
laid hands on her immediately she made straight glorified god
ruler synagogue answered indignation because jesus had healed on sabbath day said people there six days men ought work therefore come
lord then answered said thou hypocrite doth each one you on sabbath loose ox or ass stall lead away watering
ought woman being daughter abraham whom satan hath bound lo these eighteen years loosed bond on sabbath day
had said these things adversaries ashamed people rejoiced glorious done by
then said what kingdom god like whereunto resemble
like grain mustard seed man took cast garden grew waxed great tree fowls air lodged branches
again said whereunto liken kingdom god
like leaven woman took hid three measures meal till whole leavened
went through cities villages teaching journeying toward jerusalem
then said one lord there few saved
strive enter at strait gate many say you seek able
once master house risen hath shut door ye begin stand without knock at saying lord open us answer say you know whence
then ye begin say we eaten drunk thy presence thou hast taught our streets
say tell you know whence ye depart workers iniquity
there weeping gnashing teeth ye see abraham isaac jacob prophets kingdom god you yourselves thrust out
come east west north south sit down kingdom god
behold there last first
same day there came certain pharisees saying get thee out depart hence herod kill
said go ye tell fox behold cast out devils do cures day morrow third perfected
nevertheless must walk day morrow following cannot prophet perish out jerusalem
o jerusalem killest prophets stonest sent thee how often would gathered thy children together hen doth gather her brood under wings ye
behold your house left you desolate verily say ye see until time come blessed cometh name lord
came pass went house one chief pharisees eat bread on sabbath day watched
behold there certain man before had dropsy
jesus answering spake lawyers pharisees saying lawful heal on sabbath day
held peace took healed let go
answered saying you ass or ox fallen pit straightway pull out on sabbath day
could answer again these things
put forth parable those bidden marked how chose out chief rooms saying
thou art bidden any man wedding sit down highest room lest more honourable than
bade thee come say give man place thou begin shame take lowest room
thou art bidden go sit down lowest room bade thee cometh may say friend higher then shalt worship presence at meat
whosoever exalteth himself abased humbleth exalted
then said also bade thou makest dinner or supper call thy friends nor brethren neither kinsmen rich neighbours lest bid thee again recompence made
thou makest feast call poor maimed lame blind
thou shalt blessed cannot recompense thee recompensed at resurrection just
one sat at meat heard these things said blessed eat bread kingdom god
then said certain man made great supper bade many
sent servant at supper time say bidden come things now ready
one consent began make excuse first said bought piece ground must needs go see pray thee excused
another said bought five yoke oxen go prove pray thee excused
another said married wife therefore cannot come
so servant came shewed lord these things then master house being angry said go out quickly streets lanes city bring hither poor maimed halt blind
servant said lord done thou hast commanded yet there room
lord said servant go out highways hedges compel come house may filled
say you none those men bidden taste supper
there went great multitudes turned said
if any man come hate father mother wife children brethren sisters yea own life also cannot disciple
whosoever doth bear cross come after cannot disciple
you intending build tower sitteth down first counteth cost whether sufficient finish
lest haply after hath laid foundation able finish behold begin mock
saying man began build able finish
or what king going make war against another sitteth down first consulteth whether able ten thousand meet cometh twenty
or else while other yet great way off sendeth ambassage desireth conditions peace
so likewise whosoever you forsaketh hath cannot disciple
salt good if lost savour wherewith seasoned
neither fit land nor yet dunghill men cast out hath ears hear let
then drew near publicans sinners hear
pharisees scribes murmured saying man receiveth sinners eateth
spake parable saying
what man you having hundred sheep if lose one doth leave ninety nine wilderness go after lost until find
hath found layeth on shoulders rejoicing
cometh home calleth together friends neighbours saying rejoice found sheep lost
say you likewise joy heaven over one sinner repenteth more than ninety nine just persons need no repentance
either what woman having ten pieces silver if she lose one piece doth light candle sweep house seek diligently till find
she hath found calleth her friends neighbours together saying rejoice piece had lost
likewise say you there joy presence angels god over one sinner repenteth
said certain man had two sons
younger said father give portion goods falleth divided living
many days after younger son gathered together took journey far country there wasted substance riotous living
had spent there arose mighty famine land began want
went joined himself citizen country sent fields feed swine
would fain filled belly husks swine did eat no man gave
came himself said how many hired servants father's bread enough spare perish hunger
arise go father say sinned against heaven before thee
am no more worthy called thy son make one hired servants
arose came father yet great way off saw had compassion ran fell on neck kissed
son said father sinned against heaven thy sight am no more worthy called
father said servants bring forth best robe put on ring hand shoes feet
bring hither fatted calf kill let us eat merry
son dead alive again lost found began merry
now elder son field came drew nigh house heard musick dancing
called one servants asked what these things meant
said thy brother come father hath killed fatted calf because received safe sound
angry would go therefore came father out intreated
answering said father lo these many years do serve thee neither transgressed at any time thy commandment yet thou never gavest kid might make merry friends
soon thy son come hath devoured living harlots thou hast killed fatted calf
said son thou art ever thine
meet we should make merry glad thy brother dead alive again lost found
said also disciples there certain rich man had steward same accused wasted goods
called said how hear thee give account thy stewardship thou mayest no longer steward
then steward said within himself what do lord taketh away stewardship cannot dig beg am ashamed
am resolved what do put out stewardship may receive houses
so called every one lord's debtors said first how much owest thou lord
said hundred measures oil take thy bill sit down quickly write fifty
then said another how much owest thou hundred measures wheat take thy bill write fourscore
lord commended unjust steward because had done wisely children world generation wiser than light
say you make yourselves friends mammon unrighteousness ye fail may receive everlasting habitations
faithful least also much unjust
if therefore ye been faithful unrighteous mammon who commit your trust true riches
if ye been faithful another man's who give you your own
no servant can serve two masters either hate one love other or else hold despise ye cannot god mammon
pharisees also who covetous heard these things derided
said ye justify yourselves before men god knoweth your hearts highly esteemed among abomination sight
law prophets until john since time kingdom god preached every man presseth
easier heaven earth pass than one tittle law fail
whosoever putteth away wife marrieth another committeth adultery her put husband
there certain rich man clothed purple fine linen fared sumptuously every day
there certain beggar named lazarus laid at gate full sores
desiring fed crumbs fell rich man's table moreover dogs came licked sores
came pass beggar died carried by angels abraham's bosom rich man also buried
hell lift eyes being torments seeth abraham afar off lazarus bosom
cried said father abraham mercy on send lazarus may dip tip finger water cool tongue am tormented flame
abraham said son remember thou thy lifetime receivedst good things likewise lazarus evil now comforted art tormented
beside between us you there great gulf fixed so would pass hence cannot neither can come thence
then said pray thee therefore father thou wouldest send father's house
five brethren may testify lest also come place torment
abraham saith moses prophets let hear
said nay father abraham if one went dead repent
said if hear moses prophets neither persuaded though one rose dead
then said disciples impossible offences come woe through whom
better millstone hanged about neck cast sea than should offend one these little ones
take heed yourselves if thy brother trespass against thee rebuke repent forgive
if trespass against thee seven times day turn again saying repent thou shalt forgive
apostles said lord increase our faith
lord said if ye had faith grain mustard seed might say sycamine tree thou plucked by root planted sea should obey you
you having servant plowing or feeding cattle say by come field go sit down meat
rather say make ready wherewith may sup gird thyself serve till eaten drunken afterward thou shalt eat drink
doth thank servant because did things commanded trow
so likewise ye done those things commanded you say we unprofitable servants our duty do
came pass went jerusalem passed through midst samaria galilee
entered certain village there met ten men lepers stood afar off
lifted voices said jesus master mercy on us
saw said go shew yourselves priests came pass went cleansed
one saw healed turned back loud voice glorified god
fell down on face at feet giving thanks samaritan
jesus answering said there ten cleansed where nine
there found returned give glory god save stranger
said arise go thy way faith hath made thee whole
demanded pharisees kingdom god should come answered said cometh observation
neither say lo here or there behold kingdom god within you
said disciples days come ye desire see one son man
say you see here or there go after nor follow
lightning lighteneth out one part under heaven shineth other so also son man day
first must suffer many things rejected generation
days noe so also son man
did eat drank married wives given marriage until day noe entered ark flood came destroyed
likewise also days lot did eat drank bought sold planted builded
same day lot went out sodom rained fire brimstone heaven destroyed
even thus day son man revealed
day upon housetop stuff house let come down take away field likewise return back
remember lot's wife
whosoever seek save life lose preserve
tell you night there two men one bed taken other left
two women grinding together one taken other left
two men field one taken other left
answered said where lord wheresoever body thither eagles gathered together
spake parable end men ought always pray faint
saying there city judge feared god neither regarded man
there widow city she came saying avenge mine adversary
would while afterward said within himself though fear god nor regard man
yet because widow troubleth avenge her lest by continual coming she weary
lord said hear what unjust judge saith
god avenge own elect cry day night though bear long
tell you avenge speedily nevertheless son man cometh find faith on earth
spake parable certain trusted themselves righteous despised others
two men went temple pray one pharisee other publican
pharisee stood prayed thus himself god thank thee am other men extortioners unjust adulterers or even publican
fast twice week give tithes possess
publican standing afar off would lift so much eyes heaven smote upon breast saying god merciful sinner
tell you man went down house justified rather than other every one exalteth himself abased humbleth exalted
brought also infants would touch disciples saw rebuked
jesus called said suffer little children come forbid such kingdom god
verily say you whosoever receive kingdom god little child no wise enter therein
certain ruler asked saying good master what do inherit eternal life
jesus said why callest thou good none save one god
thou knowest commandments do commit adultery kill steal bear false witness honour thy father mother
said these kept youth
now jesus heard these things said yet lackest thou one thing sell hast distribute poor shalt treasure heaven come follow
heard very sorrowful rich
jesus saw very sorrowful said how hardly riches enter kingdom god
easier camel go through needle's eye than rich man enter kingdom god
heard said who then can saved
said things impossible men possible god
then peter said lo we left followed thee
said verily say you there no man hath left house or parents brethren wife children kingdom god's sake
who receive manifold more present time world come life everlasting
then took twelve said behold we go jerusalem things written by prophets concerning son man accomplished
delivered gentiles mocked spitefully entreated spitted on
scourge put death third day rise again
understood none these things saying hid neither knew spoken
came pass come nigh jericho certain blind man sat by way side begging
hearing multitude pass by asked what meant
told jesus nazareth passeth by
cried saying jesus thou son david mercy on
went before rebuked should hold peace cried so much more thou son david mercy on
jesus stood commanded brought come near asked
saying what wilt thou do thee said lord may receive sight
jesus said receive thy sight faith hath saved thee
immediately received sight followed glorifying god people saw gave praise
jesus entered passed through jericho
behold there man named zacchaeus chief among publicans rich
sought see jesus who could press because little stature
ran before climbed sycomore tree see pass way
jesus came place looked saw said zacchaeus make haste come down day must abide at thy house
made haste came down received joyfully
saw murmured saying gone guest man sinner
zacchaeus stood said lord behold half goods give poor if taken any thing man by false accusation restore fourfold
jesus said day salvation come house forsomuch also son abraham
son man come seek save lost
heard these things added spake parable because nigh jerusalem thought kingdom god should immediately appear
said therefore certain nobleman went far country receive himself kingdom return
called ten servants delivered pounds said occupy till come
citizens hated sent message after saying we man reign over us
came pass returned having received kingdom then commanded these servants called whom had given money might know how much every man gained by trading
then came first saying lord thy pound hath gained ten pounds
said well thou good servant because hast been faithful very little authority over ten cities
second came saying lord thy pound hath gained five pounds
said likewise thou also over five cities
another came saying lord behold here thy pound kept laid napkin
feared thee because thou art austere man takest layedst down reapest didst sow
saith out thine own mouth judge thee thou wicked servant knewest austere man taking laid down reaping did sow
wherefore then gavest thou money bank at coming might required mine own usury
said stood by take pound give hath ten pounds
said lord hath ten pounds
say you every one hath given even taken away
those mine enemies would should reign over bring hither slay before
had thus spoken went before ascending jerusalem
came pass come nigh bethphage bethany at mount called olives sent two disciples
saying go ye village over against you at your entering find colt tied whereon yet never man sat loose bring hither
if any man ask you why do ye loose thus say because lord hath need
sent went way found even had said
loosing colt owners thereof said why loose ye
said lord hath need
brought jesus cast garments upon colt set thereon
went spread clothes way
come nigh even now at descent mount olives whole multitude disciples began rejoice praise god loud voice mighty works had seen
saying blessed king cometh name lord peace heaven glory highest
some pharisees among multitude said master rebuke thy disciples
answered said tell you if these should hold peace stones would immediately cry out
come near beheld city wept over
saying if thou hadst known even at least thy day things belong peace now hid thine eyes
days come upon thee thine enemies cast trench about compass round keep on every side
lay thee even ground thy children within leave one stone upon another because thou knewest time visitation
went temple began cast out sold therein bought
saying written house prayer ye made den thieves
taught daily temple chief priests scribes people sought destroy
could find what might do people very attentive hear
came pass on one those days taught people temple preached gospel chief priests scribes upon elders
spake saying tell us by what authority doest thou these things or who gave thee
answered said also ask you one thing answer
baptism john heaven or men
reasoned themselves saying if we say heaven why then believed ye
if we say men people stone us persuaded john prophet
answered could tell whence
jesus said neither tell you by what authority do these things
then began speak people parable certain man planted vineyard let forth husbandmen went far country long time
at season sent servant husbandmen should give fruit vineyard beat away empty
again sent another servant beat also entreated shamefully away empty
again sent third wounded also cast out
then said lord vineyard what do send beloved son may reverence see
husbandmen saw reasoned among themselves saying heir come let us kill inheritance may our's
so cast out vineyard killed what therefore lord do
come destroy these husbandmen give vineyard others heard said god forbid
beheld said what then written stone builders rejected same become head corner
whosoever fall upon stone broken on whomsoever grind powder
chief priests scribes same hour sought lay hands on feared people perceived had spoken parable against
watched sent forth spies should feign themselves just men might take hold words so deliver power authority governor
asked saying master we know thou sayest teachest rightly neither acceptest person any way god truly
lawful us give tribute caesar or no
perceived craftiness said why tempt ye
shew penny whose image superscription hath answered said caesar's
said render therefore caesar things caesar's god god's
could take hold words before people marvelled at answer held peace
then came certain sadducees deny there any resurrection asked
saying master moses wrote us if any man's brother die having wife without children should take raise seed
there therefore seven brethren first took wife died without children
second took her wife died childless
third took her like manner seven also left no children died
last woman died also
therefore resurrection whose wife she seven had her
jesus answering said children world marry given marriage
accounted worthy obtain world resurrection dead neither marry nor given marriage
neither can die any more equal angels children god being resurrection
now dead raised even moses shewed at bush calleth lord god abraham isaac jacob
god dead living live
then certain scribes answering said master thou hast well
after durst ask any question at
said how say christ david's son
david himself saith book psalms lord said sit thou on right hand
till make thine enemies thy footstool
david therefore calleth lord how then son
then audience people said disciples
beware scribes desire walk long robes love greetings markets highest seats synagogues chief rooms at feasts
devour widows' houses shew make long prayers same receive greater damnation
looked saw rich men casting gifts treasury
saw also certain poor widow casting thither two mites
said truth say you poor widow hath cast more than
these abundance cast offerings god she her penury hath living had
some spake temple how adorned goodly stones gifts said
these things ye behold days come there left one stone upon another thrown down
asked saying master these things what sign there come pass
said take heed ye deceived many come name saying am christ time draweth near go therefore after
ye hear wars commotions terrified these things must first come pass end by
then said nation rise against kingdom
great earthquakes divers places famines pestilences fearful sights signs there heaven
before these lay hands on you persecute delivering synagogues prisons being brought kings rulers name's sake
turn you testimony
settle therefore your hearts meditate before what ye answer
give you mouth wisdom your adversaries able gainsay nor resist
ye betrayed both by parents brethren kinsfolks friends some you cause put death
ye hated men name's sake
there hair your head perish
your patience possess ye souls
ye see jerusalem compassed armies then know desolation thereof nigh
then let judaea flee mountains midst depart out countries enter thereinto
these days vengeance things written may fulfilled
woe child give suck those days there great distress land wrath upon people
fall by edge sword led away captive nations jerusalem trodden down gentiles until times fulfilled
there signs sun moon stars upon earth distress nations perplexity sea waves roaring
men's hearts failing fear looking after those things coming on earth powers heaven shaken
then see son man coming cloud power great glory
these things begin come pass then look lift your heads redemption draweth nigh
spake parable behold fig tree trees
now shoot forth ye see know your own selves summer nigh at hand
so likewise ye see these things come pass know kingdom god nigh at hand
verily say you generation pass away till fulfilled
heaven earth pass away words
take heed yourselves lest at any time your hearts overcharged surfeiting drunkenness cares life so day come upon you unawares
snare come on dwell face whole earth
watch ye therefore pray always may accounted worthy escape these things come pass stand before son man
day time teaching temple at night went out abode mount called olives
people came early morning temple hear
now feast unleavened bread drew nigh called passover
chief priests scribes sought how might kill feared people
then entered satan judas surnamed iscariot being number twelve
went way communed chief priests captains how might betray
glad covenanted give money
promised sought opportunity betray absence multitude
then came day unleavened bread passover must killed
sent peter john saying go prepare us passover we may eat
said where wilt thou we prepare
said behold ye entered city there man meet you bearing pitcher water follow house where entereth
ye say goodman house master saith thee where guestchamber eat passover disciples
shew you large upper room furnished there make ready
went found had said made ready passover
hour come sat down twelve apostles
said desire desired eat passover you before suffer
say you any more eat thereof until fulfilled kingdom god
took cup gave thanks said take divide among yourselves
say you drink fruit vine until kingdom god come
took bread gave thanks brake saying body given you do remembrance
likewise also cup after supper saying new testament blood shed you
behold hand betrayeth on table
truly son man goeth determined woe by whom betrayed
began enquire among themselves should do thing
there also strife among should accounted greatest
said kings gentiles exercise lordship over authority upon called benefactors
ye so greatest among you let younger chief doth serve
whether greater sitteth at meat or serveth am among you
ye continued temptations
appoint you kingdom father hath appointed
ye may eat drink at table kingdom sit on thrones judging twelve tribes israel
lord said simon behold satan hath desired you may sift wheat
prayed thee thy faith fail thou art converted strengthen brethren
said lord am ready go thee both prison death
said tell thee peter cock crow day before thou shalt thrice deny knowest
said sent you without purse scrip shoes lacked ye any thing nothing
then said now hath purse let take likewise scrip no sword sell garment buy one
say you written must yet accomplished reckoned among transgressors things concerning end
said lord behold here two swords enough
came out went wont mount olives disciples also followed
at place said pray ye enter temptation
withdrawn about stone's cast kneeled down prayed
saying father if thou willing remove cup nevertheless thine done
there appeared angel heaven strengthening
being agony prayed more earnestly sweat great drops blood falling down ground
rose prayer come disciples found sleeping sorrow
said why sleep ye rise pray lest enter temptation
while yet spake behold multitude called judas one twelve went before drew near jesus kiss
jesus said judas betrayest thou son man kiss
about saw what would follow said lord we smite sword
one smote servant high priest cut off right ear
jesus answered said suffer ye thus far touched ear healed
then jesus said chief priests captains temple elders come ye out against thief swords staves
daily you temple ye stretched forth no hands against your hour power darkness
then took led brought high priest's house peter followed afar off
had kindled fire midst hall set down together peter sat among
certain maid beheld sat by fire earnestly looked upon said man also
denied saying woman know
after little while another saw said thou art also peter man am
about space one hour after another confidently affirmed saying truth fellow also galilaean
peter said man know what thou sayest immediately while yet spake cock crew
lord turned looked upon peter remembered word how had said before cock crow thou shalt deny thrice
peter went out wept bitterly
men held jesus mocked smote
had blindfolded struck on face asked saying prophesy who smote thee
many other things blasphemously spake against
soon day elders people chief priests scribes came together led council saying
art thou christ tell us said if you ye believe
if also ask you ye answer nor let go
hereafter son man sit on right hand power god
then said art thou son god ye say am
said what need we any further witness ourselves heard own mouth
whole multitude arose led pilate
began accuse saying we found fellow perverting nation forbidding give tribute caesar himself christ king
pilate asked saying art thou king jews answered said sayest
then said pilate chief priests people find no fault man
more fierce saying stirreth people teaching throughout jewry beginning galilee place
pilate heard galilee asked whether man galilaean
soon knew belonged herod's jurisdiction sent herod who himself also at jerusalem time
herod saw jesus exceeding glad desirous see long season because had heard many things hoped seen some miracle done by
then questioned many words answered nothing
chief priests scribes stood vehemently accused
herod men war set at nought mocked arrayed gorgeous robe sent again pilate
same day pilate herod made friends together before at enmity between themselves
pilate had called together chief priests rulers people
said ye brought man one perverteth people behold having examined before you found no fault touching those things whereof accuse
no nor yet herod sent you lo nothing worthy death done
therefore chastise release
necessity must release one at feast
cried out at once saying away man release us barabbas
who certain sedition made city murder cast prison
pilate therefore willing release jesus spake again
cried saying crucify
said third time why what evil hath done found no cause death therefore chastise let go
instant loud voices requiring might crucified chief priests prevailed
pilate gave sentence should required
released sedition murder cast prison whom had desired delivered jesus
led away laid hold upon one simon cyrenian coming out country on cross might bear after jesus
there followed great company people women also bewailed lamented
jesus turning said daughters jerusalem weep yourselves your children
behold days coming say blessed barren wombs never bare paps gave suck
then begin say mountains fall on us hills cover
if do these things green tree what done dry
there also two other malefactors led put death
come place called calvary there crucified malefactors one on right hand other left
then said jesus father forgive know what do parted raiment cast lots
people stood beholding rulers also derided saying saved others let save himself if christ chosen god
soldiers also mocked coming offering vinegar
saying if thou king jews save thyself
superscription also written over letters greek latin hebrew king jews
one malefactors hanged railed on saying if thou christ save thyself us
other answering rebuked saying dost thou fear god seeing art same condemnation
we indeed justly receive due reward our deeds man hath done nothing amiss
said jesus lord remember thou comest thy kingdom
jesus said verily say thee day shalt thou paradise
about sixth hour there darkness over earth until ninth
sun darkened veil temple rent midst
jesus had cried loud voice said father thy hands commend spirit having thus gave ghost
now centurion saw what done glorified god saying certainly righteous man
people came together sight beholding things done smote breasts returned
acquaintance women followed galilee stood afar off beholding these things
behold there man named joseph counsellor good just
same had consented counsel deed arimathaea city jews who also himself waited kingdom god
man went pilate begged body jesus
took down wrapped linen laid sepulchre hewn stone wherein never man before
day preparation sabbath drew on
women also came galilee followed after beheld sepulchre how body laid
returned prepared spices ointments rested sabbath day according commandment
now upon first day week very early morning came sepulchre bringing spices had prepared certain others
found stone rolled away sepulchre
entered found body lord jesus
came pass much perplexed thereabout behold two men stood by shining garments
afraid bowed down faces earth said why seek ye living among dead
here risen remember how spake you yet galilee
saying son man must delivered hands sinful men crucified third day rise again
remembered words
returned sepulchre told these things eleven rest
mary magdalene joanna mother james other women told these things apostles
words seemed idle tales believed
then arose peter ran sepulchre stooping down beheld linen clothes laid by themselves departed wondering himself at come pass
behold two went same day village called emmaus jerusalem about threescore furlongs
talked together these things had happened
came pass while communed together reasoned jesus himself drew near went
eyes holden should know
said what manner communications these ye one another walk sad
one whose name cleopas answering said art thou only stranger jerusalem hast known things come pass there these days
said what things concerning jesus nazareth prophet mighty deed word before god people
how chief priests our rulers delivered condemned death crucified
we trusted had been should redeemed israel beside day third since these things done
yea certain women also our company made us astonished early at sepulchre
found body came saying had also seen vision angels said alive
certain us went sepulchre found even so women had said saw
then said o fools slow heart believe prophets spoken
ought christ suffered these things enter glory
beginning at moses prophets expounded scriptures things concerning himself
drew nigh village whither went made though would gone further
constrained saying abide us toward evening day far spent went tarry
came pass sat at meat took bread blessed brake gave
eyes opened knew vanished out sight
said one another did our heart burn within us while talked by way opened scriptures
rose same hour returned jerusalem found eleven gathered together
saying lord risen indeed hath appeared simon
told what things done way how known breaking bread
thus spake jesus himself stood midst saith peace you
terrified affrighted supposed had seen spirit
said why ye troubled do thoughts arise your hearts
behold hands feet myself handle see spirit hath flesh bones ye
had thus spoken shewed hands feet
while yet believed joy wondered said ye here any meat
gave piece broiled fish honeycomb
took did eat before
said these words spake you while yet things must fulfilled written law moses prophets psalms concerning
then opened understanding might understand scriptures
said thus written behoved christ suffer rise dead third day
repentance remission sins should preached name among nations beginning at jerusalem
ye witnesses these things
behold send promise father upon you tarry ye city jerusalem until endued power on high
led out far bethany lifted hands blessed
came pass while blessed parted carried heaven
worshipped returned jerusalem great joy
continually temple praising blessing god amen
beginning word god
same beginning god
things made by without any thing
life light men
light shineth darkness comprehended
there man sent god whose name john
same came witness bear light men through might believe
light sent bear witness
true light lighteth every man cometh world
world made by knew
came own received
many received gave power become sons god even believe on name
born blood nor flesh man god
word made flesh dwelt among us we beheld glory only begotten father full grace truth
john bare witness cried saying whom spake cometh after preferred before
fulness we received grace
law given by moses grace truth came jesus christ
no man hath seen god at any time only begotten son bosom father declared
record john jews sent priests levites jerusalem ask who art thou
confessed denied am christ
asked what then art thou elias saith am prophet answered no
then said who art thou we may give answer sent us what sayest thyself
said am voice one crying wilderness make straight way lord prophet esaias
sent pharisees
asked said why baptizest thou then if christ nor elias neither prophet
john answered saying baptize water there standeth one among you whom ye know
who coming after preferred before whose shoe's latchet am worthy unloose
these things done bethabara beyond jordan where john baptizing
next day john seeth jesus coming saith behold lamb god taketh away sin world
whom said after cometh man preferred before
knew should made manifest israel therefore am come baptizing water
john bare record saying saw spirit descending heaven like dove abode upon
knew sent baptize water same said upon whom thou shalt see spirit descending remaining on baptizeth holy ghost
saw bare record son god
again next day after john stood two disciples
looking upon jesus walked saith behold lamb god
two disciples heard speak followed jesus
then jesus turned saw following saith what seek ye said rabbi say being interpreted master where dwellest thou
saith come see came saw where dwelt abode day about tenth hour
one two heard john speak followed andrew simon peter's brother
first findeth own brother simon saith we found messias being interpreted christ
brought jesus beheld said thou art simon son jona shalt called cephas by interpretation stone
day following jesus would go forth galilee findeth philip saith follow
now philip bethsaida city andrew peter
philip findeth nathanael saith we found whom moses law prophets did write jesus nazareth son joseph
nathanael said can there any good thing come out nazareth philip saith see
jesus saw nathanael coming saith behold israelite indeed whom no guile
nathanael saith whence knowest thou jesus answered said before philip called thee wast under fig tree saw
nathanael answered saith rabbi thou art son god king israel
jesus answered said because thee saw under fig tree believest thou shalt see greater things than these
saith verily say you hereafter ye see heaven open angels god ascending descending upon son man
third day there marriage cana galilee mother jesus
both jesus called disciples marriage
wanted wine mother jesus saith no
jesus saith her woman what do thee mine hour yet come
mother saith servants whatsoever you do
there set six waterpots stone after manner purifying jews containing two or three firkins apiece
jesus saith fill waterpots water filled brim
saith draw out now bear governor feast bare
ruler feast had tasted water made wine knew whence servants drew governor called bridegroom
saith every man at beginning doth set forth good wine men well drunk then worse thou hast kept until now
beginning miracles did jesus cana galilee manifested forth glory disciples believed on
after went down capernaum mother brethren disciples continued there many days
jews' passover at hand jesus went jerusalem
found temple those sold oxen sheep doves changers money sitting
had made scourge small cords drove out temple sheep oxen poured changers' money overthrew tables
said sold doves take these things hence make father's house merchandise
disciples remembered written zeal thine house hath eaten
then answered jews said what sign shewest thou us seeing doest these things
jesus answered said destroy temple three days raise
then said jews forty six years temple building wilt thou rear three days
spake temple body
therefore risen dead disciples remembered had said believed scripture word jesus
now jerusalem at passover feast day many believed name saw miracles did
jesus did commit himself because knew men
needed any should testify man knew what
there man pharisees named nicodemus ruler jews
same came jesus by night said rabbi we know thou art teacher come god no man can do these miracles doest except
jesus answered said verily say thee except man born again cannot see kingdom god
nicodemus saith how can man born old enter second time mother's womb
jesus answered verily say thee except man born water spirit cannot enter kingdom god
born flesh spirit
marvel said thee ye must born again
wind bloweth where listeth thou hearest sound thereof canst tell whence cometh whither goeth so every one born spirit
nicodemus answered said how can these things
jesus answered said art thou master israel knowest these things
verily say thee we speak do know testify seen ye receive our witness
if told you earthly things ye believe how tell heavenly
no man hath ascended heaven came down even son
moses lifted serpent wilderness even so must son man
whosoever believeth should perish eternal life
god so loved world gave only begotten son whosoever believeth should perish everlasting life
god sent son world condemn through might saved
believeth on condemned already because hath believed name only begotten son god
condemnation light come world men loved darkness rather than because deeds evil
every one doeth evil hateth light neither cometh lest deeds should reproved
doeth truth cometh light deeds may made manifest wrought god
after these things came jesus disciples land judaea there tarried baptized
john also baptizing aenon near salim because there much water came baptized
john yet cast prison
then there arose question between some john's disciples jews about purifying
came john said rabbi thee beyond jordan whom thou barest witness behold same baptizeth men come
john answered said man can receive nothing except given heaven
ye yourselves bear witness said am christ sent before
hath bride bridegroom friend standeth heareth rejoiceth greatly because bridegroom's voice joy therefore fulfilled
must increase decrease
cometh above earth earthly speaketh heaven
what hath seen heard testifieth no man receiveth testimony
hath received testimony set seal god true
whom god hath sent speaketh words giveth spirit by measure
father loveth son hath given things hand
believeth on son hath everlasting life see wrath god abideth
therefore lord knew how pharisees had heard jesus made baptized more disciples than john
though jesus himself baptized disciples
left judaea departed again galilee
must needs go through samaria
then cometh city samaria called sychar near parcel ground jacob gave son joseph
now jacob's well there jesus therefore being wearied journey sat thus on about sixth hour
there cometh woman samaria draw water jesus saith her give drink
disciples gone away city buy meat
then saith woman samaria how thou being jew askest drink am jews no dealings samaritans
jesus answered said her if thou knewest gift god who saith thee give drink wouldest asked would given living water
woman saith sir thou hast nothing draw well deep whence then living water
art thou greater than our father jacob gave us well drank thereof himself children cattle
jesus answered said her whosoever drinketh water thirst again
whosoever drinketh water give never thirst well springing everlasting life
woman saith sir give water thirst neither come hither draw
jesus saith her go call thy husband come hither
woman answered said no husband jesus her thou hast well
thou hast had five husbands whom now thy husband saidst truly
woman saith sir perceive thou art prophet
our fathers worshipped mountain ye say jerusalem place where men ought worship
jesus saith her woman believe hour cometh ye neither mountain nor yet at jerusalem worship father
ye worship know what we salvation jews
hour cometh now true worshippers worship father spirit truth seeketh such
god spirit worship must truth
woman saith know messias cometh called christ come tell us things
jesus saith her speak thee am
upon came disciples marvelled talked woman yet no man said what seekest thou or why talkest her
woman then left her waterpot went way city saith men
come see man told things ever did christ
then went out city came
mean while disciples prayed saying master eat
said meat eat ye know
therefore said disciples one another hath any man brought ought eat
jesus saith meat do sent finish work
say ye there yet four months then cometh harvest behold you lift your eyes look on fields white already
reapeth receiveth wages gathereth fruit life eternal both soweth may rejoice together
herein saying true one soweth another reapeth
sent you reap whereon ye bestowed no labour other men laboured entered labours
many samaritans city believed on saying woman testified told ever did
so samaritans come besought would tarry abode there two days
many more believed because own word
said woman now we believe because thy saying heard ourselves know indeed christ saviour world
now after two days departed thence went galilee
jesus himself testified prophet hath no honour own country
then come galilee galilaeans received having seen things did at jerusalem feast also went
so jesus came again cana galilee where made water wine there certain nobleman whose son sick at capernaum
heard jesus come out judaea galilee went besought would down heal son at point death
then said jesus except ye see signs wonders believe
nobleman saith sir come down ere child die
jesus saith go thy way son liveth man believed word had spoken went
now going down servants met told saying thy son liveth
then enquired hour began amend said yesterday at seventh fever left
so father knew at same hour jesus said thy son liveth himself believed whole house
again second miracle jesus did come out judaea galilee
after there feast jews jesus went jerusalem
now there at jerusalem by sheep market pool called hebrew tongue bethesda having five porches
these lay great multitude impotent folk blind halt withered waiting moving water
angel went down at certain season pool troubled water whosoever then first after troubling stepped made whole whatsoever disease had
certain man there had infirmity thirty eight years
jesus saw lie knew had been now long time case saith wilt thou made whole
impotent man answered sir no water troubled put pool while am coming another steppeth down before
jesus saith rise take thy bed walk
immediately man made whole took bed walked on same day sabbath
jews therefore said cured sabbath day lawful thee carry thy bed
answered made whole same said take thy bed walk
then asked what man said thee take thy bed walk
healed wist who jesus had conveyed himself away multitude being place
afterward jesus findeth temple said behold thou art made whole sin no more lest worse thing come thee
man departed told jews jesus had made whole
therefore did jews persecute jesus sought slay because had done these things on sabbath day
jesus answered father worketh hitherto work
therefore jews sought more kill because only had broken sabbath said also god father making himself equal
then answered jesus said verily say you son can do nothing himself what seeth father things soever doeth these also likewise
father loveth son sheweth things himself doeth shew greater works than these ye may marvel
father raiseth dead quickeneth even so son whom
father judgeth no man hath committed judgment son
men should honour son even father honoureth hath sent
verily say you heareth word believeth on sent hath everlasting life come condemnation passed death
verily say you hour coming now dead hear voice son god live
father hath life himself so given son
hath given authority execute judgment also because son man
marvel at hour coming graves hear voice
come forth done good resurrection life evil damnation
can mine own self do nothing hear judge judgment just because seek father hath sent
if bear witness myself true
there another beareth witness know witnesseth true
ye sent john bare witness truth
receive testimony man these things say ye might saved
burning shining light ye willing season rejoice
greater witness than john works father hath given finish same do bear sent
father himself hath sent borne witness ye neither heard voice at any time nor seen shape
ye word abiding you whom hath sent believe
search scriptures ye think eternal life testify
ye come might life
receive honour men
know you ye love god
am come father's name ye receive if another own
how can ye believe receive honour one another seek cometh god only
do think accuse you father there one accuseth even moses whom ye trust
had ye believed moses would wrote
if ye believe writings how words
after these things jesus went over sea galilee tiberias
great multitude followed because saw miracles did on diseased
