jesus went mountain there sat disciples
passover feast jews nigh
jesus then lifted eyes saw great company come saith philip whence we buy bread these may eat
said prove himself knew what would do
philip answered two hundred pennyworth bread sufficient every one may take little
one disciples andrew simon peter's brother saith
there lad here hath five barley loaves two small fishes what among so many
jesus said make men sit down now there much grass place so sat number about five thousand
jesus took loaves had given thanks distributed disciples set down likewise fishes much would
filled said disciples gather fragments remain nothing lost
therefore gathered together filled twelve baskets fragments five barley loaves remained over above had eaten
then those men had seen miracle jesus did said truth prophet should come world
jesus therefore perceived would come take by force make king departed again mountain himself alone
even now come disciples went down sea
entered ship went over sea toward capernaum now dark jesus come
sea arose by reason great wind blew
so had rowed about five twenty or thirty furlongs see jesus walking on sea drawing nigh ship afraid
saith afraid
then willingly received ship immediately at land whither went
day following people stood on other side sea saw there none boat save one whereinto disciples entered jesus went gone away alone
howbeit there came other boats tiberias nigh place where did eat bread after lord had given thanks
people therefore saw jesus there neither disciples also took shipping came capernaum seeking
had found on other side sea said rabbi camest thou hither
jesus answered said verily say you ye seek because saw miracles did eat loaves filled
labour meat perisheth endureth everlasting life son man give you hath god father sealed
then said what we do might work works god
jesus answered said work god ye believe on whom hath sent
said therefore what sign shewest thou then we may see believe thee dost work
our fathers did eat manna desert written gave bread heaven
then jesus said verily say you moses gave bread heaven father giveth true
bread god cometh down heaven giveth life world
then said lord evermore give us bread
jesus said am bread life cometh never hunger believeth on thirst
said you ye also seen believe
father giveth come cometh no wise cast out
came down heaven do mine own sent
father's hath sent given should lose nothing raise again at last day
sent every one seeth son believeth on may everlasting life raise at last day
jews then murmured at because said am bread came down heaven
said jesus son joseph whose father mother we know how then saith came down heaven
jesus therefore answered said murmur among yourselves
no man can come except father hath sent draw raise at last day
written prophets taught god every man therefore hath heard learned father cometh
any man hath seen father save god
verily say you believeth on hath everlasting life
am bread life
your fathers did eat manna wilderness dead
bread cometh down heaven man may eat thereof die
am living bread came down heaven if any man eat live ever give flesh life world
jews therefore strove among themselves saying how can man give us flesh eat
then jesus said verily say you except ye eat flesh son man drink blood no life
whoso eateth flesh drinketh blood hath eternal life raise at last day
flesh meat indeed blood drink
eateth flesh drinketh blood dwelleth
living father hath sent live by so eateth even
bread came down heaven your fathers did eat manna dead eateth live ever
these things said synagogue taught capernaum
many therefore disciples had heard said hard saying who can hear
jesus knew himself disciples murmured at said doth offend you
what if ye see son man ascend where before
spirit quickeneth flesh profiteth nothing words speak you life
there some you believe jesus knew beginning who believed should betray
said therefore you no man can come except given father
time many disciples went back walked no more
then said jesus twelve ye also go away
then simon peter answered lord whom we go thou hast words eternal life
we believe sure thou art christ son living god
jesus answered chosen you twelve one devil
spake judas iscariot son simon should betray being one twelve
after these things jesus walked galilee would walk jewry because jews sought kill
now jews' feast tabernacles at hand
brethren therefore said depart hence go judaea thy disciples also may see works thou doest
there no man doeth any thing secret himself seeketh known openly if thou do these things shew thyself world
neither did brethren believe
then jesus said time yet come your alway ready
world cannot hate you hateth because testify works thereof evil
go ye feast yet time full come
had said these words abode still galilee
brethren gone then went also feast openly secret
then jews sought at feast said where
there much murmuring among people concerning some said good man others nay deceiveth
howbeit no man spake openly fear jews
now about midst feast jesus went temple taught
jews marvelled saying how knoweth man letters having never learned
jesus answered said doctrine mine sent
if any man do know doctrine whether god or speak myself
speaketh himself seeketh own glory sent same true no unrighteousness
did moses give you law yet none keepeth why go ye about kill
people answered said thou hast devil who goeth about kill thee
jesus answered said done one work ye marvel
moses therefore gave you circumcision because fathers ye on sabbath day circumcise man
if man on sabbath day receive circumcision law moses should broken ye angry at because made every whit whole
judge according appearance righteous judgment
then said some jerusalem whom seek kill
lo speaketh boldly say nothing do rulers know indeed very christ
howbeit we know man whence christ cometh no knoweth
then cried jesus temple taught saying ye both know whence am come myself sent true whom
know am hath sent
then sought take no man laid hands on because hour yet come
many people believed on said christ cometh do more miracles than these man hath done
pharisees heard people murmured such things concerning chief priests sent officers take
then said jesus yet little while am you go sent
ye seek find where am thither cannot come
then said jews among themselves whither go we find dispersed gentiles teach
what manner saying said ye seek find where am thither cannot come
last day great feast jesus stood cried saying if any man thirst let come drink
believeth on scripture hath said out belly flow rivers living water
spake spirit believe on should receive holy ghost yet given because jesus glorified
many people therefore heard saying said truth prophet
others said christ some come out galilee
hath scripture said christ cometh seed david out town bethlehem where
so there division among people because
some would taken no man laid hands on
then came officers chief priests pharisees said why ye brought
officers answered never man spake like
then answered pharisees ye also deceived
any rulers or pharisees believed on
people who knoweth law cursed
nicodemus saith came jesus by night being one
doth our law judge any man before hear know what doeth
answered said art thou also galilee search look out ariseth no prophet
every man went own house
jesus went mount olives
early morning came again temple people sat down taught
scribes pharisees brought woman taken adultery had set her midst
say master woman taken adultery very act
now moses law commanded us such should stoned what sayest thou
said tempting might accuse jesus stooped down finger wrote on ground though heard
so continued asking lifted himself said without sin among you let first cast stone at her
again stooped down wrote on ground
heard being convicted by own conscience went out one beginning at eldest even last jesus left alone woman standing midst
jesus had lifted himself saw none woman said her where those thine accusers hath no man condemned thee
she said no man lord jesus her neither do condemn thee go sin more
then spake jesus again saying am light world followeth walk darkness life
pharisees therefore said thou bearest record thyself thy true
jesus answered said though bear record myself yet true know whence came whither go ye cannot tell come
ye judge after flesh no man
yet if judge judgment true am alone father sent
also written your law testimony two men true
am one bear witness myself father sent beareth
then said where thy father jesus answered ye neither know nor if had known should also
these words spake jesus treasury taught temple no man laid hands on hour yet come
then said jesus again go way ye seek die your sins whither cannot come
then said jews kill himself because saith whither go ye cannot come
said ye beneath am above world
said therefore you ye die your sins if believe am
then said who art thou jesus saith even same you beginning
many things say judge you sent true speak world those heard
understood spake father
then said jesus ye lifted son man know am do nothing myself father hath taught speak these things
sent father hath left alone do always those things please
spake these words many believed on
then said jesus those jews believed on if ye continue word disciples indeed
ye know truth make you free
answered we abraham's seed never bondage any man how sayest thou ye made free
jesus answered verily say you whosoever committeth sin servant
servant abideth house ever son
if son therefore make you free ye indeed
know ye abraham's seed seek kill because word hath no place you
speak seen father ye do your
answered said abraham our father jesus saith if ye abraham's children would do works
now ye seek kill man hath told you truth heard god did abraham
ye do deeds your father then said we born fornication one even god
jesus said if god your father ye would love proceeded forth came neither myself sent
why do ye understand speech even because cannot hear word
ye your father devil lusts do murderer beginning abode truth because there no speaketh lie own liar
because tell you truth ye believe
you convinceth sin if say truth why do ye believe
god heareth god's words ye therefore hear because
then answered jews said say we well thou art samaritan hast devil
jesus answered devil honour father ye do dishonour
seek mine own glory there one seeketh judgeth
verily say you if man keep saying never see death
then said jews now we know thou hast devil abraham dead prophets sayest if man keep saying never taste death
art thou greater than our father abraham dead prophets whom makest thyself
jesus answered if honour myself nothing father honoureth whom ye say your god
yet ye known know if should say liar like you keep saying
your father abraham rejoiced see day saw glad
then said jews thou art yet fifty years old hast seen abraham
jesus said verily say you before abraham am
then took stones cast at jesus hid himself went out temple going through midst so passed by
jesus passed by saw man blind birth
disciples asked saying master who did sin man or parents born blind
jesus answered neither hath man sinned nor parents works god should made manifest
must work works sent while day night cometh no man can
long am world light
had thus spoken spat on ground made clay spittle anointed eyes blind man
said go wash pool siloam by interpretation sent went way therefore washed came seeing
neighbours therefore before had seen blind said sat begged
some said others like am
therefore said how thine eyes opened
answered said man called jesus made clay anointed mine eyes go pool siloam wash went washed received sight
then said where know
brought pharisees aforetime blind
sabbath day jesus made clay opened eyes
then again pharisees also asked how had received sight said put clay upon mine eyes washed do see
therefore said some pharisees man god because keepeth sabbath day others how can sinner do such miracles there division among
say blind man again what sayest thou hath opened thine eyes said prophet
jews did believe concerning had been blind received sight until called parents
asked saying your son who ye say born blind how then doth now see
parents answered said we know our son born blind
by what means now seeth we know or who hath opened eyes age ask speak himself
these words spake parents because feared jews had agreed already if any man did confess christ should put out synagogue
therefore said parents age ask
then again called man blind said give god praise we know sinner
answered said whether sinner or no know one thing whereas blind now see
then said again what did thee how opened thine eyes
answered told you already ye did hear wherefore would again also disciples
then reviled said thou art disciple we moses' disciples
we know god spake moses fellow whence
man answered said why herein marvellous thing ye know whence yet hath opened mine eyes
now we know god heareth sinners if any man worshipper doeth
since world began heard any man opened eyes one born blind
if man god could do nothing
answered said thou wast altogether born sins dost teach us cast out
jesus heard had cast out found said dost thou believe on son god
answered said who lord might believe on
jesus said thou hast both seen talketh thee
said lord believe worshipped
jesus said judgment am come world see might made blind
some pharisees heard these words said we blind also
jesus said if ye blind should no sin now say we see therefore your remaineth
verily say you entereth by door sheepfold climbeth some other way same thief robber
entereth by door shepherd sheep
porter openeth sheep hear voice calleth own by name leadeth out
putteth forth own sheep goeth before follow know voice
stranger follow flee know voice strangers
parable spake jesus understood what things
then said jesus again verily say you am door sheep
ever came before thieves robbers sheep did hear
am door by if any man enter saved go out find pasture
thief cometh steal kill destroy am come might life more abundantly
am good shepherd giveth life sheep
hireling shepherd whose own sheep seeth wolf coming leaveth fleeth catcheth scattereth
hireling fleeth because careth sheep
am good shepherd know sheep known mine
father knoweth even so know lay down life sheep
other sheep fold also must bring hear voice there one shepherd
therefore doth father love because lay down life might take again
no man taketh lay down myself power take again commandment received father
there division therefore again among jews these sayings
many said hath devil mad why hear ye
others said these words hath devil can open eyes blind
at jerusalem feast dedication winter
jesus walked temple solomon's porch
then came jews round about said how long dost thou make us doubt if christ tell plainly
jesus answered told you ye believed works do father's name bear witness
ye believe because sheep said you
sheep hear voice know follow
give eternal life never perish neither any man pluck out hand
father gave greater than no man able pluck out father's hand
father one
then jews took stones again stone
jesus answered many good works shewed you father those do ye stone
jews answered saying good work we stone thee blasphemy because thou being man makest thyself god
jesus answered written your law said ye gods
if called gods whom word god came scripture cannot broken
say ye whom father hath sanctified sent world thou blasphemest because said am son god
if do works father believe
if do though ye believe works may know father
therefore sought again take escaped out hand
went away again beyond jordan place where john at first baptized there abode
many resorted said john did no miracle things spake man true
many believed on there
now certain man sick named lazarus bethany town mary her sister martha
mary anointed lord ointment wiped feet her hair whose brother lazarus sick
therefore sisters sent saying lord behold whom thou lovest sick
jesus heard said sickness death glory god son might glorified thereby
now jesus loved martha her sister lazarus
had heard therefore sick abode two days still same place where
then after saith disciples let us go judaea again
disciples say master jews late sought stone thee goest thou thither again
jesus answered there twelve hours day if any man walk stumbleth because seeth light world
if man walk night stumbleth because there no light
these things said after saith our friend lazarus sleepeth go may awake out sleep
then said disciples lord if sleep do well
howbeit jesus spake death thought had spoken taking rest sleep
then said jesus plainly lazarus dead
am glad your sakes there intent ye may believe nevertheless let us go
then said thomas called didymus fellowdisciples let us also go we may die
then jesus came found had lain grave four days already
now bethany nigh jerusalem about fifteen furlongs off
many jews came martha mary comfort concerning brother
then martha soon she heard jesus coming went met mary sat still house
then said martha jesus lord if thou hadst been here brother had died
know even now whatsoever thou wilt ask god give thee
jesus saith her thy brother rise again
martha saith know rise again resurrection at last day
jesus said her am resurrection life believeth though dead yet live
whosoever liveth believeth never die believest thou
she saith yea lord believe thou art christ son god should come world
she had so said went her way called mary sister secretly saying master come calleth thee
soon she heard arose quickly came
now jesus yet come town place where martha met
jews then her house comforted saw mary she rose hastily went out followed saying goeth grave weep there
then mary come where jesus saw she fell down at feet saying lord if thou hadst been here brother had died
jesus therefore saw her weeping jews also came groaned spirit troubled
said where ye laid lord come see
jesus wept
then said jews behold how loved
some said could man opened eyes blind caused even should died
jesus therefore again groaning himself cometh grave cave stone lay upon
jesus said take ye away stone martha sister dead saith lord by time stinketh hath been four days
jesus saith her said thee if thou wouldest believe shouldest see glory god
then took away stone place where dead laid jesus lifted eyes said father thank thee thou hast heard
knew thou hearest always because people stand by said may believe hast sent
thus had spoken cried loud voice lazarus come forth
dead came forth bound hand foot graveclothes face about napkin jesus saith loose let go
then many jews came mary had seen things jesus did believed on
some went ways pharisees told what things jesus had done
then gathered chief priests pharisees council said what do we man doeth many miracles
if we let thus alone men believe on romans come take away both our place nation
one named caiaphas being high priest same year said ye know nothing at
nor consider expedient us one man should die people whole nation perish
spake himself being high priest year prophesied jesus should die nation
nation only also should gather together one children god scattered abroad
then day forth took counsel together put death
jesus therefore walked no more openly among jews went thence country near wilderness city called ephraim there continued disciples
jews' passover nigh at hand many went out country jerusalem before purify themselves
then sought jesus spake among themselves stood temple what think ye come feast
now both chief priests pharisees had given commandment if any man knew where should shew might take
then jesus six days before passover came bethany where lazarus had been dead whom raised
there made supper martha served lazarus one sat at table
then took mary pound ointment spikenard very costly anointed feet jesus wiped her hair house filled odour
then saith one disciples judas iscariot simon's son should betray
why ointment sold three hundred pence given poor
said cared poor because thief had bag bare what put therein
then said jesus let her alone against day burying hath she kept
poor always ye you
much people jews therefore knew there came jesus' sake only might see lazarus also whom had raised dead
chief priests consulted might put lazarus also death
because by reason many jews went away believed on jesus
on next day much people come feast heard jesus coming jerusalem
took branches palm trees went forth meet cried hosanna blessed king israel cometh name lord
jesus had found young ass sat thereon written
fear daughter sion behold thy king cometh sitting on ass's colt
these things understood disciples at first jesus glorified then remembered written had done
people therefore called lazarus out grave raised dead bare record
cause people also met heard had done miracle
pharisees therefore said among themselves perceive ye how prevail nothing behold world gone after
there certain greeks among came worship at feast
same came therefore philip bethsaida galilee desired saying sir we would see jesus
philip cometh telleth andrew again tell jesus
jesus answered saying hour come son man should glorified
verily say you except corn wheat fall ground die abideth alone if bringeth forth much fruit
loveth life lose hateth world keep eternal
if any man serve let follow where am there also servant father honour
now soul troubled what say father save hour cause came
father glorify thy name then came there voice heaven saying both glorified again
people therefore stood by heard said thundered others angel spake
jesus answered said voice came because your sakes
now judgment world prince cast out
if lifted earth draw men
said signifying what death should die
people answered we heard out law christ abideth ever how sayest thou son man must lifted who
then jesus said yet little while light you walk ye lest darkness come upon walketh knoweth whither goeth
while ye light believe may children these things spake jesus departed did hide himself
though had done so many miracles before yet believed on
saying esaias prophet might fulfilled spake lord who hath believed our report whom arm been revealed
therefore could believe because esaias said again
hath blinded eyes hardened heart should see nor understand converted heal
these things said esaias saw glory spake
nevertheless among chief rulers also many believed on because pharisees did confess lest should put out synagogue
loved praise men more than god
jesus cried said believeth on sent
seeth sent
am come light world whosoever believeth on should abide darkness
if any man hear words believe judge came world save
rejecteth receiveth words hath one judgeth word spoken same judge last day
spoken myself father sent gave commandment what should say speak
know commandment life everlasting whatsoever speak therefore even father said so
now before feast passover jesus knew hour come should depart out world father having loved own end
supper being ended devil having now put heart judas iscariot simon's son betray
jesus knowing father had given things hands come god went
riseth supper laid aside garments took towel girded himself
after poureth water bason began wash disciples' feet wipe towel wherewith girded
then cometh simon peter saith lord dost thou wash feet
jesus answered said what do thou knowest now shalt know hereafter
peter saith thou shalt never wash feet jesus answered if thee hast no part
simon peter saith lord feet only also hands head
jesus saith washed needeth save wash feet clean every whit ye
knew who should betray therefore said ye clean
so after had washed feet taken garments set down again said know ye what done you
ye call master lord say well so am
if then your lord master washed feet ye also ought wash one another's
given you example ye should do done
verily say you servant greater than lord neither sent
if ye know these things happy do
speak you know whom chosen scripture may fulfilled eateth bread hath lifted heel against
now tell you before come pass ye may believe am
verily say you receiveth whomsoever send sent
jesus had thus said troubled spirit testified verily say you one betray
then disciples looked one on another doubting whom spake
now there leaning on jesus' bosom one disciples whom jesus loved
simon peter therefore beckoned should ask who whom spake
then lying on jesus' breast saith lord who
jesus answered whom give sop dipped had gave judas iscariot son simon
after sop satan entered then said jesus thou doest do quickly
now no man at table knew what intent spake
some thought because judas had bag jesus said buy those things we need against feast or should give something poor
then having received sop went immediately out night
therefore gone out jesus said now son man glorified god
if god glorified also glorify himself straightway
little children yet while am you ye seek said jews whither go cannot come so now say
new commandment give you ye love one another loved also
by men know ye disciples if love one another
simon peter said lord whither goest thou jesus answered go canst follow now shalt afterwards
peter said lord why cannot follow thee now lay down life thy sake
jesus answered wilt thou lay down thy life sake verily say thee cock crow till hast denied thrice
let your heart troubled ye believe god also
father's house many mansions if so would told you go prepare place
if go prepare place you come again receive myself where am there ye may also
whither go ye know way
thomas saith lord we know whither thou goest how can way
jesus saith am way truth life no man cometh father by
if ye had known should father also henceforth know seen
philip saith lord shew us father sufficeth
jesus saith been so long time you yet hast thou known philip hath seen father how sayest then shew us
believest thou am father words speak you myself dwelleth doeth works
believe am father or else very works' sake
verily say you believeth on works do also greater than these because go father
whatsoever ye ask name do father may glorified son
if ye ask any thing name do
if ye love keep commandments
pray father give you another comforter may abide ever
even spirit truth whom world cannot receive because seeth neither knoweth ye know dwelleth you
leave you comfortless come
yet little while world seeth no more ye see because live also
at day ye know am father you
hath commandments keepeth loveth loved father love manifest myself
judas saith iscariot lord how thou wilt manifest thyself us world
jesus answered said if man love keep words father we come make our abode
loveth keepeth sayings word ye hear mine father's sent
these things spoken you being yet present
comforter holy ghost whom father send name teach you things bring your remembrance whatsoever said
peace leave you give world giveth let your heart troubled neither afraid
ye heard how said you go away come again if loved would rejoice because father greater than
now told you before come pass ye might believe
hereafter talk much you prince world cometh hath nothing
world may know love father gave commandment even so do arise let us go hence
am true vine father husbandman
every branch beareth fruit taketh away purgeth may bring forth more
now ye clean through word spoken you
abide you branch cannot bear fruit itself except vine no more can ye
am vine ye branches abideth same bringeth forth much fruit without can do nothing
if man abide cast forth branch withered men gather fire burned
if ye abide words you ask what done
herein father glorified ye bear much fruit so disciples
father hath loved so you continue ye love
if ye keep commandments abide love even kept father's
these things spoken you joy might remain your full
commandment ye love one another loved you
greater love hath no man than lay down life friends
ye friends if do whatsoever command you
henceforth call you servants servant knoweth what lord doeth called friends things heard father made known
ye chosen you ordained should go bring forth fruit your remain whatsoever ask father name may give
these things command you ye love one another
if world hate you ye know hated before
if ye world would love own because chosen you out therefore hateth
remember word said you servant greater than lord if persecuted also persecute kept saying keep your's
these things do you name's sake because know sent
if had come spoken sin now no cloke
hateth father also
if had done among works none other man did sin now both seen hated father
cometh pass word might fulfilled written law hated without cause
comforter come whom send you father even spirit truth proceedeth testify
ye also bear witness because been beginning
these things spoken you ye should offended
put you out synagogues yea time cometh whosoever killeth think doeth god service
these things do you because known father nor
these things told you time come ye may remember said at beginning because
now go way sent none you asketh whither goest thou
because said these things you sorrow hath filled your heart
nevertheless tell you truth expedient go away if comforter come depart send
come reprove world sin righteousness judgment
sin because believe on
righteousness because go father ye see no more
judgment because prince world judged
yet many things say you ye cannot bear now
howbeit spirit truth come guide you speak himself whatsoever hear shew things
glorify receive mine shew you
things father hath mine therefore said take shew you
little while ye see again because go father
then said some disciples among themselves what saith us little while ye see again because go father
said therefore what saith little while we cannot tell
now jesus knew desirous ask said do ye enquire among yourselves little while see again
verily say you ye weep lament world rejoice sorrowful your sorrow turned joy
woman she travail hath sorrow because her hour come soon delivered child remembereth no more anguish joy man born world
ye now therefore sorrow see you again your heart rejoice joy no man taketh
day ye ask nothing verily say you whatsoever father name give
hitherto ye asked nothing name ask receive your joy may full
these things spoken you proverbs time cometh no more speak shew plainly father
at day ye ask name say you pray father
father himself loveth you because ye loved believed came out god
came forth father am come world again leave go
disciples said lo now speakest thou plainly no proverb
now we sure thou knowest things needest any man should ask thee by believe camest forth god
jesus answered do ye now believe
behold hour cometh yea now come ye scattered every man own leave alone yet am because father
these things spoken you ye might peace world tribulation good cheer overcome
these words spake jesus lifted eyes heaven said father hour come glorify thy son also may thee
thou hast given power over flesh should give eternal life many
life eternal might know thee only true god jesus christ whom thou hast sent
glorified thee on earth finished work thou gavest do
now o father glorify thou thine own self glory had thee before world
manifested thy name men thou gavest out world thine kept word
now known things whatsoever thou hast given thee
given words thou gavest received known surely came out thee believed didst send
pray world thou hast given thine
mine thine am glorified
now am no more world these come thee holy father keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given may one we
while world kept thy name those thou gavest none lost son perdition scripture might fulfilled
now come thee these things speak world might joy fulfilled themselves
given thy word world hath hated because even am
pray thou shouldest take out world keep evil
world even am
sanctify through thy truth word
thou hast sent world even so also
sakes sanctify myself also might sanctified through truth
neither pray these alone also believe on through word
may one thou father art thee also us world believe hast sent
glory thou gavest given may one even we
thou may made perfect one world know hast sent loved
father also whom thou hast given where am may behold glory lovedst before foundation world
o righteous father world hath known thee these thou hast sent
declared thy name declare love wherewith thou hast loved may
jesus had spoken these words went forth disciples over brook cedron where garden entered
judas also betrayed knew place jesus ofttimes resorted thither disciples
judas then having received band men officers chief priests pharisees cometh thither lanterns torches weapons
jesus therefore knowing things should come upon went forth said whom seek ye
answered jesus nazareth saith am judas also betrayed stood
soon then had said am went backward fell ground
then asked again whom seek ye said jesus nazareth
jesus answered told you am if therefore ye seek let these go way
saying might fulfilled spake thou gavest lost none
then simon peter having sword drew smote high priest's servant cut off right ear servant's name malchus
then said jesus peter put thy sword sheath cup father hath given drink
then band captain officers jews took jesus bound
led away annas first father law caiaphas high priest same year
now caiaphas gave counsel jews expedient one man should die people
simon peter followed jesus so did another disciple known high priest went palace
peter stood at door without then went out other disciple known high priest spake her kept brought
then saith damsel kept door peter art thou also one man's disciples am
servants officers stood there who had made fire coals cold warmed themselves peter himself
high priest then asked jesus disciples doctrine
jesus answered spake openly world ever taught synagogue temple whither jews always resort secret said nothing
why askest thou ask heard what said behold know
had thus spoken one officers stood by struck jesus palm hand saying answerest thou high priest so
jesus answered if spoken evil bear witness well why smitest thou
now annas had sent bound caiaphas high priest
simon peter stood warmed himself said therefore art thou also one disciples denied am
one servants high priest being kinsman whose ear peter cut off saith did see thee garden
peter then denied again immediately cock crew
then led jesus caiaphas hall judgment early themselves went lest should defiled might eat passover
pilate then went out said what accusation bring ye against man
answered said if malefactor we would delivered thee
then said pilate take ye judge according your law jews therefore lawful us put any man death
saying jesus might fulfilled spake signifying what death should die
then pilate entered judgment hall again called jesus said art thou king jews
jesus answered sayest thou thing thyself or did others tell thee
pilate answered am jew thine own nation chief priests delivered thee what hast thou done
jesus answered kingdom world if then would servants fight should delivered jews now hence
pilate therefore said art thou king then jesus answered sayest am end born cause came world should bear witness truth every one heareth voice
pilate saith what truth had said went out again jews find no fault at
ye custom should release you one at passover therefore king jews
then cried again saying man barabbas now robber
then pilate therefore took jesus scourged
soldiers platted crown thorns put on head purple robe
said hail king jews smote hands
pilate therefore went forth again saith behold bring you ye may know find no fault
then came jesus forth wearing crown thorns purple robe pilate saith behold man
chief priests therefore officers saw cried out saying crucify pilate saith take ye find no fault
jews answered we law by our ought die because made himself son god
pilate therefore heard saying more afraid
went again judgment hall saith jesus whence art thou gave no answer
then saith pilate speakest thou knowest power crucify thee release
jesus answered thou couldest no power at against except given thee above therefore delivered hath greater sin
thenceforth pilate sought release jews cried out saying if thou let man go art caesar's friend whosoever maketh himself king speaketh against caesar
pilate therefore heard saying brought jesus forth sat down judgment seat place called pavement hebrew gabbatha
preparation passover about sixth hour saith jews behold your king
cried out away crucify pilate saith your king chief priests answered we no caesar
then delivered therefore crucified took jesus led away
bearing cross went forth place called skull hebrew golgotha
where crucified two other on either side one jesus midst
pilate wrote title put on cross writing jesus nazareth king jews
title then read many jews place where jesus crucified nigh city written hebrew greek latin
then said chief priests jews pilate write king am
pilate answered what written
then soldiers had crucified jesus took garments made four parts every soldier part also coat now without seam woven top throughout
said therefore among themselves let us rend cast lots whose scripture might fulfilled saith parted raiment vesture did these things soldiers
now there stood by cross jesus mother mother's sister mary wife cleophas magdalene
jesus therefore saw mother disciple standing by whom loved saith woman behold thy son
then saith disciple behold thy mother hour took her own home
after jesus knowing things now accomplished scripture might fulfilled saith thirst
now there set vessel full vinegar filled spunge put upon hyssop mouth
jesus therefore had received vinegar said finished bowed head gave ghost
jews therefore because preparation bodies should remain upon cross on sabbath day high besought pilate legs might broken taken away
then came soldiers brake legs first other crucified
came jesus saw dead already brake legs
one soldiers spear pierced side forthwith came there out blood water
saw bare record true knoweth saith ye might believe
these things done scripture should fulfilled bone broken
again another scripture saith look on whom pierced
after joseph arimathaea being disciple jesus secretly fear jews besought pilate might take away body gave leave came therefore took
there came also nicodemus at first jesus by night brought mixture myrrh aloes about hundred pound weight
then took body jesus wound linen clothes spices manner jews bury
now place where crucified there garden new sepulchre wherein never man yet laid
there laid jesus therefore because jews' preparation day sepulchre nigh at hand
first day week cometh mary magdalene early yet dark sepulchre seeth stone taken away
then she runneth cometh simon peter other disciple whom jesus loved saith taken away lord out sepulchre we know where laid
peter therefore went forth other disciple came sepulchre
so ran both together other disciple did outrun peter came first sepulchre
stooping down looking saw linen clothes lying yet went
then cometh simon peter following went sepulchre seeth linen clothes lie
napkin about head lying linen clothes wrapped together place by itself
then went also other disciple came first sepulchre saw believed
yet knew scripture must rise again dead
then disciples went away again own home
mary stood without at sepulchre weeping she wept stooped down looked
seeth two angels white sitting one at head other feet where body jesus had lain
say her woman why weepest thou she saith because taken away lord know where laid
she had thus said turned herself back saw jesus standing knew
jesus saith her woman why weepest thou whom seekest she supposing gardener sir if borne hence tell where hast laid take away
jesus saith her mary she turned herself rabboni say master
jesus saith her touch am yet ascended father go brethren say ascend your god
mary magdalene came told disciples she had seen lord spoken these things her
then same day at evening being first week doors shut where disciples assembled fear jews came jesus stood midst saith peace you
had so said shewed hands side then disciples glad saw lord
then said jesus again peace you father hath sent even so send
had said breathed on saith receive ye holy ghost
whose soever sins ye remit remitted retain retained
thomas one twelve called didymus jesus came
other disciples therefore said we seen lord except see hands print nails put finger thrust hand side believe
after eight days again disciples within thomas then came jesus doors being shut stood midst said peace you
then saith thomas reach hither thy finger behold hands hand thrust side faithless believing
thomas answered said lord god
jesus saith thomas because thou hast seen believed blessed yet
many other signs truly did jesus presence disciples written book
these written ye might believe jesus christ son god believing life through name
after these things jesus shewed himself again disciples at sea tiberias on wise
there together simon peter thomas called didymus nathanael cana galilee sons zebedee two other disciples
simon peter saith go fishing say we also thee went forth entered ship immediately night caught nothing
morning now come jesus stood on shore disciples knew
then jesus saith children ye any meat answered no
said cast net on right side ship ye find therefore now able draw multitude fishes
therefore disciple whom jesus loved saith peter lord now simon heard girt fisher's coat naked did cast himself sea
other disciples came little ship far land two hundred cubits dragging net fishes
soon then come land saw fire coals there fish laid thereon bread
jesus saith bring fish ye now caught
simon peter went drew net land full great fishes hundred fifty three there so many yet broken
jesus saith come dine none disciples durst ask who art thou knowing lord
jesus then cometh taketh bread giveth fish likewise
now third time jesus shewed himself disciples after risen dead
so had dined jesus saith simon peter son jonas lovest thou more than these yea lord knowest love thee feed lambs
saith again second time simon son jonas lovest thou yea lord knowest love thee feed sheep
saith third time simon son jonas lovest thou peter grieved because said lord knowest things love thee jesus feed sheep
verily say thee thou wast young girdedst thyself walkedst whither wouldest shalt old stretch forth thy hands another gird carry
spake signifying by what death should glorify god had spoken saith follow
then peter turning about seeth disciple whom jesus loved following also leaned on breast at supper said lord betrayeth thee
peter seeing saith jesus lord what man do
jesus saith if tarry till come what thee follow thou
then went saying abroad among brethren disciple should die yet jesus said if tarry till come what thee
disciple testifieth these things wrote we know testimony true
there also many other things jesus did if should written every one suppose even world itself could contain books amen
former treatise made o theophilus jesus began both do teach
until day taken after through holy ghost had given commandments apostles whom chosen
whom also shewed himself alive after passion by many infallible proofs being seen forty days speaking things pertaining kingdom god
being assembled together commanded should depart jerusalem wait promise father saith ye heard
john truly baptized water ye holy ghost many days hence
therefore come together asked saying lord wilt thou at time restore again kingdom israel
said you know times or seasons father hath put own power
ye receive power after holy ghost come upon you witnesses both jerusalem judaea samaria uttermost part earth
had spoken these things while beheld taken cloud received out sight
while looked stedfastly toward heaven went behold two men stood by white apparel
also said ye men galilee why stand gazing heaven same jesus taken you so come like manner seen go
then returned jerusalem mount called olivet sabbath day's journey
come went upper room where abode both peter james john andrew philip thomas bartholomew matthew son alphaeus simon zelotes judas brother
these continued one accord prayer supplication women mary mother jesus brethren

men brethren scripture must needs been fulfilled holy ghost by mouth david spake before concerning judas guide took jesus
numbered us had obtained part ministry
now man purchased field reward iniquity falling headlong burst asunder midst bowels gushed out
known dwellers at jerusalem insomuch field called proper tongue aceldama say blood
written book psalms let habitation desolate no man dwell therein bishoprick another take
wherefore these men companied us time lord jesus went out among
beginning baptism john same day taken us must one ordained witness resurrection
appointed two joseph called barsabas who surnamed justus matthias
prayed said thou lord knowest hearts men shew whether these two hast chosen
may take part ministry apostleship judas by transgression fell might go own place
gave forth lots lot fell upon matthias numbered eleven apostles
day pentecost fully come one accord place
suddenly there came sound heaven rushing mighty wind filled house where sitting
there appeared cloven tongues like fire sat upon each
filled holy ghost began speak other tongues spirit gave utterance
there dwelling at jerusalem jews devout men out every nation under heaven
now noised abroad multitude came together confounded because every man heard speak own language

how hear we every man our own tongue wherein born
parthians medes elamites dwellers mesopotamia judaea cappadocia pontus asia

others mocking said these men full new wine

these drunken ye suppose seeing third hour day
spoken by prophet joel

shew wonders heaven above signs earth beneath blood fire vapour smoke
sun turned darkness moon blood before great notable day lord come
come pass whosoever call on name lord saved
ye men israel hear these words jesus nazareth man approved god among you by miracles wonders signs did midst yourselves also know
being delivered by determinate counsel foreknowledge god ye taken wicked hands crucified slain
whom god hath raised having loosed pains death because possible should holden
david speaketh concerning foresaw lord always before face on right hand should moved
therefore did heart rejoice tongue glad moreover also flesh rest hope
because thou wilt leave soul hell neither suffer thine holy one see corruption
thou hast made known ways life shalt make full joy thy countenance
men brethren let freely speak you patriarch david both dead buried sepulchre us day
therefore being prophet knowing god had sworn oath fruit loins according flesh would raise christ sit on throne
seeing before spake resurrection christ soul left hell neither flesh did see corruption
jesus hath god raised whereof we witnesses
therefore being by right hand god exalted having received father promise holy ghost hath shed forth ye now see hear

until make thy foes footstool
therefore let house israel know assuredly god hath made same jesus whom ye crucified both lord christ
now heard pricked heart said peter rest apostles men brethren what we do
then peter said repent baptized every one you name jesus christ remission sins ye receive gift holy ghost
promise you your children afar off even many lord our god call
many other words did testify exhort saying save yourselves untoward generation
then gladly received word baptized same day there added about three thousand souls
continued stedfastly apostles' doctrine fellowship breaking bread prayers

sold possessions goods parted men every man had need

people saw walking praising god

gave none inheritance no so much set foot on yet promised would give possession seed after had child

at second time joseph made known brethren joseph's kindred pharaoh
then sent joseph called father jacob kindred threescore fifteen souls
so jacob went down egypt died our fathers

time promise drew nigh god had sworn abraham people grew multiplied egypt
till another king arose knew joseph
same dealt subtilly our kindred evil entreated fathers so cast out young children end might live
time moses born exceeding fair nourished father's house three months
cast out pharaoh's daughter took nourished her own son
moses learned wisdom egyptians mighty words deeds
full forty years old came heart visit brethren children israel
seeing one suffer wrong defended avenged oppressed smote egyptian
supposed brethren would understood how god by hand deliver

did neighbour wrong thrust away saying who made thee ruler judge over us

then fled moses at saying stranger land madian where begat two sons

there great joy city

saying give also power on whomsoever lay hands may receive holy ghost

trembling astonished said lord what wilt thou do arise go city told thee must
men journeyed stood speechless hearing voice seeing no man
